text:
took one tab   of it   at am and felt the first effects   mins later  except perspective distortion  i had no visuals at all  i have this effect also on high amounts of sativa weed and with dissos  so i would say its is not more psychedelic than these  i was a bit more sensitive to light  but thats also something  that i know from weed  

i had some minor nausea during most of the time of the trip  but i guess it was more due to the perspective distortion  

music sounded great and creativity was increased  i had some nice conversations with my wife  i was able to  force  some drifting when i stared on a textured surface  but it was very subtle 

physical euphoria started towards end of the trip for some short amount of time 

the headspace was very functional  i would say  my wife did not notice at all that i took something  though i talked with her during the whole trip  i was properly able to coock  eat lucnh with her and go for a walk to the next shopping center on my own to buy some groceries during the peak  even having some small arguments did not throw me off balance  though i had the need to come clean immediately  

i feel that being on your own is not very pleasurable on this substance  i felt the need for talking and doing something rather than listening to music or watching movies 

around   it began to wear off  but i noticed when changing the environment  going out again  that i was higher than i felt before  between   and   i was quite sober again with a nice after effect  sleeping a around midnight was no issue at all  the day after is totally ok with no side effects 

i have a bit doubts that i actually took   al lad due to the missing visuals  that were reported to be more pronounced with this substance  than with lsd  i read that   al lad does not react with test kits  so would like to know if these effects are common or i might have had another substance  

i dont want to take     tabs the next time  before making sure that its actually   al lad  because i actually felt quite on the edge of getting a strong headspace all the time and i guess this would just get more pronounced  then i would rather stick with   lsd  which is much more visual and crisp  even at lower doses    al ad felt quite mellow  what someone might call warm  on   lsd i had the impression that my thoughts became more clear while on the   al lad i felt that they got confusing like on weed 

are these effects common for   al lad or al lad or did i have maybe another substance  i also read  that the substance has not a linear dose  effects curve  so that the difference between   and   can be significant

text:
so my brain was virgin and i used both   and   daily  for functional purpose 
i took  medium  doses and medium   doses 

generally people report that   is more warm euphoric entactogenic than   which is said to have low recreational value 

i never tried d amph but my goal is to reach this supposed sweet spot of euphoria and functionalness 

  fma at a dose of     mg is functional but after a few weeks it bring not much fun euphoria  and even at the start the effect was mild 
  fma at the same dose was much more warm appreciable 

so i decided to try medium   doses  i tried   at     mg twice and paradoxically the effect was shit  i felt i was on something dirty  i had zero energy motivation  possibly less than sober   and i did felt a warm feeling and something close to euphoria but halfway there  that was not enjoyable at all and frustrating  those days were shitty and i regret them  although i didn t use the stim efficiently  i stayed in bed and waited for the stim to do it s magic  the experience could have been better had i done something of my day  

today i tried for the first time   at   and    i am  much  more functional    at least for now    after taking it  i feel a gentle feeling of joy happiness  

i have expertise in pharmacology and i do not understand at all what can explain those discrepancies at equivalent dose  

hypothesises 
     and   would not have the same bioavailability  meaning that you need higher   doses      
i don t believe much in that hypothesis and lower dose of   fma don t make me feel anergic  

the binding profile of both stims are not perfectly known but 
we know that   has an equipotent releasing potency of sert vs amphetamine    fma is supposed to act not as much as amphetamine on sert  i doubt amphetamine at similar dose would make me feel anergic avolition  
releasing potency is not everything  the reuptake and binding to transporters matter but they are not known    could be more serotonergic or not than amph because of this  
   the serotonin would make me feel anergic  

we know that amphetamine is a  much  more potent noradrenaline releasing agent than meth and      fma might be more noradrenergic than    in fact at similar dose   induce more dry mouth  
   euphoria is not supposed to be significantly mediated by noradrenaline but that would at least explain the functionalness

the potency of   vs   for dopamin is unknown  to me  
i doubt that   fma is more dopaminergic but that could explain  

   other explanations 
sigmaergy  
unknowns

i still have to see how my tolerance will evolve and whether a simultaneous mix of   with a bit of   can bring the best of both worlds  

tl dr i prefer   vs   at    but significantly prefer   at    which is contra narrative because   is said as mostly purely functional and   as being great for fun  and i had a bad experience

text:
i’ve fucked around with pressed bars for quite awhile  and it wasn’t until recent that i realized they’re mostly rc benzos  

i get some that feel pretty similar to kpins  just mellow me out still very functional and i don’t forget things  and most importantly  i wake up functional and not barred out  i’m guessing these are etiz’ but who can be sure  

now there’s these other bars i can get  and last time i did them i don’t remember literally anything past taking the first bar  i gotta assume they were clonazolam  i took them around   and my mother said she saw me stumbling around getting cake at    walking blackout  no memory for around   hours after i dosed  

i just hate that some bars are perfect and are exactly what i expect from a “xanax” even if i know it’s street pressed  but others send me into dark holes that usually end with involuntary detox  which is basically just jail but dope

text:
so i always wanted to try every class of drugs    i heard o dsmt is a good opioid that s legally for sale on rc markets  i purchased from   different vendors    of an unknown powder form and   hcl powder 

tl dr   thought freebase was bunk because it didn t dissolve in water and burnt my mouth with hcl  in short  i had an  amazing  first time experience with an opioid   i d describe it as boring as a benzo but with added nausea  vomiting  heat flash and optional chemical burns to the mouth  still feeling like shit     after the last   dose  i hope you use my experience as an example of what not to do 

i decided to try the unknown form first  putting   in water  it did not dissolve  it s probably the freebase which isn t water soluble  dumbass   seeing as i recently saw  this post  https   www reddit com r researchchemicalsnl comments      this scared me so i poured it out and put   in water instead to be  safer   still not dissolving but i thought fuck it and drank it anyway  it tasted awful and bitter  what i didn t notice is that a lot of the powder just stuck to the glass so that when i wanted to drink just water from it again about   or so later  i was shocked by the disgusting flavour  i realise my onset would be staggered as i didn t get the full   at once  this was annoying 

anyway i wait it out for about     since the first drink  not feeling anything except slight nausea so i think to take more  seeing as i thought the first powder was bunk as it didn t dissolve  it s probably freebase     i decided to try the other hcl powder  since the first powder didn t dissolve i figured i d just not bother trying to dirty my glass again and just pop the powder in my mouth  wow  what a mistake  i flipped   from my scale s dish right under my tongue and got a nasty chemical burn  i quickly tried to wash the rest down my throat  not before getting another burn on the surface of my tongue which manifested as a tough bump 

i immediately realise how stupid i m being and just put the powders away before i try anymore idiotic shit  my   dose was surprisingly worse than my first  i had terrible nausea all the way until the   mark  it seemed to stop for a bit but then i suddenly got really hot and felt the urge to run to the bathroom  throwing up just in the nick of time  this was pretty shocking and i had to hunch over the toilet to quell my intense nausea  after a few minutes i went to bed but since the curtains weren t closed i quickly stood up and walked to them   bad move  vomited again in the bathroom 

i brushed my teeth and stayed in bed for longer this time  i tried to sleep but couldn t i was getting weird thoughts and imagining annoying things involuntarily e g  some bread commercial  i decide i can t sleep like this so i get up and go sit at my desk to play cs go  not even one whole wingman game finished before i m back at the bathroom for a   time vomiting

text:
tldr  
best study aid productivity enhancer    fpm and caffeine

best for recreational use    and mdma

about me    y o male with minor adhd symptoms  has been experimenting with all types of drugs since age    nowadays mainly interested in functional stimulants and psychedelics but also using benzos sporadically as comedown drug or sleeping agent  sober when making this list

if you can recommend other substances or disagree with my opinion feel free to comment

roa for this list is oral via capsule and vaporized  foil and pipe  if mentioned


amphetamine     
  the non toxic og  long lasting powerfull euphoric stimulation  makes every activity interesting and motivating  the benchmark for stimulants

  nasty comedown with long lasting residual stimulation  becomes alot worse when redosed


  fa    
   almost the same effects as amphetamine up to medium doses with shorter duration and less severe comedown

  pretty low ceiling dose  anything above high dosage not worth it  very caustic


  fma    
  similar to   fa with less euphoria and longer duration

  similar negatives to   fa


  fa    
   very long duration with managable comedown 

  feels like little dopamine activity is present  body feels energetic but with little motivation and euphoria  noticable side effects at common doses  abnormal heartbeat  sweating 


  fpm    
  clean stimulation with moderate euphoria but almost no comedown  feels like an inbetween of caffeine and amphetamine  easy to vape which makes it much more recreational

  comedown becomes present if redosed


  mph    
   no comedown at common doses  slow tolerance increase

  feels less energetic than caffeine  only little euphoria  low ceiling dose  less is more   redosing is difficult and can cause anxiety


methylphenidate    
   clean stimulation with short euphoric rush  good study aid

  recreational doses come with noticable side effects and comedown


caffeine    
   fast acting  if used sporadically effective wake up agent  little comedown with effective redosing  very safe even with long term use

  jitters and other side effects with higher doses  positives dissapear and are replaced by withdrawal symptoms once tolerance is build


hexen    
   tasty when vaped  intense rush that can not be brought back by redosing

 strong residual stimulation that makes sleeping impossible long after any euphoria dissapeared  intense craving but binges are not rewarding in any way


a php    
   oral roa somewhat functional with surprisingly nice effects  the sex masturbation drug  intense rush that can be brought back by increasing dosage  binges are somewhat rewarding if kept under a day

    makes extremly horny

  the most addictive substance i have come across  intense anxiety and plot building so benzos are a must have  nasty smell that sticks to everything including walls and furniture  binges are hard to avoid because craving is severe  vasoconstriction and abnormal heartbeat at common doses


a      
   no positives  difficult to vape  nasty taste and smell with little to no effects  not worth trying


     
  high oral doses feel like less intense mdma with much less energy  chill vibe   redosing is effective  comedown is minimal with common doses  can be vaped effectivly  low doses are somewhat functional  the  fire and forget  drug  moderate serotonergic activity thats not overwhelming

  likely to have a bad safety profile  high addiction potencial  builds tolerance quickly


  mapb    
   potent and long lasting serotonin releaser with little dopamine activity  very rewarding in a  borox combo   comedown is minimal

    can be vaped effectivly reducing duration with a noticable rush with more energy than oral roa

 very little energy  serotonergic effects can be overwhelming  no  fire and forget   can feel almost dysphoric  very long tolerance breaks are a must


mdma    
  magic  reliable and very pleasurable effect profile  fire and forget   the best substance for socializing and deep talks  almost therapeutic discussions that can improve relationships  very energetic  makes dancing and other physical activities extremly euphoric  the best cuddle drug  little comedown and euphoric afterglow when used in calculated personal dosages with long tolerance breaks

    truth serum  works best if only used for special occasions  less than twice a year 

 can lose the  magic  if used too often  very long tolerance breaks are a must have  severly impacts the effect of other stimulants for up to a week  neurotoxic  especially if body temperatur is high  dehydration is severe  makes eating and drinking difficult


dimethocaine  dmc     
   oral use is not effective  required dosage for nasal and vaped roa is very high which makes it unpleasurable to consume  effects are underwhelming with side effects at common doses

about a week ago  i ordered   gram of   mmc from a dutch dealer  this morning  at about     am  the doorbell rings  it s the courier  i look out and as soon as i take the package    local police officers get out of a black jeep and then break into my house  after showing the badge  they tell me that the courier reported the package to the authorities  and that they are therefore authorized to start a search of my home  they enter  and begin to turn every room upside down  as if i were a drug dealer of escobar s caliber   i give him the gram of   mmc and a measly blotter of   lsd  pretty much everything i had in the house  they ask me to get dressed and let me get in the car to take me to the police station  once there they analyze the substance and wow they discover it is amphetamines  but on the paper report they brand it as mdma  they give me a lecture telling me not to buy this shit  reiterating that everything is not going to end up on my criminal record because they are doing me a favor  for no reason  they even temporarily seize my phone  once the minutes are done  they let me go home  i got reported as a drug addict  they also confiscated the   lsd blotter despite having no reagents to test it     it was enough to read lsd on the card to hold it     

well  all this happened in italy  and the courier who reported me was bartolini  the thing that bothers me most is that i have received the package many times without problems  and just today  the police decided to break into my house  i thought that the courier was a safe way to get the stuff to my house  because the dealer i bought from offered this option for the modest sum of   euros  it s all here guys  bartolini is an affiliate of the dpd group  so beware of couriers from the same chain

text:
i ve had my issues with this rc for     year and i m trying to get out of it assisted with an addictologist and a psychologist 
within such a short period i ve wasted so much money and i ve clearly damaged my mental health  as well as my nose  mostly  

i ve tethered   mmc to a specific event that happened to me back then  and everytime i finish using i m the most miserable person in the world and i honestly think i could take my own life because my brain is stuck in a kind of thoughts loop about the aforementioned event  
i can t find anything to stop these thoughts and make me feel better and anxiolytics are not recommended  even though my former gp had me put on xanax last year  

i usually end up in tears for several hours  plus i m quite dehydrated  moderately starved  i m trying to drink and eat but you know how it works 

the ritual and the events i connected are mine  but i know some of the aftermaths  side effects can be experienced by other users 
if it ever happened to you  have you found something to counterbalance this critical condition  i don t really kno what i m looking for  open to anything  
i m not planning to use again but yesterday showed me that it may happen and i should be prepared for this 

thanks for reading

text:
reporting in  
i went out drinking w friends had   cocktails  a small doobie and about   mg   insufflated over the evening   
got home  prepared everything to go lie down in bed  insufflated   mxipr  chilled a bit and hopped in the shower 

at this point i already felt like i had clear communication with my body  and my body wanted a steaming hot shower  while in the shower i closed the cold showerknob bit by bit until it felt like i was in a steam cooker  around this time the mxipr started coming up  i felt great   
  minutes of steaming later i feel the heat and mxipr relaxing my muscles   i get too warm and my body tells me to go for an ice cold shower  i am used to taking cold showers so i completely close the warm water knob at once  now i m feeling like wim hof s fucking daddy complete  ly dominitating this ice cold shower while fully relaxing and enjoying the sensations   
but the relaxation really begins when i get out the shower  i get out  cover myself in my weighted blanket put on my headset and listen to some guided mindfullness audio 

  
now this is the moment where i reach ultimate ultimate relaxation  i ve had moments in my life where i was so relaxed i felt like my body would melt into the floor  but that is nothing to this   
i felt like i was being massaged by a thousand fairies and that they stretched all my muscles from my bed to the end of the universe  i felt like i knew how life and the world worked  it was blissful

mxipr is a big yes for me  going to try a bit more next time without anything in my system  i would say it felt like a body heavy k trip but obviously my experience was influenced by the other stuff in my body  it s   am now i still can t fall asleep despite the relaxation so i decided to write this little report  hope you enjoyed and stay safe

text:
our story begins with my retrieval of   blue   clonazolam bars      each purportedly  i generally have a high threshold for psychoactive substances  benzos included  and i m pretty experienced with c lam and recalled the blackout potential as being highly dangerous  i abstained from drinking all day in anticipation of their arrival to help prevent such a scenario  

with a little trepidation i started with     bar at about     on my day off work  i let the      kick in and level out  at which point i felt pretty functional  no motor control issues  no typos when texting  etc  the slightly foggy relaxation is cool  but i wanted to catch a real buzz so i took another     at t      i recall nothing past this for approx   hours 

when i started regaining lucidity i realize i am in my boxers  bleeding from both knees and one leg  my shoes are conspicuously missing  i have an achy knot on my forehead and a badly sprained ankle as well  i was standing just inside the entrance of my work  in front of manager who was trying desperately to help me out  they had no idea what s up with me  they chalked it up to some episodically problematic psychiatric issues i have and am open about  so they drive me to the er  

still half fogged  i left the er upon hearing  toxicology report  and caught a ride home  c lam is uncontrolled in my jurisdiction  but i was sketched anyway  i arrived at my place and let myself in the window since i had no keys  my place was halfway trashed  all my bars were missing  as was my whole stash of speed  apparently i d blown through all the bars save for about   i found outside later that evening  i found that my phone and wallet are completely missing  and upon further inspection that i have the batteries for my scale but the scale itself was missing  a solitary left boot sat under my bed  missing its mate 

what did i learn  stay the fuck away from clonazolam is the biggest take away for me  too blackouty at recreational doses  and the urge to redose is  at least for me  problematic  scary shit can go down and i m lucky to be alive as i live next to a busy ish road and could ve easily walked into traffic  or could ve died from an od as i had no capacity to get to help in the event of distress  also  if possible mix your own solution and volumetrically dose if at all possible so you know exactly how much you ve dosed  and steer clear of any bunk pills anytime ever  who the fuck knows what s in them anyway  

tl dr
c lam will rob you and leave you bleeding in an alley days later with zero recall whatsoever  find some far more forgiving benzos or just avoid them entirely

text:
it can be difficult to find out the what is banned and in which country  this info might help you understand the process and help you prepare to for any future upcoming bans  so you aren t caught off guard anymore  keep in mind that multiple government sources are required to make certain a substance isn t banned before purchasing 

not all  but a lot of the bans are related to a few types of meetings bulletins initiated by unodc who  first  they present a few drugs for consideration of regulation with requests for comments on the matter  after that  they decide the schedule each substance should be and announce the date that it comes into force  although  not all substances presented are scheduled by unodc who 

for example from this link  https   www unodc org lss announcement details            mxp    meo dalt  and   fpm were not scheduled but were noted to be kept under surveillance  also  you can see that flubromazolam was banned in this specific announcement  it comes into force december       so that s why these bans are happening now in different countries 

these bans do not take effect immediately in all the member states  there is a deadline for them to enact policies to prohibit the proposed substances  although  the speed at which each country makes a decision varies 

this is where the announcements are listed  wait for page to collapse links to read titles easier   https   www unodc org lss announcement type nps

two pumps of nasal spray in each nostril    
   one more pump in each nostril      total 
   starting to feel onset 
   another spray in each nostril     total   gonna wait a bit before redosing again  either gonna watch maniac on netflix or play skyrim 
   playing skyrim i’m high asf
   might have to change the difficulty bc i’m playing terribly lpl
   strong physical numbness  really enjoying playing skyrim rn 
   one more spray each nostril  total is now    
   i love playing this game  the visuals are so nice  from skyrim and mod not from drugs   
   i’m having more fun than i would sober for sure  i’ve never really been into playing games high but this is amazing 
   just dosed another one in each nostril  total is  
   man i’m having the time of my life rn haha  never had this much fun playing video games before 
   didn’t realize i was this high until i stood up to go to the bathroom  this is amazing lol 
   i feel almost like powerful or something  pretty sure it’s hypomania 
   i’m really immersed in this game   i got attacked by a lion and jumped irl
   noticing myself coming down a lot  just dosed an additional    total dose is now  
   just remembered i kinda have stuff to do tmr lol  probably should stop with the redosing 

   i’m surprised by the emotional connection i have to this game rn  i feel actual anger towards the silver hand for killing kodlak

   just finished the companions questline in skyrim  it was the most immersive and emotional gaming experience i’ve had lol  i felt powerful when i was peaking and was fighting in the game  i felt the energy running through me  when characters died in the game i actually felt emotions from it  it was as close to actually being inside the game as i think i’ll ever get  this was a crazy experience and honestly way more than i expected 
   back to watching maniac 

   now i’m laying down listening to music  holy fuck  this drug is insane  dissociatives really are my favorite  

   i would fucking love to smoke some weed rn lol  this t break is easy until i’m coming down from dissos and then i really miss it 

   this drugs feels like being in a broken computer 

   straight blissin  i love dissos  

next day  this is where i’m gonna write the report of what i was actually feeling bc i was too immersed in the games i was playing and shows i was watching to type very much during the experience  first off  today i feel ducking great  just in an amazing mood  the afterglow is really fucking nice  had a really nice long hot shower and just in a really good mood  almost euphoric tbh  when the   ho pcp hit i decided to play some skyrim  i had just finished installing a shitton of mods  i think somewhere around       and i was excited to play the game  i started the companion questline with a completely new character and waited for the drug to hit  when it did hit  i felt fucking amazing  the immersion in video games with this drug is unmatched by anything i have ever tried before  i was aware of the body sensations i had in real life  but i was much more focused on the feeling i got on the game  whenever i killed an enemy i got such a rush  and after a while when the hypomania started to kick in a little more  i felt powerful  i just had this crazy ego boost and felt like i had so much power  as if i was the character in the game  i was also in awe of the graphics and music of the game  i normally don’t pay much attention to these things because i just view it as very simple fun and i’m never too focused or obsessed with it  but during this high the game became my life  and i loved it  the visuals were also really nice in the game because of the mods i installed  and the game felt pretty new because the mods changed the game a decent amount  throughout the questline i actually felt emotions relating to what was happening in the game  i’m not usually an emotional person at all when it comes to forms of media  besides music   movies never made me cry or feel an urge to  etc  but i felt actual real emotions whenever someone died that i was allied with in the game  or whenever i learned something new about what was happening  it was strange because i had played the game many times before and knew what was going to happen  but i still felt emotions tied to things the whole time  i felt anger when kodlak died  and felt like a movie character who needed to seek vengeance  the whole experience felt like i was the main character in a movie  and was a very intense experience emotionally  the story of the game kinda went well with the high too  with the mania in the beginning middle tying well with the fight scenes and at the end i was more focused on the story as i was coming down a little more  i redosed a lot during this time  and this is the most   ho pcp i’ve ever taken  i didn’t realize how high i was because i was so focused on the game  but every time i stood up it hit me hard and i realized how high i was  i also watched some netflix during parts of the experience  mostly when i had to eat  i get really hungry on   ho pcp for some reason   and the immersion in the show  maniac  was pretty intense as well  i recently did   ho pcp and watched that show basically all day  and it was a very enjoyable experience  when i was coming down a lot more  after i finished the questline in the game  i went to visit my friend who is leaving moving away soon  i started crying almost immediately after seeing him pack things up  i’m not a very emotional person  and i don’t usually cry much at these things  but i cried harder than i have in years last night  overall  this was a very positive experience and one of my favorite drug experiences i’ve ever had  when i first tried this substance i didn’t see much value in it  because imo it doesn’t really enhance music as much as other dissociatives like dxm  but it’s immersion in games movies series is unmatched by anything i’ve ever tried      great experience will do again

text:
month ago my life took a crazy turn  my ptsd surfaced from a repressed childhood of trauma  abuse  family betrayal  etc…won’t go into it it  we all came from somewhere  


spent the last couple years using cannabis daily to mitigate anxiety assist with a sleeping disorder but realized now i was running repressing and self medicating all the time  despite being quite “successful” in terms of career  homes  finances  wife and kids etc my ptsd and repressed memories have surfaced  and for about   weeks became extraordinarily anxious depressed tons of distorted thinking and even suicidal thoughts  no plans though  

it’s been really hard  however i moved from   counseling session eow to every week including marriage counseling for the sake of my wife understanding a deeper picture of why i have responded this way and how she can support  

i hadn’t used my xanax script for months  hardly ever   but when this hit i was using     a day  maybe a   dose of     at night to calm down my mind and rest  

i ran out and it took a few days to get a refill which i knew would happen and ended up obtaining some flu alp  
i’ve been using this daily now for a week              tops but never reposing   just for sleep  but yes only one dose a night to sleep    i stay focused at work and endure the days anxieties as to not self medicate this situation like i was prior and deal with what’s surfaced  last night i dosed     then     later really late when tossing and turning  this stuff is strong  but after an hour or so i’m ready to sleep  

i read horror stories about research chems  i have more anxiety about wondering if my withdrawals are going to be insane after all the reading i’m doing  are people dosing more than me    and that’s why these horrible problems occur  i have my xanax script back now and plan to moderately dose as my anxiety around my episode last month is definitely lifting  especially combines with therapy  

the horror stories worry me though  what’s the half life of flu alp and am i in for it     like am i already too deep into this or will simply slowing coming down and be safe to do 

love feedback however it looks  thanks again

text:
hi  so i ve tripped on a fair few different psychedelics   i find lysergamide bodyload energising and restless but not uncomfortable and would judge them the easiest bodyload for me   common tryptamines  shrooms    subs  can be a little bit rougher on my body but it s still quite relaxing with a heavy load more like weed that i can enjoy if i don t have to go anywhere   

tripping for me these days is mostly for the aim of a novel visual   musical experience as i ve had plenty of spiritual  introspective trips and am currently pretty settled   i probably only trip about once every     months and generally haven t used many drugs recently bar daily weed so tolerance isn t a factor here 

phenethylamines  specifically the couple   i ve tried  along with nbome back in the day  give me my favourite visuals by far  but the worst bodyload   this is independent of supplier  salt form  dosage and method of ingestion   something in my body just does not react well specifically with phenethylamines   this is a shame as they re my favourite psychedelic due to taking less of an emotional commitment and having wide applications   spontaneous  social  sex etc   i like to trip at big clubs and parties and only phenethylamines leave me clear headed enough to feel    confident doing it and getting myself home safely afterwards  

it will always start with the projectile vomit  even if snorted   then is the comeup with immediate  aggressive bodyload which is cramping and squeezing all over my body along with aching shoulder joints   the clenched feeling and need to stretch is so much stronger than other psychedelics i ve tried and puts me off taking it   i ache through the trip and afterwards with a killer migraine at the end   i m also a woman and taking it  anywhere  near my period  so even   days before  massively increases this to the point of physical pain in my muscles and joints   

note  it doesn t feel dangerous like an allergy or something   it s just a bodyload and nausea far more intense than i think is expected   for example   snorted   will have more bodyload for me than   lsd   i ve tried yoga on the comeup which does help  and feels class tripping   but not completely   also tried known vasodilators and herbal aids like citrulline  magnesium  ginkgo  ginger  garlic etc to zero effect   alcohol helps slightly  so not sure if it s the muscle relaxing part that helps there  

  i am wondering   what s different in the structure of these drugs that makes my body react so differently physically compared to other common psychedelics   

  does anyone else here have a much stronger bodyload from these drugs than others   did you ever figure out why

text:
hello again    
i ve made a new overview of the most  common and popular lysergamides  https   imgur com padykgf  with which you can quickly compare their structural differences  there are some of these floating about but they rarely include all the common analogues and when comparing different images  the orientation of the structures is usually different and imo less intuitive   


my first  post  https   www reddit com r researchchemicals comments lkjydr lysergamide structures sidebyside chart for quick   on this is archived and omitted    and   which are now included  lsz on the other hand i have left out this time  i ve also deliberately left out chems like the mipla series or things like   al lad  you now know it would simply be al lad with the same   group attached   


as always  explicit hydrogens are left out  the rest of the structure is left to show as much of the   nature of the molecules in a static flat image  i encourage you to check out the lsd structure in    here  https   www worldofmolecules com     htm   takes a while to load  then click and drag to rotate the molecule   i hope it is understood that all analogues have  lysergic acid diethylamide  following their unique identifier    acetyl        etc    


if you see any errors or have any feedback  let me know   next up  probably stimulants

text:
i d like to provide some background info first  feel free to skip to the point  but i hope it serves as an example of how not to use drugs to people also suffering from anxiety and depression  i am a   yo male who has been a recreational drug addict for about   years and i have suffered from depression and anxiety my entire life  i have managed to use mainly dissociatives and psychedelics for a long time at least weekly to both escape from the pain and to try to feel the emotions my depression numbs  but i have used and abused pretty much every drug from every drug class  i realized from the beginning i was self destructing  but i didn t care because i ve been suicidally depressed for years  but lately my anxiety has worsened to a level that has made it unbearable  causing me to be closer to suicide than ever  

i experienced my first panic attack on a high lsd dose last year in september which had me admitted to a hospital and was so traumatic it ruined every future trip  at the time i was surprised because i had experience with more than a hundred psychedelic trips but now i realize that the frequency in which i tripped was precisely the reason why i got the panic attack  i had been ignoring troubling symptoms of addiction for a long time  my disso tolerance was constantly through the roof  often causing me to feel even more depressed  and i had to dose my psychedelics at times in quadrupled common doses  around the same time as my first panic attack i started abusing alcohol heavily but was forced to quit after only a few months because the insomnia i had been developing from it had become too severe 

i should have recognized the warning signs but i stayed in denial for a few more months and kept using until practically every drug class started having a negative effect on my sleep  earlier this year i started developing gad which made it harder and harder to justify my drug use because i was having trouble functioning  in april this year i decided to quit entirely when a few key bumps of dck caused a sleepless night and panic attack that lasted hours  but it was too late because the anxiety had gotten so out of hand that i couldn t function anymore at work and had to be admitted to a psychiatric hospital  at this point i had also been prescribed seroquel for about half a year which i was forced to quit from when it started inducing panic attacks  during seroquel withdrawal i started getting anxiety attacks even being off any drugs  which was a first  and it caused my insomnia to deteriorate  which i m still suffering the consequences from 

before this i had only ever used benzos functionally after stimulant binges  but i never had any problems controlling myself and i never understood what people were talking about when they were talking about benzo euphoria and how they could get addicted  this changed when i got them prescribed around april  very quickly i started getting dependent on them psychologically  i knew very well what the benzo withdrawal entailed but i still slipped into addiction because it was the only drug that relieved anxiety and especially because every ssri made me more anxious and deteriorated my sleep quality  soon enough i started being dependent on them to sleep  but when i started getting so tolerant that i could barely source them anymore i was forced to get off them  i had been using on and off for maybe   months and abusing for a few weeks  it was absolute hell to get off them   even though it hadn t been that long  i suffered for a week from constant panic attacks  unbearable insomnia  constantly near tachycardia  complete loss of appetite  chest pains  nightmares     i had to fight the urge to source some of my dads bromazepam every hour of every day  

i made it   without and then dosed once and then noticed that after that the worst of it was over  i committed myself to log every use from then on to prevent the same from happening again  but i didn t plan on quitting entirely because no other med worked and certainly not as well so i sourced some etizolam to replace the prescription lorazepam and bromazepam from my dad  for a few months i managed to control myself and i managed to limit my use to twice a week max  however about   months ago i relapsed on recreational drugs and i started using etizolam together with the dissos and psychs to be able to handle them without anxiety  of course i didn t hold this up for long and the drugs made my insomnia worsen and etizolam tolerance increase  i was forced to quit recreational drugs again last weekend because i was getting increasingly more sleep deprivated  right now i m lucky to sleep   on average and i m at least   days behind on sleep just from the last   weeks  to make matters worse i m getting withdrawal from etizolam and i m completely stuck in a vicious cycle because the sleep deprivation is making the anxiety worse which in turn is making it almost impossible to sleep especially because the withdrawal is making everything worse  

i m growing increasingly desperate because i ve tried trazodone which doesn t help enough  i ve tried melatonin but that has never felt like anything more than placebo  i m on mirtazapine which helps a bit but not enough   i just got prescribed zyprexa and i m trying that tonight but i m afraid it s going to be the same result as with seroquel  it seems like the only way to get   of sleep minimum is by taking benzos every night  but i already have to take     to be able to sleep and get the chest pains and palpitations under control and i m still unable to catch up any sleep but only having my sleep deprivation increase every night  right now i m close to losing all hope and i m constantly planning out my suicide  

my question is whether anyone has an idea on how i best handle this  my idea would be to taper daily before sleep but it s incredibly hard to stay disciplined and not increase my dose again like last night when i m having chest pains even on   especially because i can t really afford a lot of more sleepless nights  but i m afraid that by taking daily i might make it worse because i wasn t taking it daily and because i ve noticed a considerable difference in tolerance between yesterday and the day before yesterday  but i don t really see any other options  i titled this post by calling it early addiction because the frequency hasn t been very high compared to many benzo addictions and certainly i have no use of that ashton manual  however i m aware it s still very problematic and it makes me respect people who made it through worse addictions much more  i m also not sure this is the right subreddit to post in so please refer me to another one if it isn t 

i have included a picture of my use log starting from my first  withdrawal  to give you an idea of the frequency and dosages  units are       for bromazepam and       for etizolam

https   imgur com

text:
even if ur stuck in a miserable addiction u shouldn t be hard on urself  ur not a bad person ur sick  most likely ur in this scenario because something is missing or ur hiding from something or not addressing something or something is currently destroying u in ur life  

i ve been addicted to so many things and it was mainly bc i was internalizing all the negativity i received  i was living in a home where i m not really welcome  i had no support network i was not happy with how i looked and i really had no real outlets  it takes time to heal from these things but after i cut off the my loser drug friends and started investing in myself  working on my art  doing daily affirmations and shit i came out of it  

 amp    

  years later i now feel comfy doing drugs again bc it s not like i m running away from anything anymore  just wanna have fun   it is possible u just need to come to ur senses  realise what s important and that u can rly have fun with this life u allow urself  no one is lost or  a way  or  stuck  people chose that and lose themselves to shit that s just literally in ur head and not the reality   


only bringing this up bc i saw some real destructive shit in the past pages and it made me sad and reminded me of me  my   friends n me back then be mixing whatever the fuck together and just crack jokes while we all had srs problems and never talked out our feelings or tried to do something productive  both of them are now dead now and i m still here and it feels just so fucked up that that shit could have been avoided  they just needed a support system or better friends or to move the fuck outta town or etc etc etc  


just understand this life is what u wanna make it and ur not alone on this hell world  lt   if my life can change in   years after being addicted to like   things urs can too    


stay safe y all and give urself a lil break  this world is a bitch

text:
on this day my package finally came in the mail  i ordered some o dsmt and   mph  

gave o dsmt a shot first since i already new this substance and it felt great as always  later that day  when i had the feeling the o dsmt wouldn t be as present anymore  i decided to snort around   of the   mph  it was stimulating and activating of some sort but i kind of also felt like i was high and tired and exhausted as i am always with cannabis  the whole afternoon felt very weird and i was very hungry the whole time  but that didn t make me stop 

in the evening i had another small bump like   of   mph because i was really tired and i thought it would wake me up  i suddenly started getting really high like uncomfortably high and took   of flualprazolam to help calm me down and stop this weird trip and feeling 

it s still a normal and fun night with my gf to this point and we re watching tv when it suddenly hits me 

i realize im not in reality whatsoever and just surfing in thoughts and visuals  my heart beat pumps to like    i stop knowing who i am and am just sitting in my bed now knowing what the fuck is going on  the xan made me sleep but my gf told me afterwards that my breath was really weird when i fell asleep so she just told me to stay awake 

the emergency arrived and i don t really remember anything else because of the xan making me blacked out other that one emergency lady was being unnecessarily rude  im guessing the vendor somehow sent me synth  cannabinoids instead of what i ordered  no clue 

just wanted to tell this story to someone  please be careful with the current   mph charge maybe this hasn t happened to me only 

tldr  what was supposed to be   mph sent me tripping and having a panik attack into the hospital

text:
as many of you are no doubt aware  the biggest bulk lab in china is no more  the lab had a total of three sister sites that vended for them  they had almost exactly the same inventories and prices 

in addition to those sites there were   more chinese vendrs that stocked their products  but it is not clear whether they were directly connected to the lab 

this organisation was rumoured to have been under the protection of the chinese triads 

around   weeks ago all of the sister sites went down at the same time  and nothing was heard from them for a long while  but then a member of a other rc subreddit  which i am the owner of  received communication from one of the sites owners 

it was bad news    apparently they had attracted too much of the authorities attention  and were forced to flee on short notice  the owner told the community  that they wish to return sometime in the future  but it will not be anytime soon  he stated that they are acquiring additional security  and negotiating with the local authorities 

i think it is safe to say  that this player held by far the biggest market share and the rc scene will be no doubt affected 

now the majority of rcs you know and love are synthesized by one and single lab in europe 

however the industry is responding to this  and new players are emerging 

i can t really share any more detailed information  nor even hint at whom i m talking about  but feel free to ask questions

text: been taking clonazolam liquid since july of this year daily  never more than    mg a day  typically       mg every night  sometimes during the day but i would be in such a trance it just wasn’t enjoyable  always taking a couple drops at night and walk around downtown west palm  sluggin golden monkey ipa’s having a good time  would also take my xan script   a day during the day and save the clon for night time  decided i wanted to stop  my girl was also fed up with my snoring as i’m on seroquel at night 🤣  said fuck it i’ll stop so i just dumped out     bottles of clam  was kind of regretting my decision the next day  took my final   drops the night before and was psyching myself out  day   woke up in a panic  still went to work said fuck it  in phone sales  i magically got a deal some how but was drinking the whole time  boss is an alcoholic so all good there  was also taking my alp script which helped tremendously  day   was yesterday  felt the same  got drunk at work  no deals  drinking henny focused on getting fucked up and to get the pain and burning in my legs to stop  finally today is day    feel   better  muscle spasms happening   woke up with a panic attack and took a    of alp  fixed all my problems  and on the plus side my alp script feels   stronger now that i quit the clon  anyone else have a daily clon habit and quit without much issues  i was so worried reading the horror stories on here but it’s really not too bad  sometimes colors are super bright  not really in a talkative mood am and stuttering a little but no seizures or anything close to it… yet lol assume i’m in the clear

text:
put   of al lad on my tongue 

   swallowed the tabs

   just felt the tabs hit  got a body high body load going on  was very sudden 

   my face feels weird  almost like there’s something crawling on it  similar feelings on my legs 

   i have a weird stomach feeling  not sure if it’s nausea or what it is  i’m slightly uncomfortable but it’s not too bad 

   definitely some nausea body load but i wasn’t feeling amazing earlier today either  i couldn’t eat much of my lunch  

   music sounds weird  almost like the pitch is changing 

   hope it comes up more than this  i feel almost sober rn 

   feels like i just set into more of the actual trip  i like this chemical i feel really nice  

   still not really getting much going on visually  i thought it was coming up more but it stopped 

   i might take some   ho met soon  if i dose before the peak is over it should still work  although i’m not sure if i’ve peaked or not yet bc this is very mild 

   this substance seems to take its time  i’m definitely tripping now but can’t tell if i’m still coming up or if this is the peak  still having some stomach discomfort but idk if it’s bc i’m a little sick or the drugs  visually not much either tbh  euphoria is kicking in tho for sure 

   ended up dosing     ho met  and ended up getting in a friends car and she took me on a scenic ride  at some point i started feeling pretty physically uncomfortable  mostly i was really thirsty and felt some strong vasoconstriction  i asked where we were and apparently we were   minutes away  this kinda triggered a bit of a panic from me but i was able to relax mostly  her driving did cause more anxiety later tho  and i felt very car sick after and uncomfortable  ended up selling her some metocin because she wanted to trip  during this period of time the opened eye visuals became so intense that looking at someone’s face would result in a sort of tunnel vision  where i could see their face clearly but everything around became a blur  and on the persons face i would see patterns that were similar to hieroglyphs   

   my friends just left my dorm  i’m tripping pretty hard  the visuals are crazy on this combo  i think my friends leaving triggered the initial feeling of sadness that became more intense later in the trip 

   the visuals seem to be better with open eyes than the closed eye visuals  the cevs are pretty dark  

   having some weird thought loops and anxiety  not sure why  as this wasn’t an issue during the peak of the trip  maybe being around people alleviated this earlier

   i left my room at some point because i was hungry  and i had left a fork in my car  i walked out to the car and this was probably the most visually interesting part of the trip  and the reason i want to trip in nature next time  as i was walking out to my car i looked at the trees around the parking lot  and if i didn’t stare directly at them i could see they became fractals  constantly moving and shifting out from the center  these visuals didn’t last very long tho  as i think this is when the peak of the metocin ended  something happened where i suddenly felt pretty sober  and these visuals kinda stopped  i then ended up sitting in my car because i was feeling slightly anxious  and just listening to music in there  i looked at some trees in front of me  and kind of let my vision unfocus and let the visuals do their work  i’ve noticed if i kinda zone out my vision while tripping the visuals become much more intense  doing this  i actually had some environmental cubism which i didn’t think happened often on psychedelics  the trees looked like they were a pyramid made of a few roundish squares  which breathed and moved  the intensity of this also varied with the breathing of the shapes  so sometimes i would almost only see these cubes  and sometimes i would mostly just see the tree  

   i went to hang out with some other friends because i thought it would help with the anxiety i was feeling  and it did a lot  the hieroglyph visuals became more intense and noticeable here  and everything i saw was covered in this geometry  for some reason  i didn’t get this much when i closed my eyes  but with open eyes the visuals were very pronounced  i think this could be because i daytripped  because i had a similar experience with   of lsd recently  

   this comedown is kinda bad  i feel really sad and alone  kinda felt this partway through the trip as well but it wasn’t as bad  just feel pretty depressed and tired  

   i ended up smoking a blunt with some friends later  which i’m usually cautious of on psychedelics but it actually helped me out a lot  relaxed me and increased my mood a bit  i still felt kinda out of it and tired but i wasn’t feeling depressed like earlier  had a lot of trouble sleeping but was able to get to sleep at some point  the next day i feel pretty tired and slow  i’m definitely taking a bit of a t break from weed after this  and slowing down with all the other drugs i’ve been doing  downloaded an app to help keep track of long i’ve been sober  probably going to start taking my meds more often too  didn’t have a bad trip or anything  just kinda showed me that my focus is in the wrong place rn  as far as my thoughts on al lad  it was a very weird chemical  it didn’t have the same kinda magical feeling or euphoria that regular acid has  but the visuals were pretty nice  and the music enhancement was definitely there  felt a little dirtier and almost harsher than acid to me  both mentally and physically  i’ll definitely revisit the chemical  maybe in combination with acid because i’ve heard positive things about that

text:
a couple months back i had to check my blood glucose and couldn’t draw blood from my fingertips 

i chose to instead prick the side of my finger where you can see veins  terrible idea   and accidentally hit a nerve  making me partially lose sensation in two fingers  rendering that hand painful to use and feeling pins and needles when i moved it 

it got better over time with hand exercises and lion’s mane to the point where only the tip of my pinky would have that “nerve damage” sensation 

i know that most psychedelics are neurogenerative and so i microdosed lsd      which reduced pain for the day but no long term benefits 

however i dosed   mmc for the first time a few weeks ago    oral     in at    and     and the pain completely disappeared and never came back 

during the experience i felt   pain in my body and it reminded me that i read that stable social groups and love lead to less pain and disease  and i wondered if empathogens could mimic this via release of serotonin and oxytocin 

purely anecdotal  but is there some evidence that sras could help with pain nerve damage   have any of you experienced something similar

text:
i took   tabs over   years ago now  and well  yeah it was traumatic but i came out the other end a better person  just took some time  i want to know your opinions on the drug and the   x  nbome class   will it cause permanent damage  or is it   simply a range of phenethylamine derivatives that are erratic by nature    the damage caused by serotonin syndrome is  more often than not  temporary  could the same be said for seizures and bad trips experienced on nbomes  

anyway  i have a bone to pick that s on a different note   most people who post about   nbome on reddit are doing so in a plea for help    do i have brain damage     is my life over   they just want answers  some clarity  and someone to tell them they re okay  but because their minds are filled with paranoia it creates a feedback loop  the trippers will say they re paranoid and that they re overreacting    if you re that concerned just go see a doctor   what will a doctor know about these research chemicals that the person doesn t already know  if the doctor knew anything at all about rcs then it s likely that they ve previously visited the reddit community   there is a notorious lack of information for this drug class over the internet  so thus  with none of their concerns resolved from qualified medical practitioner or otherwise  they post again   to the only community that would know a thing about their problems  time and time again they are shut down  i just find it disheartening to see these people down in a truly bad way  likely at the fault of an untrustworthy dealer  get excluded from one of the only communities that has the power to help them  the growing typical response of mental illness is a relation of experiences  a reminder that one might not qualified  and then a reinforcement that in all likelihood they are okay  however when it comes to those who ve had bad trips on rcs  the response is typically unsupportive  unless they ve already overcome their issues  what s the point in all that  we re all just human and i think it s awfully human to become terrified after extreme trauma  these people should be supported in their recovery and given love   not outcasted

text:
hi everyone   


i like getting blasted on dissos and psychadelics   


as i ve gotten older i seem to be much more confident in my trips with psychs  playing some new world and recently got some   lsd and am so excited i decided to trip despite having tripped last weekend   


i m not worried about too often for health or anything  just feels like a waste  to go overboard when waiting would give me stronger trips  but i made an exception as ever since i started acid i wanted to dose in a liquid solution   


maybe it s naivete but i feel like there is a chance the dosing may be a bit more accurate than blotters and despite dropping   last weekend i did   now

anyone less responsible who feels a bit of sunk cost and one should  make sure  to get a good night    d

text:
tldr  this combination is extremely stimulating and made me socially active  i did not get heart palpations  shadow people  tremors  or any panic attacks  would do it again but not without a benzo on hand 

this was an accidental dosage  the experience was valuable and i felt i should share it  as when i had realized what i had taken and rushed to the internet  i was not able to find any experience reports to put me at ease 

       after traveling for a few weeks  i returned home and was cleaning my room  an old bottle of phenibut faa   contained a capsule  i was sure i had put a different kind of capsule in this container so after a taste test i concluded it was  at worst  a left over caffeine pill   it was in fact   phenylpiracetam and i consumed it on the spot not knowing  then took   sabroxy immediately after  empty stomach 

          still exhausted from my trip i laid back down and woke up at about     sweating profusely  without even getting up i spotted the bottle of phenylpiracetam   on my dresser and immediately realized i fucked up  cursed myself for not considering the interaction i rushed to my computer but found no satisfactory analysis on my safety proceeding 

          got very in my head expecting the worst  i had once  years ago  and pramracitam with ritalin and had terrible heart palpations for hours  after taking stock of my vitals  around      i concluded that at this point  if things aren t getting more uncomfortable i can ride it out  around     a rush of nausea hit me and i was sure i would vomit  i smoked a very small amount of flower cannabis from a pipe and the nasuea subsided after a breif flash of anxiety faded away  around this time i found myself very much enjoying the experience  i noticed some jaw clenching and a friend of mine asked if i wanted to go to the bar  

        i met up with my friend  i was very chatty and had a body sensation of clean and calm functionality  normally for me  modafinil  some racetams  and most ndri s  cause a terrrible body sensation of anxiety  as if i can feel my blood rushing under my skin  that full body feeling that is reminiscent of manic episodes moments before shit hits the fan and heart palpitations start  that feeling showing up made me so afraid to relax that my social interactions were internally uncomfortable and felt rushed  however my verbal fluency and recall were the most incredible they have ever been  at     i could not longer take the social stimulation and fled back home  at home i continued to have in depth and mentally rewarding conversation with my housemates  the social pressure was gone and i felt good again 

          i decidedly had enough of this experience and swallowed   meltaonin    of l theanine and    of klonpin  after two more   melatonin doses and an hour of relaxing playing video games i was able to sleep 

retrospectively i would have taken half the dosage of sabroxy and probably would not have been so neurotic  thus the experience would be a bit easier to navigate  what shocked me abut this combination is that normally racetams with dri s or ndri s are a recipe for disaster with my panic disorder  i would have mania and panic attacks with only   of modafanil alone  or   of ritalin or even   wellbutrin  so i am not sure why this combination which i had never planned to take hit with so much fluid and calm energy  i was offered amphetamine that night and i turned it away  knowing  i was too stimulated to do amphetamines is something that i normally do not have the patience to recognize  due to years of reckless cocaine abuse i unfortunately have a rapid reaction to being offered dopamine drugs and that is usually  yes please give me more   i was proud of my down to earth thinking and realistic analysis of the situation  i attribute this realistic thinking to the combination of sabroxy and phenylpiracetam  they did not make me feel a rush of dopamine that normally satisfied my monkey brain  rather just enough dopamine had slowly pooled in my head to allow the thought to appear   ya know what  i have enough energy tonight  i don t need anything else thank you for offering   that is very unlike me  but this combo could be a good way to stay off speed

text:
hello my friends  so i got   of a pihp to give it a shot  it s my first time taking a pyro  and i rarely take stims as well  

the products was inside a ziplock bag and it was mostly powder and there were some rocks inside there as well  which could break apart quite easily  they were slight yellowish colour and i was ready for action  in the beginning of the high  i was on my bed by myself 

       measured     of it and snorted it in one go  believe it or not  once i insufflated  it smelled very similar to sperm or bleach  it burned a little bit and my eyes became watery but went away very fast    meo mipt  moxy  was way harsher on my nose than this 

       started feeling the euphoria kicking in  

       feeling fucking awesome  similar feeling to coke but way hornier  euphoria is there but also jaw clenching and need to smoke 

       i was feeling better and better  pure dopamine high  i was also extreme horny and pervy lol  i started smoking cigarettes  which i don t when sober  rolling or tripping 

       tried beating my meat but despite the crazy horniness  my dick was going limp from hard at random moments  it was like   minutes hard    minutes limp  again  the horniness was still there and it was intense 

       was pretty pissed off that i couldn t stay hard so i decided to redose in case it would help  

       tried boofing for the first time ever    but failed miserably  i dissolved   with     of water and drawed it with a slin pin  i was on my side and i though that the tip of syringe was inside my ass but apparently it wasn t  resulting in bed sheets covered in sperm smelling pyro water lol 

       i tried boofing one time  same amount and this time i made sure the syringe was in there  after pushing the plunger  i could feel the liquid inside of me and it wasn t my cup of tea  i pulled the syringe out and i noticed that this time it was really in there  ​

       still feeling very good and music sounds also very nice  felt a slight burn in my ass but went away in   seconds or so 

       a little dissapointed  after reading so many positives about boofing  i only felt a slight pump of euphoria  i know i did something wrong and decided to forget about boofing for the moment but would definetely give it a shot anothee day 

       feeling the effects diminishing and i wanted more  the crave was not that intense but i really wanted to keep going  

       took   more      snorted and the rest sublingually  luckily it didn t taste like cum  not that i know what cum tastes like of course  starts sweating 

       feeling fucking amazing  euphoria through the roof  good energy  extreme horniness  started texting many friends because i was feeling like talking and laughing with someone  despits not being that much of an extrovert  

       felt like going for a walk to see my bro who was working nearby and knew his time working was up  before i went out  i tried jerking off one more time and again  my dick was going limp at random moments despite the horniness  i finally reached my goal and finishes  while being      erect lol  it was a very pleasant orgasm and i m sure weed would make it way better  didn t smoke any weed because i don t like to combine new drugs but i unfortunately smoked     cigarettes for sure   

       snorted   and headed out  i had a big smile on my face  was feeling like a king and was into anything at that moment  i went to see my brother and i was very open to everyone around us  i could talk about anything with anyone  i noticed a huge increase in confidence  resulting in many convos and laughs  i was still smoking a cigarette every   minutes unfortunately 

       my brother finished his work and another friend met up with us and we decided to go for some beers on the beach  i went to my hotel to get changed but of course before i headed out  i had another   line  

       i was feeling that last line kicking in  the high was the same everytime i redosed  which was a nice surprise  this time i was sitting down and noticed my leg shaking  it has happened before with other rcs and didn t worry about it  the euphoria was insane and i made many new friends on that beach bar  really good times and good laughs  around that time i felt grateful for getting to try all these rcs  it happens every time i m high lol 

       i was still feeling great but could feel the effects diminishing once again  it was fine with me  i was planning to smoke a joint and head to sleep until that one friend that met up with us said  let s go to tropical  which is a nice club with nice dancing music but also a relaxing terrace with a beautiful sea view  we all agreed to do so and we left the beach bar 

had   more     lines in the following hours and had an amazing time in that club for       hours at least  felt really energetic and happy  very confident and met new people  danced and really enjoyed my self 

sorry for the long report my friends and for any useless information  feel free to ask me any questions in the comments and i will happily reply   

to the more experienced people here  would you kindly have share your wisdom with me because i have some questions as well 

   do you think i pushed the syringe too far inside my ass  which resulted in poor effects 

   any tutorials on how to smoke it with foil  don t have a vape right now 

   can i take viagra cialis to deal with the limp moments 

   should i try a php as well or is it almost identical  or maybe nep or hexen 

   how long after insufflation can i blow my nose 

   what is the most amount of a pihp you ve done in one session day 

that is all  sorry for the long post and thank you for reading this  please be careful with this rc as you can easily overdo it  it was only my first time and i believe i took a decent amount  with that pace  that   won t last long 

safe travels my friends❤

text:
hello dear community 
i wanted to share my yesterday s experience with you i hope you enjoy 
soo  i woke up yesterday and knew that this day i don t have important things to do  so i thought it s the perfect opportunity to try one of my dissos that i ordered a few months ago    meo pce was my choice  i had a previous experience with this substance  snorted it with some friends  but the effects were relatively weak  although i had a very strong dose    regular doses  every   hours  according to psychonaut wiki and the duration was completely manageable  a few hours after my last dose i was nearly back to baseline  so i decided that this time i try it oral 
made a capsule with about   and took it  it was still early that day  
about  three hours later the effects were very subtle and i decided to take another capsule with about    another hours passed and i feel dissociated  the second capsule is now working i thought  i even bought two new games while the dissociation got stronger and stronger 
after a few attempts i closed the game and laid on my bed  because at this point i wasn t able to understand the game mechanics anymore and died all the time 
 in   or two hours  when the effects get weaker  you can try again  i thought  oh boy were i wrong  
i closed my eyes and even saw   dimensional optics  i have got lost in my inner self and spent the next time floating in the disso land  which felt very nice 
more hours passed and i stood up to go to the toilet 
at this point it was already dark outside and i  realized i was tripping hard and it got stronger and stronger  my last dose was about       hours ago and it felt as i was peaking  totally dissociated i didn t realize that it was probably the capsules that took waaaaay longer to kick in than i thought  i have became a bit panicky that i have damaged my brain and the effects don t stop and the fact that i had to wake up early next day didn t help  it became so strong that i even tried to make a reddit post about my state  to maybe find someone comforting me  but i didn t manage to write coherent sentences 
it was nearly midnight when i decided that i have to call a friend for help  
that was probably the best decision i had that day 
i explained to her my situation  which was very hard in this state and she comforted me simply by being there  we stayed on the phone until she was sleeping  it was still impossible for me to sleep  but i was comforted enough to lay in bed and  wait  until i had to get up 
when my alarm rang and i ve stayed up  i still felt strong effects  more than   hours since my last dose  but weak enough to manage to go to work   i m alone most of the time at work  so this was not a big problem  
while making myself ready for work  the effects faded and i was almost back to baseline  
i m feeling good now but i have a lot to think about  
this wasn t the trip i wanted  but maybe the trip i ve needed  
thank you for reading  i m no native speaker and am still tired so sorry for grammatical errors  but i hope you enjoyed

text:
so on saturday  we’re on the following friday now for reference  i had taken what i thought to be mdxx which i had bought without using a testing kit to confirm it so i thought i’d share my experience and why you should never take it 

the euphoria was mild and subsided shortly after taking so naturally you take more  i’m unsure of exact doses but i must have passed out around   and woke up at    until the thursday evening i didn’t sleep at all  after about   hours the lack of sleep starts to put a strain on your body  by thursday during the day i had started hallucinating and was showing early signs of psychosis due to the sleep deprivation  

i suffer from anxiety and had been prescribed diazepam but put off using this because i was unsure what the effect would be of me mixing it however it gave me the boost i needed to finally get to sleep  leading up until that point was the scariest experience of my life with marked derealisation and panic attacks to the point of hysterics and i didn’t know where or who i was 

    would never take again and please always use a testing kit

so psychonautwiki only has dosage information listed for oral administration of cyclazodone 

i’ve seen many reports claiming that intranasal administration of cyc is largely ineffective — which would be in line with the data on a popular vendor’s website stating that the compound is “soluble to   mm in ethanol  insoluble in water ”

however  what has me curious is that i’ve seen many people claiming sublingual administration to be an effective roa for cyclazodone  as well as mixed reports regarding the efficacy of intrarectal administration 

how could sublingual administration  and possibly intrarectal  be effective if cyclazodone is not water soluble 

is there any way to make these roas more effective  for example  i know that etizolam is not water soluble  but once dissolved in a pg solution i have had success diluting doses in a few ml of water and taking these doses intrarectally  could the same be done by dissolving cyclazodone in ethanol and then diluting in water to make it safe for sensitive bodily tissue 

final question  and this is where my lack of chemistry knowledge will really show — can something be done analogous to mixing    heroin with an acid  making it water soluble  i know this is changing base heroin to a salt form — so is there something i can mix the cyclazodone with to change its salt formation or basify if  increasing its solubility in water  unfortunately the vendor i bought this from does not specify the specific salt formation of their cyclazodone 

thanks for any insight you can provide

greetings everyone 

i apologize for posting something discussed in different posts already  but after i ve checked few of them  and the different subjective opinions  by not following the dissos scene since a while  i need your expertise to pick the most suitable rc of this class for research 

my last rc dissos i tried was long a go  when mxe was still legal  definitely an amazing experience  and his story behind   chemist who created it with a precise purpose  was really a great person  it was definitely more mystical and deep as experience compared to ketamine  and with a longer duration 

i ve tried to gather the different info about the current rcs of such kind of dissos  but being my focus on other kind of compounds  i wasn t able to get a proper picture 

i m seeking a compound with a moderate duration  slightly longer or shorten than ketamine   that can add some extra magic but not feeling a completely different experience  and that will slightly enhance  opioids effects 

about the last point  i ve put some time researching the most suitable for opioid enhancing dissos  based on a good number of feedback    oxo pce    meo pcp    ho pcp and   ho pc 

i ve not been able to research them personally  and i m not aware if in the last months  other interesting options appeared  keeping in mind an rc with this last criteria would be preferred  which one is the most suitable covering the other   aspects   duration       hour compared to ketamine  and effects somewhat aligned with ketamine  i won t mind some additional  deepness  in terms of disassociation  but the gap should no be too big  ideally  the potency should be as well something you can eye ball  and not where a      more more would give an insane blast 

last but not least  even if it s pretty uncommon with such compounds  the comedown and the side effects should be very smooth and nothing leaving your body brain like a wreck the day after  of course  if consumed as intended and not an insane amount 

thank you  i know it s not simple to find the one matching all those criteria  but your help to identify the closest one  would be greatly appreciated 

best regards
