text:
would you try   ho pcp again 

 amp    

so i tried it for the first time a fortnight ago and i found it to be a difficult experience  which at the time made me feel like i made a massive mistake  which i would never repeat  i also wondered why people on earth people do this drug recreationally 

first thing i need to point out is that i take anti convulsant drugs due to a seizures disorder which i acquired a few years ago  this condition surfaced most likely due to benzo abuse  but my first seizure and the resulting hospital visit revealed a venous brain abnormality which i had surgery on to repair  i have had   further seizures since the first but i have not had any since i quit benzos about     years ago  so i take sodium valproate and lamotrigine for the seizures  i also take venlafaxine  mirtazapine and dexamphetamine for depression  anxiety  and adhd  yeah  i know its a lot  but it s working well so i wont be changing it any time soon     

i decided i wanted to a pcp analogue because the previously mentioned drugs i use limited the type of recreational drugs that could provide any enjoyable effects  having read a number of experience reports on various dissociatives  i decided i wanted to try   ho pcp and   meo pcp  i had tried dxm many times in my early   s  most of which were positive but a few of my later high dose experiences had me thinking i was dying  maybe it was just a panic attack  maybe i was in some kind of physiological distress  i dont know and my memory of the experience was always unclear 

back to the experience  i started off with an orally ingested allergy test approx       after   hours had passed without any perceivable effect decided to take what i thought was a fairly low dose  i had bought a solution which claimed to be     per ml and from the i ingested what should have been    only the guy who sold it to me knows if the solution was accurate  and maybe he doesnt even know 

after an hour i started to feel a building anticipation fear nervousness  in hindsight it was a little like the feeling i get before an mdma experience is about to begin it s been a long time   but its also similar to the feeling i get before i have a seizure or a panic attack  i was either facing impending doom or euphoric wonder 

i decided i needed to do something to prevent me from having a seizure and all i could think of that i had on hand was beer  i had previously read a number of reports of people mixing this drug with alcohol and they did not mention any adverse effects  but in hindsight they may have just been the ones that survived  

i quickly downed   beers as my body began to feel like a foreign vessel i was inhabiting  i was sitting in front of the tv but i couldnt look at it directly because it was hard to perceive its proportions  and i was feeling confused and overwhelmed  the beer wasn t chilling me out like it normally would  i wanted to stay grounded but i felt myself floating away  what the story with this drug i wonder  i dont feel any euphoria  this is not what i was expecting from what i had read  after reading this drug could cause mania  stimulation  compulsive redosing  anxiety suppression and euphoria  i was hoping it would feel similar to an amphetamine or cathinone type drug 

 amp    

my wife asked me to join her for a walk and i thought it might help me stick to this reality which i felt like i was slipping away from  i fucked around for about   minutes moving random shit around and getting dressed multiply times to feel like i had a grip on things before i set off  i dont think my wife had figured out i had taken anything yet  she is usually very perceptive at the slightest hint that im inebriated 

my spatial perception was distorted and i was surprised i was able to walk straight  as we walked i continued to feel confused and distant from the world around me  i remembered a reddit post i saw which showed an animation or computer game of what it felt like to be on pcp which i felt was very accurate  it felt like i was on the set on grand theft auto and i now understood why people thought the pcp experience was very comical  even though i wasn t feeling it  i heard some birds fly above me and their squawking felt digital and metallic if that makes any sense to ya 

 amp    

i was very quiet the whole time but my wife didn t seem to care  and i still managed to mumble out some short responses when required  i began to feel what i assume is derealisation  i wondered if i was dead or in a coma somewhere else and i was in some other realm  was my wife in on this deception  was i just now beginning to reveal the fact that everyone in my life was in on some conspiracy and i was just a fool  a puppet that had fucked up big time  i had experiences these thoughts before while tripping  but i cant remember what substance i was on at the time  

 amp    

these thoughts soon faded as we made it back home  i sat down wishing i could fall asleep or take something to end this  but sleeping would be impossible and beer was doing very little  now my wife could see the concern in my face and questioned me on what i took etc  i told her i would never do this stuff again and i meant it  i went back to drinking beer and decided to clean the house to take my mind off things  two hours after i first felt the effects i began feeling ok again  and   hours later i was fine 

 amp    

so what am i missing here  have i been to quick to give up on this substance  perhaps i should make another attempt at a lower dose minus the beer  i felt like this drug had great potential but i was sorely disappointed  maybe all the other meds im on sucked the joy out of it 

 amp    

thoughts

text:
hey guys  as the title says don’t abuse this drug  or don’t abuse rc’s in general 

i deleted all my previous posts but maybe some of you remember me posting around here  i abused   fma for studying for about one year and a half  i used to take it on small doses  about     mg  thinking it would do nothing to me  i was completely wrong  

i consumed about   grams of   fma  probably one of the biggest consumers of this substance around here and my life has changed drastically since the beginning of the summer  

i used to be that guy that was being successful in all aspects of life  had very good grades  had a very good social life  was very smart  had some girls  this drug turned my life upside down 

in the beginning of july  after my exams  and after consuming some   fma for about two weeks straight i started having panic attacks  and since then my brain just shut off 

i can’t talk to people anymore because my brain just stopped working  even with my closest friends and family   i lost all my cognitive functions  i can’t even read things properly  i lost all my emotions  i can’t even get aroused anymore  i just spend my days in bed seeing life go by 

basically this drug destroyed my life  it’s been   months and no improvements  this drug debilitated me  at least i am debilitated for now  

stay safe out there

text:
hey guys  

there was a post by  u alert water    https   www reddit com user alert water     earlier showing some new rc s coming out of germany  i have since gone ahead and done some computational analysis of the  box structure  off the benzene ring of the cathinone analog  hypothesizing what might happen if this ends up being a prodrug for another known cathinone analog   http   www swisstargetprediction ch result php job   amp organism homo  sapiens  http   www swisstargetprediction ch result php job   amp organism homo sapiens    i ve typed up a brief report if anyone wants to have a look  

the report is titled  computational analysis of novel cathinone analog  in the github repository  just click on the file to read it  

 amp    

  github link     https   github com   novel cathinone analog analysis  https   github com   novel cathinone analog analysis 

 amp    

one thing to note  i mentioned after the conclusion section that you would need to use a text editor to view any of the  gjf or  out files  but i was mistaken  just click the file in github to view it  no need for any downloads  as for the  cml files  to truly view them  you ll have to download them and open them in avogadro  

 amp    

another thing to note  the conclusions drawn from the data collected will apply similarly to other rcs containing the  box structure  like the novel pyro in  u alert water    https   www reddit com user alert water      s post  

 amp    

i hope this helps build some understanding of the structural characteristics of these molecules  i also hope that if some poor soul sometime in the distant future has to do similar work on this stuff  this gets them on the right track  hello from the past btw you poor bastard   

enjoy

so i´ve stopped taking classic uppers for a year now and wanted to get me some etizs  but because stuff like   mmc gets banned soon and i never tried rc stims i wanted at least to try it out once 

on the day of days i started really slow and only took about     orally   i weighed it out 

i was really surprised because it kicked in pretty strong for that dose  i´ve read that   mmc is slighlty less potent in dosing compared to mdma but this dose felt like     mdma  i was not rolling but still it was surprisingly strong  it also felt like advertised  it felt like an upper with a sero component to it  interestingly the sero component felt more like i had took pure amphetamine and then popped a   htp pill  the sero felt like the sero of   htp and nothing like the one of mdma 

i didn´t feel like shit and the roll was pretty pleasant but i still stopped after that dose and got to work the next day  the comedown the next day was also way worse than i had expected  still i wanted to try a second time after work to begin the weekend 

on my second time i didn´t weigh it i just put even less then last time in it  it really was maybe      it still kicked in pretty strong  lets say my page is broken and i can´t eyeball for shit then it was both times   at most but it kicked in like   of mdma  after that i thought na man i don´t like this shit  i threw away all of it and stopped

i also experienced pretty bad memory impaired as if i had took way more  but the scary thing is that i have this weird dizzy feeling thats just not going away

  can someone who has experience with   mmc tell me what might happened  and what i can do about this or how long this feeling will stay   

for notes  the etizolam of that site is pretty good  so don´t know what happened  but i´ve heard that the   mmc is not as good as it was a few years ago 

also i´m a pretty experienced mdma and amphe user and i know the difference between a comedown and when somethings wrong and i never felt that weird and for that long after taking any upper

text:
two days ago i decided to drop around   mg of   meo mipt on my own  i had done it before  but those times i was with someone  i remember those times being pretty okay  but a bit uncomfortable due to having the feeling that i had a hard time to be central in my self  this time however  this effect of not feeling  myself  came up way worse  after   hours in  i started to mindlessly stare into my eyes in the mirror  having the feeling that i had no idea who i was anymore  but that my body and desires were moving through the room on their own  mind you  this is not alike ego death or a profound spiritual experience  it was very confusing to say the least  mostly because i did not have a bad trip  i sweated a lot  but had no panic or negative thoughts  i just couldn t think  act on my intuition  or reach any profoundness expect for sitting still and focusing on my breathing 

i was wondering if any of you have the same experience with moxy  it was a very difficult experience for me  and in all my psychedelic endeavours  the only one that i had to abort with   mg etizolam purely because i did not have any confidence in my own ability to exist    minutes after dropping the etizolam  i was back in my self  able to think about things again  

once again  it wasn t scary  just plain  very plain  is this a common thing  i noticed that i stared in the mirror for a long time  normally during a psychedelic trip  this offers very interesting thoughts or visions  but this time  my eyes could only speak of some pure dreadful emptiness 

wondering about your thoughts

text:
well technically amantadine is not a research chemical  which is even better  it has been extensively tested in humans and has a good safety profile  i believe  
amantadine  apparently but unclear  is a dopamin and norepinephrine releasing agent or at least it behave like a regular stim  do not have significant serotonin activity and atypically is a nmda antagonist  rumored to be less potent than the related compound memantine  

the good news about amantadine is that you can get it over the counter easily though i m not sure if it is legal and in which countries  but since it s not a controlled substance like amphetamines  it should be like regular pharma drugs  meaning it s illegal to sell but not to own  but don t buy more than a   month supply at once   is this belief correct 

if so then amantadine is likely to be a safe atypical functional stimulant  i have no idea how euphoric it is but a study has found it as effective as methylphenidate for adhd  which is promising 
it s unclear to me whether it has dopamin agonism property like memantine or if it increase tyrosine hydroxylase like bromantane  being an adamantane  
so overall  a potentially very underatted underused compound

text:
introduction 

last week i tripped on a combo of   ho met and acid  i had done this two times prior to this  but with lower doses  and always had amazing results  
this time was different tho  this experience was so special to me that i almost feel obligated to write a report  which i never do 
the location was at a really nice lake in the forest in italy  south tyrol   i was with   good friends  one remained sober as a tripsitter  the goal of the trip was really just having a good time  last trip was   months ago 
my highest acid dose up to this point was    highest   ho met dose   
so  let s get into this 

 the trip 

t     we drop the acid  it is currently       and we just arrived at the hiking trail  we are all excited since we didn t see each other in a long time  the sun is shining  and the temperature is just perfect  we enjoy the beautiful nature and there are wonderful vibes 

         we arrived at the lake and set up our hammocks  i m starting to feel the acid creeping in  so i drop the   ho met  a little comeup anxiety  but that s nothing out of the ordinary for me 

  t       coming up hard now  the bodyload is coming on strong too and as i lay down and look up to the sky i start seeing the first visuals 

  t       the last hour was a slow but uncomfortable comeup  did not really feel clean up to this point  we decided to take a walk around the lake  we really chose a good place for this trip 

  t       bam  it hit me like a ton of bricks and the peak is here  insane visuals  very complex and lots of variety  i and my friend who took the same dose kind of lost the ability to talk  so we just enjoyed the walk and laughed a lot    i have to say that the peak of this experience was not that clean  there was more confusion than with   of acid and there were more side effects like temperature regulation issues and a bit of nausea which i usually don t get on psychedelics 

  t       after we returned to our spot  we listened to some chill music  at first we tried some forest psytrance  but we found that a bit too hectic  so we switched to tipper and psychill which calmed us down a bit  we didn t expect it to be this strong but hey  that doesn t have to be a bad thing    

at this point  the visuals were out of this world  they weren t that strong  but the variety was what made it so special  the tryptamine and the lysergamide melted into one amazing  beautiful experience  the closed eye visuals were what impressed me the most  i had full on   dimensional geometric and very complex cev s which i only ever got from dmt before  

  t       it s currently     and now the peak is slowly starting to fade away as we can talk again  even though it is pretty difficult  up tho this point the headspace was pretty wild  now it seemed to calm down  we were just having a good time smoking some cbd and ciggies  talking about deep topics and the world we live in  another amazing thing was the music enhancement  it was out of this world  never got anything similar from just one of the two 

  t       now the peak is over and we are in heaven  this combo is really euphoric  we put on some dark forest psytrance  the music seemed like the visuals translated into sound and dancing felt sooo good  almost comparable to mdma euphoria  the visuals were still in full force  i think this is where this combo really shined  from here on out  i didn t get any side effects anymore  just a really clean and amazing trip  
the chaotic headspace died down a lot too and we were left just feeling amazing and fresh 

  t       we were sitting by the lake smoking some weed and looking at the water  this combo just has a really special  amazing euphoric feeling to it  if it weren t for the peak  i would make it my go to for parties 

at this point i was in a really calm state of mind  just feeling really balanced mentally  euphoria was still strong  and we never got tired of talking  it was a really nice bonding session for us 
effects are gradually getting weaker tho  but really slowly 

  t       as the sun was setting  we started our journey back to the car  the walk back was a real adventure  visually it was still mind blowing since the weed boosted it again  they persisted until i went to sleep 

  t       we go to our local pizzeria and eat something  since during the trip i was not hungry at all  tasted great  

 conclusion 

this really was an amazing  if not the best trip i ever had  visually this was really remarkable since i saw things that i thought weren t even possible from acid   ho met 
i also got a really nice afterglow from it and didn t feel exhausted the next day at all  sorry for my grammar mistakes  but english is not my first language

  i highly recommend this combo to anyone  it really is worth trying

text:
this is my   time with this molecule and probably yet my most profound experience with all substances ever  

like any time that i do dissos i sniffed my dose  cleaned up after myself  and hopped in the shower  i began to start becoming very dissociated and began to have trouble washing myself so i got out of the shower and used the netti pot to clear the drip from my nose  every time i netti pot my disso high usually becomes much much stronger kicks in for some reason  and i went back to lay down in my room  i played spyro ripto s rage  smoked a bit  and listened to old death cab for cutie songs 

now that was fun in of itself  but i eventually got struck with an urge to open the quran  i am not religious  and i was absolutely struck by the wording and i was trying to close in to read the words and next thing i knew i was hunched over like in the mosque and i realized then that if i were to be caught doing this by an extremist i would be killed and then i thought about how people wanted to kill jesus and i thought  holy shit  they ll kill me too  i then started to type a bunch of rambling religious crap with my eyes closed into the computer   i still have yet to check back up on that

so yeah   now thats over i realize it was just hella mania   fucking crazy though

text:
i ve been taking clon for   years this month 

i suffer from ptsd  all the anxiety disorders and bs  as well as insomnia  trouble falling asleep  due to hypervigilance 

i was an alcoholic for years     or so to be exact  never drank in the military but   years after i started and for   years i drank myself into a hole where i lost friends  family  and almost my freedom 

every time i d try and quit i d get the shakes  crazy anxiety  suicidal depressed  etc  i m sure you ve heard what it s like  i went to doctor after doctor trying to get sober but none would help with benzos  only anti depressants or whatever they wanted to peddle at the time 

finally i found this sub   did my research and ordered some clonazolam  my first few doses were only         a dropper  man did it hit   and i knew not to take any more 

i ve been doing that for   years this month now and i vary my dose depending on my day  at most i take          a   l dropper and only at night   minutes before bed 

we all hear the horror stories but some of us can manage and it s helped me be sober from alcohol for   months and   days and turn my life around  i m a new man

text:
first of all let me start off by explaining to you a little backstory about me   ’    w a     bar tolerance but can handle   without blacking out  i have about a week or two left until i enter very special treatment   probably   actually so figured why not do some research   hopefully to put myself out of this misery they call addiction for a full year and truly let me brain heal  let’s get on with it 

usually i’m a fan of clonaz because of its euphoric effects and so on and usually dose      this does usually does the trick everytime and i’ve always loved my clam  however the last couple weeks of my vacation  detox currently off methadone hence the benzo use  i have started to notice myself wanted to dose twice because i can feel it wearing off after about   hours   this got annoying and it also got annoying reading a lot of threads about flub being so great and euphoric and yadadadada…  so i then said fuck it lets open the lab  

i got the flub in two days and was very excited to open the lab and get to work  after reading a lot about this chem and doing my research the best i could i tried to ug the powder i bought and do the regular polyethylene glycol  ethyl alc and distilled water mix but somewhere along the way i just couldnt and felt as if i’ve made a mistake and didn’t wanna overdose so turned straight to the pre packed liquid from my amazing vendor  

now knowing that from what i’ve read on the wiki  the equivalent calculators to the whole   yards and including anecdotal evidence which is what i usually take into account more than anything i have heard or studied about rcs when it comes to harm reduction that this chem was two to maybe three times as potent clonazolam  i’ve read some accounts that even say that it could be five times as potent so with that being said   moved on to the next step  dosing  

with listening to music and nothing better to do i decided it was time to do dose  now this time it was more unusual than most considering how much i was planning on using because i really wanted to get a euphoric effect out of this chem  so i dosed for abouta whopping   totaling two mg‘s total with one bar because i was having extreme anxiety shaking while dosing myself with this mainly because i was in withdrawals   opiates  

i made a trip report on another account and it was really fun to say the least  on the come up i was a really talkative almost a manic sounding person which had me in good graces because this is what i heard it come up is like  as time went on the muscle relaxation and the sedation grew more and more on me to the point where i was incapacitated and when i mean by that is passed out with the best sleep i’ve ever had  

sorry for the typos in this if there is any i am using talk to text because for whatever reason my computer phone that’s what i call it nowadays at least is lagging very bad when i text on the post  other than that i still feel the effects from yesterday and that was at     pm when i started out dosing and don’t remember this but i think ive dosed again or spilled some because there’s some missing i would go with the redose because i did end up blackout out  just sleeping but it was nice  all in all my rate was with this considering its long half life and considerably euphoric and sedative effect as well as help with sleep so much so i didn’t even dream  i would rate this chem     when used correctly  

     i was just reading earlier about how somebody’s life just got ruined four drops clam and literally laughed  this sub is like clockwork and i love it and i love you all and i will be back a very soon to bigger and better man hasta la vista baby  also to the guy who said his life is ruined over four drops of clam … i hope you read this because you haven’t responded to my comment on your post yet but who knows maybe just know not all hope is lost i’ve been in a lot worse position than your own right now you could be in jail or a lot of other worse places however i wouldn’t be posting on reddit if i were you to talk about it i would be figuring out what the hell to do but that’s just me  i don’t mean to be rude anyways that’s just m o on that and i wish the kid the best  i feel about flubbing out soon and that’s okay  i wish you all the best  namaste

text:
so it s been   days since i last used a lysergamide    lsd   my last experience was so mentally straining  left me with a lasting inability to breathe autonomously  or rather  caused me to focus constantly on breathing  feeling as if i have to force it at times  and generally just scared me off  after a year and a half  i m looking to jump back in 

plenty of people claim that eth lad has a steep dose curve and can punish those who take too much  but many claim it has an easier headspace with more proportionately pronounced visual effects 

many people claim al lad is lackluster  but also has an easier body load than eth lad 

i m not exactly timid  and i know if i respect the dose of either i will probably have a good time   but which one  in your oh so very expert opinions  is the more  gentle  option when it comes to headspace  on comparable doses   i will be at a festival already  so don t need to be blown away by visual distortions as the environment is already intense

text:
this story is from a few years ago  before i discovered rc benzos in    i had hardly any experience with benzos at all  i had a daily phenibut habit     day  and pretty nasty polysubstance use  phen  kratom  alcohol  benzedrex  dph and dxm  for a few years at that point  after getting expelled from high school and dropping out of state university i was living with my parents  going to community college and waiting tables  

the day my first package of metizolam was delivered  i was hooked  i dropped the whole bottle onto altoid mints and popped those bitches all fucking day everyday  of course at that point i learned about the stronger benzos i could order  and started making everclear tinctures with diclazepam  flualprazolam and clonazolam powders 

soon i was starting my days with huge quantities of diclazepam flualp and clam  smoking benzo soaked cigs on lunch break at work  before school  during school  after school  boofing full droppers of everclear solution  drinking shots of everclear every night  making huge mixed drinks of flualprazolam and everclear to drink on the   hour drive i made to and from fucking this girl i barely knew  no condom  no birth control  dry as fuck she didn t have lube so she grabbed a bottle of hand lotion to use lmfao  basically my life was completely falling apart around me 

i failed most of my classes  kept getting in trouble at work  and i was making potentially deadly decisions for myself and others on a daily basis  i lived in a perpetual blackout for   months until i quit cold turkey 

i wish that was where the story ended  but a few months later at my school library i got the urge to get barred out again  i hopped on my phone and overnighted a   bottle of clonazolam to my parents  house  i could handle it this time  i was sure  when it arrived  i immediately cracked the bottle open and dropped    big deal  i thought  i used to pop   presses all day long no problem 

well  i blacked out  at some point i decided i would go to walmart  buy a ton of benzedrex and jerk off for   hours  once i consumed three inhalers    propylhexedrine   i guess the stimulation overpowered the blackout and i was lucid again  i was folding clothes at lightning speed and talking to my gf on facetime  i decided to re dose   intending to take another mg or two  but due to my lack of coordination i spilled the entire bottle onto my desk  and due to my lack of critical thinking skills  i slurped up the remaining   of clonazolam into my mouth like some degenerate  drug addicted  limp dicked vacuum cleaner  what happened after is a mix of fragmented memory and accounts from my parents 

they said i was acting incredibly fucked up and they were scared to death  i was chugging alcohol so my parents took it away  then they had to take away my mouthwash because i started chugging it too  i called my therapist so he could explain to them why rc benzos were actually therapeutic for me and why i needed them  i kept lying to them about how i needed their keys to go to the gym and they somehow ended up letting me go  or i snuck out  who knows   instead of going to the gym  i facetimed my gf and was staring directly into the camera instead of looking at the road on my way to walmart to buy more benzedrex  my parents drove to the gym to check on me and obviously i wasn t there 

yes  i jerked off for at least   hours  i m sure my parents knew what was going on  my dad said i shat myself in my boxers on his tile floor  at some point that night i passed out 

when i woke up the next day  i was mortified by what i had done  and my body was on the brink of collapse from the benzedrex comedown  it took a while for things to go back to normal in my family 

today  i ve cleaned myself up  i ve been clean from benzos since july    and quit all the other shitty drugs i was doing  i moved across the country to a beautiful town  attend aa meetings regularly  have held the same well paying job for over two years  plan on going back to school for a degree in psychology and have found a love for life again  i ve beaten the odds in the sense that i made it out with my life and didn t kill anyone with my idiotic decisions  substance abuse will always be a struggle for me  but i could never express how grateful i am to be where i am today 

if you haven t used benzos  either don t or make sure you are someone with a high level of responsibility and self control  i am not that person  if you re currently hooked or just in a bad place mentally  just know that things really do get better if you work for it  

i ve got lots of stories from this era in my life  i m still haunted by a lot of them  hopefully getting them out and having a laugh can be a step towards self forgiveness  thanks for reading

text:
hello folks 

i thought i’d try and be a helpful lad for those who may have stumbled across this unusual  fringe cathinone  who like myself was left unsure and disappointed by the lack of reports and information regarding this substance 

i acquired roughly   gram from a canadian vendor probably     months ago roughly  along with several other novel stimulants i was curious about  i kind of put it on the back burner since it was a promo toss in that was given for free along with the other rc’s i was mainly interested in  

so  time passed  and i went through my stash of what i ordered  and mostly forgot  but one day i got that typical out of the blue intense desire to get an adderall  or something like  but couldn’t  that’s when dmc came to mind  i quickly went and grabbed it and tried to do a refresh on whatever info i could find  basically zip to be found  at the time there was only   reddit post describing an experience  and it was uh  not that informing   but  me being who i am  saw that it was     less potent than methcathinone  which has great remarks  so i figured hey  fuck it  do your research lads  in this case i did not do this  however  i acknowledge with certain novel chemicals we need a few risk takers for the betterment of “society    ” lol 

roa   insufflated  holy shit my boys girls  be warned  this shit will burn the absolute fuck out of your nose  thankfully the intensity only lasts about   seconds and gradually recedes  but god damn i had tears in my eyes  it feels like youre snorting flour  leaves a stuffy feeling in the nose  i tried more before this time and really fucked my nose good  this time i probably did roughly     max  i could tell the burn was less because of the more modest amount 

note  it’s important to pay attention to the fact that dmc derives any all of its pleasurable effects from its metabolic conversion to methcathinone  a well reputed rc  effects wise   so there is an argument to be had about whether it’s smarter to orally ingest it or snort it  reasonably  i feel it a safe assumption to guess oral roa would be more effective  which is true with other stims  addy for example   

but don’t be mistaken  dmc will make you feel stimulated  but it’s unique  and definitely nothing quite as euphoric as other traditionally abused stimulants  but for stim lovers out there  it’s definitely no nothing  but at the same time  it also seems like one of those rc’s that people would only turn to out of desperation or curiosity  it has satisfied my urge for adderall  no doubt 

to put it simply  the effects are most dominate toward physical stimulation  and while the psychological boost is    there  it’s a bit underwhelming considering the potential of other stimulants  and from what i’ve read it’s extremely hit or miss with most people who’ve been curious enough to give it a go 

hopefully this was helpful  i finished the last of what i had tonight  but i would be interested to hear a experience report from someone who took     orally  i really firmly believe  scientifically  this route makes so much more sense in terms of maximizing the bioavailability of dmc 

thanks to any folks that read through the wall of text  stay safe and do the best research possible  an educated user is a safer user

text:
preface  i have bad adhd and take daily concerta  methylphenidate extended release  and have a massive stimulant tolerance in general  looking for something to get some of the intial magic that medication gave me  cleaning house like a maniac for hours lol 

experience 

a week of mixed dosing at     daily         

  do not dose after   or you will not sleep 
  it feels like a stronger modafinil  and seemingly has no crash
  i don t feel euphoric or feel a distinct onset like my regular methylphenidate but just feel awake  alert and less mental fatigue and increased attention to detail when writing academic papers 
  no crash or massive tiredness comedown like i usually get with methylphenidate  i m in abnormally good moods late in the day when i m usually exhausted  grumpy as i m coming down off mph 
  lacks distinct push and euphoric interest in boring tasks that medications can allow 

overall  max dosage has been    i might take it higher  heroic dose   for some desired euphoria but i can t say it can be a replacement for adhd medication but maybe a way to lower dosages as a conjunct therapy 

future tests  as i m in new zealand it is incredibly hard to get things through our customs or other compounds that might be better    mph etc   i m surprised the nmc came through  also have some ppap to add too 

side note  haven t been using long enough to worry about liver effects 


thanks for reading

as you guys know this is a community first and foremost interested in harm reduction above all else  this is why we need to address this issue  

it has come to our attention that you are trying to convince newcomers to the sub and first time  inexperienced stimmers to take their adderall prescription by putting it up their ass or as your kind puts it  boof that shit

not only are you causing them to panic  freak out and stay awake for the next two days but you are also promoting engaging in homosexual  sinful behaviour to underaged children when the bible clearly says that god doesn t want men putting things up their ass  he stated   miss me with that gay shit bro    in verse   in the new testament 

as someone who is concerned with protecting r researchchemicals strictly christian  family oriented values i cannot accept you lying to innocent children by saying stuff like  boofing ain t gay bro  or  i boof everyday and only suck dick once  when clearly this has made you stray from gods path and led you into life of impure tweaking

  fma    fpm and   f mph   seems   to annecdotally not be more addictice than therapeutic d amph 

however annecdotally   f mph isn t good for social and i need a stim that is simultaneously good for mood socialness and for mental work ability    fpm is said to be versatile so good for both aspects but isn t great for any of them  just good  not on par with d amph    fma is often compared to vyvanse however annecdtotally it doesn t improve mood euphoria socialness as much as vyvanse   is that true  

hence if   fma maintain the pro focus work ability of   fma  to which extent  while being on par or superior to d amph for mood socialness then it would be the clear winner 

the unknown about   fma is  can it really be as functional as vyvanse  and is it more addictive than d amph orally  if so how much  guesstimates are welcome

text:
yesterday i tried   lsd with my boyfriend  we ordered it ourselves on a research chemicals site  
first weird thing when we put it in our mouth   it has a taste which is not supposed to be on lsd  and after a tiny bit  my boyfriend got a bit of nausea  at the beginning my body felt stupidity massless and that wasn t even enjoyable   i don t know  it was really strange  
we went to watch a movie and spent the time of it trying to deal with a painful discomfort in my body  i don t know how to describe it exactly but i was feeling that it wasn t right  we took half of a   tab each  which would be considered a small dose of lsd  and i know by experience you can feel some discomfort but i never felt so bad in my body with anything else nor even when i taking a lot of shit at a time in parties  it was an oppressing sensation in my body  hurting  and caused me some spams in the leg at one point  
the trip itself wasn t that great either  it was just mostly disturbing and cold   the space just appeared stupidly immense  like i was seeing my house way hugest than it was and that was just weird and uncomfortable  i kept in mind that it could be just some kind of bad trip because he wasn t feeling that bad but after talking about it we did some researches and saw that other people experienced this body pain thing  i also bled from the nose at one point  we saw afterwards that   lsd can increase blood pressure  and went to try to sleep  this weird lightness came back and was very scary   i was exhausted but was feeling that i could not wake up if i closed my eyes  i took the risk   during the trip already i was feeling very tired and could have maybe fell asleep a couple of time  other difference from lsd to me  

fortunately i woke up and am ok but i felt important to share this experience  i think we should take research chemicals very carefully and stop spreading around that it is legal and safe  it is not legal but just not illegal yet  and i think this distinction is very important to understand  it means that those products are not known and studied enough to be subject to a law   those are all new substances created for the purpose of contouring the law and be able to sell it without risking troubles due to the legislation gap  this can lead to substances more and more fucked up due to the slight modifications of molecules they cheat with and it is to me important to see how dangerous this can be  i would say to obviously do a lot of researches beforehand this might not be that possible either due to the same nature of those  research chemicals   

this is my first post on reddit  i am very shy and don t usually express myself on social medias  but i thought it was very important to share this and i would also like to have your experiences 
did someone experience this body thing  if so  do you have a problem with your liver    lsd being a  protodrug   which means that you have to do half the job yourself by metabolising what has not been synthesized  to turn it into lsd   a liver trouble would be to me the answer to why i got so bad compared to my boyfriend who on the moment couldn t really distinguish it from lsd  but after thinking about it told me he felt some weird shit too   although i tripped a bit   somebody knows what it is supposed to do if it can t turn into lsd in the body 

ok i think that s it guys  i hope i won t appear like a lesson giver or something  but i just want people to be safe with this and write trip reports so that you can do this as safety as possible  keeping in mind that inherently this is a dangerous market  for my part i don t feel like trying more of those research chemicals and will test my drugs  because i don t want this to be sold to me as an other substance

text:
the reason i create this thread is so you can get the benefits of functional rc usage without the bad 

while diving into the world of chemical drugs i realised that there seems to be a lot of misinformation when it comes to how and how much too take of a certain compound  

i think that s the case because a lot of people go the recreational route 

but there are people like me who mainly want the functional aspect 

before i got into rc s i got introduced to the realm of chemical drugs by people who bought it off of dealers  these people consumed ridiculous amounts at once and praised it as being the right way of doing these things 

experiencing how much these people consumed and what kind of side effects they got it became instantly clear to me that there was a connection  for some unknown reason these people didn t see it  well never mind  

i instantly knew that these compounds have great potential and i knew i didn t wanna end up like a tweaker  so i studied the substances on me  and tried to find the sweet spot between functionality and no side effects  

the first problem was that street stuff is cut  and the stuff they add makes you sick  god knows what kind of tweakin retard decided to add solvents to amphetamine to create this toxic paste  

well that s not my problem anymore  i dived deeper and found research chemicals  god bless  

back then i heard about them but i didn t give em any attention since the media was flooded with all this  they are hella dangerous and kill you mambo jambo  

well it came to the point i found this subreddit and others related to it  that i felt like it s actually worth a try  and it was  the quality is pristine  like pharma grade  

but still even tho it s of such great quality the need for harm reduction is still there  long story short  

rc s are the way to go  but in order to gain from it instead of loosing you have to stay to a few simple rules  if you can t it s the proof you have to step back  

the first thing if you are new to rc s is this  

    threshold 

go to the psychonaut wiki and lookup the threshold and and high dose  

always start below the the threshold dose and then dose up slowly to the common dose throughout the day and listen to your body  take notice at what dosage you start to feel it  thats very important  everybody is different and you have to find  your  threshold dose  this way you have your baseline  and know when a tolerance starts to kick in  

   body 

throughout your day of testing a new compound you should at first feel the mental stimulation  the more you take the more you will feel your body being influenced by it  raise of heart rate or blood pressure  feeling nervous  feeling unwell in your head from neurotransmitter overload  and a lot of other stuff  

once you feel the body load come slightly  that s the frontier you don t wanna cross  write down the dosage  

   repetition

this is very important  if you use the substance only every once in a while you will not develop a tolerance  you save money  you benefit from the substance and you stay in control  

repetition is what makes you own or be owned by the substance  its supposed to be an aid  not your life saving vest  

you have to swim yourself through life  but the substance can give you that little extra  

so never do a substamce more than     days in a row  

the more euphoria the substance gives the less often you are allowed to take it  

  fma is very functional for instance but lacks euphoria and could be used   times in a week at low to moderate doses  
but   mapb for instance is too euphoric to be used this frequently  this compound you should not use more than once a month  even better several months apart  

these are just two examples  and a guidline  you are an individual and have to find the sweetspot for yourself  

every substance is different and should be treated individually  

    route of administration

the best way is to use a gelatine capsule and insert your preweight substance  

it gives the less amount of harm to your body  

it also doesn t give that addictive rush which is another plus point so you stay in control  



this is it for now  i will add more once i got the time  

i hope i can help someone with this  

have a nice day and stay responsible and safe

long story short  about   hours ago i attempted to abort a really bad trip  was already up a very long time on a big dose of   ho pcp and decided to slap two tabs of   in my dumb fucking face  with roughly   of flualprazolam    

i have a very vague memory of freaking out  not knowing what was going on  and barely being lucid enough to get to my flap solution and dose it out  then getting into bed and waiting for it to take effect  i even have it written in the notes on my phone  i record times doses when i take any benzo to avoid dependence     

thing is  i woke up about   hours ago to find my flap to be almost entirely gone  probably     worth just vanished  however  i really don’t feel like i could have taken that much  sleeping    hours seems like an extremely short amount of time for that huge of a dose  i’m definitely still sluggish and a bit out of it  but again  not nearly as much as i’d imagine  part of that i’d even attribute to taking another    when i woke up fearing extreme rebound symptoms   

it’s going to take a couple days to clear my system entirely  i’m sure  but if i’m already this lucid this quickly  what more can i expect over the coming days  i am fortunately not entirely out of flap  just what solution i had prepared  what’s the best course of action    

i already have a psych appointment coming up in the next couple days and will bring up the obvious substance abuse issues  i’m just looking to avoid a seizure

i m not sure if it s because that site is more psych and disso centric  but many common rc benzos  for instance  have no article page on that website  it s the best website i know for more novel chems  but it s missing tons of info  frankly this subreddit has more information but it s so scattered between  etzimlm nnot wkrnig  posts and people talking about going on   day benders of some cathinone that it s not exactly intuitive or easy to research  

i d like to ask if anyone knows a better resource  but also to request and challenge you all to contribute to that site so we have a more centralized hub of information from our experiences and our own research  and you re not really  researching  a research chemical if you just take a bunch of some obscure substance for   days and never share about it  we as a community have a lot of knowledgeable people  but perhaps more importantly  a lot of experience  we should preserve whatever knowledge that we have so that it can be easily accessible to someone new to a chem  or new to rcs as a whole

text:
test an rc psych for the first time at a music festival   they said     it will be fun   they said    

i usually pitch ideas about demoing nps s in public to the rc community first  which leads to good feedback and subsequent positive results  the time i got cocky and didn t  and promptly had my ass spit roasted and handed back to me 

t     swallow a     fly cap upon entry  the sun is still up and it s hot as a mf outside  so takes a   cap shortly thereafter 

t     so it begins  it s now like       and i haven t eaten anything but a handful of nuts in about    i feel an immense tension in my limbs  the desire to stretch is like the sensation of an impending sneeze that never comes  i hold it together and take a casual k bump and shoot the shit with friend  but beneath the surface i am struggling to maintain a good vibe 

t     we are at the bar but only to humor our friends  i pregamed with my usual     drinks  which turns out to be entirely too much  i m dizzy and can t keep my eyes open  as they are twitching and rolling backwards  sans any positive sensation  someone buys me a stiff drink i don t want  and when i sip the vapor fills my lungs and prevents me from getting any oxygen  having noticeable visuals now  but the body load is so dreadful i can t enjoy it 

t     we left the bar to get some air and escape the chaos of the crowd  the heat of the sun is a searing pan  the liquor leaching out of my pores is sizzling oil  and my body in this overdosed rc phenethylamine trip is a crispy strip of bacon  overheating like this has turned me into sentient breakfast meat  the so is having a rough time of it as well  they are tripping too hard to communicate effectively  i try to damage control but instead set off in search of a friend to ground them 

t     wandering through the crowds  we feel like flies with kaleidoscope eyes  the visuals from the stage conspire with the ones from my brain to make everything a foot in front of my face a blinding blur  we run into friends but eye contact is difficult and conversation is only barely manageable 

t     i can no longer suppress the growing sense of panic about the situation  abort mission  i administer     emergency alprazolam to so and myself  though the relief is virtually instantaneous and palpable  hardly puts a dent in the psychedelia  so much for  trip killer  

t     we continue to run into people we know and it s embarrassing  our behavior is indistinguishable from people completely out of their depth on lsd  and just like with lysergamides  i am experiencing a non stop stimulation of the urethra that is constantly giving the sensation of needing to pee   peeing   having already pissed myself  so is experiencing this phenomenon to a nightmarish degree  and we commiserate about it like   soldiers caught in a dramatic crossfire 

t     ketamine  weed  nicotine  etc  nothing helps turn the trip into anything resembling a recreational experience  the xanax interrupted the downward spiral into hell but from this point on  it is the most we can do just to survive this encounter 

t     some notes on the trip itself  visuals are only vaguely    like  much more jarring  strobing  epileptic seizure y compare to the wavy technicolor rainbow i was anticipating 
this is the literal definition of body load  i feel as though i ve been swaddled in a blowdryer hot  sweat drenched    ton burlap blanket    makes me feel happy  giggly  and incredibly horny  in comparison    fly has me feeling castrated  my dick has shrunk into a raisin and the headspace has such a complete dearth of sexual energy it s reminiscent of being chemically neutered on ssris  there is   euphoria or push to be sociable  yet we sway to the music like   shuddering zombies to pass the time until we can leave 

t     we depart feeling like we narrowly avoided a majorly catastrophic experience  aware that it was still particularly traumatic  

t     home but still wide awake  which is a problem on account of the impending   day of the show  my body is tired but my mind is not  i take   xanax 

t     still can t sleep  take   etizolam

t     still can t sleep  take   clonazolam

t     eventually drift off into an unrestful twilight slumber that leaves me sedated and irritable well into the following day 

some thoughts  i don t deny that   fly could be enjoyable to the right person  under the right circumstances  i decided on both the drug and the amount based upon a recommendation that described the experience as  mild with low headspace   but i also realize that taking a heavy dose for the first time in a crowded public space is a far cry from ideal set and setting  and i take full responsibility for that  

just want to reinforce the idea that   fly is by no means a substitute for    imo they feel about as far apart in subjective experience as mushrooms and lsd  similar only in the sense that they are both psychedelic drugs    fly is nothing to be taken lightly  and out of over a hundred psychedelic experiences  this one had the most miserable body load i ve experienced to date 

the verdict      won t be returning to this one anytime soon  if ever  unpleasant physical effects warrant an even lower score  but i m just grateful i had a little benzo on hand or it would have been much worse 

tldr  retard takes lots of   fly with alcohol at music fest  proceeds to have a bad time

text:
so i received my   bottles of        ml  about   weeks ago  since that time  i’ve dosed between     and     on the   or so days i’ve done it  obviously i’ve read the horror stories about blackouts and building a crazy tolerance  but luckily i’ve found it to be very anxiolytic with no amnesia and no stupid behavior 

i have slight bezo tolerance  clonazepam     bid for the last   months  but usually would finish my script in a week in a half  never went thought noticeable benzo withdrawals   a lot of times i would have amnesia but never did anything overtly stupid  i went to work  did my job well  a chemist   interacted with family  they did note that i seemed much  more friendly and sociable than normal   i did  however  have a shitty memory during my binge  i paid bills i don’t remember paying  promised family i’d take them out to dinner the following week but had no recollection when the asked me about it  filled out sheets at work correctly and accurately but don’t remember doing it  and mowed the lawn and pruned bushes that i don’t remember doing 

clonzolam has been very benign thus far  i feel less anxious and quite clear headed with no lapses in memory  my intent is to use it sparingly when i run out of my klonopin early

i bought some of the mph from a good source  here was the problem he said his batch went bad so he gave me a big discount   for around    when i first tried it it just wasn t my thing i m more into euthogine or nep  but later on i needed a boost  i had no idea the potency so i weighed out   and got amped as hell redosing about   hours later and was on a good one all day  amped with a little euphoria i d say a     on the newer stim scale  but the next day i woke up  slept like shit the night before probably from the   and dosed    not much feeling it was more like a cup of coffee  well to make it short i started     and it is now      i ve dosed     times now which   is supposed to be a high dose and defiantly feel amped  i have drank   shots of liquor with no tolerance and took   of pyrazolam  i should be on the floor but i m still just amped  its not euphoric like yesterday and it seems to have more side effects  if i don t dose atleast a little every hour and a half i just feel exhausted and cranky  so writing this post now what i have to say is first do not go off my dosages supposedly this stuff became weaker or some shit he says anyways  second it s a good drug and can be very useful but make sure you acually have shit to do not just pace back and forth all day  third the euphoria if you can call it that does go away so don t expect it after the first day or you ll just redose  four don t mix in depressants unless its either bed time or you overdid it

all in all i would probably done much less without mixing the depressants and wouldn t feel the need to redose  obviously the first day was baseline so i m overdoing it honestly hoping to feel that good mood again but i don t  just edgy tired sweaty and moody  
also don t mix with alcohol for   reasons 
   you won t feel it so you ll be slammin shots and probably redosing
   it seems like the alcohol brings out some of the bad side effects 

just my two cents guys i wish i could give you more solid numbers with how much of the   mph is acually entering my system when i dose  all nasally btw  

have fun and stay safe everyone

text:
hey all  as many know  dipt is one of the most obscure chemicals mentioned on this sub 

there’s so many posts asking questions with little answers or real info  so i took the task of doing some research and hopefully providing one of the more thorough trip reports available 
 

i ingested   dipt fumurate  orally   having recently eaten 

there is little to no comeup with this tryptamine  after     hours i really couldn’t notice anything  but that “something’s happening” tripping feeling did start to begin 

the headspace is almost non existant  but at times there would be a sense of euphoric disorientation  almost similar to some mdma feelings  it reminded me more of a shroom like sedating high  rather than an alert one  motor skills were slightly impaired similar to alcohol 

as most reports have mentioned  the major effect with dipt is major auditory hallucinations in the form of pitch shifts 

something i noticed  which i believe is why many reports have a hard time describing how pitches are affected  is that i really am not familir with how many things normally sound  it’s hard to tell pitch shift when you’re not overly familir with the way something is supposed to sound sober 

for example  the most noticeable pitch shift was on my own voice  as it sounded much different than normal  my voice sounded very similar to those anonymous interviews where a person is blacked out  it was easy to tell the pitch shift on songs or television shows i’ve watched before  but without a frame of reference  it was less noticeable listening to new music 

overall it makes all sounds shift down a few octaves making most voices and music sound silly  the light uplifting headspace makes for a unique fun time 

after about       hours in  watching tv became difficult as all the voices began to blend together into deep muddy sounds  at this point i went to sleep  which was not difficult 

the following day  and over   hours later  the pitch shift is still present  but has declined significantly  at   hours  it is not very noticeable and almost back to normal 

another interesting note  i constantly had the sensation of my throat feeling full and my ears needing to pop  but i’m not sure if this was a physical reaction  or simply psychosomatic from hearing my own voice sound strange 

this is a super unique one and i can’t say much bad about it expect the duration is pretty long  however you’re not really impaired in any way  i’d recommend trying for a night in if you get a chance

text:
i ll start off by saying that this isn t a post about how i took some absurd amount of etizolam  blacked out  lost my job  or whatever  none of that stuff  in fact this is more of an anti benzo post because i ll be talking about the exact opposite of that 

so i have some really bad insomnia issues and sometimes it gets to the point where i will stay up for several days at a time without the intention to do so  it is a miserable condition and the worst part about it is everything the doctors tell me will work absolutely does not work  i ve done several sleep studies  i use a cpap machine and it s all pointless because it doesn t help 

anyways  it s quite uncommon now a days for me to stay up several days in a row but it used to be a weekly thing  today was my lucky week though and yesterday was the start of day    i really struggled to get through the day and i came home with a migraine and my plan was to go home  take some etizolam and go straight to bed  when you have a condition like mine sometimes there is literally no such thing as too much sleep 

i got home around    ate my dinner and ended up getting in bed around    i took    etizolam because i ve never tried it before but    of alprazolam usually works well enough 

i tossed around for about an hour and a half before i actually fell asleep  and i woke up at      exactly   hours on the dot  i was still incredibly tried so i went to the bathroom and i took another    it wasn t an option for me to go another night without sleep because i just wouldn t make it  i felt like i tossed around awake again for another hour or so and then i woke up at      again exactly   hours on the dot 

i feel awful  i feel like i still didn t sleep  and the sleep that i did have felt incredibly low quality  

why didn t this work  is etizolam just an unusually mild benzo with slow onset  and unnoticeable effects  i m incredibly disappointed  usually taking a benzo when i can t sleep is my absolute last resort and it s not something i aim to do more than biweekly  now i feel like i don t even have a fallback plan if i can t get to bed because of this awful experience  

i did use an oral spray as my roa because i don t have metered droppers  perhaps that s the issue  is sublingual an incredibly low viability roa

i tried it for the first time last night  first i started with around     snorted  i eyeballed it  i know not wise but i can handle my dissocs so if i overdid it  it wouldn’t be a problem  it made me pretty damn wonky and also had this really awesome body high that was kind of like a constant light nitrous hit but less in the head more body  speaking of heady though  i find it was one of the more head fucky dissocs  not in a sketchy way but in a having trouble organizing and collecting my thoughts kinda way  i always find dissocs have this ability to give me this really clear thinking and way to break down my life and the realities of it without the lies i tell myself  much more than i get with psychs but that’s a personal thing 


so then i lay out like     eyeballed  i do this as i’m kinda coming down but still relatively high  i turn all the lights off  put on one of those   hour long trance trippy youtube videos and just laid back  the body high got increasingly more pleasurable  much stronger nitrous feeling though i wish this lasted longer because quickly after my senses started merging together and i didn’t really notice it anymore  i went into a hole for i don’t know exactly how long but it was relatively smooth to come out  a little annoying at first because it was taking a bit longer to go back to normal than say ket which is where i want to be after a hole  though this stage did give me some of that thought clarity i talked about before and i did some analyzing of myself but it wasn’t as productive as i get from other dissocs 


for recreation purposes i’m thinking next time i might take a high dose orally so that come up leading to the hole last longer because that body high was seriously amazing  it even persisted lightly on and off after as i was coming back down but it’s one of the more euphoric dissociatives i’ve done   definitely gonna go for a few more holes in the near future  i ordered it and some   meo pcp so i got both my polar end dissocs basically  one to absorb into my bed universe and one to be manic and just dissociated enough i feel more comfortable in the world

the cycle is that  pyros when used  are awesome  if you have a friend the sex can be mind blowing  sociability through the roof  hyperfocus  and mind blowing highs and rushes   however  the dark side of pyros is that psychosis is but   milligrams more from the dose you are loading and you are measuring your dosage in lung fulls

so  let s talk proper pyro rules for maximu yes there is she s in the arm right nowm safety and enjoyment  i just got over a hell night   of paranoia  sitting in dead silence for hours with bated break trying to determine if that sound was imminent death or th neighbor going to work  actor

my suggestion  weigh all your doses ahead of time and don t fall to pipe fascination as you are going to have a minor od  eventually the delusions become so real  so very tangible you finally tell somomem and they just don t understand and oreaxh

text:
a formatted version of the trip report is available on the  effectindex  https   effectindex com reports comfortably melty and floaty  

  setting and subject information   

   setting   in my bedroom
   age   early  
   height            
   weight            
   health   good  overall 

  introduction   

i avoided reading any trip reports of this substance beforehand  so i would have no specific expectations when i tried it  with the exception of checking psychonautwiki for a dosage guideline 

note that i list   as the dose in this report  i had dosed   previously the night before but passed out during the comeup  as i had been exhausted from the flight i had just been on  given i had spent about   hours travelling  in total 

  onset   

           
woke up about   minutes before  and as a result of realizing the nap i had planned during the comeup of my last dose had turned into sleeping through the whole trip  i decided to dose   
           
i’m really starting to feel the full body dissociation  and it’s rapidly setting in 
           
my lips are entirely numb  and so is most of my skin  i’m quickly feeling the effects setting in  typing is quickly becoming a struggle  and i’m feeling an almost uncomfortable body load  i spent the next     minutes lying in bed feeling very anxious  and almost paranoid  it quickly passed  but i’d say it’s the most intense comeup of any substance i’ve done  despite the fact it wasn’t very physically intense 

  peak   

           
typing is really a struggle at this point  and i’m physically numb on most of my body  i feel entirely weightless  as if i’m not even lying down and instead floating on air  tactile sensation isn’t really changed all that much  and isn’t noticeably pleasant how it is on dxm 
           
i spent the next half hour ish having very introspecting thinking  my sense of self was very abstract and moldable  in a way  at the time i described it as going back to the drawing board and asking for people’s suggestions  taking them quite literally with responses like “but that would make me into a frog” to being told to draw a frog  at this point the physical sensations were smoothing out a lot  and the trip only got much more relaxing and comfortable from then on 
           
i was extremely comfortable at this point  and my soft blanket was beginning to feel quite nice  and i was very comfortably warm  i feel purged  and rejuvenated  and i’m in a much better mood than i was earlier  mentally the headspace has been quite clear since the comeup  and i almost feel sober until i try to move around  putting my glasses back on causes the slight double vision to be noticeable  so i keep them off 

  offset   

           
i practically feel like i’m back at baseline  except for moving around still being slightly wonky 
           
i decided to take a shower  and eventually it feels more welcoming and comfortable as i finish it up 

  afterthoughts   

i spent most of the day relaxing and programming afterwards  feeling very rejuvenated and in a wonderful mood  i feel like this was the perfect substance for getting settled back home after a month long vacation  and feel it was a good choice despite not having done it before  i had planned to relax in the evening after getting off the plane  but had turned out to be too tired to experience that one properly  the combined sedation and relaxation  with a clear headspace yet physical dissociation  is a really wonderful combo  and i’m excited to see what other pcp analogs hold for me

i took   meo pce as my first disso away from dxm and nitrous  got me some  and started with low high intranasal doses        this quickly led to redosing apon the second day of much higher doses  the last day i dosed  i ended up taking   intranasally 

there were times where i thought that i was going to have a raid upon my house for even possessing a small amount of an unscheduled substance  this was towards the end of the whole experience  however  i had a night where i just laid in bed looking at the wall and having completely mind boggling thoughts about what my life had led up to this moment and why society was structured around peoples looks and individual monetary profit while the people at the bottom of society idolize the people that will never even notice them  i had tried to keep track of other things that had gone on  honestly could not tell you where the hell those thoughts had gone or where they came from  

the experience was all around fun  horrifying  eye opening  breathtaking  relaxing  and anything in the middle  i was notably manic at some points and had no idea what the hell was going on  i did some things that could come back in the future and hurt me  or so i think i did  i am unsure yet  i passed some exams for college with flying colors  but i do not attribute that knowledge to the   meo pce at all  i have been practicing computer science since i was a young kid  at some point  i had even dosed allylescaline  this is where i know things had gotten interesting towards the mania side because i had no idea why anybody would have done that  that experience was intense  to say the least 

this really wasn t a trip report because it spanned across the course of three days  possibly still affecting me as i write this  it was an experience that i know i will not be taking again  especially not to that extent    meo pce was very enjoyable so long you stay in the bounds of responsible use  not going through a quarter gram in a short amount of time

text:
hello dear community 
i wanted to do a little report about mxpr because i hardly see any experience report on it 

first of all  i am very familiar with research dissozoativa  but after testing   and dck extensively  i found them too bald and boring  you can almost say that you can integrate them into everyday life 
now on to the mxpr 

i drew around   mg of the hcl first to do an allergy test  after about   minutes i started num with a very thin nose  you have to say that the mxpr hcl is very fluffy  in contrast to other powders 

set  about a year ago i exaggerated a bit with lsd  until i then had psychosis and depression which  however  were only very easily noticeable until recently  during that time i was only isolated and smoked weed by myself  months long  but i digress   

setting  dark room  windows open with street lamps that lightly illuminate my room  in the background still led on with a turquoise hue  so quite cozy  i also played some quiet music 

now when i have transported the fluffy line into my nasal cavity  there was a stinging sensation that tickled my brain too  but it wasn t uncomfortable  i played some cold war with my co workers  after about   minutes i drew another   centimeter line  the stabbing pain was noticeably less  but after   minutes i still didn t notice anything  i have to say that i weigh according to the eye  eye balling   that s why i put a dose that i would otherwise have divided by   
and a short time later a small rush became noticeable  which gradually got stronger  i told my colleagues that the game was too exhausting for me and i let music play on my headset  i closed my eyes and bang i was in a world where i no longer noticed myself  i didn t notice my body anymore  i immediately noticed a pleasant feeling about my loose body  which cannot be compared with other research dissociatives  so i was flying through a very bright and warm dimension  looks felt so great  i didn t want to lose that feeling at the moment  i felt little of my body  but what i felt felt like something on opioids  tilidine  tramadol etc   music felt so great too  especially the bass  it was like a current flowing through my whole body  very nice feeling  but after about   hour it showed only a slight or no effect at all  and as beautiful as the feeling was  i wanted to dive into this world again  but i thought of my resolution   why do you want more when it s already at its best  
so i decided to roll a joint that turned out to be very good in retrospect  because he had pushed the effect again for about   minutes  the best thing was that i had almost no motor difficulties  and i wasn t too bad either  unlike other derivatives  after about   hours i lay down and was able to fall asleep after an hour  without great cev s  the next i didn t feel a hangover or anything  it also has a mild antidepressant effect on me 

i wait until the next experience because i don t want the  tolerance  not to spoil the beauty of this trip 

i thank everyone who has read this far  i have to admit that i m stoned and please don t be mad at my spelling  i m not the best at english either  i come from germany    

i hope my contribution was able to provide some clarity and i have to say that it is my first report that i have ever written 

thank you dear reddit community  lt

text:
dear community 

i would like to gather some information on dipyanone overdoses that either caused someone to die or almost led to it  a person i know almost died of an overdose of dipyanone just a couple of weeks ago  luckily he was found by his roommate  brought to the hospital early enough and they were able to safe his life  in other forums  i found a few other reports of people who just barely survived  the ones who are dead  however  won t be able to tell us their story 

we should gather all information possible on the dangers this substance possesses  especially because it s so easily available in some nations  this is particularly crucial to protect users who have little to none experience with opioids  and those who are very young and are just curious to experiment with substances which can be easily ordered on the internet 

if we come to the conclusion that dipyanone will put the life of many users in severe danger  we should put pressure on our trusted vendors  who sell dipyanone  to put an age restriction on dipyanone  ask them to very clearly warn of the dangers of the substance itself regarding overdose  of course  in this case  also the excruciating dependency issues   and  possibly  request if they would stop selling it altogether and instead try to provide rc opioids that have a higher safety profile  

i thank you for your contribution  stay safe

he’s having a mild panic attack with very jittery movements  i try to calm him down but i worry he was going to enter a full blown panic attack with hyperventilation  as he is prone to such

i kind of feel like an asshole for giving him a benzo though  don’t know if he’s going to try seeking it out or anything like that  i don’t know if i was correct in giving him a taste of a pretty good benzo 

it did definitely help him and i don’t think i’m ever going to repeat this but  aita

text:
so i plan on picking up a gram of some benzo  i have experience with triazolam  etizolam  zopiclone  and  lorazepam  i haven’t decided which benzo i want to get because i need some help choosing and i need info about some of my choices 

i currently use etizolam for hangovers and sleep at most once a week  whenever i’m hungover i find     of etizolam makes it a million times better and helps me get a great sleep where i wake up feeling fully rested and rejuvenated when i’m hungover i get a spinning sensation that makes it extremely difficult to fall asleep   i can’t seem to figure out what part of etizolam makes my hangovers so much better so please leave a comment if benzos help with your hangover or if you have a theory on why 

i have put together   benzos i think are promising for sleep hangovers 

nitrazolam 
  reviews needed

 tripsit dosage duration  https   drugs tripsit me nitrazolam 

a benzo similar in strength to etizolam with a slightly longer duration  most reviews i’ve read say it’s relatively hypnotic  a decent muscle relaxant  and pretty euphoric benzo  to me  this one seems well balanced but i definitely need more input as there weren’t that many reviews 

rilmazafone 
  reviews needed

 tripsit dosage duration  https   drugs tripsit me rilmazafone 

a new benzo on the rc scene but has been used medically in japan for a while  rilmazafone is the benzo i have the least amount of information on  the onset seems pretty fast with the duration lasting     hours  it is primarily a hypnotic with little of anything else  as a bonus  it is water soluble but it’s a prodrug so i don’t think snorting it would really do anything  if you have any experience with rilmazafone please do comment it is new to the rc scene so i don’t have a lot on it 

etizolam 

 tripsit dosage duration  https   drugs tripsit me etizolam 

not technically a benzo etizolam has been on the scene awhile and is prescribed in multiple countries around the globe while having plenty of information about it  i have a lot of experience with etizolam so everything i talk about in this summary is from personal experience  it has a fast onset with a short duration compared to most other rc benzos  it has good muscle relaxation  kills anxiety well  and is euphoric but not very hypnotic to me  etizolam is what i see as the most versatile benzo and many would agree with me  


flualprazolam 

 tripsit dosage duration  https   drugs tripsit me flualprazolam 

also has been on the scene for a while flualprazolam is a long lasting potent benzo with fuck off kind of hypnotic that makes it extremely easy to just wanna sleep  apart from being very hypnotic its muscle and anxiety relieving abilities seem to be meh  my only concerns with flualprazolam are blacking out  skyrocketing tolerance  and its duration lasting so long i wake up still sedated  

bromazolam 
  reviews needed

 tripsit dosage duration  https   drugs tripsit me bromazolam 

pretty new to the rc scene bromazolam seems to have a decent length of action lasting slightly longer than normal alprazolam and a normal potency  bromazolam is not super hypnotic but has good euphoria  decent muscle relaxation  and good anxiety relief  my concerns with bromazolam are its metabolites  apparently  they are very amnestic with long durations of action so this is a large concern of mine because there’s no point in using bromazolam if i’m going to be mentally handicapped for the next day or two  please let me know if you have experienced the amnestic effects of bromazolam’s metabolites

for instance when everyone is enjoying the night of drinking i’ll bust out some whippits  nitrous oxide  and everyone has a blast and gets excited haha a nice bump to the evening like the cherry on top  but i’m looking for more substances that easily stack and add to a party but without being to aggressive like cocaine which is a decent option  but preferably something more light hearted bc these people are newbies to most substances
