text:
i had   of pure   meo mipt powder laying around and researched a bit on how to take an accurately measured dose  it was difficult since i didn t have any good volumetric dosing methods 
i had a ccell vape cartridge laying around  and since i made my own thc cartridges before  i thought i d try to make my moxy dosable by turning it into a vape cart 
                        
the process was quite easy  i put a shot glass on a mushroom heating mat  put in the    i weight checked   added     of pg and   of cbd with some terpenes for flavor 
this would come out at around     which was perfect for my   cartridge 
i dissolved it in about   minutes time  and put the mixture into the cartridge with a syringe 
                         
it looked great and clear  the viscosity could have been thicker  but it should work 

excited me thought  i should try this out to see if i should make any adjustments to the mixture 

 i think it ook      i thought it would be easy to measure out  but i messed up 

what happened next could have been expected  but i was too ignorant and excited to try 
i went outside to my garden  sat next to a butterfly bush with my vape in my hand  i put it on a low temperature  took a hit  i felt it flowing  held it in for   sec  and there was basically no cloud when i blew it out  so i put the temp higher  i enhaled a   sec puff  feeling it filled my lungs  held again for   seconds  and this time once again only a very small amount of vapour came out exhaling 
i immediately felt light headed  but  thinking it was placebo i took another hit or two 
after this i realized i got hit by a very peculiar and forcefully hitting chemical 
i thought  what if   meo mipt i d heavier than pg and it falls to the bottom making me dose a lot higher     i don t know if that could be  prob not 
i heard my neighbors and all kids in the street playing in the garden  as if all of a sudden everyone was standing next to me  making noise 
physically i felt like i couldn t stand anymore  but i didn t dare to lay down in the grass because i felt like people were looking at me 
i went inside to clean up the mess i made while making the cartridge  it kind of felt like dying  but i was able to function and keep up that i was in fact okay 
i felt like having a relaxed panic attack  it was physical 
this is   minutes later  i uncomfortably cleaned up and went up stairs 
i saw waves and distortions everywhere  my head felt incredibly fuzzy but my mind was still clear  i got some pains  chronic pain i already had  but enhanced  and went to the attic to chill out and evaluate wtf was happening 
i did some yoga on a yoga ball trying to calm down  my body felt as if i was having a mega panick attack  but my heart rate and breathing felt okay  i put on some music  saying to myself it was just a comeup at hyperspeed  everything will be fine 
   min
i listened to some classical music  did some yoga  and kind of felt calm but uneasy  i didn t enjoy the experience but i thought i should at least try to get a good experience out of it 
time seemed to go slow 
while shaking and feeling uneasy  i tried to play some guitar  i jammed some jimi hendrix but it was difficult  i was severely dissatisfied with my playing  but since i was under influence  i agreed with myself that it was pretty decent 
it calmed me down and at this moment i was full on tripping 
it wasn t visually pleasing unfortunately  just vibrant colors  waves and distortions  it was difficult to focus and it was a struggle to keep my guitar in place 
   min
i took some crystals and stones to look at and hope they would somehow calm me down  they looked absolutely alien  i was convinced one of my rocks didn t come from earth 
   min
for comfort i went to my bathroom to take a hot shower  this changed everything  
i felt in control again  the heat dissolved all uneasy sensations  finally i felt bliss and could enjoy the headspace  wow that was intense i thought  glad the hard part was over 
i spent an hour in the shower enjoying my deep thoughts and the infinite hot water streaming on my body 

   hours 
the effects started to fade  colors were still a bit vibrant  and there was some more contrast to everything 
after this way too long relaxing shower  i had so much energy  i decided i d my earphones  put out all the lights  and put on some intense psytrance  i raved in the darkness of my warm humid bathroom  on my own  and it was freaking fantastic  i understood why it was called psytrance  and i danced feeling the music for half an hour like no one could judge me for my actions  i felt at peace and loved the synergy between the fading moxy and dancing 
     hours
i m done  back to my day as if nothing happened  the effects are gone  i just feel like working out and doing something active  i guess it has stimmy after effects 

i decided to put away my vape cart for a while  this all happened yesterday and i thought i d share my experience  it was overwhelming  strange  short lasting and quite fun and enlightening in the second half of it 

thanks for reading 
here s an image of the cartridge i made



 vape cartridge i made  http   imgur com a

text:
recently i used   fma to study five full days  literally  five full days    to    i am now   and i can honestly say  that was the first time i ever did that in my life  i always thought i wasn t made for studying or a higher education 

those five days gave me   credits  or     of a bachelor degree   but most importantly    made me realize i can study  i can sit down and actually learn  even on an academic level  it still blows my mind 

so please don t just take   fma to study and don t think about it  a rc doesn t give you superpowers  it s just blocks and enhances certain things    fma truly inspired me 

 thank you for coming to my ted talk

text:
i recently accessed some moxy and have been experimenting with dosages  i mixed   with   distilled water for a   ml concentration  

a few months ago  i tried    it was incredibly energizing and uplifting  but i felt very antsy   it needed to be subdued with alcohol or ghb  there were some visuals  but just brighter colors and slight waviness  no headspace that i can recall  

in may  i experimented again with what i thought was the same dosage  however  this time it was highly psychedelic to the point that i had a challenging experience  i kept the solution in a   glass bottle with a dropper top and etched the dropper stem  not sure if this is what it’s called  at the   mark  i theorized that the moxy may have settled toward the bottom and i didn’t shake the solution before dosing out  but i’m not really sure  

most recently and more carefully  i tried it again at a dose of   orally  it was great  it felt like taking a short term stimulant without any stimulant downside  i would describe the feeling as less intense adderall  with noticeable euphoria  energy  confidence  and lightheartedness  i redosed   times when i felt the effects diminish  all with the same outcome  there was no real psychedelic experience at all  which was ok with me  i absolutely love stimulants but also really love to sleep  so usually avoid them  this is a great find for me  i plan to try to replicate the results this weekend

text:
age   

weight    lbs

dosage    mg intranasal

setting  on the train  walking around the city  at my house

 amp    

preface    me pcpy is an exciting development in the world of arylcyclohexylamines  once again i’ll give a brief chemistry pharmacology primer to contextualize this drug  if that’s not of interest  just skip to the body of the report  and per usual  there is an overall summary of the compound at the end 

pcpy is a close cousin to pcp  the second “p” in “pcp” denotes a piperidine group  where the essential nitrogen in the compound is part of a hexagonal   atom ring structure  pcpy is very close to that  with the nitrogen in a pentagonal   member ring  forming what’s called a pyrrolidine group  both pcp and pcpy and most of their analogues have similar qualities like high potency and stimulating effects 

pcpy was first only seen as a street drug  made by enterprising basement chemists to try and circumvent laws around manufacturing pcp  very little information exists on the subjective effects of pcpy itself    meo pcpy cropped up on the market briefly around mxe’s heyday  but even then it was an obscurity and very little data trickled out before it too faded into oblivion    me pcpy represents an exciting return to a base compound with a lot of potential 

personal correspondence with dr  jason wallach and poring through some of his publications brought about some hints as to what effects this compound may have  it was shown to be a triple reuptake inhibitor  meaning it leads to a buildup of the neurotransmitters serotonin  dopamine  and norepinephrine  perhaps the most famous triple reuptake inhibitor is cocaine   this generally can display stimulating effects but it also has interesting implications with regards to antidepressant effects  much more formal research is needed in this area with this particular compound  a few other scattered reports suggested high potency and subjective stimulating effects  i managed to obtain a sample of this and had to see for myself 

the short of it is that this is a stimulating potent dissociative with a short duration  the headspace is shallow but it is euphoric and social and prone to redosing  it is not so much a trip as it is a casual high  though a unique and wonderful one at that  again  at the end of the report is a more detailed summary of this compound and its effects at different doses overall character  along with other properties pertinent to the batch going around 

     i am waiting alone at a train station in my home town  eating some dinner  i had just dropped my car off to a family mechanic for state inspection so i had to take the train back home to the city  it’s a lovely summer afternoon  the sun is getting low in the sky casting everything in a peach golden light  the trees arc overhead and shimmer in a pastel suburban breeze  my train isn’t coming for another half hour 

i pour out a pre measured capsule onto my hand and snort it down in one go   it burns a lot  bringing tears to my eyes  there is a bitter stinging petroleum flavor typical of ach’s  this is near unbearable for a minute or two but the pain subsides to a dull numbness 

     already feeling a bit dissociated  just a tad lightheaded and spacy  my extremities feel just a little number  great dark thunderheads tower and loom and rumble in the distance  timidly lit by the fire of setting sun  where i am it is balmy and nice  it feels like my feet are floating off the ground  with the onset it seems what appetite i had before has completely dissipated  i wrap up the rest of my dinner and pack it away 

     my teeth are numb and buzzy  like i can feel them invisibly vibrating in the gaps in my gums  this is a dissociation that sets into my bones  a high frequency vibration that shakes me into a dull half anesthesia  i am dizzy now  my head is spinning like i’ve had too much alcohol  i am taken aback by the speed and intensity with which this drug comes crashing in  it has an exhilarating rush  all i can do is sit on my bench and gaze down the tracks into the distance  my dazed attention lapsing into my own skull 

     bearing down harder and harder like that thunderstorm in the distance  my field of vision is flashing  i feel waves of anesthesia pulse through me  i am stimulated and short of breath  there is a sense or rising and inflating in my skull and everything looks blurry except for what’s right before me  it is like extreme tunnel vision  the walls of these hallucinated vitreous tunnels illuminated by flowing pulses of understated light  my sense of depth perspective has all but collapsed  distant buildings and trees telescoping to the forefront of my vision  i am glad i am alone here right now  in the looming dusk 

     i get up and pace around a bit just to get a measure of how exactly this dissociation is manifesting  there is a surprising degree of physical dissociation  my limbs feel heavy  well lubricated with excess momentum  my proprioception is led slightly astray  it is like every part of my body is moving easier and more than it should  more than i am used to  i feel clumsy  dizzy  uncoordinated  but i can still walk straight and be steady on my feet  perhaps to an outside observer my posture is weird and my walk a tad off kilter but i feel like i could outwardly project relative sobriety  my extremities are buzzing and numb  this is similar to any of the manic  lucid dissociatives out there  pcp or   meo pcp or   me pcp or   meo pce  though a bit heavier and less precise 

the mental dissociation rules first and foremost  it is like a big weight has landed in my skull  a pile of bricks that leaves me dazed and listless  confused and baffled by the mere presence of my surroundings  visually  everything is flashing and blurry  there is a stimulation coursing through my core  conflagrating out from my pounding heart  rippling down my muscles  flashing my anesthetized phantom limbs with vibrating electricity  as content as i am to just sit still i feel obligated to be up and in motion  moving feels fantastic in fact  this drug would be excellent for dancing or some other physically demanding social activity 

the drip is hitting and it is unpleasant  it stings and irritates on the way down the back of my throat  whatever appetite i had left is certainly gone now 

beyond the flashing and depth perception there isn’t much in the way of open eyed visuals  not much patterning or color  just strange alterations to perspective  blurring and tunnel vision  i sit and close my eyes to take stock of that space  i am greeted with great pulsing radial images  great turning floral wheels  mostly black but adorned in auras of maroon and yellow ochre  they are hardly perceptible  not vivid by any means  but they turn in tune with a general sense of perpetual rotational motion that carries the dissociation of this experience like the turbulence of an undulating sea 

     everything wobbles and waves  my entire field of vision is gently vibrating  warm electricity crackles into my fingers and toes and extremities  it is mostly dark now  visuals begin to dance in the sky  radiant and rotational with neon fringes  there is a blast of light glinting off the tracks in the distance  a rumble and a shriek of a great machine  the train is approaching  i stand up and take a second to collect myself before boarding and being immersed in the world of the living  this feels like an elaborate fantasy or a half formed memory from some lagging dream  i don a mask  give a nod to the conductor and climb aboard  the world taken by vibrations from this rumbling machine of light and the odor of brake fluids  i find a secluded seat towards the back  windows eventually facing the city skyline  and settle in  content to be totally unnoticed  it is lucid and functional  but at the same time quite heavy and off base 

i then notice someone sitting right in front of me  another old friend from elementary school who i have previously lived with and shared a number of psychedelic experiences with  we haven’t seen each other in a good long time  he is commuting home from his job  we chat briefly  the world falling away from this singular focus of my attention  talking and interacting flows smoothly but it also disjointed and uncomfortable  i am not quite sure how to conduct myself in a public space full of strangers  i feel like i would be very content to talk to a person in relative privacy  in a previous experience  i had dosed this drug prior to attending a party of good friends and acquaintances  and it proved delightfully social  making me articulate  commanding attention and brimming with confidence  that sensation seems to be quite contextual  he gets off at his stop in the suburbs and i am again alone on the train  i plug in my headphones and listen to oneohtrix point never’s “garden of delete” 

     i don’t like that i have to sit still for this entire train ride  that i can’t get up and pace around  my whole body is getting creeping crawling pulses of numbness  i feel like ball lighting  bouncing off the walls with pent up energy  i just want to run and jump and exercise my muscles  but i have to settle for fidgeting in place to not make a scene  i am explosive and tense and existing faster than the world around me  even on this train as it barrels down into the night city  glints of light drifting past 

     i arrive at my stop and make my way off the train  it feels so nice to stand up and move again  i am tense and my gait feels awkward and stiff  but there’s a spring in my step  extra energy and extra momentum propelling me forward with a steely determination 

i have stepped out onto a major commercial corridor  a recent development in this city’s downtown to try and mimic time’s square  massive screens blast sterile white light from advertisements onto the street  reflecting in blue on the asphalt and black granite and filth that coats everything  concentric fountains of visuals seep from the lights  cascading down in steady ripples  ghostly and subtle but certain  it is dizzying and disorienting and i suddenly feel very small  beaten back by the fires of neon until i am left cowering like a roach in the gutter  small and inconspicuous  i duck behind a pillar and pull out my one hitter  taking a few puffs of cannabis to lighten up the walk home  with things pleasantly smoothed out and an aura of smoke around me and the filth of my work clothes i set out and pace between the shadows in the grime  obscured from the glistening gods overhead 

     i walked hurriedly home through the night city  it’s a warm friday night and of course people are out and about enjoying the weather  i have little interest in stopping and smelling the roses  i would like to just be back in my house  nevertheless i do occasionally have to stop and wait for traffic  tie my shoe  respond to a message  etc  when i stop it feels like the experience bears down on me like a big gooey tidal wave of static  there are drifting visuals on the buildings and on the sky  like there is shadowy black water flowing down every surface  the whole world feels like its slowly drifting and cascading  and my sense of body is trickling into the concrete and flowing into the gutter  in contrast to this  a glowing energy is rising through me  flaring into the atmosphere in an electric corona crackle in fluorescent white light  i am buzzing  drifting  dizzy and disoriented  but there is a stable energy springing through my limbs  ensuring i remain locked into my path 

     i get home and am again thrown for a disorienting loop by the change of setting  from the warm swirling night rippling with energy  to the quiet dim light of the house with still  cool  conditioned air  i interact briefly with my partner and do a few chores before taking a shower  the space is warm and meditative  the sensation of hot water cascading off my body is heavenly stimulation  steaming off of me as electricity courses through my veins  the clatter of water on the tub echoes and reverberates into a cacophony that pummels its way through my skull  pulling me into a trance  my sense of body  my anchoring to our world swirled down the drain to mingle with my languid long hairs  i am left in a daze where i am replaced by a simulacrum of solidified light  a theseus’ ship that felt naturally at my command  a body rinsed away from the buzzing of electric nerves 

i usually take scalding hot showers  but i already felt warm  walking all the way home in the balmy night  and the drug felt like it had me warmer too  i turned the water down and savored a gentle cold deluge  the chills shocking me back into reality a bit and pulling me back into my body  i feel fairly lucid when i step out and dry off and dress myself  the most noticeable effect being excess momentum in my movements and a numbness across my skin 

     i talk to my partner a bit but can’t really find much to say  i am in a bit of a daze  a lower dose taken previously had me unable to stop running my mouth  it seems there is a sweet spot for socializing  i go downstairs where its colder and plop down nice and clean on the couch  i am buzzing with dissociation and stimulation  but my body feels comfy and not overwrought  it feels nice to stretch out  listen to music  talk to some people online  there is a daze and a dumbness that washes over me  it doesn’t feel like the cognitive enhancement imbued by substances like   meo pcp or   meo pce  i am just empty and fast and dissociated  i would describe the overall headspace of this drug as “shallow”  there really was no tendency towards curiosity  flow of thought  processing  introspection  or pattern formation  it is quiet and neutral  but it burns bright and hot  i am comfortable and satisfied with the state i’m in  if a little restless 

i am past the peak but there is still a visual drifting on the white of the walls  a messy wash of colors blending together to form a contrasting visual mud  with my eyes closed it is a similar slow  steady  radial motion 

     the sensation of stimulation has overtaken the sensation of dissociation  all that remains is a sensation of floatiness and weightlessness  a sensation of being ethereal  of defying gravity from the energy in my veins  i am alert and talkative now  more articulate and coherent than before  i am enjoying just lying here  taking in sensations  i am idly playing minecraft and listening to music  it seems like a perfectly mindless way to wile away a delightfully mindless experience  i am beyond a daze  beyond dumbness  now i am taken by a stimmy afterglow  a neutral sense of euphoria  i really want to redose  it seems gone too soon  but for the sake of this report i restrain myself 

     playing good ol’ chivalry medieval warfare now  definitely on the downward slope  my partner comes down and interacts for a bit  i feel a bit dazed and the physical stimulation is dying down  while a distinct mental stimulation and clarity remains 

     back to baseline almost entirely now save for some residual numbness in my fingertips 

     entirely down 

 amp    

 amp    

conclusion  if i had to describe   me pcpy as anything i would call it dissociative cocaine  and this isn’t just because it supposedly shares a portion of its pharmacology with cocaine  it is short  fast  fun  stimulating  euphoric  hedonistic  reinforcing  and low commitment  it stands apart from most of the other dissociatives for lacking in depth or introspective ability  the dissociation is there but not in any meaningful way that has one pondering their role in existence  it seems to conveniently obscure such thoughts  or not allow room for them in the first place  just smacking a user up with the physical and mental sensation of dissociation  it is perfectly crafted for casual low commitment use 

this isn’t to say this is a bad thing  there are different drugs for different purposes  i see this one as serving the purpose of an excellent party drug  a lower dose in a social setting was delightful  i was articulate  disinhibited and confident  as though i had mixed cocaine and alcohol  though   me pcpy has the added benefit of not having the toxic metabolite  cocaethylene    
one quality i would like to emphasize about this drug is that it could prove quite troublesome to people prone to binging or compulsive use  the short duration and the pleasant rush of the comeup lend to  chasing the high   redosing again and again  even in many situations where i only planned on dosing once i found myself reneging on that and redosing anyway  for this report i wanted to capture the experience of a single dose but i really had to hold myself back from dosing again when i got home  in previous weeks i found myself using it multiple days in a row  something i almost never do with dissociatives  it feels light and purely recreational but people should be wary of overuse  as the dissociative mania that builds with repeated doses could easily devolve into the territory of stimulated psychosis  while i don t use dissociatives daily  the relative functionality and short duration of this seem dangerous in being a slippery slope into that territory 

the general qualities of the drug are such 

dosage information carries the caveat that i have a slight tolerance to dissociatives and that i tend to opt for more intense experiences  i would consider   mg to be an upper cap on dosage  i ventured beyond that but there seems to be diminishing returns  with the experience asymptotically leveling out at the top  there was little discernible difference between   and   mg beyond a greater sense of physical dissociation    mg felt like the fully fleshed effects of this compound  a   mg dose was delightfully social and warm and hypomanic  and redosing     mg bumps spaced hours after an initial dose made for a fun night spent with others 

it is quite caustic to snort  burning intensely for a short time and seeming to cause some sort of tissue damage that can lead to nosebleeds the next day  sublingual dosing was the same potency  though this too left a sore spot on the mucus membrane  oral dosage was the same potency  but with a much longer comeup and less of a rush  no other routes of administration have been attempted yet 

it hits fast depending on route of administration  onset for an intranasal dose is within   minutes  followed by a  –  minute comeup  about an hour peak  and a steady comedown for     hours  duration did not seem to increase with a higher dose 

visual effects are light  often consisting of subtle drifting or radial forms  there is a sense of constant motion  whether it be textures perpetually flowing like an ancient creek or the dizzying steady rotation that took hold when i closed my eyes  auditory effects had a nice synesthesia with tingling physical sensations  it was mildly physically dissociating  not impairing movement enough to interfere with walking around in public  though i definitely felt a good distance off base  there were sensations of creeping dissociation  crackling down my nerves like arcs of electricity  this substance is distinctly stimulating  though not overwhelmingly so  the stimulation exists in greater proportion to the other effects relative to drugs like   meo pcp or   meo pce though i would still distinctly classify this as a stimulating dissociative rather than vice versa  the stimulation adds a lot of motion and momentum to the experience it pairs well with physical activity like dancing or just going for a walk 

for those seeking a comparison to familiar substances  it bears the most similarity to   me pcp and pcp  a moot comparison because those drugs are fairly uncommon  it shares a quality of shallow  hedonistic  stimulating dissociation  perhaps the next closest thing would be   meo pcp  though that substance is longer lasting  less stimulating  less physically dissociating  more introspective  more visual  and more psychedelic  they seem worlds apart  though when compared to a more sedating dissociative like ketamine  they can clearly be classified together  as for the triple reuptake inhibitor activity  i cannot say this is a sensation i can discretely pick out from a drug  though perhaps the self reinforcing dosage behavior and compulsion to redose this drug is because of that property 

overall  this is a light  fun dissociative that is best for casual use  a fantastic and low commitment party drug that shines in social settings  nevertheless  it should be approached with caution and the utmost responsibility  i can imagine it would be very easy to make mistakes with something so potent and seemingly forgiving

text:
okay so i am   years old  i started taking   day etizolam around   years ago  it progressed to around   in   weeks  i then ordered clonazolam instead of dizlazopam by accident to taper down from eliz cause i was high as fuck while ordering 

i then ordered diclazopam immediatel the next day  but when i opened the envelope  it was empty  i checked the vendor and they were out of stock the next day so they clearly fucked me over  

diclazopam was not around for around   months afterwards on any vendorso so i continued to use clam 

i m a pollydrug addict so i m addicted and take any drug at any point  favorite being stimulants  after a   day stim binge  of course i need a heavy dose of clam to sleep  

basically  it escalated from   mg a day for approx   weeks  then   for   weeks    for   weeks    for   months     for a month   u get the picture 

i am am now on   clonozolam per day for over   months  i calculated and it would take me   years of excruciating tapering to quit  after which i would develop dementia or alzhimers  

i also abused over   grams of hexen    grams       grams in   day on   occasions  a phip  nep  a php  various dissociative snd psychedelics  coke and speed 

i have taken large doses of psychedelics over   times including   cp lsd  shrooms  doc  salvia     cb    cb fly  ho met etc   

i was addicted to   grams of phenibut and   grams of kratom a day  i quit them in horrible fashion only to repeat this horrible relapse over   times 

i have mixed numerous stimulants with dissociatives  tramadol  kratom  weed etc 

i took   of pure amphetamine with   tramadol together  knowing that its a fast way to a risky death  

mixed   apb with a php  nep  weed snd   fdck 

basically i have mixed and done everything for the last   years   if anyone is wondering  i m still alive because i was a fitness fanatic with good cardio and studied and used antioxidants vasodilators  botanicals  and vitamjns minerals and nootropics  i have studied them for over   years as this was my passion 

i accidentally took   of o pce orally recently because i didn t check the label and thought it was   mmc  i then popped   rock of   because i was afraid of holing from the o pce  it worked  but again  put extra strain on my heart  my brain and heart are damaged 

my dopamine serotonin receptors are fried most definitely 

right now i have some kidney disease due to high blood pressure from all the stimulants dissociatives i abused  my feces are sometimes black or red 

as of now i have quit everything except   clonazolzm per day  

i do not wish to suffer   years to get off it only to develop mental issues and most likely stroke etc  

i have a plan to end my life  in around     years after i enjoy all the drugs i want  why not go out with a bang and enjoy my last years on earth  i am fully content with my decision  

i fucked up and its no one s fault but mine i know this is really bad for this community but i had to put it this disclaimer on exactly how destructive research benzodiazapines are 

i m not showing off but i am multi talented snd could have achieved a lot in life  

i m    i have never had a girlfriend or had sex i receive compliments that i am super good looking with a kind and funny personality   i always try to help people in crisis as i strongly believe in equality and karma 
also  please don t feel sorry for me  

i m begging you all to stay away from benzos  and live a normal  functional life  we were gifted a life which is a beautiful thing  please don t risk going down my route  

i was also one of those that thought that i will not ruin my life with drugs  but here i am  

take care guys ❤

so yesterday i took   pregabalin at an amusement park  about   hours later i seized up  fell hard onto the pavement  busted up my head  and got a concussion  thank god that i was with friends who knew what to do  not too long after i was in the er and getting tests done and the doctor told me to stick to weed and nothing else  apparently once you have a seizure you are at very high risk for future seizures  my doctor said i should stop doing drugs 

now that sucks because i have tons of rcs that i ve been responsible with  a wonderful collection of maybe    different drugs  some rare now 

which drugs rcs would i still be okay with doing  which one s don t have a high risk of seizures  if it s still possible i ll have a seizure than i m not gonna consider  but i heard benzos are safe  at fair doses   maybe opioids   

kratom  high doses of caffeine  nicotine  tryptamines  dissociatives  can i ever do mdma benzofurans again  benzos  opioids 

if anyone knows anything i would really appreciate it

so  for   funsies   research  i tried a very low dose of the fly  i made a solution using   of ethanol and   of the rc  i have a metered dropper and i used less than a    ” ml  basically a little more than the tip of the dropper  so i assume it’s less than     and more than

text:
after listening to a bunch of podcasts and reading over the last year with all the exciting news about mdma therapy i have some questions   

mdma is in phase   testing for ptsd which is amazing   its further ahead then all other psychs in clinical trials     brilliant people like rick doblin and maps are making massive leaps into the future of mental health treatments   

but every time i listen to them talk about their trials they usually are giving people mdma   times with in     months     

rick also states even in a very recent interview with lex fridman that mdma is not neurotoxic as we once believed    he basically said at the standard doses there is no harm done   


so   is the   month rule something that will be a thing of the past   obviously its not healthy to use any drug excessively    and the whole point of their mdma therapy is to use it a few times and then not have to do it again    

the benzofurens were developed to find a less neurotoxic alternative    i wonder if these will be studied one day for other things like addiction   

cheers

text:
so  in a previous comment just a few minutes ago i more or less said i wouldn’t even buy a benzo without having a diclazepam stock on hand i can use when a taper is needed  this might sound extreme  but i think it’s for a good reason given the nature of benzo use  

i have seen posts more or less saying benzos are no big deal don’t sweat it  i’ve also seen posts saying they are the devil and if you so much as look at them  you will get addicted and if you don’t taper you will probably die  these are slight exaggerations of the posts  but there is a tendency towards some black and white thinking towards benzos  

which is fine  everyone is entitled to their own point of view on benzos or any drug in general  the problem is it leads to bad and often unhelpful advice  we are all at least interested in drugs  or we wouldn’t be here at all  i assume most of us also use drugs to varying extents  so it’s not a big surprise if our fellow members are not simply going to stay away from any drug and make their decision based on what any of us say about some of the risks  

back to my comment a few minutes ago about not even considering buying a benzo without also buying diclazepam if i don’t already have some in stock  i have used benzos  i read ahead of time about the addiction risks  i knew it can happen and now i am unfortunately aware that addiction can happen regardless of how responsible you think you are or even actually are  addiction and physical dependence is sneaky and more complicated than “just be smart ” 

i would personally like to see more of “have diclazepam or  insert good benzo for tapering  on hand” as the general advice of this sub  something like that could be on the sidebar if mods think it is worth putting there  it could also just be the standard advice we as a community give to anyone considering a benzo  

it’s also probably one of the better benzos to start out with unless you really need something strong for one reason or another  but that’s another topic for another day  worst case  you hate it and have a good chemical on hand if you try other benzos and need to taper  but yeah  i’m general it just seems like good safety and harm reduction advice both sides of the argument can get behind  

if you can’t afford the insurance  you don’t buy a fancy sports car  same idea here  if you can’t afford to also pick up diclazepam  well save a bit more and wait  drugs cost money  things to properly and safely  as best as possible  use drugs also cost money  cost is the only thing i can think of as to why anyone wouldn’t want to have a diclazepam stash if they are going to buy and use other benzos as well  

that’s just my       i hope to see more advice like this regarding benzos on this sub  and if the mods think this is good advice too  it should really be on the sidebar because that indicates a community consensus that safe benzo use is having materials on hand that you will need if a taper is ever your only option   unless you consider seizures and possibly dying an option  i don’t  so diclazepam is a non optional safety precaution in my toolkit

text:
not mdma  but probably pma or pmma 

so i didn’t really know where to post this  but someone on the mdma sub gave me this sub  i kept looking up “designer drugs” as opposed to “research chemicals” lol  guess i missed that one a bit  so anyway  last night i had a pill that someone had given me for free  now i know some people that will legit do that to get customers because they believe their product is what it is  but this was not mdma  actually not even close  i have done very pure mdma in the past and had wonderful experiences  but it’s normally not my doc or anything like that  this was more of a recreational trip that i decided would be fun  cuz hell  i got it for free an had been holding onto it for days an ln seemed like the perfect time  so anyway the first real red flag was that the pill was a blue superman  reportedly blue superman pills used to contain little to no actual mdma  and then mostly a substance known as pma or pmma  i frowned  what the hell is pma pmma  so i started the research upon the come up  first of all the come up was extremely slow  in comparison to mdma  and then when i started actually feeling something  it was not the massive waves of euphoria that i was used to  it was instead a strange buzzing sensation in my head  and what i call my “dopamine hurting” or my “serotonin hurting”  that’s really my own expression for the serotonin syndrome mildly setting in with that strange feeling at the base of your neck that doesn’t hurt but feels like pressure kind of   it happens when you smoke a lot of crack lol…   anyway  this feeling i had was nothing even similar to mdma  i had no hallucinogenic effects really  i mean it was more like a slight change in perception  because i’d read of many people dying on small doses of this stuff  i did continually text my good friend to make sure i was ok and not overheating  i did feel mildly warm an my heart beat rose a little but the most noticeable effect was a slight stimulant essence  much unlike mdma and more like speed  i was typing texting extremely quickly and i was very curious and kept looking up videos on time being relative and the twins paradox  it was actually mildly enjoyable  throughout the time it seemed to peak at about       an then dampened down at about        it was actually quite strange  the effects to me seemed like a mild dose of a depressant like alcohol spiked with a stimmy twist  i guess to sum it up  it was not what i wanted  but it was not the worst  i did not die and i certainly did not have the strange adverse effects reported online  not to say it couldn’t have happened though because i was actually laying in my bed the whole time as opposed to moving around like i’m sure most people tripping are  regardless  this goes to show how important it is to make sure you test any pills because they can always turn out to be bunk or another substance entirely  such as in my case  i genuinely wish i’d tested it first because i was looking forward to a roll and received and got rickrolled instead  such is the nature of this game i suppose…

text:
whoa  this is a very interesting molecule with a lot of potential for irresponsible behavior if one doesn t exert willpower or mitigate the potential for compulsive redosing 

i m     and nearly   so i am naturally going to require doses on the higher spectral end of each experience level 

i have an addiction to opiates so i started off by iving about   of my opioid and took a few drops of an rc benzo  i knew this could impact the effects of the cathinone but i couldn t do much about it 

i started off by using aluminium foil and vaping around     to test it out  i was losing a lot of product but quickly was able to get a proper process for maximizing results 

i took a hit and held it in for about   seconds and felt a nice rush of warmth and euphoria come over my body  i felt like i was needing to catch my breath or at least consciously take deeper breaths 

after two more similar attempts at this roa  i migrated to using an oil burner pipe  this helped save product much better and i was able to get much better hits 

by this point i was putting approximately   into the bowl  albeit i wouldn t actually smoke the entire thing 

tolerance seems to increase dramatically  putting around   into the bowl after around     hours 

there is a point after i m taking hits where i feel a bit nauseus and feel my heart rate beating very high 

this is a natural point where i will stop and wait for around an hour or so before taking another hit 

effects wise it feels very similar to smoking crystal meth but with a bit more euphoric rush albeit shorter duration 

i feel some anxiety and rigidity after a few hours of binging and took some benzos to counter the issue 

still researching but definitely a very interesting and fun molecule  absolutely not functional and likely with high abuse potential 

better living through chemistry  be safe

text:
so  i ve been working my way up slowly on dosages with this chemical  starting at    to    then    and now    i think   is a sweet spot for this 


dosed at     and come up lasted about   minutes as usual  i did have very mild gi stress and the faintest sense of nausea on the come up which i hadn t had at lower doses  but it was short lived and again  really not an issue at all 


once peaking i had the hallmark oevs consisting of enhanced colors  general waviness  color fractals  tracers  perspective scale distortions  and everything takes on the appearance of an oil painting  i didn t notice quite as strong of a body high at this dose like i have at lower ones  but it was still present and nice  i tend to really like digging my toes into the carpet and bending my legs due to the increased tactile sensations 


the headspace at this dosage was finally on the level i had hoped it would get    ho mipt tends to be described as a more intense headspace than   ho met but i think i disagree with that assessment  early peak my thoughts were swimming and i characterized the general vibe as  eating thought soup  as concepts didn t really have rigid form and sensations and perceptions seemed to constantly shift and churn but it was so satisfying and satiating to indulge in thought  not overwhelming or anything but very interesting and intriguing  watched some vr porn while absolutely peaking and it did get slightly strange  


i started watching tron  legacy which i had set up in advance  this was an absolute trip once they began talking about digital beings and all the digital god stuff  i was absolutely entranced by these concepts and my mind went wild with it  soooo much fun  i decided that what i was experiencing was the truest and purest form of tripping 


i smoked weed about halfway through the movie once i had leveled out and was perhaps just starting the comedown and wow what a combo  i d had a difficult experience in the past with this combination but this time i don t think i ve ever felt physically better  i felt like my body and mind were sandwiched between two incredibly soft and pleasantly warm mattresses  i just payed on my couch for several minutes internally remarking on how incredibly euphoric i felt 


cevs were absolutely bonkers as well  i tend to get lots of spinning and moving shapes that are like  neon pastels and sharp outlines

text:
so  yesterday i ran out of   fma 

not a big deal but i thought i d take the opportunity and clean up some old baggies i had lying around  just getting the residual powder out of them before throwing them away 

so  i filled each baggy with some distilled water  dissolving all the remaining   fma  i then collected the water in a glass beaker 

now  the plan was to evaporate the water  such that the accumulated powder from the baggies would remain in the beaker afterwards  so i put the beaker on my stove and waited for the water to start boiling  meanwhile  i was happily chatting away on my phone 

i checked the beaker very frequently  but overestimated how much water was left  because of the bubbling  its hard to tell   i noticed when a weird smell hit me  the water had evaporated and the powder was producing fumes while burning and turning brownish  

i quickly took the beaker off the stove  when i noticed the smell again  it smelled    interesting  so i put the beaker under my nose and took a good sniff  

then it fucking hit me   i just heated a methylamphetamine derivate in some glassware and i am now inhaling the fumes  without even thinking about the implications i almost smoked some meth  basically 

i quickly pulled away from the beaker  the whole incident just felt like the devil had a brilliant day and pulled a trick he was most certainly proud of  almost got me as well  fuck 

 amp    

for the curious  i noticed no effects from the vapor that i did inhale

text:
a   old male here and   gf tried this chemical in many settings and wanted to post this report from a rave setting where many people wanted to try this chemical at a rave setting  was a party somewhere in the woods  only friends circle  like   friends at least tried this chemical and were explained excatly what it is and that there is not many reports of it out there  me and my gf s experince with this chemical is it is that it is very similiar to the original ketamine  but the effects are easier on the body and mind and it also posses the same antideppresant  anti anxiety effect as the original ketamine  doses are a bit higher than with original ketamine and the only route of administration we used was nasal  one friend parachuted it oral  like   and he said he was nicely  ketted out  but all of the people reported more euphoria on the come up than with original ketamine and less ego death being it more fun for people who dont like dissocitaion that much   even a friend that doesnt like ketamin at all liked it because even on higher doses you are able to speak and function  all poeple said its a very interesting chemical compared to original ket  it didnt posses any major negative side effects like the original ketamine people said also  maybe we have to try it a few more times to be sure  one friend reported peeing was hard on it soo it may have the same side effect on the bladder as the original ketamine  all in all this is a great chemical and i hope they dont ban it any time soon 
‌
‌doses used for nasal usage were from     being k hole that me and a friend experienced   khole is a little different than with original ketamine but very similiar  you are more self aware of your body  more euphoric  duration from     till baseline  oral usage that a friend reported lasted around     of light effects compared to nasal use but more smooth high all in all very good  no comedown to speak off but a nice afterglow reported from all people  maybe a little sleepy afterwards but people were also on stimulants soo yeah  
‌
‌ stay safe guys and rave on 
‌
‌

text:
disclaimer 
i am absolutely not proud of this  this was supposed to be a   day binge but got way out of hand due to my own failure 

stats i guess 
    grams of   used   i should’ve not bought this much omg 
nights awake  
days at work    if you wanna know what i do dm me 
damage to body  
nose fucked up but clean
importend things to watch for while binging    purple knees  purple elbows  painfull liver  small chance to get   blue toes or fingers  blood pressure  heart rate  hydration  mental state and nerve damage 

i checked all these once everyday and didn’t find anything out of order except  mental state  on day   i started getting psychosis from sleep deprivation  i noticed this first while at the job  i turned off all radio’s for some zen time but kept hearing the music but couldn’t find the source  this kinda creept me out but i shrugged it off  night   i started to notice the real effects of the psychosis  i was standing next to my bed and a cat started walking around my legs  i couldn’t get my eyes to focus on it so i turned on my phone’s flashlight  cat vanished in tin air  from this point i knew i needed to keep my head calm and layed in bed calming down  until some fking non existent woman started staring at me from my door for idk   minutes  after that it was mainly fake scares while looking into reflecting surfaces and opening doors  and the fking music  like i didn’t even like the music some type of   slow pace music  

went to my job on day    today  had to calm myself down allot before starting    cigarettes and some meditation did the trick  from their on just a bit down till the moment i’m typing this  gonna finish of the last    grams tonight 


since starting the story at the beginning is way to mainstream welcome to day     
these days were literally jerking of and being happy for   days straight  no i’m not gonna link the porn  

anyways day       
work… snorted all days and nights except at work  i made   bombs with cigarette paper  if y’all wanna know how to make them let me know  work was basically the same except i was happy    of the time  no one noticed since i “claimed” to have a bad cold  we got corona tests at the job 

what did i learn 
don’t buy more then you plan on using  this shit owns you once you start  the chances of you finishing it all are bigger then the chances of the being an sphere 

sleep deprivation is not a joke  i’m still in psychosis its mild but fuck this could break you mentally if you don’t know whats going on  

most importantly  
don’t go on reddit while binging  i think atleast   people hate me now 

i’ll update later when i remember fun details 

have a good one 

sincerely 

your favorite mephedrone addict

text:
i guess this will be my first lengthy trip report 

so to preface i use lots of ketamine and for the last year have found it hard to k hole  i thought i had honestly lost the magic  but during this experience i had basically set two routes 

if i dont k hole im off dissociatives as long as i can possibly go  minimum a few months until my birthday in september 

if i do k hole ill wait until my tolerance resets and never use ketamine recreationally ever again  only for khole s  

i did in this experience end up right at the edge of a khole  a place ive been before and honestly forgot was just as interesting visually as the full khole 

perhaps what keeps me chasing the khole is the fact it is the most profound hallucinatory state ive ever been in  its not particularly euphoric compared to others nor is the dissociation always a preferable effect  especially the comedown  but my god were the visuals the most beuatiful things ive ever seen  

when i was    maybe    on new years i took   tabs of acid  under   tho  and i had a mad dxm tolly or rather dxm lost its magic but that hadnt mattered for ketamine  

anyways i was watching some space show  maybe it was smt to do w black mirror or smt  idk my cousin was showing me stuff 

i didnt weigh my doses i just bought   bags and snuffed as much as i could  i had bought a half gram this time and i ended up sniffing a great amount of the half gram leaving a decent line left  

here is where i fell in love with ketamine 

the scene on the tv showed really well rendered space cinematics so like i had just entered the hole as the scene played and the planets and stars left the tv slowly entering the room and filling it  i turned around me looking all directions  i could see all the planets and stars still  all completelt convincing yet i knew i was hallucinating due to a pretty lucid state being retained  but my god the detail was hd  i could see it better than my actual vision  i even moved around the room and their angles corrosponded to my perspective 

it was absolutely beautiful and the hallucination had felt like a half hour but lasted less than   minutes  

thats when i fell in love with that hallucinatory state  as well as on the comedown i had a very introspective self interrogation that ended up being the start of me getting out of crime  

i had stopped dealing and doing petty theft and generally became a more law abiding citizen  not out of some need to conform but a need to change my bad and self destructive habits   i now express my disdain against authority by doing activism work and shit that means something  not by being an edgey teen rebel archetype  

anyways fast foreward to recently with the whole pandemic i had slipped into a relapse w many drugs and ended up taking drugs like   cl pcp    mep pce    ho pce  o pce  hexen  etiz  flualp    nboh  doc  various tryptamines and lysergamide rc s  i had  especially with the pcp s done quite alot of harm paychologically  i became manic when sober  and essentially stayed that way for a year until a few months ago  then for the last few months ive been anxious in general 

in the last   years i havent taken psychedelics in even common amounts because of my mania and anxiety  half tabs and   gram for some reason felt more intense  but the visuals or effects werent stronger  its sort of like when your manic and experience things a little more intensely  its like that compounded onto the psychedelic effects  wasnt comfortable 

anyways i guess ill begin with my trip report 

it was my week off before i left to my home province   i had decided to do that aforementioned thing w ketamine depending on the outcome 

before that however i decided id try if dmxe is possible to hole while on   
 
      eat the   b

      begin feeling effects  i remember checking the clock here 

      feel sort of trippy  think this is a usual   dose  it does get stronger however and i estimate it to be just under    i smoke weed and weigh out the dmxe

      finally muster up enough courage just to rail the dmxe as the causticity is a bit of a bitch w my allergy ridden nasal membranes

      get a call from my grandma  awwww fuck 

from            i am just barely managing to talk to my grandma and make plans and explain my day  i told her of jobs offers and my plan to come home  when i ask her to pick me up i slur my words and can barely get the word out  i am very impaired  the stimulation is not overt but noticable 

time gets a bit iffy from the end of the phone call at     in until     when i remmeber the next time i took the time  within that window i was too manic to check the time  

    onwards 

 i am running around thinking i forgot to do tasks  hahahaha amo  im sorry  like replant my moms new houseplant or something  she ended up just telling me to go to bed as she was used to my manic epsiodes when sober  so she just usually sent me to my room and gave me a joint to go to sleep  

thankfully i didnt get in trouble at all  she didnt even mention anything the next morning but the anxiety and guilt of lying to my mother still played into my experience i think

anyways i start going into my usual manic pattern of thinking i am a messiah and meant to bring my wealth of knowledge about activism topics i was recently reading like baukunin and kroptokin thinking i was some genius for finding these authors on my own  

i ended up smoking more and overall i just remember pacing in my room  writing alot of stuff in my notebook  then like cleaning my room  but still not organzing my dressers because ofcourse i wouldnt   not even when im stimmed up on a pcp like disso  fuck sakes  

i come down enough around     in and check the time  strangely as soon as i took the time and added up how hard i was in  it was like a switch  one moment i was taking the time while disso d out on dmxe but then the next moment it was pure psychedelia from the   b  i hadnt noticed the   b too much so i was at the peak s beggining  a bit sudden and offputting but nothing i couldnt handle  just a novel effect

      off dmxe and pour out my last gram of ketamine  

decide that this is it  if nothing happens im gonna take a long long tolerance break  if it does work then im going to be grateful and never use such a sacrement for recreation  at most ill do it once a month  preferably ill get it down to just special occasions  

figure that since im becoming older its now or never to get my usage under control  

      the   has its stim properties so this compounded with the usual nasal dialation of psychs like lsd and shrooms that allow me to take massive keta doses  

sniff almost the entire gram line in four sniffs  the first two i let drip then the next two drip  i had a tiny tiny line left no more than    

i put on my favourite song for these trips since it was nostalgic of a time from my teen years when everything was so shitty  

i get smacked like a train and time becomes meaningless so i dont keep time until the experience ends

i didnt enter the hole but it was as close as one could get before going over  

as soon as the k hit the lyrics began to somehow male absolute sense and that all things were happening as they should be  i began doing strange automatic movements influenced by an unknown force  

the room and all its contents began swirling inwards to a central point until it became a solid mass at a point  i could only realize i was in my room through other senses like touch and sound  the sound however got overridden by echoes and voices seemingly coming from the walls  

a foreign alien language yet i understood exaclty what it said  

my automatic movements became more and more automatic until i was simply an observer to my own limbs being controlled by an unkown force that was also puppeteering all other things such as the visuals and the music and my sensations and movements all in sync  

i had become a marionette in the singularity of the edge of the khole  the only way i can explain it is like the khole is a black hole s singularity and the sober reality is outside the event horizon  it was like i was in the event horizon but not the singularity where time is half broken  physics still somewhat work  and shit isnt completelt broken down like the khole does  

the experience lasted all but an hour and a half  

      experience ends  next time i took time but in my impaired state i forgot the exact time and didnt write it down 

    onwards until      nothing much of note but just the comedown experience 


i look foreward to treating this less like a drug and more like a psychedelic experience meant for select occasions  

im also working on my carreer as a teacher and am trying to get everything sorted out for the semster  but ill get the funding taken care of if i get in its just a matter of time really since im likely to get into the post sec program 

as such im getting less and less time to experiment  something that im actually looking foreward to do and record more in depth 

ive been saving up to go to spain and amsterdam to party since canadian cities can only get you so high unless its meth and fent haha  

my plan is to more properly record and research dissos and other chems not available in my country

my plan is to establish a standard procedure for rc testing and then test as many chems as i can and establish doses and titration procedures as well as reagent results and solvents  

mostly interested in documenting disso s  psychs and some stims and empathogens  

if i finish this i also plan on repeating a blind test for analouges w my friends that i lost the data and write up for      

anyways thanks for reading if you cared  

also careful w dmxe mania it aint no joke  i recognize pcp mania when i feel it   same w mxipr

i love psychedelics of all types for the profound thoughts  euphoria  visuals  and music enhancements  mostly lysergamides and mdma  

love snorting   like a couple mg’s at a time until i’m at a good tripping level  then doing whippets🤣 

been experimenting with   nboh recently and made it too   oral  witnessed the most insane visuals i have ever seen aside from smoked dmt  i feel the   shouldn’t be compared anyways   but kind of find the substance boring after the first hour  it has such a lack of a headspace that after the initial woah factor of visuals passes it’s just kind of boring with consistently predictable visuals  it’s like watching a youtube simulation video of an acid trip 

tried ketamine and didn’t like it  never combined it but on its own i just felt slower mentally  and numb  there was no euphoria  no visuals  and music sounded distant and didn’t make sense 

are the rc dissos any better  they seem so hyped up and loved  if i don’t like k then should i just leave them alone

text:
in our current world of rc there are a lot of substances that seem to be prodrugs to the better known psychoactive compounds 

on the one side  this brings the safety of the better psychoactive compound  take   p lsd for example  there is evidence that this prodrug to lsd gets metabolized to the active substance and therefore the toxicological profile is as safe or dangerous as lsd

however  on the other side  this could lead to  spontaneous metabolization  leading to a legal problem depending on the laws of your country  taking   p lsd for example again  does it hydrolyzes spontaneously to lsd if the compound blotter pellet gets wet  what about making a suspension out of it  would this convert to lsd on itself 

how stable is your stash  what happens over time  does it simply disintegrates into a non active compound or does your legal substance denaturates to a controlled one over time

text:
decided to make this post to add another experience i can look back on and have others use as a resource in regards to what they can expect from the experience     
 this report is written while under the influence so keep in mind it will be long but i will attempt to avoid blocks of text  

always  test every batch you recieve  https   testsubstances com   don t trust online vendors or dealers    
 amp  here is a link to  alternative test kit vendors  https   www reddit com r drugs comments   test your substances promote harm reduction w  

  full disclosure  there was compounds consumed the morning before taking this substance   

prior substance consumption 

       clonazepam      
     l tyrosine      
     l theanine      

just wanted to keep this here to mention that i didn t notice any negative interactions with these compounds 

                                                                                                                  

    weighed out          
chopped into bumps to start with a smooth come up 

    bumps consumed          
usual burn taking me by surprise and drip slowly caking my mouth 

  noticing heart rate increase          
getting head lightness  and an slight feeling of euphoria 

  euphoria intensifying          
similar to clean effects of mdma where you feel less stimulated than straight amphetamine or cocaine i would describe it as a more relaxed energy 

  noticeable intensity of heart beats          
although not uncommon for me personally i feel that this substance in specific gives me this effect much more than other stimulant compounds 

    bumps consumed          
knowing this is such a fiendish substance from my pervious experiences doesn t surprise me that i feel the need to re dose fairly quick 

  noticing slight trailing when looking around          
head high is intensifying focus feels more locked  heart rate is less noticeable as my body feels very peaceful 

    bumps consumed          
loving the ride thus far  not trying to over do it and induce a panic like my last experience and thus it s working great i feel the light serotonin release and a stim feeling cleaner than coke 

  update          
noticing less cardiovascular sensations this time as compared to my last experience with   mmc and much less than when i do cocaine 

    small lines consumed          
euphoria building  extremities are colder due to vasoconstriction but otherwise i am feeling amazing   
this chemical has almost the perfect amount of serotonin and dopamine release to be just right for a situation where a mdma roll is too much and regular amphetamine isn t enough 

  update          
euphoria is at a peak right now i could close my eyes and lay down and feel super cozy and sleepy  but at the same time i can sit and focus on writing my report and feel wide awake  overwhelming urge to chat comes with this substance much like any stimulant  but the undertones of entactogenic effects make me feel very lovey 

  added another    to the pile   amp    lines consumed          
feeling very stimmed and no lack of euphoria or die down is occurring as i redose  feels like i repeak each time 

    line consumed          
keeping hydrated is key with this substance  much like mdma and other amphetamines you can feel when you will start to overheat or get dehydrated and overheating leads to neurotoxicity  

  update       am    
uncomfortable chest feelings seem to be common with this compound a little while in not something i would call  pain  but more just an uncomfortable feeling  this is only somewhat tamed by the euphoria it s not experience ruining but figured i would mention it for anyone ultra sensitive to these feelings 

    lines consumed          
if you have little control it s best to keep this substance locked away once you ve taken out the amount you want because if it weren t for my self control i would probably keep this going for a few days  i would honestly say though that this is now my coke replacement as it does feel a lot less speedy and anxiety filled when compared to even   acetone washed cocaine this is probably due to the rolly effect  

    lines consumed          
wakefulness with this substance is insane  and i can see how people would binge this for long periods of time without feeling fatigued still uplifting and the drip quickly became unnoticeable  

  comedown     
recommended to stop taking this compound       before you plan to get to bed because even with benzos you will struggle until the effects wear off  my comedown is always very clean i am not sure if that s due to the massive amount of water  and anti oxidants i consume but for me the comedown doesn t drag me down like an mdma comedown 

  conclusion    
total consumed        
once again another great experience with   mmc even more so this time since i spaced my doses more and put away the remainder of the bag early in the session  if you re already a compulsive redoser please be careful with this one as i find it fairly functional as well as euphoric so it could be easy to use this daily but not recommended for both your heart and brain 

i said last time that i would try the oral roa but skipped out on the chance this session but for sure will prioritize it next time and write a report on that as apparently the two have fairly different sensations  

thank you for reading i hope this was useful to someone and can give an insight to what you might feel during the experience  remember everyone is different and all experiences will have different results so if you are so inclined to try a substance start slow and always test prior to using

i m looking at getting a stimulant for hp with several things  including getting through depression at work on the real tough days  

i currently take kratom and have for many years  it s been a godsend for a non opiate pain reliever from  a chronic lumbar back injury and a herniated disk in the next  i work in the flooring trade so it s also been very useful for energy and endurance  i m trying to take less of it and soon take a tolerance break from it for a while  i ve found that the right stims can be extremely helpful doing the whole process   i will only be using them   maybe   times a week and in the lower end range of doses  

the reason i ve chosen these three is because they are what my vendor is carrying and affordable  i like the fact they don t have real long durations like many amphetamines do  some euphoria is good  i don t want to be fucked up though  just decent mental and physical energy and clear thoughts and uplifting euphoria as well  i find i can go much longer  time between my crowd and doses if i m using stimulants responsibly  

seems like each one has its heavy defenders as well as heavy opponents so i m just trying to look for all the opinions in one spot here and figure out what to do next

text:
i will keep this post short as it doesn t contain huge amounts of content  every chem i mention came yesterday so i was pretty excited to try them out  

so this morning i woke up with plenty of stuff to do  i took   mg of   mph becouse i read that it s pretty functional stim  before come up i went for a   minut run as i most mornings do  the run was fine but i didn t feel much yet  after the cold shower i started to feel it  i was noticeably more energetic and that was it  that s what i have been looking for 

so i do my stuff that i have been delaying for a pretty long time done  then i insuffled more   of   mph  at first it was ok but after while i got really anxious and since i had social plans for my afternoon i came up with the briliant idea of trying   of etizolam for the first time  so i took it  after a while i had urgency to go to sleep so i went 

after few minutes of trying to sleep i experienced one of the most intense sleep paralysis i have ever had  really wild one  vivid hallucinations and something similar to extreme euphoria for a while  it is important to mention that i experienced sleep paralysis way before i have used any substances in my childhood  and it is very familiar to me  also after few years of combating sleep paralysis i came close to peace with it  i sometimes get really euphoric phase of sleep paralysis  it s pretty rare from what i heard but you can probably google it   

when i woke up after something like an hour i was pretty tired  so here comes the irony  why not to do another   of   mph  i did that and went to the event  i must say  i feel good  non anxious but very energetic  also non euphoric  it s ironic and stupid but seems to work for now 

in my opinion based on very limited experience   mph seems to have really low abuse potential  

do you have some similar experiences

text:
i massively overdosed on a huge amount of adrafinil     grams is my best guess  the powder had clumped together apparantly and i tried eyeballing it     to terrible results   


i also had amphetamine in my system from taking a vyvanse the day prior  i was driving across country alone and didn t really have time to stop  also worth noting i have been tapering benzo and kratom use    


i got to colorado  eventually noticing i was having a very hard time getting sleep  i figured it was due to life stressors  being on the road  wife away  death in the family   i do eventually go to the er for kidney pain  thinking it is likely a stone  the find nothing in any of my labs and send me home    


  
i m back home now    days later  twitching and jerking  i can t sleep  even after having taken flexeril  which usually knocks me out    


  


  
i m worried about the neurological symptoms  should i go back to the doctor and tell them this  should i just stop trying to taper for a while and try to ride this out  i know that i combined an dopamine releaser with a reuptake inhibitor  i am praying i did no permanent damage  this is goodbye to drugs for me  that had been the plan anyway as i was tapering down because i have no self control and seem hell bent on ruining my life

  
tl dr   multiple grams of adrafinil after having taken     vyvanse   the two days prior  experiencing light chest pains  only when worrying  twitching and it s impossible to get any worthwhile sleep  eating is difficult  i m the worst and the dumbest person alive

text:
i am thankful i am very well educated when it comes to substances  their uses  abuse potential  and everything in between

i’ve messed up surely  it’s part of the process of learning  i let myself get addicted to weed and lied to myself to justify it  and now after having faced that  everything is more enjoyable 

i miss you lucy  i haven’t been with you since september    and i miss that oneness and clarity you put in me  how you made me see and helped me create a moral compass and understand it’s building blocks instilled by my parents  but my gut tells me to wait to be with you again  still need to integrate your lessons more

tomorrow i see my brother for the first time in   months and it’s my last day to get a lil fucked up  and here i come back to my subject of knowing myself  knowing i’m reasonable and not messing with neurotoxicity  keeping my rolls at     per year  today i chose to sniff some    drink a couple of beers and smoke some weed  and i’m just so excited to see my bro 

i’ll have enough time to sleep and rest  and tomorrow it’s gonna be wonderful  he’s gonna have his first joint w me too   

goodluck being a thing in the world  much love

text:
bit of a lengthy post  but it s very interesting  at least imo  you can read a summary in the last paragraph at the bottom 

a while ago i ve swallowed about   of   ho pcp and snorted another   of it while coming down from mdma at night  i also snorted   of k just to get it all going quicker  worth mentioning my tolerance to dissos is almosy non existent btw  i went on to hole for about    the first     being composed of fairly typical disso hole elements  maybe a little more intense with some sensations of touch taking me up by surprise 

anyways  what i wanna focus on is that towards the end  on the remaining      my brain started to become very tired to the point of sleepiness  at this point it was about   and i had no sleep  i was however laying in bed with my sleeping mask on  i take the recovery position  and let myself go the way that i do when i fall asleep at night  spotify s brain food playlist playing through my earbuds  

this is where it gets fucky  i don t notice it right away  but smoothly  my brain was producing very colourful and saturated images inspired by the sounds i was hearing  but i was no longer in   person flying around space  i was just a camera flying above this chill beach  seeing this saturated sand and beautiful cyan waves  at points  i even forgot where i actually was and what was going on  almost like in a dream  except i was just spectating the beautiful landscape 

it then started getting weaker  and weaker  and i came back to reality  according to my smartwatch  i entered  light sleep  in that last      yet that was the most amazing part of it all  very warm and relaxing  it s been over   weeks since then and i ve been trying to think of a way to make my next disso hole all the more colourful realistic warm  i d like to bounce some ideas around here with you guys  if any of you are interested on the subject  so far i ve thought of dosing some     shrooms about half an hour before snorting swallowing a high dose of   ho pcp   a     booster of ketamine  i d like to hear your input on it too though  what if i was to skip sleep on the night before  and then attempt this hole on the night after  when my body will definitely want sleep  maybe i could go straight into rem sleep and have even more of a vivid hole  i don t know  but i m going insane thinking about all these possibilities by myself 

tl dr  long story short  i ve done     ho pcp     ketamine at night when coming down from mdma  holed for    and according to my smartwatch   i entered light sleep in the last     of the hole  that was also when the hole got a lot more vivid and warm and colourful  thinking of other ways to recreate that experience  but maybe with even more vivid colours  maybe having the same pcp   k combo but with shrooms on top  or purposely losing   night of sleep and then attempting this hole on the night after  hoping that my brain would be more likely to lightly fall asleep during the hole  please let me know your thoughts
