text:
age   

weight    lbs

dosage    mg intranasal

setting  my house

  


introduction  hxe is the mxe adjacent name applied to another novel arylcyclohexylamine  which does bear a passing similarity to mxe only with a hydroxy group in place of the methoxy group  hxe had been conjectured years ago  appearing prominently in the collections of some online research chemical vendors  though it was never for sale  there were few to no reports of anyone who had actually encountered or ingested this chemical for many years  until early   when it was first seen for sale on the open market  it is likely that it will remain a rarity and a one off curiosity owing to difficulty in synthesis  despite being a very natural direction to go in arylcyclohexylamine design 

i attempted a few trials with this chemical before this one  at   and   mg  all intranasal    mg yielded threshold effects  a distinct dissociative stimulation  while   mg was more intense though still manageably lucid  overall it is an interesting dissociative  very cognitive  physically sedating  warm  with a confusing and elusive headspace  it is homely and cozy  heavy and slow  it is assessed in full in the conclusion  what follows is a description of a trial with   mg administered intranasally 

     i weigh out a large pile of extremely fine  chalky powder and cut it into several lines  i snort them one by one  pausing between each to recoil and brace for the next  this chemical is incredibly uncomfortable to consume  the flavor is rancid  bitter and vile  it stings on contact with my mucus membranes and the powder fluffs into a cloud in my sinuses  coating every surface  each draw into the snorting straw makes me flinch and recoil  the stinging forces tears from my eyes and i involuntarily retch at the flavor  this is not enjoyable in the least  thankfully the stinging subsides fairly quickly  though the bitterness and discomfort continue to rage 

 amp    

     finally finish taking down all of those lines  no effects to note yet other than a continual unpleasant drip 

 amp    

     onset  feeling a bit faint and wobbly  something is definitely happening now  i am dizzy and lightheaded and my fingertips feel a bit numb 

 amp    

     the drug overtakes me more and more  the intensity at this point is akin to that felt at the peak of my   mg dose  i feel like i am being compressed and tightened as my breath grows shorter and shallower  this is a tight and constricted dissociation  a sense that the boundaries of my physical body are no longer aligned with my sensory perception of my own size and shape  namely  the actual body is smaller  denser  pulled tighter than the perceived body  there is a cooling bubbling dissociation that burgeons now  an unease that travels from my core down to the tips of my extremities  something amorphous and indistinct growing larger by the second 

     i am sinking deeper and deeper by the second  this is not a rushing dissociation  there is no sense of floodwaters buffeting me and streaming my essence into the void  it is as though i am in a chamber that is rapidly flooding with water  water eager to fil the space even before it has displaced the air  growing denser than one would think possible  exerting an immense pressure on my body as it rises around me  i feel trapped  tightly bound  locked into my current position and pose  i am folding up  becoming smaller and recursive  it quietly beckons me into its core  i sink into its inky bed as its waters crush my bones with weeping frigid pressure 

 

in pitch black waters under crushing pressure the pitch black skin of the earth stretches and ruptures  open wounds that ooze with glowing molten blood  a primordial heat generated from an entire planet’s worth of atoms bearing down on each other  the great dense salty waters that creep and crawl across the earth trickle into the planet’s crackling skin  churning into the great heavy fires below the crust and exploding back out into the ocean as impenetrable black plumes of chemicals 

 

that which beckons me to sink deeper is still  stoic  glowing and warm like the core of the earth burning under its own pressure amidst the tumult of the mantle and the raging vibrancy of its crust  it resides in a realm still and dark and impossibly heavy  fluid but steady  it casts its glow into the abyss  its warmth crackles at my skin and seeps into my bones  a respite from the infinite cold that surrounds it on all sides  the cold sloughs off my shoulders like a reptile shedding its skin  falling into loose ruffles around me  i have turned off all of the lights and am sitting in the glow of my computer screen  there are patterns churning and seeping into the shadowy surfaces cast in blue and teal  quiet and pensive and watching me like timid hagfish scouting out a fresh ocean floor carcass to burrow into 

despite this sense of depth and space and impenetrable void dominating my mind  when i force myself into lucidity it is quite manageable  standing up and moving around  i have little loss in motor skills or coordination  i doubt i could hold a coherent conversation right now  but i very likely could walk down the street without giving a stranger the impression of being intoxicated  this is an odd sort of functionality 

 amp    

    

i am enjoined with this drug’s light and its warmth  i am entwined with its molten core as its fire courses through my veins and steams off of my skin  in its glowering light i can gaze out onto the infinite watery abyss that expands on all sides of me  frigid  unforgiving  and unimaginably vast 

i take advantage of the optional lucidity to run and pee real quick  sitting in the dark in the bathroom feels like being encased in a flooding submarine  the rushing currents painted with impressionistic strokes of maroon and turquoise reflected light  the writhing wriggling pressure bears down on my skull 

back downstairs on the couch in the dark  the subterranean waters flow through me  like the tendrils of frigid ocean seeping into the earth’s crust to do communion with the fires of the mantle  all light is hazy and diffuse through a deep blue filter  my fingers feel blunt and gooey like i am a gelatinous creature of the deep  my body feels like it is being rolled up with wads of abyssal mud and bioluminescent mucus  the world is spinning away from me like a twirling pebble descending down a water column  my feet are twisting around themselves  my body is giving way to diffusing into a softness that it sinks into  a softness that swirls and churns with convection and turbulence  mixing its essence with the glowing liquid heart of this chemical 

 

deep under the ocean  incomprehensible and colossal masses of frigid salty water creep along the seafloor  heavier and vaster than anything we can comprehend on the surface  the eternal march of these great masses  step by step along the midnight bottom of the great seas  drives the circulation of water around the earth 

 

the drug is fearsome in its power  fearsome in its scope  yet  still and matter of fact  if one were to sit at the bottom of the ocean  surely it would be fearsome in the vastness  it would be difficult to comprehend the immenseness and the sheer volume of impenetrable water in every direction  it would be near impossible to consider in the abyssal dark but its presence would be heavy and distinct  the pressure the entirety of the ocean exerts would turn a person to liquid  pulverize them and churn their essence among looming deep sea currents bearing down on them  yet one would simply be there  in place  among something that surely exists and surely contains so much power  regardless of our petty existence  that is the grip of hxe  fearsome like a mighty glacier  fearsome like an shroud of all consuming fog  fearsome like the span of the night sky over an empty plain  vast terrible and awesome and completely indifferent to human existence like so much else that is vast and terrible and awesome 

i am incredibly warm and sweaty  i feel considerable nausea  moreso than i typically experience from dissociatives  i am enraptured in this drug’s magmatic embrace  its convections flowing in streams around me  pressing down upon my soft flesh  its breath is at once warm like opening the maw of an oven  like a lover fervently exhaling on my neck  yet cold and breezy like the wind before a thunderstorm  it is like being pinned under a heavy mass of warm seaweed  great slimy undulating curtains that hold me to the ground  steam rising from their blades 

 amp    

     its currents and flows run over mid ocean ridges  the prominences of seamounts and the skyscrapers of black smokers  like great drapes being dragged across a stony riverbed  it bends and works its way around angles and edges and points that it obscures  protrusions and penetrations into an eternal inky flux  and thus its ribbons and vortices trace around my bones  the odd vertices of my body like an infinite sheet of black silk is being pulled over my form  with my eyes closed i seep into a world of shadowy obsidian forms  fractalizing and self transforming into illusions  presenting inconceivable dimension and perspective  gripping me in its heavy gaze  it is a storm of volcanic sludge  warm and impenetrably dark  and always in steady  heavy  unstoppable and indifferent motion  there is an uneasy pull  like a great creeping current has taken my tiny body and tossed it into the great blue dark  i plug in headphones and decide to listen to music  a compilation of b sides and demos from one of my favorite musical projects  julia brown  it’s lo fi  nostalgic  and intimate music that is deeply entwined with my life  there is great comfort in something familiar  there is great comfort at the bottom of the sea 

 amp    

     lying down and surrendering myself to music in the dark has brought about the typical dissociative hole sensation  this sense that i am being enclosed in an inconceivably soft cocoon  that my body sinks into its silken plush and becomes amorphous and malleable  that this new vehicle for my body enters a steady motion  in this case a sense of sinking and plummeting into a swallowing and crushing and undulating pressure  i would consider this to be the peak effects of the experience 

the world turns to dark  my cocoon swirls and stirs with its surroundings  everything is cast in palaces and arches of sea glass stained in the darkest teals and deepest blues  self generating structures in illusion and abstraction  taking a distant  warm  muted light through their crystalline structure  the organic and cryptic motion and process of this geometry seems to suggest something organic  something alive  and yet this vast dark ocean floor is devoid of anything that could be considered biological  this is an ancient sea  one that persists even when all else does not  perhaps it was once inhabited but the liveliness of this experience is like a fossil  traces and vestiges and signs of what once was but is no more  preserved for unknowable eternities  my cocoon gives way to a thick  deep glass sarcophagus  nestled among the shifting currents  a great heavy thing subject to a great pressure  there are tickles and ripples and trickles of electricity crackling through the space where my body lay 

the music is comforting  at once familiar yet impossibly alien  my brain can register that this is something it has heard before but it can’t quite grasp what it is exactly  it is like feeling the form of some familiar object in total darkness  my thoughts trace around the words  the melodies  but don’t seem to drift or engage with much else  all i can think about is the darkness  the blueness  the pressure  the ripples of sound waves in a viscous void  the visuals do not appear to be synesthetic  they don’t dance or shift or change their appearance in response to the music  they simply exist as they need to  flowing and shifting and swirling like any body of water would 

 amp    

     i spend the next half hour or so sinking into the hole  opening my eyes and inflating myself to rise to the surface  ad nauseam  i enjoy the relative lucidity of this substance  how it can only overtake me when i allow it to  and then it bears down with the weight of the seven seas  fine motor skills are compromised  attributed to a total numbness in my fingers  standing up and walking still presents no issue  attempting to use technology or communicate with people digitally or read information on a screen presents a challenge  owing to a heavy mental dissociation that scrambles focus and coherent lines of thought  i am dulled to only really being able to perceive the sensations i am currently being subject to  which is frankly quite pleasant and peaceful  it is a cozy and homely drug  akin to dozing off next to a fireplace  chains of association have become cryptic  obscured in a vast blue dark  i can only hope to grope around to make sense of things the way i can while sober 

the latest sensation to overtake me when i close my eyes is a sense of my body melting into a puddle of slime or liquid or perhaps a heavy flow of voluptuous lava  glowing seething and steaming into the cold night  slimy and radiant  my body droops and sags and sinks into the ground  becoming amorphous  it’s novel for the experience so far and fun  i love taking delight in the little flourishes and touches that dissociatives can have  i feel like i am exuding heat  my skin feels hot and sweaty to the touch  though perhaps with the general sense of anesthesia my ability to assess temperature was not accurate   i wonder what my body temperature would measure as right now 

 amp    

     aspects of this experience seem to be traveling in great deep sweeping sine waves  such as a sense of pressure rising and falling  the beginning of the peak had my in its heavy grip  and that sensation has returned  i close my eyes and i feel cocooned  tightly wrapped in a smooth membrane  pulling tighter  shrinking around me  bounded on its other side by an infinite softness like the abyssal plain  but there is no world to be had beyond this high pressure bubble that contains me  there is the infinite recursive void within my skull  where i fall into yet another high pressure bubble bounded by an inconceivable nothingness that extends in directions i cannot perceive  there is no point to perceiving a world beyond this sinking infinite light  radiating heat from my body 

 amp    

     stimulation and sedation are another feeling that have cycled throughout this experience  in broader waves than the undulating sense of pressure  the mental stimulation of the comeup and peak has crashed into an all consuming quagmire of sedation  suddenly my limbs feel like lead  my eyelids creep shut in a steady downpour  i am yawning and nuzzling up into the couch  wishing i could sink deeper into it than is physically possible  i would love to sleep but my brain still feels too jarred to get rest  it in fact is not a relaxing sedation but a heavy  forceful one 

the experience seemed to plateau and lag in a steady intensity for the last hour or so  perhaps steadily turning down  but it feels as though it has just peaked a great deal  perhaps it is the anti rush of being swamped with a sudden sedation  of drowning in a bog  soon the fatigue gives away to a distinct alertness  a raw intensity  the drug has shot into the sky before burning out and fizzling before the glistening moon  one last peak before a sudden downturn in all of the effects  what an odd timeline for an odd compound  i wonder if this timeline is a result of metabolism and physical interaction with the substance vs  an inherent property of the compound  further experimentation is required  i still feel slow  melty  sluggish  i am taken with an exhaustion like i am floating on the surface of a deadly still pool  i can force myself to stand up  move around  interact  but i just don’t feel much energy or drive to do so  it is functional on paper  but not in practice at this point 

visuals are formed into regular harmonic grids  constructed of a deep translucent glass  overlaid subtly on surfaces  catching a light with no discernible source 

 amp    

     still a buzzing presence in my mind  i have been absentmindedly playing videogames as i am unsure what else i should do  my mind feels blank and empty  mxpr is a drug that i consider to be distinctly lackluster because the comedown is so inhibiting and dull  drugs like dmxe or mxipr meanwhile  feature a stimulated and introspective comedown replete with curiosity and a degree of cognitive enhancement  this drug falls in the middle  though more towards the inhibiting side  there is just enough stimulation for it not to be a dull experience  i simply exist in the present and process my senses rather than being able to think myself down rabbit holes and ruminate on whatever catches my interest  it is a state of zen  one in which i am mostly too adrift to recognize it as such  and also too adrift to recognize that i normally don’t enjoy this kind of state 

one interesting cognitive effect that has been setting in during the comedown is that i am finding it difficult to fully process or comprehend things that are entirely normal and familiar  things like objects around the room  reading about world events  basic house appliances  all are suddenly alien and foreign  i can’t quite wrap my head around why i know about these things or why i simply accepted them before  now they are incomprehensible objects and concepts that are pared down to their basest sensory information  bereft of all meaning and association  this is most striking when trying to read  while i can mostly read okay  certain words suddenly become near incomprehensible  in that what was once familiar letters have become indistinguishable glyphs  divorced from my knowledge of the latin alphabet  the sensation is fleeting  i will stumble on a few words in a sentence before they realign and i can piece it together  taking in that information and processing it into something coherent is a whole challenge that follows  but i do not mind  i find it to be novel  interesting  almost funny  there is a calm acceptance of all of these effects that should otherwise be jarring or annoying 

 amp    

     the confused haze has given way to a bit of that motivated psychedelia  another flash of stimulation  another flash of cognitive enhancement peaking through the receding tide of the sedative ocean  besides this sudden glow  most other effects have fade  there is very little physical dissociation remaining  feeling has for the most part returned to my limbs and extremities  the sense of melting and of sinking proprioception has for the most part faded  this is certainly primarily a cognitive experience at this point  hyperthermia lingers but is definitely fading out  the night gets darker 

 amp    

     the last two hours have been the comedown stimulation fluctuating with an overall sense of dazed sobriety  i am absentmindedly playing videogames still  i can’t find much else to do really  i am cozy and content  i smoke some more cannabis but it hardly stirs the dust  beyond making me more curious and more motivated to pursue topics that strike my fancy 

 amp    

     almost entirely back to baseline now  the final state of this is a residual neutral stimulation  this happens to keep me awake for a few hours longer than i intended  though i don’t really feel dissociate during this time  just weakly stimulated 

 amp    

     that has worn off too  i go sleep 

 amp    

conclusion  i apologize for the flowery extended and perhaps repetitive metaphor for being on the bottom of the ocean  but i really cannot thing of a better way to describe this substance at this dose  so much was reminiscent of the properties of the abyssal zones of the sea  the darkness  the blueness  the vastness  the immense pressure  the sense of currents and flows and swirls  the sense of being pressed and tossed about by immense masses of creeping fluid  the sense of viscous magma glowing and setting and sinking into the dark  casting a warmth and light that beckons me in  it is a cozy  homely substance  like being in a dimly lit house during a thunderstorm  it’s a heavy dissociative  one whose magnitude fluctuates between varying degrees of stimulation and intensity  the headspace is empty and confusing  but also accommodating  cozy and warm  to a degree where one doesn’t really care about the emptiness  it is a cryptic drug  like much of the deep sea  does it have the potential to unlock something deeper  is there introspective potential  in my mind  it is like being adrift in the pelagic column  begging the vast ocean on all sides of you for answers and insight  i am in its realm  it simply exists here  it is not equipped to answer anything i dare ask of it  it is best to sit back and enjoy the ride  the lovely pleasurable and novel physical sensations 

it loses points for me for how exceedingly difficult administration is  but other that i think it is a worthwhile compound for someone seeking something somewhat novel  though i conjecture there isn’t much deeper to go in it  i would classify this one as immensely fascinating but not particularly enjoyable  perhaps mixing in some manic dissos will overcome some of the lacking qualities and yield some truly fascinating experiences  happy dissing

text:
bought isopropylphenidate  ipph  in hopes of using it to help with my adhd  i found it to be wonderful  i am just  in the cleanest way  productive and focused  i was sick of being prescribed adderall xr because of how awful it made my mood  and how little it helped me pay attention  ritalin worked great when i had it  but a fiendish friend talked me into asking for adderall or vyvanse about a two years ago  and i ve hated it since  anyways

ipph is simply easier for me to get than maintaining monthly visits with my a    hole psychiatrist  and it s been helping me much more  i take a consistent dose and i don t ever really have the urge to redose  which was the reason i stopped self medicating with       and   in the past  i just got a little fiendy and it scared me  that being said  what would be your concerns with self medicating with ipph  is it as slippery of a slope as other phenidate stims  what harm reduction practices would you advise w using this chem  thanks

so im coming down about   hours in to taking   of eth lad tabs i might not be too sober to tell yet but i want to still get it out lol and i have got to say never have i had the most amount of pain and pleasure  joy and terror all in one trip 

it all starts with the come up i start feeling a bit drowsy sedated my vision gets a bit distorted and i start seeing acid like visuals similar to what i would see on   nbome or nboh except these were on a complete whole otherworldly level of detail and imagery accompanied with the most brutal bodyload ever 

i start feeling sedated then stimulated its like at one point my body didnt know whether it wanted to chill on the couch or get up and aimlessly walk around i was completely confused and overwhelmed with the bodyload and the headspace it tends to bring   never have i ever had such strong delusions and insane thoughts even at my highest doses of my acid experiences   i am ashamed i threw away nearly   tabs of eth lad during a thought loop i had earlier      yup 👍 
 
it felt downright bizzare uncomfortable and i felt like i was losing my mind the first   hours then bam everything becomes sexual and insanely visual it has been a long time me and my wife have had a lovemaking session that great i mean like wow at some parts it was a bit awkward tho since i never socialized with her on psychedelics but still had a great time tho lol    

i might come back to edit this when im fully sober lol    ✌️

text:
while i strongly recommend reading the whole thing  i realize that it s pretty long  so there is a tl dr at the bottom  but really  read the whole thing  

 amp    

drugs can provide beautiful  magnificent experiences  it is the gift that keeps on giving  cherish it  you can reduce the risk of addiction and dependency  and keep these amazing tools in your life  why wouldn t you 

  so  how do you safely and responsibly use drugs  how do you know when to stop using a drug  do you have to stop all drugs if you have an issue with just one   

 amp    

  introduction  

these are very interesting questions to me  i have an issue with alcohol  and therefore i don t drink any more  i do use other substances regularly   kratom  phenibut  ketamine  the occasional empathogen   and have never had issues with any of them  i ve been an active drug user for about five years 

how does that work  i have an idea  and it has to do with your relationship to the substance in question  note  this idea is not supported by any scientific literature that i am aware of  these are my own observations and explanations  i am not a doctor  nor a psychologist  nor a therapist  i am an experienced drug user 

this post is about drug addiction  prevention   it s not about fixing existing addictions 

 amp    

  my relationship to drugs  

so  how does the relationship matter  i ll explain my experience first  when i was    i started drinking  we did this at a friend s place  and we would binge drink every time  people threw up or blacked out regularly   basically every time  i learned to drink there  always a lot  never taking it easy  i first stopped drinking for a month when i was    because i would drink too much in inappropriate situations  family dinners  or hanging out with friends casually  i would still get trashed  even though i didn t want to   and even when i actively tried not to  going sober for a month would help for a while  but i would go back to the same pattern  i have zero issues choosing when to drink  but loads of issues with how much i would drink  when i did drink 

i do drugs as well  i smoke weed on occasion  use empathogens a few times a year  i take kratom roughly weekly  phenibut about every two weeks  i use modafinil for productivity once or twice a week  i use ketamine once in a blue moon  usually at low doses  all of these patterns are work with  cooldowns   if i take kratom today  the first time i can take it again is a week from now  for instance  the times i have broken these rules for anu substance in the last five years  i can count on one hand 

my relationship with all of these substances developed in a very different way than with alcohol  with alcohol  i just started drinking like a deranged lunatic  with drugs  i thought first  and carefully picked a pattern before starting my use  this has been sustainable for the past five years  and i expect it to be sustainable indefinitely if i do not increase my usage 

 amp    

  others  relationships to drugs  

i have a friend who went to rehab for cannabis after it completely took over his life  he spent six years smoking weed and watching youtube videos alone  basically  this is how he always used weed  all day  every day  to keep the boredom away and never have to do too much to be somewhat comfortable  progressing in his studies was optional because he didn t care much  was constantly mentally foggy  and had no motivation  this is how he learned to smoke  this is his relationship with weed 

this friend has joined me in many other substances  we have enjoyed empathogens  psychedelics  ketamine  phenibut  and probably a bunch of other interesting substances together  these substances have never been a problem because just like me  with all of those substances  measures were taken and rules were self imposed to prevent any issues down the road  and for the past years  this has worked  his relationship with weed is ruined and i don t think he can ever re start smoking without it completely taking over his life again  but he can drink  as he never did that much anyway and he certainly never drank like me  he can do drugs fine because that relationship never progressed to a problematic stage 

i have a few more examples of this that follow the same general trend  writing them down is a lot of the same  so i ll summarize  a similar pattern happened to 

  a guy i know with ghb and mephedrone  separately   but can use other substances without issue 
  a girl i know with weed  but can use other substances without issue 

i think it is also possible to have a bad relationship with drugs in general  i have one friend who fell into a very deep hole with benzos  but who has been abusing basically every substance they have been in contact with  alcohol  weed  kratom  myriad benzos    they have never had sustainable use patterns  i think this means that the relationship with drugs in general is broken 

 amp    

  caveats  

if you ever decide to put this information to use  please be critical of your situation  there is a possibility that drugs in general just aren t something you can do in a sustainable  controlled way  in my experience  unresolved or untreated mental health issues are a strong indicator of this  these issues can prevent you from properly protecting yourself by using in a disciplined way  after all  if you are suicidal and don t care about your well being  why would you put in effort and  have less fun  to protect yourself on the long term  those words were literally what my dear  benzo afflicted friend said to me 

 amp    

  conclusion  

my takeaway from all of this  once you ruin your relationship with a substance  i don t think you can go back  sober stretches  even fairly long ones  have helped me temporarily but never permanently  i think this holds true for a lot of people  protect your relationship with the substances you love  regularly do sober stretches   i would recommend a month or more  every year   to make sure you can function fine without your drug s  of choice 

drugs are best used to enhance your life  using them to  fix  your life is unreliable and unsustainable  protect your relationship with substances so that you can use them indefinitely to enhance your experiences 

 amp    

  how i apply this theory  

i keep track of my use in a notepad app so i can easily figure out how long ago use of each substance was  then  i use it enforce  cooldown periods  between use of the same drug  on the  on  day  i can use as much of the drug as 

this means i can do different drugs on consecutive days  e g  kratom monday  alcohol tuesday  weed wednesday  but for the next kratom session i would have to wait the   week cooldown until next monday 

here are the  cooldown durations  that i have been successfully using for the past five years 

  weed    week  more can also be fine but this is what i try to stick to most of the time  be honest with yourself here though 
  kratom    week
  phenibut gabapentinoids    weeks ideally    week minimum
  mdma highly serotonin based empathogens    months ideally    month minimum
  functional use of dopamine based stimulants  e g  modafinil    mph  dexamphetamine     week max at low doses  this means very far from being recreational  and take at least a week off every month
  recreational use of dopaminergic stimulants    week minimum    month ideally  things like cocaine  euro speed    fa  ethylphenidate  n ethyl pentedrone  hex en  etc  
  dissociatives  ketamine  pcp derivatives     week minimum    weeks ideally

 amp    

i don t use these substances  recreationally   but if i would then i would use the following cooldowns 

  opioids  except for kratom     weeks ideally    week minimum
  benzos    weeks ideally    week minimum
  alcohol    week if small amounts    week if drunk

all other stuff i think you can play by ear  i doubt anyone will fall into salvia addiction  psychedelics can become an issue  but it is very rare  if you tend to take them too often  i would recommend tripping at most once every     months 

 amp    

  when to stop using a drug  

i stopped drinking after i repeatedly drank more than i intended to  and embarrassed myself in front of friends and family multiple times  this was how i knew that my relationship with alcohol was problematic  and trying to fix that i stopped for different lengths of time  the first few times i stopped drinking for a month  which i did   times about   year apart  the next time i stopped i did so for   year  i am currently   months into a dry   years  if i end up drinking again  and have issues again  i will stop drinking for   years  then   the next  then    then    and after that i think i ll be  nearly  dead anyway 

i m probably not going to drink anyway after this   year stretch  because i m tired of failing to control myself with booze  i think escalating breaks like this are a good idea though  and i would recommend it to others 

 amp    

  final thoughts  

thank you for reading  i hope this helps someone  and i think this information can be especially helpful if you are new to drugs  drugs are great  but they deserve respect  i have seen drugs destroy people  everyone always thinks it won t be them that has issues  it can be you  you can easily think you are in control even if you re really not  stay safe and enjoy 

 amp    

 amp    

  tl dr  

you can enjoy drugs in a safer way  with a much lower risk of addiction dependency  by 

  being mindful about your relationship with each individual drug you do
  tracking your drug use in a notepad app  date  substance  dose  maybe time 
  taking pre defined breaks between using the same drug  see advice under  how to apply this theory 
  taking breaks from specific substances if your relationship with a substance is problematic
  making these breaks longer if you have to take them again

enjoy the amazing tools that drugs are for as long as possible

text:
now  i am someone who is really anxious with psychedelics  espacially with lsd     is enough to make me anxious  
al lad on the other hand didn t make me anxious at all  neither my gf  

the come up is really smooth  slowly coming and very clear headed  i had a little bit of echoing at the beginning you know from larger lsd doses  

  hours in  i was peaking  visuals close to   lsd and quite similar no colour shifting tho sadly  a body load was present but comparing it to acid it was very mild 

the headspace i had   have is very very clear  sometimes i d even ask myself if i am tripping or not  i even tried to cause though loops with absolutely   success  
this changed when we went inside again       hours into the trip  mild confusion but very very very forgiving   

overall i would recommend al lad to anyone who is willing to spend the price  i am very sure it s better at     tabs as everyone is saying   and even for someone with anxiety   tab was a little boring for me 

thanks for reading

so i got some new chems to test and started with this one 

t        rock crushed and dissolved in water thrn drank it  bitter  similar to molly but maybe slightly less 

t     start noticing a very smooth clean rolly effect while chatting with my gf

t     seems to peaking  really enjoyable for music and body feels good  mdma like  but lighter 

     peak is over  very smooth and gradual comedown 

t     redosed   by boofing 

    starts to get more euphoric again  top up with   vaped  vapour seems quite benign  this time it s not as warm but more dopaminergic sexual 

t          mostly had sex while listening to music  really sexual drug  but also very chatty  you could go either way with it  

t          redose   by snorting  i think this one felt even more dopaminergic than the boof  vape  but it could be my serotonin getting low  still felt good  sex felt really good  errection was possible but needed a bit of work  orgasm didnt happen but felt fine

i woke up early one morning excited to start my day with a few small doses and planned to just chill on the couch until i came up   i have used the chemical before and and very comfortable with how much i can handle and how much is too much  and the amount that i measured out was way below what a usual recreational dose is for me   i didn t really feel much stimulation so i decided to just go about my day   

 amp    

however about an hour later my headspace just went into complete and utter dysphoria   i tried to clean for a bit to try and burn some energy off and thought  its just a bad wave it will leave soon    so i set a timer on my phone for an hour and decided if an hour passed and i felt any worse i would try to sedate myself   the alarm rang and i took a couple of downers and tried to lay down and i swear to god i could not get sleep no matter how hard i tried 

 amp    

 do not try this  this was for emergency only   i took   shots of vodka  some diphenhydramine  smoked some weed  and the utter disability for me to get sleep was making my anxiety worse   

i just sat half drunk and dazed from the benedryl watching tv for the afternoon and it took   hours –– yes   hours for me to come down from that single dose at   am 

 amp    

should i just write this shit off for good   got a bad batch   i mean the damn doa of the stuff is no more than   hours  but   hours of crushing anxiety  i m not sure what i did wrong

one thing that s always confused me though  because i ve never met anyone who has the same experience  is that the effects of ketamine last substantially longer in me than anyone else  i m talking  it takes about   minutes to an hour for the effects to peak and then they still last     hours total before sobering up  similarly to most other substances  i once went on a     a day binge for   weeks and never experienced any bladder pain at all over the course and also never seemed to develop a heightened tolerance to it

  gt  dmso is also used to dissolve test compounds in   in vitro   https   en wikipedia org wiki in vitro   drug discovery  https   en wikipedia org wiki drug discovery         https   en wikipedia org wiki dimethyl sulfoxide cite note             https   en wikipedia org wiki dimethyl sulfoxide cite note      and  drug design  https   en wikipedia org wiki drug design         https   en wikipedia org wiki dimethyl sulfoxide cite note       screening  https   en wikipedia org wiki bioassay  programs  including  high throughput screening  https   en wikipedia org wiki high throughput screening  programs          https   en wikipedia org wiki dimethyl sulfoxide cite note             https   en wikipedia org wiki dimethyl sulfoxide cite note      this is because it is able to dissolve both  polar  https   en wikipedia org wiki chemical polarity polar molecules  and  nonpolar  https   en wikipedia org wiki chemical polarity nonpolar molecules  compounds

anyway  on to my  report   let s just say   i have a nice house and home with a lovely woman that i love very much  but this particular night  we d both had enough  so i took the bullet and decided to get a hotel room  of course   i ve got some a pihp stored away for a rainy day  so i wen t and grabbed it  along with a bottle of some   proof everclear  a pack of some kamel reds  been vaping lately  couldn t wait to smoke again   after driving to a few hotel rooms  i finally found one that suited my apparent needs  not too expensive  but not too cheap   but most importantly  it has a balcony  just right  

annnnyway  onto the rc  i brought maybe     grams with me   with more than half of that being a rock  a pihp crystalline is what they call it   where i buy it at least   first thing i do when i get into my room is take a key bump and a shot  or a chug  whatever   normally i would have brought a scale  but i forgot it   too late now  this hotel was too far away  i would say this key bump was probably     mayyybe    tops 

called my rents  because they re worried about me   felt great  like cocaine without the jitters  normally one bump of cocaine would have put me on edge  i feel calm  like myself  i explain myself perfectly   it s really a grwat conversation  

next up is my girlfriend   she s  of course  upset that i let home   so  i prepare with another key bump and another shot  feeling good  i m ready  same thing  smooth   conversational  i couldn t even begin to explain the shit we re going through  but the fact that i managed to come out feeling like me getting a hotel room was the best idea i d ever had  for both of us  nonetheless  was magnificent  

of course  now i m on my own  time to go ask the front desk for a pen i can take apart  as i don t have a bill  i begin to vape it  maybe half the key bumps i was previously taking  so if i had to guess       tops     as told how to do by who was previously mentioned   works like a fuckin charm  

take a few more shots   start thinking i should call everyone  i refrain   i ve been there  but i like the feeling  i haven t had that in quite some time  hit up every random person on reddit i can  naturally  and eventually  decide to make this post  i know it s not a typical        this happened   post  but man i really like this stuff  much easier on my brain than cocaine  much less urge to redose  i ll probably go to bed soon   and i ll probably regret this post  but  if your thinking about trying a pihp  i would suggest giving it a chance  granted i m pretty new to rc s  but i m a big fan   can t wait to try out   what are they      mar and   cpm  

don t have many opportunities to try this stuff   as my girlfriend and family are   well   not as open minded as me  

sorry if this breaks any rules at all  or if it pisses any of you off  just let me know and i ll delete it  i m not attached to it   just having fun  

tl dr a pihp is a fantastic stimulant  i won t pretend to know much about these new rc stim classes  something between halogenated and chlorinated    again  i don t know  don t judge me

text:
so i got about   of boh   b in the mail recently  was pretty excited to try it out  my immediate primal ape brain instinct was to snort   of it  the reasoning being that i wanted it to come on quickly and intensely  i however failed to test whether it was water soluble  which it is not  i also disregarded people who said snorting   x sucks  because i assumed they were just pussies or something  

immediately after taking a fat rip off my phone screen  the pain was instant  it felt like my nose canal was going numb from the intense burning  its wasn t just a little stinging  it was like i straight up snorted sulfuric acid  like it was melting the skin off the inside of my nose  

i told myself i would endure the pain  how long could it last after all  turns out that shit keeps burning for at least   minutes before even beginning an excruciatingly slow decline in pain  

naturally  i thought i could outplay this bitch ass boh   b  show it whos in control  so my high iq play was that i would snort back the copious amount of mucus developing in my nose and swallow it  that way i could take it out of my nose and send it straight to my stomach  game over for the boh   b  absolutely not 

you bite the sketchy research chemical and it bites back  all the unbearable pain i felt in my nose  had now transitioned into my throat  the same place you d normally get drips  however  here it was substantially more unpleasant  my entire esophagus clammed up  it tightened  making swallowing difficult  i took my water bottle and began gurgling water and swallowing it every few seconds  in an attempt to alleviate the pain  turns out i went through     of water within   seconds  coincidently  it also didn t help at all 

so i conceited  the boh   b had won  my only option left was to ride it out  endure the pain  i have now come to understand that pain as a punishment for my recklessness  i dearly hope that you  the reader  do not repeat the mistakes i have  do not try and snort boh   b  because that shit is whack

text:
hello fellow researchers  soon i will be doing some long distance driving over germany and sweden  basically just highways  and i need a piece of your knowledge and wisdom  first off  does anyone know what are the chances of me being tested   where and why and how to minimise the risk of being tested  do they do urine tests  sweat tests  saliva tests  hair tests  

the thing is that i m quitting a pretty long cath binge  hexen  a phip  peppered with occasional dissos and tryptamines and i assume all these would show on a regular drug test one way or another if i was driving intoxicated  but what about the metabolites  i presume it is not a problem if they detect that the driver was doing drugs maybe a month ago  right  but what if they detect someone was doing something maybe a week ago  or maybe a couple of days  what is the practice of german and swedish police  are there any locals with experience  should i go full on paranoia  or avoid all the hassle and just turn myself in to the first cops i see there 

i am of course going to be driving absolutely sober and i will be clean for at least a couple of days before any driving  but is that even enough these days  🤔when do i need to stop if i wanna drive on a friday 

danke tack thanks ❤️

text:
i m not really one for long write ups so i ll keep this succinct 

i ve been intrigued by psychedelic phenylamines  nbomes have been one of the ones that have intrigued me the most  but obviously they aren t great for you  nboh s are commonly regarded as being safer alternatives to nbomes  nowadays it s hard to get most nbohs  however    nboh has recently become available  i decided to give it a shot 

i took some magnesium beforehand as i always to to help with vasoconstriction  i took       mg tab  a few days prior i had taken an allergy test of a small piece of the tab with no real effects   a few hours into the trip i noticed that one of my pinkies were numb  kinda weird but whatever  fast forward to a couple of days afterwards my pinkie is still numb  sometimes tingly  and hasn t really gotten better  probably a bad sign of vasoconstriction for this drug 

just wanted to share  also  the trip wasn t nearly as visual as i thought it would be  although the headspace was interesting   probably not worth it  stay safe ish

text:
it was halfway of what you’d expect 
dpt is a very powerful tryptamine  i initially dosed fairly close to when i woke up  and dosed   spread out doing   intranasal weighed until gotten to that dose  it definitely dampened the intense visuals i most well would have had  they were more rainbowy and soft and showed hues  i can compare this to my previous trip where i did not take any benzodiazepines or derivatives  where as i did have very intense visuals 
after the the initial duration of the etizolam dosage was over  i had continually been dosing dpt in just bumps slight amounts 
the visuals were most definitely heightened and everything was extremely sharp and sliding and things started to drag on my tv  and i walked out to go somewhere and everything was so bright it had blinded me almost all while having a very stimulating body high  which i also had when i was under the influence of etizolam and dpt earlier in the day 

be vary aware that this is often considered a sinister trip or “bad trip” to experience for most people especially at way lower doses than i consumed under the influence of when i tripped without a benzo or derivative  i am also very experienced at tripping and handling my trip extremely well  even using psychedelics for extended periods of time staying up   hours straight with only   hours of sleep in that period 
i would extremely recommend and tell you to use harm reduction when using this chemical 

but holy fuck is it really fucking good  😂

tldr  lighter visuals when on etiz compared to when not  dosage on etiz was    spread out in   increments  once the etiz wore off the trip got more intense

text:
the proposal for the amendment to the german npsg is now published on the eu website  

when it will be voted on by the bundesrat is not yet known  but the proposal is classified as urgent 

i made a list of substances  which are currently on the market and will be affected by this law  

arylcyclohexylamine 
 pretty much all of them 

  fdck  dck  o pce  dmxe  hxe  mxipr  mxpr    ho pce    meo pce    ho pcp    me pcp    f pcp    cl pcp  btcp

tryptamine 
 added cycloalkyl groups on   and   and halogens on the ring 

  ho mcpt    br dmt    cl dmt    cl amt

ergolenes  
 added cycloalkylcarbonyl and cykloalkylmethyl groups on   

  cp lsd    cp al lad

benzimidazoles 

etazene  metodesnitazene  fluonitazene

for the other minor changes please read the document  https   ec europa eu growth tools databases tris de search  trisaction search detail amp year   amp num

so i’ve never tried any of the pyrrolidine based stimulants but have always wanted to do so  so i got about a gram  i have fairly good self control with stims  much more than with downers  i eyeballed my doses ain’t gonna lie but based on just my observations i’d say i went through      i have a scale i could use to be sure but i don’t feel it’s very necessary  i’m still feeling amazing  last dose was   mins ago and first was like   hours ago i’d say  clearly from the book i’m writing i’m still feeling it and euphorically as well  i literally instantly got some whiskey after my first dose and took a small benzo dose cause this shit is obviously super stimulating to your physical body  i’m done dosing for the night and i’m sure i’ll hold myself to it as i work early but not crazy early and have some   fma if i really need a functional pick me up in the morning  along with enough sedatives to take out a elephant 


so going into where i didn’t expect this to differ from my experience and i’ll note the vendor is very reputable  is people described it as a mix of meth and crack  i’m just not seeing the crack thing  i’ve heard of freebasing this shit and that might change these things but definitely feels much much closer to a more intense meth  in the best and worst way possible  like i’m so pumped and productive but i’ve also never gotten so paranoid so quickly  going to sleep tonight for sure and wait a few days to do this again  would never recommend a binge  overall it’s kind of like not what i was hyped it for it to be in that overwhelmingly beautifully heavy crack hit sensation but indefinitely dig it 


i’ll make an edit if i take more hits than the   i’ve done tonight because i like to think i have good control over stimulants  meth back a few years ago tested that but i got it under control  opiates though  i do them till they’re gone  i never order more than     grams of   map or o dsmt at a time and even with that i need a     kratom taper after so we all have our strength and weaknesses  if you feel you have good control over stimulants especially if you can handle meth i heavily recommend at least trying this shit  i mostly used meth as a sex drug but i’m alone right now and stopped watching porn a while ago because i just don’t think it’s good for you  seeing my girl soon tho so i can report back if anyone is curious of sexual enchantments compared to meth  which combined with ghb or any analogue of it is my favorite sex combo just lmk 


well enough stim rambling  much more manageable stimulant than i expected honestly but again i have more control over stims than various sedatives  i wouldn’t recommend it to people with stimulant issues obviously  just very different than i expected

text:
clonazolam and flualprazolam are the rcs that have the highest addiction liability and or blackout risk and associated harm 

so i ve had clonazolam and flualprazolam but mostly clam  i normally go at it for a week to a couple month  not likely more than   days because it just won t work out  this is what you should have on hand for a couple weeks  i have most but not all  all will help but not all are necessary to have  it s good to have several   though 

all of the following are psychoactive on their own  they all provide benzo adjacent effects but only somewhat different  they have a wide range of effects 

first line rc for high dose clam or flualp should be diclazepam titrating downward until the chems listed can replace benzos

the notes about the legal status refer to the us  please search each chem on psychonautwiki com for info on dose and exact effects 

gabapentin  i keep    rx required unscheduled 

phenibut  legal dietary supplement and readily available 

f phenibut  same status as phenibut and slightly less common 

pregabalin  cv controlled substance   less common 

fasoracetam  legal dietary supplement  readily available 

picamilon  legal  rare 

    butanediol  federally legal  ruled a ghb analog in some states   was common recently becoming less common  use with extreme caution  

gbl  pretty much the same as     but with a better safety profile  getting rarer  use with extreme caution  

ghb  ci narcotic except sometimes a cii controlled substance  rare  use with extreme caution  

i tend to have one of the phenibuts  always gabapentin  sometimes pregabalin  sometimes fasoracetam  also     unless i can get gbl to replace it  there s no need for more than one of the g family at once  use caution mixing all of these  especially the gs and fasoracetam with the phenibuts 

like i said  the chems are recreational on their own  rating the recreational value of the listed chems  clam flualp is a       gt   are generally opioids

phenibut

pregabalin

personally i never come off all benzos  i ve taken em daily for   years and believe i m a lifer  i just eliminate clam first  if i get to     clam i get diclaz  if only at     i use the above chems to get down to my   usual dose  may take extra kind in the first few days  i stockpile when taking clam  i take other stuff like stims  kratom and cannabis depending on the day  dissos n psyches in a blue moon  current kratom addict  occasional opioid use then switching back to kratom 

kratom and lyrica along with rx benzos is my go to for opioid withdrawal  likely along with gabs and benzos

contemplating it now sober  it s been a year or more since i don t use the chem  i was wondering if you guys have some opinion or theory about how come this particular chem gives such particular feeling 

i ve definitely have experienced something similar on   meo dmt  but on   meo my mind is so gone that i can t even think about the idea of being alone  i m just  gone   on   meo though i can have  normal  thoughts and contemplate the fact that maybe i m alone in my world and you are all imaginary  it s kind of more terrifying lol   in   meo your mind is gone so there s no problem if solipsism is true  but on   meo   

pd  of course i m not saying this is true in fact i put in the title  delusion  but i thought in making in a thread and ask you about your experiences with this particular feeling and if you think it could actually be true

text:
i don t usually make posts on things like this but this felt important 

i didn t think much of the effects of   bromo before taking due to reports advising it was baby dmt but after my experience i would say the opposite 

at   pm i inhaled one large hit of the   bromo that made through simple sodium carbonate extraction as it was a fumarate and i got a normal amount of vapor and held it in  with in   seconds i started to get the humming and vibrating vision so i exhaled it and went straight into visuals that made it look like the auto stabilization was off  after about   minute of lying there the visuals turned into what looked like armadillo scales folding into themselves and when i opened my eyes the walls stretched back making the room looks   feet wider than it was and still with an overlay of that armadillo pattern 

after about   to   minutes of overwhelming visuals i fell asleep leaving me to have the most intense vivid dreams which made the whole experience almost merge in to the dream but i was left with the most positive feeling 

in summary this chemical is not to be taken lightly  but do enjoy it with caution as the headspace it gives you the next day is wonderful  i hope my experience was helpful 

peace

text:
tried   meo dipt yesterday for first time  took   oral  usually start with high end of  common dose  on psychonaut wiki if the setting is right  always wise to start lower  on an empty stomach  within   mins it was pretty clear the drug was taking effect  got nausea so took ondensetron at the   hour mark  by   mins in i was at peak and no longer nauseated  

body felt very shaky  similar to dpt  touch didn t really feel much better than normal  tried jerking off but couldn t get into it  there was an elevated mood and clear headspace  but nothing deep or profound  almost no visuals  no audio distortion  coordination felt a little off  music sounded nice but not anything to write home about  about   hours in effects began to wind down  by   hour mark i d say i was sober enough to drive  i didn t  this is just a benchmark   

i think this chemical may have been more enjoyable at a lower dose  much like how i feel about   meo mipt  overall not better for me nor different enough from   meo mipt to warrant trying to find more  i generally prefer a psychedelic that will really  wow  me  and this wasn t it  overall not a terrible time though

text:
after a severe mrsa infection the hospital put in a picc line  an arms length tube that is surgically inserted into one of the primary veins near your heart  to allow me to use iv anti biotics at home  my routine was to insert the syringe with antibiotics into the picc line and then follow it by connecting a   syringe of saline which would be injected quickly to “flush” the line  

before my hospital stay i would sometimes fill up a   of liquid ketamine and heat it until it evaporated into a powder that could be snorted etc  but i had forgotten all about that  and on this particular night i reached for a   syringe full of clear liquid that i thought was saline to flush my line  plugged it in and in one quick push emptied all of it into the line and straight into my heart  i didn’t have any idea that it was the ketamine syringe until a while after it happened  so in that moment when i fell to my knees and realized i couldn’t move or call for help  my last thought before i ended up sprawled out on the floor was that i had to be dying somehow  later on i found out that the liquid in that syringe had at least    high doses of ketamine in it   so whether i almost died for real or just experienced a massive k hole  i can’t say for certain 

i saw myself on the floor not breathing as i moved up out of my body past the ceiling  and what happened after was the most mind blowing set of events that i couldn’t have thought up in a million years and still can’t describe very well  i stopped being myself in every sense and since i was “dead” there were levels of information that was too complex for any living person to comprehend  each level extremely more complex than the last one  but my “being” felt terrified of reaching the final levels and i was put back into my body  at which point i remember gasping for air like someone who had stopped breathing would be expected to   

for the next several hours i laid on the floor just repeating my own name and where i was  my name sounded strange at first and very foreign   i don’t believe that what i experienced could’ve been projections from my own mind  subconsciously or otherwise because it was seemingly so far beyond anything i could ever come up with  

maybe some of you can shed some light as to what actually likely happened

text:
hi all  

this subreddit has been a great source of information for me on multiple substances and occassions and i thought it was a good idea to give something back by sharing my extesive experience with multiple sessions with   mmc over the last   months since i discovered it   

and for the people who are going to say how irresponsible i am and how unhealthy it is to do this  i totally agree  i just did it so i could inform you all  so you don t have to do this 😊 but on a serious note  if you are sensitive to addiction and do not have a strong discipline  see redosing below  then i would strongly suggest to stay away from this substance because it can be really fiendish and addictive 

  tl dr  

if you accept the risks and if you think you can handle this stuff    mmc is a very interesting research chemical  it gives a loving and speedy rush at the same time and is absolutely amazing in social and or sexual settings  the effects unfortunately are short lived  which means you need to redose if you want the effects to last longer  but it will never really feel like the first dose again   compulsive  redosing is a great issue and risk with this substance  tolerance builds up directly within a sessions  and last for several days  i have found a protocol that  works  for a fun night for me  it may be of use to you 

  general   effects  

my overall experience is that   mmc is a very exciting  but also quite a fiendish substance with a relatively dissapointing short lived effect  it gives an amazing buzz which is often described as a combination of the connecting and loving mdma like effect and the speedy sharp exciting cocaine rush  for me that is a totally accurate description  to give some context about myself  male     with substantial experience with all sorts of substances like shrooms  lsd  ayahuasca  tryptamines  mdma  weed    mmc  etc

for me   mmc works purely as a recreational stimulant  it is absolutely amazing for sex  it brings out a very loving  but at the same time incrediby energetic en unsatiable sex god  so i ve heard   my experience is that ghb makes you feel sexually more  filthy  and cocaine more  aggressive  and lsd and tryptamines more  trippy and connected     mmc just gives you this incredibly hot  clean and energetic feeling  you just want to keep going and going   

  dosing and duration  

i started with   tabs i bought online in the netherlands  the first     times i started with         and then redosed another     or     after about   minutes  

my experience is that you start feeling something around     minutes and the absolute peak is always around     minutes after which it starts to slowly fade away   i would normally redose once or twice  usually     minutes after the previous dose  redosing more than twice  so redosing   i e  taking a   dose  doesn t do anything positive to the experience at all  it just has the stimulating bodily effect  but the nice hot rush is almost totallly gone  trust me on this one  i have compulsively redosed several times  for science 😊   you just feel the uncomfortable stimulating effect on the body which before was probably masked by the extremely exciting feeling you had from it  i assume you probably squeezed the last drop of neurotransmitters out of your body by that time    but more on redosing below  

after     sessions i started to try higher doses and more redosing in different patterns  the higher doses       are pretty exciting and provide an almost overwhelming  breathtaking  probably literally  experience  it s not trippy  but just  literally  very exciting as if you swim in a  sea of wow   stimuli come in sharper and more overwhelming and your whole body is on  it s probably not very good for your body as  in my case  my heart rate was constantlly around      for sexual activities it is not the best place to be as the experience is just a bit too overwhelming  and dosing more than around     mg in one session really writes off the next day  and part of the next  for any serious activities that use your brain  and obviously it probably is not the healthiest thing to do for your brain on a regular basis anyway    

about duration i would say the pretty sharp peak always comes after a predictable     minutes and fades away quite quickly  for that reason i usually take a redose   minutes after the previous dose  so about   minutes after the peak   so that by the time the effects start to fade away  the next dose starts to kick in   

regarding sleeping after a session  i usually use     hours after the last dose as a rule of thumb when i can actually fall asleep  so if you start in the evening and take your last dose around midnight  don t expect to fall alseep before     am      

   compulsive  redosing  

compulsive redosing is a serious issue with this substance  if you do not have a lot of self control  please stay away from this stuff  it is extremely fiendish if you can s control yourself  i have done several sessions in which i had already done   hits and started to feel that the effects of the third were already well below the previous ones  but saw the bag of caps on the table and just couldn t resist the urge resulting in the unpleasant effects descried above  almost pure  uncomfortable  bodily sensations and almost no pleasant stimulating effects  but the urge to go back to that great feeling of just an hour before is soo tempting  but you can actually never get there again    

so what i do nowadays is plan my session and weight down the doses beforehand and then put everything away  i take a piece of paper and write down the   or   doses i am going to take and put the caps on the piece of paper and every time i take a dose i write down the time   and i keep the previous experiences of redosing with only negative effects in the back of my head 

  optimum protocol    for me 

after a few months i found a sort of optimum session where i would dose two or three times according to this schedule   

       t  

       t  

     mg   t      

this would give me a nice relatively constant best effect starting around t   and lasting to around t        hours after the last dose for   doses or t   in case of   doses    

  tolerance  

as i tried so many different dosages and protocols for this subreddit and in the name of science  i found out a little thing about tolerance too  this is obviously my personal experience  so it may be different for you  

within a session  tolerance builds up directly after the first dose  the effects of subsequent doses  at the same mg dosage  are lower  i would estimate the effects of a    same mg  dose to be around    of the initial and the effects of a   dose around     a fourth dose is not worth it  see above  i would estimate the effects to be around      but with the unpleasant full bodily   cardiac sensations  

after a session  i would say that my tolerance would be almost gone in about   days  i would estimate my experience to be something around    of baseline  my shortest interval was   days  so using on a monday and repeating on a wednesday  and i estimate the effects were around    of baseline then  

it obviously also depends on the amount of substance you used  but these figures would be an average when using around   in one session  

and again  i did these experiments for science  so please take at least a few weeks time between sessions  there is no research on the effects of this substance on humans  so effectively you are your own lab rat if you try this filthy stuff    

  conclusion  

  mmc is probably a very unheathy neuro  and cardiotoxic substance without any research on the effects on humans  so if you want to try this stuff you  don t  know the risks    if you are prone to addiction or have poor self control  stay the f     away from this stuff  because you will have a hard time getting rid of it and not fucking up your life  

 tl dr from above   if you accept the risks and if you think you can handle this stuff  it is a very interesting research chemical  it gives a loving and speedy rush at the same time and is absolutely amazing in social and or sexual settings  the effects unfortunately are short lived  which means you need to redose if you want the effects to last longer  but it will never really feel like the first dose again   compulsive  redosing is a great issue and risk with this substance  tolerance builds up directly within a sessions  and last for several days  i have found a protocol that  works  for a fun night for me  it may be of use to you 

  thanks   

this story is obviously an n   experience report  but nevertheless i hope it gives some insight for those who want to know a bit more about   mmc  this subreddit has given me a lot of knowledge  so this is my way of giving some back to you all  enjoy

text:
so this happened a week and some days ago  i had waited a full week since my last trip and i had     mg pills left from the   i ordered 

the first was very underwhelming  the second was was very nice but this one    phew

so i finally got some dabs through the mail from a friend  and that was a game changer  

i snorted   mg early in the afternoon and went to the store with my sister  we come back and i feel the mild come up  it was similar to my last trip  nice but nothing to write home about  wait about   hours just vibing in my room  then i get the text notification that my mail got here  i went and got it out the mailbox ran back and heated up the nectar   took a nice dab   i then snorted the other   mg

now here is where things get interesting  i haven’t smoked in months i remember feeling like oh yeah i’m tripping good  but i sat in the new recliner i got the day before and stared at the roof  it’s a popcorn roof and if you don’t know look it up  every shadow and crave ace was a luminous crack into a colorful pulsating world  after looking for a few moments in awe  i noticed something  as i “lost focus” and just stared the roof overtook my vision partly  it was like when a program breaks on a computer it only takes up a small rectangle and as i swivel my head where the square moved  it incorporated it into the blinding blur  i still had my peripheral vision and could see my computer screen and looked at it and it went void too  i panicked for a second and closed my eyes for a second and it was back to normal 

i tried it again and managed to repeat it  even though insufflation is supposed to last     hours i was felt like i was doing it all night  although i never had any breakthroughs or anything the visuals were amazing and the day is definitely one to remember  there’s a good amount more to the story but i’m high and tired of writing lol

text:
once  several years ago  i was weighing out   and putting it into individual capsules  i had dropped a small  unknown amount of material on my table  and decided to pick it up with my thumb and lick it off  as i planned on tripping that night anyway 

bad idea 

within about   minutes  i was hallucinating that i was in jungle type seeing and that there was a war going on around me  i have tripped hundreds  if not more than a thousand times  yet this particular trip was one of three  nightmare trips  that i have had over the years  i couldn t figure out how to use my phone  and didn t even realize it was my phone at all  suddenly  my girlfriend called me and i just knew to hit the green button  she guided me into a much better headspace and instructed me on how to open my safe and get a dose of seroquel to abort the trip  since that night  i keep antipsychotics on me at all times when planning to trip 

anyway  point being      reminder to use a scale and don t eyeball chemicals

text:
there was a time where i would offer mxe by the hundreds of grams at a time  i had a serious problem with that particular chemical  and it ruled my life for almost a decade  even after it suddenly went extinct  i had a stash that lasted me about   years after that  for these   or   years  i was always fucked up  i would wake up  snort a bump or two and head to work  i would then bust out a few bumps on my desk and take them between seeing clients  honestly i have no idea how i still work this extremely sensitive and important job 

anyway to the story  

i lived in virginia  and my friend jimmy lived in maryland  i ve morning  i took the metro  dc subway  to meet him  we get back on the train and i pass him a bullet full of mxe and i had one for myself as well  we were talking bumps on the train like madmen  and eventually lost all relation to where we were  we got lost in the subway system and happened to get out at the pentagon  we recognized that we were at the pentagon and got on a bus really quickly  this particular bus was full of hispanic day laborers 

as the bus drove in  we began to lose relation as far as where we were again  within about   minutes of being on that bus  we got off in what seemed like a faraway land  we thought we were in south america      from washington  dc to south america in less than an hour  lol 

we went into a supermarket that reinforced our belief that we were no longer in the dc area  we wandered around for several hours exploring until i see a highrise apartment building off in the distance and it was then that i realized that i was looking at my apartment building  and the entire   or   hours previous had been spent within about a half mile of my home  

lmaooo

text:
please do not take this as professional advice and i apologize in advance for not following a specific professional format  this is simply a quick unprofessional subjective experience  you should use caution and do not follow any of my advice or comments here 

i have some tolerance  roughly   to   of suboxone a day or every other day for a couple of years  started my first dose of dipyanone around   with very light effects  tried   to   orally the next morning and finally i felt full effects  if i had to compare it to another opiod i would say it is similar to methadone  it took about   minute to an hour to feel the effects and the peak was in by the   and half hour mark  very long legs and the effects continued many more hours  it feels to me that its half life is similar to methadone so possibly   to   hours  once the onset is over and after the peak it turns to a sedative warm state similar to methadone  id say its possibly less potent than methadone by a factor of     to   times but be very careful as i could be dead wrong  i could still feel the effects the next morning 

overall i find this a decent opiod with longer legs than o dsmt  longer onset than odsmt  less stimulation  more sedation  similar or deepee warmth  great sleep  very little to no rush  some itchiness and a bit heavy on stomach digestion  could be a great opiod for tapering or suboxone or methadone replacement  i only tried orally and found the oral roa effective  i personally prefer this to odsmt but then again i prefer methadone to odsmt and am a fan of long half life opiods  its a bit weaker than methadone but very similar  so im not sure why some reviews out there call this a short half life opiod with no legs  this shit is potent and has major legs

text:
today i took   tabs of al lad  just kind ve did it because i had the day off school and work and i ve been yearning to trip  so why not  started the trip with a beautiful hike  got some sunlight  got real close to some cows  didn t start feeling it until i got done with the hike   hours after  it was because i had ate right before the tabs 

i got home and my cousin texted me  says were going out tonight for food  i told him to pick me up 
 
the visuals were good it was just more intricate  tribal pattern type visuals  great  but nothing to write home about  i was expecting to be blinded by fractals and to see some dmt elves doing cirque du soleil type shit in my vision  but whatever  headspace  very manageable  but still present  some minor confusion at the beginning but nothing i couldn t handle  now that i got the formalities out of the way  let me tell you about the trip 

maybe this is a good place to preface by telling you a little about myself  i am trying to reach the highest level of consciousness i can in this life  i have started studying mysticism  esotericism  light occultism  etc  i have become somewhat literate to how consciousness speaks to us  which in my understanding is mostly through symbolism  i like to study the hidden meanings of religions  practice things like semen retention  have gave up drugs  amp  alcohol  eating meat  and most of my other vices  i try to transcend my animal side to reach a state of divinity  i would like to help people understand these things  because i believe the that we aren’t progressing forward in consciousness   because we have a lack of understanding ourselves and our relationship to the universe  on the path to doing so i realized how unconscious people are and how conscious i was to myself  how spiritually dead most people are and yet don t care  it makes my heart weep that consciousness is asleep  i feel like the kid from the   sense who says he sees dead people  i interpret the sixth sense to be your “third eye” and the dead people he sees are those who are spiritually dead 

back to the trip  eventually my cousin picked me up and we were just riding around chilling  the first thing we drove past a church and i saw a bunch of people out there  people who just don t really care to actually be spiritual and put in the work  they just follow the dogmatic exoteric views of religion  then we pass some people just smoking cigarettes and drinking alcohol  just desecrating their body  not caring  i try not to let it get me to last my thoughts man just enjoy the music  eventually get to the restaurant   there is a long wait for the table food before we sit down cousins order drinks and they start drinking  a majority about is how hungry they are and how much they re going to eat  feel like a lot of people or just just looking for immediate gratification  and just want to satisfy a insatiable carnal desires   

we get to the table eventually and my cousins order huge servings of food with more alcohol  one of them orders a   oz steak  another fish chips and a cheese pizza  another orders two entrees  i order a avocado toast  my cousins ask why i didn’t really order any meat and i told them vegan  they couldn t get a grasp of why someone would be that way  but even if i told them they wouldn t really care anyway  i think animals are to be respected and we shouldn’t feast on there decaying carcasses after they were spiritually raped and destroyed my cousins talk about watching porn and how they masturbate to it multiple times a day  i try to tell them about semen retention and how they’re depleting their life source  anyways the night goes on and i eventually head home  i did enjoy getting out 


this trip made me start thinking when will humanity wake up  when will we become conscious  when will we start caring  when ill we transcend our low animalistic nature and embody higher levels of consciousness  where has the care in the world gone  i believe it’s gone  waiting for humanity to wake up  weeping  waiting… 


another thing that s been on my mind is that i ve been single for awhile  my last relationship taught me a lot and i finally started getting over it  a lot of times i seek companionship and intimacy  but as of lately it s been consuming a lot of my thoughts  i desperately seek someone to love and care for  with the help of al lad  that i need to love myself that was a nice breakthrough  sorry if the report seems spaced out  i m not the best at writing reports  seems a lot cooler in my head before i start typing it 

sending love and light to you
