text:
mapb march    
  at     



my plan to do   mapb was rather sudden to take it the evening of tuesday march   i  i took   my first dose i think it was maybe too high of a dose  maybe i’ll try   the next time i try it  anyways we start feeling the effects in the first   hours building into the peak  i decided to take   of   to round out the roll from the   mapb  can say it was quite nice for a boost in visuals and heart opening  but the part that is most memorable is that after we had our roll on tuesday night and thought we were sober before we went to sleep we both woke up still having residual effects from the roll that we had taken last night  the after effects of this substance lasted   hours for me  there wasn’t a comedown at all  after my first experience with   mapb i can say it is definitely one of my top   favorite chemicals of all time  

i was feeling so much bliss and euphoria throughout the entire time i took this with another person who is close to me that we will call person a  person a and i experienced telepathy  it was so beautiful experience 

i was able to heal for the collective and tap into the ocean of suffering that chris bache talks about in lsd and the mind of the universe  

i’m going to share a bit about the pharmacology cuz i’m a nerd and i find this interesting  

     methylaminopropyl benzofuran  or   mapb  is a substituted benzofuran and phenethylamine  it is comprised of an n methylated ethylamine chain and a furan ring attached to a central benzene ring  it can also be classified as a derivative of methamphetamine because the n methylated ethylamine chain is alpha methylated in an analagous manner  molecules of the amphetamine class contain a phenethylamine core featuring a phenyl ring bound to an amino     group through an ethyl chain with an additional methyl substitution at rα  the oxygen atom in the furan ring is placed at the   position  which generally constitutes more stimulating effects than when the oxygen is placed at the   position  which usually renders it more psychedelic in effect 

  mapb is a triple reuptake inhibitor for the monoamines norepinephrine  dopamine and serotonin as well as being an agonist for the     and     receptors        it has also been speculated that   mapb acts as a releasing agent for the previously mentioned neurotransmitters 
as a result  releasing agents such as   mapb may exert their activity by effectively boosting the levels of the serotonin  norepinephrine and dopamine neurotransmitters in the brain by binding to and partially blocking the transporter proteins that normally clear and reuptake those monoamines from the synaptic cleft  this allows serotonin  dopamine and norepinephrine to accumulate within various reward and cognition related areas in the brain  resulting in stimulating and euphoric effects 

i think the pharmacology of   mapb is more preferred to me than mdma 


overall i highly recommend people try   mapb if mdma has lost its magic  due to excessive yawning next time i will take a lower dose  the yawning was the only uncomfortable part of the experience but my jaw was hurting from being too open

text:
note  this post does not discuss substances potentially controlled by the controlled substance analogue enforcement act of    informally referred to as the federal analogue act  or natural sources of illicit drugs that by virtue are not controlled  exceptions are peyote  cannabis  opium poppy latex  and coca leaves   it only addresses substances listed in the dea orange book and some interesting legal loopholes that could enable use of some of these scheduled substances without violating the law  

  since being signed into law by the honorable president richard nixon  public law     is one of the most wide reaching and near unconstitutionally punitive laws on the books  although most scheduled substances are sealed off to law abiding citizens  with the only ways to experience the effects of the substance is by breaking the law  however it may be of interest to know that some scheduled substances could be enjoyed without breaking laws  getting a dea license  or buying an rc  analogue  below are some of the following substances 

trans   methylaminorex 

despite being the supposedly  evil  club drug        trans   mar is not controlled as   methylaminorex in schedule   because only the cis isomer is controlled    this is because the pure trans isomer racemate was believed to be too difficult to synthesize and lacking significant recreational potential  this is not true and in a opinion letter  has no force of law  dea acknowledges this  

 amp    

oliceridine freebase 

i just recently found this out as oliceridine was just recently approved by the fda  but if one takes a closer look at the    placement of oliceridine in schedule ii  one will notice that   the scheduling order only applies to the fumarate  salts  isomers  salts of isomers  ethers  and esters  the freebase is not controlled    this represents an interesting scenario as unfortunately the freebase cannot be iv ed and therefore would either have to be smoked  snorted  or swallowed  

 amp    

butapap  butabital exempt preparation  

 amp    

although  butapap contains butabital  a controlled substance  it is not regulated under the csa s  any mixture of a controlled substance  clause as it is an exempt preparation    an exempt preparation is a mixture of a controlled substance that the dea has determined is exempted from control because of it formulation    as a result an individual can lawfully possess this substance without violating federal law  in ohio though  this formulation is controlled 

anyways  i just found this interesting  comments  critiques  questions  compliments  and suggestions are welcomed

text:
tldr at the bottom

almost everywhere you read about   meo dmt  people tell you that it s an entirely crazy and difficult experience  which i think is true for when you actually do breakthrough doses  but in my opinion keeps a lot of people from experiencing the amazing benefits of this beautiful drug  i always thought that   meo dmt is way too  hard  of a drug for me in the sense that i wouldn t be able to handle the experience     
however  a few weeks ago i still took the step and ordered it  and even though i ve been doing comparatively tiny doses  it s absolutely changed me for the better  i m less impulsive  have way less of an urge to do other drugs  and am generally more happy with who i am  or more motivated to take the steps to improve when i am not happy with myself     

so i think that while   meo dmt is definitely a powerful drug that should be respected  breakthrough doses are way too glorified and just make people think that that s the  goal  of dmt consumption or that you don t benefit from it when you don t consume those doses  if you ve been thinking of trying it  i definitely recommend you to do so but absolutely do way smaller of a dose than what is recommended everywhere 

i had a breakthrough a few days ago  and while i definitely think that it s a beautiful experience worth having  i m don t think the lasting benefits from that dose are so much bigger than the ones you get sub breakthrough doses  at least as much as people say 

tldr  the glorification of   meo dmt breakthroughs keep people from benefitting from this incredible substance because it makes it seem like that s the goal of the dmt experience  even though a breakthrough is not all much more lastingly beneficial and even harder to integrate properly compared to smaller doses

text:
treatment resistant depression and social anxiety sufferer here  i am running out of options  so i wanted to ask if anybody has an idea what else i can try   

things i have tried 

   multiple psychotherapies  lifestyle interventions like regular exercising  healthy diet  fasting  meditation  sunlight exposure  a good sleep wake cycle etc   

  medication  multiple ssri and snri  proppranolol  cbd  weed   wellbutrin  quetiapine  trazodone  lamictal  mao i  parnate up to     tianeptine pregabalin  amytriptiline  benzos  modafinil  methylphenidate  vortioxetine  ketamine infusions  microdosing psylocybine  dxm   

  supplements like l theanine  ashwaghanda  magnesium  sam e  l tyrosine  nac etc   

  transcranial magnetic stimulation  electroconvulsive therapy

several psychiatrists told me that i am treatment resistant and they dont know what else to do   

blood work is fine

currently i am taking vortioxetine  trazodone and kratom and once a week phenibut  i know psychedelics could be a solution but its more or less impossible to discontinue vortioxetine  a serotonin modulator and ssri   so psychdelics make no sense 

i would really love to know if anyone has an idea what else to try   no matter if legal or illegal  i am a fairly responsible guy but iam at a point now where i am willing to give almost everything a try

well i snorted   mg of   aco dmt yesterday  took a shower and watched the water turn in a bunch of shapes and tapestry like mosiacs flowing all over me  i even chanted and sang to the water as it poured over me because of how beautiful it was 

i had amazing visuals and laughed about everything for about   and a half hours before it came down to just a body high  

when i came down off the visual high i proceeded to snort another     mg of   aco dmt and took   mg of   ho mipt orally 

the mix produced a warm yet jelloy buddy high and a very deep headspace of thought and emotion  the oev were a bit different than the crisp sharp mosiac of   aco dmt on its own and more casted shadows and made it seem as people or spirits were walking past me every so often  everything also had an aurora or tracer around it even if it wasn t moving  music sounded amazing also 

overall it was a good evening and night  i really enjoyed the combo and would probably do it again in higher doses at one point

text:
if you take your average  generic cbd power and ad glacial acetic acid  condensed vinegar basically  it yields delta   thc  if you let this mixture sit for a certain amount of time it’s converted to delta   thc 

it is then distilled  like alcohol is  to where your final product is pure delta   

it is called distillate for a reason  

an isomer is the same molecule  just rearranged differently  correct me if i am wrong  

guys it’s ok that it’s synthetically produced  fuck they extract thc from plants with butane  that’s what bho is butane hash oil  

it’s ok though  delta   is amazing  i struggled with spice addiction as a teen and   makes me have severe anxiety and makes me feel uncomfortable in my own skin    i can push the limits and embrace the high 

just stop kidding yourself that it’s extracted from a hemp plant  cbd is cbd  there is no marijuana strain that has enough delta   to make a rats ass  you could take the highest containing delta   mj plant in the world  harvest   pounds and maybe get half a gram of delta   

downvote all you want  i love delta    i like that it’s no harsh chemicals to synthesis isomerize for the people that sniff there finger after scratch their ass

rc benzo blackout

this is a cautionary tale of sorts  i have acquired one flualprazolam        ml solution as well a   mg equal solution  i also received two solutions of flubromazolam containing        ml total for each bottle  i didn’t take a super dose of any   but boy did the flubromazolam take me out hard  luckily i didn’t drive or have too much contact with others but there was a good     hours worth of memory completely gone  luckily my wife got home into time to ensure i didn’t dose my self any further  please be very careful with these chemicals and use as responsibly as possible my good people of reddit  best wishes to you all  one thing i can say is that the flubromazolam i have been using has similar effects to good o’ fashioned xanax in my opinion  it definitely stops a panic attack from coming on

text:
n n pipt  vaporized  unknown dose      time     sad and sleepy   

  tl dr   not very interesting for me  it could have been insta tolerance  but i m not in a hurry to revisit it  

due to my efforts to clean up some of the reported on contaminants  my n n pipt freebase reverted back to an oily goo instead of a fine salmon colored powder  this made storing  weighing  and administering it difficult  i was worried that it would decompose even faster than it otherwise would  so i opted to vaporize it today instead of taking other more intriguing materials  i thought about dissolving it in a volatile solvent and spraying it onto plant matter for smoking  but opted to use a ceramic donut coil vaporizer instead  

  background    

i ve taken dozens of different psychedelics over    years  it has been three weeks since my last psychedelic experience and a week since i took any st  john s wort  i ve had no drug today but caffeine and a half of a brunch margarita a couple hours earlier  leaving me feeling quite tired  i m in a good mood otherwise  and it s a beautiful day  my stomach is still full of ultra greasy tacos  

  experience   

    i added a ball bearing or dippin  dot sized blob to the ceramic coil  then pulsed the vape pen  inhaling long and slowly  holding my lungfull for over a minute  the effects begin immediately  but build slowly over four minutes  they re mild  appropriate to the presumed low dosage  it reminds me of ept  but less euphoric  more generic  it s pleasant enough  

    i load up another comparable blob and repeat  the effects slowly become stronger  reminding me again of ept  but less enjoyable  it s a neutral sort of tryptamine stoniness growing  there re some feelings of over fullness in my stomach all of a sudden  but no actual nausea   this persists for the rest of the experience  

      i load up a fatter blob  and start vaping it over the next few minutes  the effects flesh out a bit more  i am getting no somatic sensations at all  there s the awareness that something is going on at a cognitive level  but it s as clear headed as base tryptamines seem to generally be  i wouldn t want to try to interact with people at a grocery store  for instance  but i m a long ways from feeling cognitively debilitated or out to lunch  

my friend s cat has become aware that i m taking a psychedelic and has come over to investigate  while it generally dislikes the vibes that i give off on psychedelics  particularly from mal and mescaline   there are a few    b  that he doesn t seem to notice and a couple  dmt  that he loves  in the past when i ve smoked dmt  he has come running from across the house to cuddle up next to me and purr enthusiastically  he seems to like this material a lot  too  settling in firmly beside me 

as the effects build  they become a bit more grey in character  i feel like a flat  blank drawing board cognitively  emotionally  it s a different story  i feel an emotion that i don t have a word for  but which seems familiar  and i feel it prominently  it s not exactly sadness  nor is it exactly melancholy  i can t tell if it s something bubbling up from my life that i need to address  or if it s an artifact of the drug s pharmacology  i respond weirdly to serotonin releasers and sometimes to agonists  mdma makes me feel sad and alone  and psychedelics occasionally make me feel emotional pain on come up   so i don t know if this is an example of this phenomena or if it s insight  i don t mind sad trips  they re rare for me  but can be useful  i set about trying to figure out where this is coming from 

    i keep powering down  it s something that i do when mushrooms become too intense  basically just turning off my conscious mind and surrendering to the point of near blackout  this is nowhere near strong enough of an experience to warrant this  i think it instead comes from the isopropyl character of this drug    ho dipt has a profound absence to it  a void quality to the mental landscape it produces  this has a bit of that  when i try to explore the source of the emotion  my mind just falls into a tiny  hard  black point in the middle of a grey white void  it s like i m falling asleep  i can t disern anything about the only real quality of this experience  an almost purely emotional trip  because i find myself just falling into the blankness  i couldn t connect to it  it s not frustrating  but it s also not interesting or useful  a drug that just makes me feel sad and sleepy is novel only for a little while  

    i m coming back from some nitrous  it wasn t especially insightful  actually  it was pretty nihilistic  but without the negative emotional connotation of the word   i came back thinking that taking a long break from psychedelics to focus on other priorities might be worthwhile  as the somatic sensations of the nitrous kicked in  my friend s cat stood up  confused and disappointed looking  and left  there s no accounting for taste  

    i seem to be down at a low plateau now  for at least   minutes  nothing of interest here 

    the low plateau continues  i imagine that i will just feel  sad  for the next hour or so before it finally disappates  to hell with this  i m aborthing this by insufflating a more enjoyable psychedelic 

  summary    

i don t know what this will do in another body  but i didn t find this to be particularly useful or interesting  perhaps the low starting dose gave me instant tolerance  and a big old rip taken all at once would be more telling  i m in no hurry  though  it reminded me too much of my second   meo pipt experience  which felt too much like a weird serotonin releaser and not enough like a psychedelic  i m a bit of a weirdo  but seems like in my body  i get the dissociation and emotionality of the propyls  but mostly the empty  numb  shrug of the isopropyls  i think i m going to move on from them for now

next thing i remember im at a techno rave with my buddies and i felt strong anxiolytic effects but no sedation  no stimulation either like i had no abundance of energy but no urge to sleep whatsoever and enough energy to do anything  i also felt a mild intoxication lowering of inhibitions and no overthinking  but wouldve been oerfzctly capable of going to work  and an amount of euphoria where it wasnt too much so to become moreish or manic but everything was exactly perfect in this beautiful moment  i didnt have any urge to do more at all but wanted to be at this level forever 

when i woke up i was so sad it had ended lol  my
biggest wish is for this absolutely fucking perfect drug to exist one day 
praise saturn 🙏

text:
hi  i wanted to share this experience that was blew my mind and helped me tremendously   
on an impulse decision i decided to heat my glasspiece that i used to vaporize dpt with and inhale it a few times  i was completely sober when i made that decision 

i suspect that there was quite a lot of it left as it was a much stronger experience then when i initially tried it    https   www reddit com r researchchemicals comments   report    dpt  vaped  freebase   https   www reddit com r researchchemicals comments        


  experience   

now this was a continuation of the  split mind  challenging experience  again i had this feeling like a    part of me  lets call it s for subconcious  was split off  seperate from the real me  but this time it was not in panic as much  the    of me  lets call it c for concious  again started singing to calm myself as i was feeling a bit worried but i was not repressing s as much as last time   
a question was looming over my conscious   
why did i decide to do this just now  who are you and why are you insisting on proving a point   
i was a little scared about going insane  triggering a multiple personalities disorder or sth  so at first i did not want to admit that s was really me that was in my head aswell   
c was trying everything to make it as comfortable as possible  taking a warm bath  lighting some candles  kept singing stuff like  we are you  you are me  i am us  i am me  but on the inside there was turmoil   


s was trying to be a part of me again  but when i was trying to go with the flow and do it  i got very scared and creeped out like i was giving into a dark desire i could not control  and i resisted it   
i was very afraid i was going to go insane and do unspeakable things if i gave into this desire to accept s as myself  it felt like s was trying to become the real me and take over   


s did not insist however  he just stayed there in the back of my mind and asked why c did not trust him  said he would never do anything bad to another person  he made promises of boosting my confidence when it comes to interating with girls  especialy when it comes to flirting and sexual tension  c thought they sounded manipulative and evil   


but i kept singing  we are you  you are me  i am us  i am me over and over  while in my head s and c were having a legit discussion where s was trying to convince c he was not a bad evil being  he also was not saying he was perfect however 

i knew what this stuff was about  it was about my past where i suffered abuse from a family member  and about the creepy  women hating teenager that i was at that time   
unfortunately i myself was not innocent either  i had done despicable things like trying to take advantage of drunk girls  luckily i never took it further than trying and failing 

my chant had changed to  forgive me  we would never do something like this ever again  at this point c realised how important this opportunity to heal was and engaged with it as much as i could   
c started to imaginge s as a small child that was terrified of a bad thing they had done  and managed to talk to them as an adult would  calming them  lovingly embracing them  and reassuring them   


eventually both voices sang the same song together in unison  and the horrible feeling was gone   
i was both c and s again 

  analysis     


i assume that this was an old coping mechanism that manifested as a personality split under the influence    
i had pushed away the part of me that acted confidenty with women and sexuality because they did some things i regret as a teen   
these actions were such a stain on my otherwise spotless trackrecord  i must have just decided to cut this part off  hampering my social development and staying a non assertive  nice but romanitcally unsucessful person   


my mind is blown by the amount of help this experience provided me  i am not sure if it is resolved    but i think i am in a much better place than before   
i did not know such a thing was possible   


i suspect that s was sometimes responsible for fleeing into alternate states of conciousness too  i am curious to see how my behaviour around women will change  and how my drug use will change   
if you are interested i can provide an update on that   


thanks for reading

hey guys   brief bit of backstory  i m   and i have a fair amount the  traditional  mainstream drugs such as cocaine  mdma  lsd  psilocybin  ketamine    etc  in my experience  the only drug that ever really got to me was what i believe to be an nbome sold as  acid   i was   and had no prior drug experience other than weed  but that doesn t really count here  aha  honestly  i can remember for a long time after this experience feeling very shaken up  almost mildly traumatized  funnily enough however  i have never had such a negative effect from any other psychedelic drug after that  i actually find my head feels more clear after a legit acid trip

text:
we are researchers at columbia university medical center  new york state psychiatric institute  nyspi  

we are looking to recruit people who facilitate plant medicine ceremonies in non indigenous contexts  i e   in settings beyond what is offered by tribes to their own people or to visitors   we are seeking to gain a better understanding of your role in your community and your personal experience guiding ceremonies with entheogens 

 the information will be obtained through an online survey  the survey takes about   minutes to be completed  it is anonymous and confidential 

if desired  there is an option to participate in an interview with the columbia university   nyspi researchers where you can share more about your experience  you will have an option to write your email at the end of the survey for us to contact you 

see below the link to access the survey  feel free to share it with your community 

you can email us if you have any questions at   silvia franco corso nyspi columbia edu  mailto silvia franco corso nyspi columbia edu   
 link for the survey   https   cumc   qualtrics com jfe form sv    https   cumc   qualtrics com jfe form

text:
hi all  first of all i wish to explain my situations with drugs for a better understanding  and dosage i will speak of  

im an opiate addict from   years  start with heroin and then methadone treatment  now im tapering slow  i was on   die now im on   and i wish to continue the tapering until zero  i have prescriptions for xanax    die   lexapro    seroquel   mg xr to help me to control the benzo intake  im not psychotic  and trazodone   for sleep 

experienced drug user  took mdma at least   times in my life  every opiates avaible in my country  italy and damn we re so behind and too strict about opiates  even with legit pain if youre lucky they give you those useless liver crusher codeine apap        i ivd couple of times buprenorphine  fentanyl and heroin  which you had to add citric acid and its garbage  i used a     of h in a shot and barely felt something  used cocaine  crack  amphetamine  speed   some rc  lsd  mushrooms  weed  alcohol  smoke meth once  very hard to find in italy  you can search everywhere and you ll never find some who has it  or they scam you 

from those words i may look reckless  but i always search on web alot of info into reddit and other harm reduction sites  always start low  never mix dangerous subs except alchol benzo opiate  dont do it i have a skyrocket tolerance for both benzo and opiates   never had other addiction except for opiates  i like stims but not too much to develop an addiction  and i always weight the dose before use it 

ok  now i wish to talk about hexen  i start to use it   days ago  i search online info and i start with an average dose     and felt good  after   i redose   and stop  felt fine 

second attempt i started on    and redose     in an hour interval and after   hours start to feel little anxious  

today i redose much but start low as   and increase every half hour hour   until i reach a total of

text:
this happened years ago       but ive always been curious if anyone else has experienced anything similar or knows why this happened 

i really loved rolling  too much   the shit was so clean  but i say that so you can understand i took methylone a lot  like quit my job  dropped out of college  couch hoped and just rolled as much as one could   at this point in time i had taken plenty of         but had not tried moxy   meo dipt before  me and my friend had been given some “moxy” to try one night  so i cant remember if we had even slept or not at this point  but this capsule of this shit looks like barely anything is even in there and we hadn’t redosed in hours so we decided to say fuck it and dose 

this is all really strange to explain but imma try to hit the important aspects  me  f   my friend f   and her   friends  m  dosed at their house  it had a odd not quite right feeling from there lol its evening time btw

the first lots of hours i spent  jaw completely clenched locked  fetal position  under a blanket on the coach  it was like i couldn’t talk because my jaw wouldn’t move i guess but i remember making some noises that were not words  lol  trying to talk with a closed mouth  on top of that it did not matter if i closed or opened my eyes  i saw the same fucking thing  nothing in front of me was visible at first  just this same kaleidoscope of colors and shit 

next thing i know i came to the conclusion i need to go to the bathroom  i get up  i take a couple steps and my vision goes like a tunnel and i can’t see anymore and fall into some stuff  i don’t remember getting back up but i know i made it to the bathroom and sat down on the floor 

everybody was having a super strange feeling trip or whatever you wanna call it  so now it’s the next morning
next thing i remember is us getting dropped off  and at this point we were all realizing this trip is going on too long  my friend starts freaking the fuck out  so we go inside try to get something to eat  we were staying with other people who were worried about us  we ended up burning a pizza  so me friend started feeling so weird she ended up going to the hospital  i was definitely not doing that in my current state  i stayed and tried to lay down and it’s night time at this point  i was still feeling like i was tripping  the next night  almost   hours later  

this was probably the strangest part for me  i wanted to sleep so badly  i was laying there and everytime i’d nod off my whole body would violently jerk  over and over again until i eventually fell asleep and slept for another   hours 

i definitely wasn’t the same after that shit  i still have mild visuals all the time where everything looks like i’m coming down from a trip 

had anyone else ever had some weird shit like this happen  tia

text:
i have been experimenting with noopept for the past weeks and have taken it at the end of a disso trip  mid trip  before  right after dosing etc    and i can say indeed it does alter  or even kill a disso trip in some ways   

it s like noopept kills the entire headspace  an anaesthesiologist once told me that ketamine basically disconnects your neocortex from your cerebral cortex  this means you have information input but you cannot process it  while on noopept  i was actually aware of the fact that i can t understand shit   but if you take the noopept before your disso  you may end up needed more than your usual dose since the headspace is gone while you re still wonky in a more connected way 

still  one night after vaping      o pce after some   noopept up the nose  i managed to sit under my desk for  hours  saddened by the fact that my laptop had died right as i put on my headphones and i had no more technology to entertain my hole    just to realised my laptop had no battery and was unplugged  

i guess noopept can help you chillout  amp   kinda sober up  if you re having a bad time on some dissos  do some more arylcyclohexylamines  and you ll still    end up brain dead i guarantee it

 amp    

base tryptamines are a curious bunch  base tryptamines being defined as a tryptamine without any additional modifications  or in other words  the names of many tryptamines are prefaced with a   ho    aco    meo  etc  a base tryptamine is just the base structure without anything added to it  

all of them seem to have low oral bioavailability  or in the case of dmt  none at all  by virtue of being metabolized into inactivity in the liver  many of them dose orally in the range of   mg or more  many see higher potency via other routes of administration  such as intranasal or vaporization  most base tryptamines are sold as freebases  ideal for vaporization  the most common route of administration for their use  i for one  am too lazy to obtain or set up a rig for vaporizing tryptamines  so i opt for oral administration whenever possible  rarely  however  are base tryptamines available as a salt  which allows for greater oral availability and more stability  when i saw mpt fumarate available on the market  i jumped at the opportunity to sample it 

this report is the last of several trials i attempted    mg yielded threshold effects  while   mg was similar in intensity to the   mg detailed in this report  that being a mild  nonvisual  and functional but noticeable psychedelic   a fairly shallow dose response curve  perhaps higher doses or other routes of administration would yield interesting results  

 amp    

     dose taken 

     onset  feeling a bit nauseous and lightheaded 

     feeling stimmy  dizzy  definitely a sensation of an oncoming psychedelic  it is woozy with a sensation of stirring some turbulence at the bottom of a watery sinkhole  something is coming from somewhere deep and dark 

no visuals really  some light concentric patterns on surfaces  though this might just be my hppd  when i close my eyes there are faint morphing shapes and fractals  colored in deep blue 

everything is still subtle though  like a premonition  i just feel a bit off base  a bit anxious and shaky 

     there is so much bundled up tension i need to let out  it feels like coils and springs are building up in my muscles  pushing at their boundaries  demanding release  i feel a sense of vertigo  flighty  as if i could be levitating right now 

     very nauseous  seeing slight color shifts with eyes open and stripes and concentric patterns on surfaces  though it is still subtle and barely there  

closing my eyes however  reveals a different world  though it is cast in a perpetual dimness it still makes itself apparent  a pulsing and dancing void  the swirling and undulating walls of its boundaries patterned with fractals and paisley patterns resembling an oriental rug  they close in on me  becoming an esophageal tube convulsing with peristaltic motion  bulging and receding like oil on surface of unseen waves  the patterns dancing along with whatever force propels their surface 

it is a dizzying array of patterns  first something like a grid of paisley forms  their edges adorned with fractal patterns  though soon the whole scene is flushed with a radiating palmetto form  colored in a dull green yellow white gradient  washing over and smothering the other pattern with a wall of overlapping scales  their grip is tenuous though  and soon the space between the scales begins to crack and bulge as spinning violet astral shapes  their points decaying into a red fractal chaos  one that breaks the line of the previous fractals  pierces the armor of the green palmettos  and soon the violet stars flush the scene and claim their dominance  this would continue with all variety of odd forms and patterns  like a food chain in which one eats the last only to be consumed by the next  the next to break through was another set of radiating palmetto fronds  resembling sunbursts or fish fins  cast in orange and violet like a sunset  continue ad infinitum  

     open eyed visuals  shy and reclusive  poke their heads out just a bit  overlapping concentric forms like great clouds of scales materialize on the walls and ceiling  pulsing  waving  undulating  i smoke a bit of cannabis  mentally  the experience is lucid  there is a sense of dissociation when i close my eyes and sink into the void of the great fractal battle  but i feel entirely functional  i can hold a coherent conversation through instant messaging  i am definitely off base but probably not in a way that would isolate me from the general public  it’s a very mild drug that lends itself to a degree of intensity of i allow it to  by closing my eyes and sinking into the bed and letting that world take me  but beyond that void  it is something fairly unremarkable  i vape a bit of cannabis oil  

     i feel restless but i don’t know what to do with myself  just sitting still and shaking a lot while i read news articles on the internet  more intense psychedelics have a push to them  a vibrancy that can make just lying on a bed and listening to music an exciting and enlightening experience  this is absent here  if i want to get something out of this substance i have to reach deep into it and drag it out myself  i have to be the one to do the work 

     lots of nervous fidgeting  i need to run out to the market to get produce for dinner later  the market is nearby  an open air produce extravaganza  with relatively fresh but extremely cheap fruit and veggies of every variety  i am a frequent customer  there is nothing about my current state that makes me hesitant wanting to go out in public  it feels like an entirely manageable task  i just want to get the errand done and be back in the coziness of the house without it hanging over my head  

     back at my house now  interacting with the clerk at the market was awkward i was taken aback to hear my own voice when i spoke  odd and unnerving  there was also some difficulty with the payment  compounding the overall discomfort of the situation  walking around presented no issue  i had almost full control of my motor skills  feeling a bit off balance  though i was ultimately being driven by a stimulation and sense of warmth  a barrier against the cold albeit pretty and sunny day  

     right on schedule  another part of the mpt experience i have come to expect made itself manifest  a sudden wash of nostalgia  emotional sentimentality  a tug on the heart strings that fills me with warmth and nearly drove me to tears  in this i cite similarity to my experience with   meo dpt  where there was a sudden upwelling of emotional vulnerability and emotional depth on the tail end of the peak  the great fractal battle that was swirling and churning with my eyes closed earlier no longer presents  no matter how hard i search for it  open eyed visuals are all but absent now too  signaling that i am indeed crossing into the tail end of the experience 

i really begin to bask in the glory of the sun of the day  now that i am warm and indoors  it really is a beautiful day  it really is beautiful when the glistening rays of this distant ball of fire bless the surface of our rock with light and life and warmth  it is difficult to wrap my mind around something so powerful that it provides us with so much light and warmth from so far away  i want to go to a part of the house with more west facing windows  to really catch its full glory  i want to engage in something nostalgic and familiar  to play an old videogame i played when i was a child or something to that effect  i want to listen to the music i listened to as a teenager  i want to empathize with my past selves and lay pity upon the poor youth that would be fated to turn into the abject mess of a person i am today  at least the product of that childhood was still alive  something that would seem quite unbelievable years ago  the task of the hour becomes lying comfortably  basking in sunlight  reminiscing on experiences that have made me smile 

     the experience hasn’t progressed much in the last few hours  it’s been a slow and gradual downturn  i smoked a bowl of cannabis  ate lunch  and then went out to run another errand i had forgotten earlier  i didn’t feel sober  and didn’t quite feel exclusively under the influence of cannabis  interaction was still awkward in that unique self perpetuating way it is under the influence of psychedelics  

interacting with people while running my errand still felt off and awkward and i definitely didn t feel sober with this interaction but i feel like i am lucid and down otherwise

     a friend stops by to pick some things up from our house  i am really not feeling much anymore  even by the metric of interacting with another person  i would consider myself fully back to baseline at this point 

 amp    

conclusion  at this dose  mpt is still a mild psychedelic  perhaps it can be pushed further with higher doses  i feel like i could weather a more intense bodyload  but i’m busy and have many substances to test out and won’t be devoting more time to it in the near future  it is notable for presenting little to no sensory effects  only mild open eyed visuals  the closed eyed visual space is simultaneously dim and vivid  triggering a dissociation into an undulating swarm of fractals  this was exciting and interesting  but ultimately the highlight of what would prove to be a fairly boring and lackluster experience  another unique feature of mpt seems to be a sudden wash of emotional rawness  vulnerability  and nostalgia as the visual peak begins to taper off  this is pleasant and introspective and could probably serve utility to someone if they timed it right  perhaps if they didn’t desire intensity in any of the other aspects of the experience  i have not really combined a fully active dose of mpt with anything else  so i have no comment on how it would perform as a mixer  though perhaps that interesting emotional space and closed eyed space could be compounded and accentuated by something else  perhaps i’ll revisit that someday in the future  but i don’t feel any particular draw to explore this substance further  a curious novelty but not anything particularly astounding  if i were to revisit it perhaps i would try an intranasal dose  and for those looking to investigate this compound further  that may be an interesting avenue to travail

wow  this is   unusual and unexpected   for me 

doxylamine succinate may be the most common legal sleep aid available 

i m sure it s totally safe 

what is strange  for me  is that i ve taken this safe sleep aid twice  at the recommended dose  and i have been  completely  wiped out the next day 

i m older  so that may be an important factor 

i m considering doxylamine succinate as a research chemical here on reddit because this phenomenon needs to be discussed or experimented with by other r researchchemicals subredditors 

i don t think doxylamine succinate is dangerous if used as recommended but i do need to emphasize that this side effect  for me  is rather devastating 

i m retired so i can blow off a day without much consequence 

but if you are a working person  doxylamine succinate may have extremely detrimental consequences

text: so i found a mystery powder on the ground in hawaii in honolulu  it’s in a small white little round container and looks like it has a slight yellow tint to it or at least to some of it  something throwing this off though is it straight up smells like dabs  i smoked some of it with my friend and we both go super high  it felt kinda like being stupid stoned but then still nodding and very euphoric  warm body feelings  all problems seemed to have faded  my friend and i started panicking that we were on our way towards an overdose and we tested it for fentanyl  the first time it came back as negative but i think i did the test wrong that time  i tested it again a few hours later once i had sobered up a little and it came back positive fir fentanyl  i’ve smoked straight fentanyl before and this felt similar to how it felt then except this time it’s lasting way longer like an hour and a half or so before it begins getting less intense  i only took one hit out of a crack pipe of it but was already on meth before smoking the mystery drug  it made my breathing scary slow even though i was on meth i couldn’t even tell i was breathing and couldn’t make my breathing get faster no matter how hard i tried  i definitely felt the fentanyl but i think it’s another drug that’s laced with fentanyl but i’m not sure what other drug it was mixed with  what are some powders that come in an off white yellowish kinda small clumpy powder  looks maybe it has little crystal like clumps  it smells very strongly of weed  i kinda felt stoned but to a whole new level  please help i’m really curious

text:
i don t normally bother writing much in the way of reports  but in this instance i can see it might be useful to give a brief description 

ingestion was over the weekend  we  predosed  with a stack of anti oxidants  amino acids  magnesium  etc    as the intention was to take a popular empathogen at the tail end  we didn t bother with anti nausea preparations as the reports for mipla seemed to suggest that it would be mild in this regard 

we took a single blotter each  ostensibly dosed at   μg  they were tasteless  they were held under the tongue for a few minutes and then swallowed  the  come up  was remarkably swift and fairly lightweight  but my partner complained of slight nausea so we took some odansetron    mg   the experience proceded to be very hedonistic  erotic and enjoyable   we were favourably impressed  however  my partner had a few more  tummy grumbles  and took another odansetron to calm it down   nothing serious  but noticeable 

the main part of the experience was about   or so hours of    well    roller coaster fun   we had a great time  as we were coming off the peak though  i too got some gut growls  but more from the bowels end  at this point  i should note that we had been out of  posh  magnesium supplements and i often don t get on with the cheap oxide based product that we ended up taking  we d also had a massive feast the evening before   tmi alert for the squeamish  the massive and fairly explosive shit that i had at this point was entirely consistent with those pre conditions  but i can t rule out the possible contributory factor of the   mipla 

a loperamide    mg   calmed that down rapidly and there were no more concerns 

at this point we downed some grapefruit juice  followed a few minutes later by a moderate dose of empathogen  antacid tablets etc    more fun ensued and we finished off with a gentle landing into a small patch of dissociative 

to put into perspective our opinion of the   mipla  we agreed that we should probably stock up a bit more  but with the knowledge that anti nausea preparations would have to be taken a bit more seriously   

tldr  really good fun  but noticeably a bit rough on the nausea front

text:
i like to run up the dose on tryptamines and have typed up a report on my high dose   ho mipt experiences  the doses here are multiple   mg trips and an   mg trip  the trips are quite intellectually immersive for me and typically last up to six hours at these doses  especially when mixing with cannabis  i would not push higher than   mg and i would only suggest these doses for those very experienced with tryptamines and high doses of psychedelics in general 

the come up on these doses is noticeably more physical than a high dose of   aco dmt  yet i find it more comfortable mentally  it’s a bit jarring  but generally manageable and also quicker than other tryptamines  

i have my ritual  as soon as i drop i hit a couple of dabs and turn on some music  the music appreciation develops in some ways before the headspace and i find it helpful for the come up  a smoother transition  i get sparks of the impulsive urges to dance very early on and i try to hone in on them 

this one is a thinker  the headspace during the peak is almost ‘mechanical’  for lack of a better word  the headspace during the peak on a high dose of this one is simultaneously intimidating and awe inspiring  

below are some first person insights into my thoughts during my high dose trips of   ho mipt  inspired by notes taken during the trips  many of these insights occur during the late peak and after the peak  the peak itself at these doses is hard to articulate  

this report is offbeat in the sense that it’s less a description of the effects of the drug  but more a journey through my thoughts during the trips that i hope will be insightful for some    

     

i am shifting from the come up into the peak  i am picturing the thoughts in my mind and my brain is organizing them mechanically  this gives way to visualizing a great and vast ‘path’ which winds and twists into seemingly endless other paths and trails  i can visualize my thoughts veering from path to path and quickly zooming to the next  i’m dumbstruck catching a quick glimpse at the infinite number of paths that is the capability of human thought  it’s quite complex 

i sit down at the table for another dab and am struck with intense vertigo as i fall into the chair  i mimic the previous motion and realize i can willingly induce vertigo for a few seconds at a time  lost in my own world  i continue practicing for a few minutes and am able to maintain for     seconds each time before snapping back to “reality” 

but it’s not my reality  it’s a reality bigger than myself  what is “myself” anyways  of course i know who i am  but in this world i can simultaneously disconnect from that  i hone in on this feeling subconsciously  or is it instinctively  is it both  after all  in the grand scheme of things i am just an animal like the rest of the creatures on this planet  i have split second urges to run  not to run  but to run  this is not a feeling like one gets when they decide they want to go for a jog  this is a primal feeling coming from something deeper than the evolved psyche 

primal  not tribal  but ‘primal’ feelings  there is nothing social about this feeling  it’s a take your clothes off without realizing why you’re doing it feeling  it’s instinctive  what is clothing and why am i wearing it  it must go  my mind makes this transformation though i am unaware of it and the clothes come off ‘instinctively’  some type of communication with the beings i evolved from  channeling something within from what my consciousness evolved from 

music is fantastic  i have a baseline curiosity for new music  yet old and familiar songs produce great nostalgia and each one is tied to suddenly accessible memories previously locked away in the depths of my mind  i have strong emotional responses to music  as if the playlist is delicately plucking the strings of the harp that is my mind 

i have a profound sense of being  billions of years of evolution resulting in the domination of the human species millions of years in the making  i accept my place  i am thankful to be at the cusp of the epoch  seeing technological advancement beyond the wildest dreams of millions of generations  and i have a front row seat  

i feel like things are getting a little too heavy so i try to watch some tv  king of the hill  but every scene i find myself digging in to something more  episode starts with hank working on his truck  i start thinking about trucks and the dialogue of the show becomes second priority  i think about how trucks were invented and then commercialized  i think about how much automobiles have accelerated the development of society  i snap out of my runaway thought and pick up on something else from the show  some dynamic between hank and his wife  i start to examine the cultural groundwork that makes this interaction possible  and i snap back to the show  bobby walks in the room  the word bobby reverberates within my inner commentary  suddenly i’m wondering why he has a name at all  when did names become a thing  this is the dynamic for the duration of the show as i become distracted by the next thing and temporarily lost in my thoughts and so on and so forth 

i think about what it would be like to be in this state constantly  is this what it would be like to be crazy  my initial conclusion is that i would hate to be in this state forever  yet some other part of me is trying to reason with myself  this is a state of enlightenment    to be in this state eternally may actually not be so bad  to remove oneself from worldly aspirations and to focus on the self and on enlightenment sounds instinctively promising  but my ego has its reservations and its own aspirations  i read a bit about chinese philosophy  it takes   minutes to get through a paragraph because my mind wanders with the impact of each sentence  either way  i make a note to look into meditation in an effort to hopefully visit these enlightened states systematically and habitually at some point 

i equate society to a run away train  i can’t imagine life on the earth in a thousand years  thinking about the increasingly complex technological advancement that would occur over     years is simply unfathomable  i can’t reasonably imagine that we could make it through     years without a world war or some other manmade catastrophic nuclear event that would end life on the planet  and so with this knowledge of where we’ve been and where we are going  i find my place in time  right at the end of the rope  privy to the social and technological advancement that will eventually be the undoing of the entire process 

as i often do when i trip i read about history  evolution  and science  i pull up an old favorite  the comprehensive timeline of historic inventions on wikipedia  from stone tools and control of fire in the paleolithic era to computers and spaceships in modern times  as always  i have a sense before even diving into the list that i understand my place in this world and in this universe  and more importantly  in this time    

i start pondering time  humans started using stone tools     million years ago  a million years would pass before humans controlled the use of fire  i do the math  it’s over     lifetimes by today’s standards  still millions more years before life would evolve to what we see today 

i am in utter awe thinking about how consciousness evolved  during my   mg trip i came to a point where my brain flirted with the primal language  “ohhh ahhh baaa boo laaa looo” these became my internal dialogue  yet i still knew exactly what i was saying when uttering this nonsense  i think about the origin of language and about how slowly  generation after generation  language was gradually formed 

and then apart from the incredible physical evolution that took place    farther than the evolution of the psyche and human consciousness  comes the evolution of society  a third layer of complexity that has allowed exponential growth beyond the wildest dreams of generations of the past   

and here we all are  precariously positioned at the denouement of human existence  whether it’s   years or     years  we are definitively at the end of the rope  we are all witnesses to the great unfolding of this brilliant process  it’s truly beautiful 

and it’s been a wild ride  ☮️❤️

text:
ketamine is too expensive buying domestic in the states so i’m looking for an rc alternative  i’ll give a list of the dissos i’ve tried and which ones i’ve enjoyed  amp  disliked so you guys can get a feel for my taste  ranked from worst to most liked 

   o pce  feels sinister  faaar too dark and sinister  it’s potent and duration is a bit long similar duration to   ho pce  didn’t hole on it and wouldn’t try to  it felt too manic  confusing  stimulating  i hated pretty much everything about it  oral roa         

    dxm  did it a bunch when i was a teenager  the smell of cough syrup makes me gag and retch harder than any other odor in the universe  it was sedating  not stimulating nor manic  the high feels dark  slightly sinister  but i never felt uncomfortable with that  it can be interesting and introspective but it’s clouded with a high that feels dirty and grim  feels like you’ve been slightly poisoned  like with mushrooms  duration was around   which is too long especially for such a shitty high  nausea     chance of vomiting within the first hour and if you don’t you feel even more sick the remaining    even extracted without all the syrup it still made me sick           

     ho pce  not terrible  below average  i wouldn’t go out of my way to get this chemical again  felt a little too sinister for my liking  a bit manic  although it was warm and from what i recall it felt more sedating  the potency was proper and the duration was      which felt too long since i didn’t really enjoy the chemical  i didn’t hole on it and i wouldn’t try to  roa  oral         

   dck  not a groundbreaking chemical but good enough  technically more potent than ketamine dosage wise but far less powerful and intense  was never able to hole with this chemical  i’ve taken upwards of   but it was intranasal  the duration similar to mxe is great  it didn’t feel sinister  not stimulating and not manic  chill and sedating like ket and mxe  this is an average disso  nothing special about it nothing negative  true neutral           

   mxe  i tried mxe early    i had never tried it before but i sent some to a friend that had mxe extensively in the early  ’s  we reagent tested it with marquis  mandelin  mecke  and lieberman  every single one came back positive for mxe  one thing though is the potency was reduced to about    because according to the source it had been sitting in a barrel for nearly a decade  upon testing it my friend claims it did feel like mxe but with decreased potency  i enjoyed it  it was similar to ketamine in many aspects  it’s not stimulating or manic  it’s sedating and chill  it feels warm unlike ketamine  but also does feel welcoming  i  was able to hole with im shots  the duration was longer than ketamine but it was a good length  about     and another hour or so afterglow  it wasn’t as groundbreaking as ketamine  the holes were never as intense but this could’ve been because of the lost potency  i feel like if i had a better batch it would be up there with ketamine         

  above all  ketamine is by far my favorite  it is king  duration is convenient  short and succinct   i dose about   im shots in one session  one   shot every          it’s perfectly introspective for me  not sinister like other dissos  but dark enough  it has a physically cold and clinical feel to it but despite that it does feel comfortable and welcoming  it’s potent enough to where i can hole easily with an intramuscular shot  i’ve also experienced anti depressive qualities including the day long afterglow  stimulating and manic dissos are an absolute dealbreaker for me and ketamine is sedating and chill         

i feel that as a rule of thumb i just don’t enjoy the pcp analogs  ime they feel too sinister and manic  some of the rc dissos i’ve been considering are dmxe  mxp  mxipr  mxpr   i can’t tell the difference between the mxp’s i’d appreciate if someone can shed some light  i want a disso that is potent and powerful enough to hole  is not sinister  not stimulating and not manic  it should be welcoming and sedating like ket and mxe

text:
yesterday i tried      mephedrone with a little bit of speed and   cialis 

the come up was  due to the cialis i think  a little bit uncomfortable  my face was burning and i had a slight tingling throughout but not too intense 

the peak was great  it wasn’t like mdma because i was very sharp clean minded and i think it’s maybe like coke but idk i‘ve never tried coke  also the amphetamine was a plus  i did some work on my pc and chattet a bit with some people 

the offset on the other hand was meh  it wasn’t very bad but i felt a bit irritated and empty  at some point i got a small rush idk maybe again from speed or so  at the end i took a xanax and went to bed hahah

all in all i can imagine   mmc being a „all day“ drug like coke or speed where you don’t have the disorientation of mdma so you’re clear minded  it enhances you rather then take over you if you understand what i mean haha

text:
u danpenpalman   i was responding to your epic post this morning when i realized my response was just rambling too hard and i should just post it here to keep your thread from getting derailed   i humbly submit  

around   am tuesday morning i was apparently sitting in my   floor bathroom  fully clothed  jamming the fuck out to some solid tunes  when     i called my wife on the phone     to come upstairs and hang out with me   i proceeded to tell her what i was seeing was  absolutely beautiful  and just rambled about amazing  humorous  to me anyway  things   she kept asking me what i was on  and i m generally very honest with her  however as fucked up as i was  i apparently just kept saying  it s not mushrooms  lsd or dmt    which was technically true  to my knowledge  and all but i guess i reasoned she was ok with classical psychedelics and held the line   see  i am  generally  really great at managing my drug use  i ve been doing this for well over   years   but with benzos  i just have no fucking self control   and i know it   

 but  you know  this time was going to be different   

i can control myself with any class of drugs except benzos    i told my psychiatrist this years ago and he knows that if i ever ask for a short term benzo that i will always give the bottle to my wife  as she is very straight laced with her personal consumption  i ve literally smoked pot with her twice and she has taken edibles twice in my   years of knowing and loving her  however  she is very understanding of my drug use   

well a few days before the   election i was getting bad vibes that trump was getting re elected and i knew i couldn t handle it   i did a zoom call with my psychiatrist and request     a few     ativan to get through that week   like  i wanted    maybe   ativan  max  i have a great relationship with my psychiatrist   i am very open and honest about all of my drug use with him  so it s a very trusting relationship  well  with modern electronic scripts and an overwhelmed medical staff during a pandemic  along with that established trust  i guess it s easy to hit the  refill  button from a script a few years ago and not have to write out a new one   he submitted      day supply    ativan    with refills     the first fill back in november went as planned  gave it to my wife to hold   in fact  there are probably over   of them left   i have great self control when i m not holding the bottle  lol   well  monday i was picking up a script for a sinus infection  and wouldn t you know they had an ativan auto refill sitting there ready to go   

 i did not give it to my wife  

i got into that script hard  and  well the results are obvious   delusions of sobriety with a pile of benzos and a huge rc collection that i have built up to over   unique molecules over the last   years just didn t go well together   fast forward   hours and you have the above cited occurrence   i of course had zero recollection and my wife was pretty cool about it all   i do have   vials of ketamine that i use for depression in my collection   i took one of those vials and told her that was what i had taken that night and really  sincerely apologized   she was ok with this  as she knows clinical ketamine saved my life a few years ago   but i still didn t tell her about the ativan because i thought i had somehow went on a ketamine analog binge  which is quite unusual for me  so it was obviously just a blip and something i could control  but i still didn t understand the black out portion   yeah  i ve had some brown out states during ketamine analog binges over the years  but never just a complete black out   

well  my adult child and i were discussing what we had for dinner tuesday night and i was arguing with her  telling her she had lost her mind  i clearly had a different entree tuesday night    it was at that moment that i knew what had happened   i went upstairs and opened the ativan bottle to do a count and see how many i took   i have enough experience to know that what i dumped in my hand was not even close to the   ativan i had been prescribed   i started counting and the pile got very small before i even hit     i stopped counting and put them back in the bottle  

 my wife now has both bottles of ativan

text:
seems to have sprung out of the dark quite recently with very little info surrounding this compound as of now  curious as to how this will fit in amongst the other mescaline derivatives floating about 

a very small description of it i could find atm 

 isoproscaline  also known as     dimethoxy   isopropoxyphenethylamine  is a novel mescaline homolog originally discovered in   by david e  nichols  it has also been explored further in research by alexander shulgin and ann shulgin 

it is the   isopropyl homolog of mescaline  and binds similarly to the serotonin receptors  it seems to have increased potency by weight  with an active dose in humans reported to be     mg  compared to     mg for mescaline   

 https   imgur com arzhegc  https   imgur com arzhegc

added in by u   bandtramadol

text:
this is going to be ranty and i apologize for that  i m sober right now though  just a bit sleep deprived  i usually write out a rough draft before posting or at least write with a single idea in mind but here i m just going to spill my thoughts so expect disorganization  grammar errors  and just a low quality post in general 

i ve been around here since i was a youngish teenager and this place along with a few other subreddits kept me safe and over time made my usage a lot more responsible than it would ve been had i not found this place  i credit this subreddit with saving many of my friends lives or at least extending them  this subreddit helped me figure out my ambitions in life and through times of suicidal thoughts and reckless thinking gave me something i was interested in learning about and experiencing and gave me the education and encouragement to remain safe even if there were slip ups along the way  especially when i was     

i see a lot of posts of people doing reckless things and dealing with psychiatric problems and all of them remind me of the things i went through  i was very lucky to have only brief run ins with dependency and impulsive behavior  i try my best to reach out to people when i see them struggling but it s impossible to reach out to everyone  i know questions and posts from impulsive people can be annoying but i can t help but feel sad for those who make them  many are people who have been failed by the education system and cast into mindstate where drug information seems inaccessible  i feel annoyed sometimes by these posts and have made some unhelpful comments  everyone probably does has  but i wish i could properly get across to these people how strongly i wish to see them okay and wish to see them turn to more sustainable and responsible behavior  

i get being annoyed and i ve made comments in the past that have shown this annoyance openly  but as a community i think it s our responsibility to not turn down these people when they ask for advice  we can make search bar jokes all we want but not using the search bar isn t something that should be punishable by the risk of permanent injury  death  or emotional trauma from a bad trip  i think we need to ensure we give these people the knowledge they seek in a way that also tells them they need to learn to do research on their own  this is not only helpful to them but it will assist other people in the future who do use the search bar so even if they click on a thread asking a  dumb  question they can find information rather than be told to continue searching through dozens of semi relevant threads  this responsibility is also especially relevant as there is inevitably going to be teenagers asking questions like this  and i think it s fair to say we were all more impulsive to some extent as teenagers  i also think many people do add helpful comments  but oftentimes they can be phrased in a hostile or belittling manner which can really do nothing but make someone less likely to listen 

i ve been here since    i don t believe the quality of the subreddit has decreased anywhere near the extent that people say it has  that being said  it s grown a lot  that means more people  more posts  and more  dumb  questions  this is a lot to sort through  back in   i could search a compound and find pages and pages of information  now i need to sort through dozens of threads to find the same level of information  like i said i don t think this is because of a lower quality of posts i think there are just more to sort through and also different things tend to be upvoted as people tend to upvote things they find entertaining more than what they find educational 

  tl dr    i guess what i m saying is it s just important we don t let our pet peeves stop us from remembering behind the screen there is a real person with loved ones who may be minutes away from permanently harming themselves  and this person may be a teenager with a brain that isn t fully developed  regardless of how reckless you are  i just hope everyone in the community ends up okay in life  not just from a mental standpoint but in general  it might not be a super tight knit community due to the nature of it  but we all have mutual experiences that are rare when you step out into the real world  and these memories aren t going to disappear regardless of where we end up 

  tl dr but shorter    i m a simp

text:
so i took about   nep oral    etiz       and vaped delta    helped my nep side effects  throughout a meditation session 

i ended up spending up half hour learning about neuroscience  i m a freshman going for an ns major who knows nothing yet  and i was looking at my arm skin  thinking about my head and brain and googling images and learning about how small scale neurons work with bigger systems and i was really focused on the learning and it was enjoyable  i feel like i can learn about anything because it s interesting  i attribute this to mostly the empathogenic effects of nep and the benzo from keeping me scatterbrained  the balance might ve given me the focus  and i feel like i m in a very comfortable  focused  enthusiastic state of learning 

now  as  enjoyable as this feeling is  the nep is giving me uncomfortable effects and it s also not a great substance for your body  so i don t think doing this regularly for meditation would be healthy  i would be open to trying caffeine as a replacement  but i wonder what you guys think what drug or combo that i could use regularly that would help me get the comfortable focus that i have  i feel that a week period practicing meditating with this mindset could drastically help me develop the best permanent habits for productivity and minimizing distraction  though again  this mindset cost a few nasty chemicals and i wonder what you guys think would be a healthier option  i don t want my habits to revolve around the drug s  but i do want the enhancement of focus that a drug gives to help me develop my habits  basically i think this is a real opportunity to help me become the person i want to be with enough motivation to keep a permanent habitual routine  but i want to hear what to safest way incorporating this drug fueled learning and development experiment would be

text:
context  

i used rcs three days in a row  three days ago   aco mipt  and yesterday and the day before yesterday of dmxe       over two evenings  

i am still in awe of how beautiful and fitting dmxe is to me  more relaxing  more lucid mxe and without any psychotic or overwhelming wobble moment  pure beauty of peace with oneself  less forced and less deep  or less remote from the world than the mxe but still perfect in what it is 

i have read that mxipr can be  neutral  or uninteresting at low doses  so i will  after allergic test  go for   intranasal i think  it would seem that it is more mindfucky  more unpredictable and chaotic  less zen and in short less lucid than dmxe  i m not sure what to expect other than something more alien  deeper or out of the world  more bizarre  so maybe closer to these aspects of mxe in this sense  which are more or less absent in the dmxe  where these aspects are exchanged for a quiet and perfect bliss in dxme   but therefore something less saving  less precious  more erratic and stranger 

the sky oscillates between gray and white today  i am alone at home  i have my nicotine reserves  the housework is done  it is almost noon  i can put the music on the sound system of the apartment and not not worry about the noise i make 

i am happy to try this chemical  having been disappointed in the past by analogues of pcp and dck  few dissociatives having marked my mind    dck  ephenidine  mxpr  and recently dmxe far winning the fight in my heart  

yesterday  under dmxe  i was listening to melodic  minimal and soft electronic music that touched me emotionally  by the more alien and strange nature of the mxipr  i chose a more anchored and alien playlist  like yesterday  i put my phone in offline mode  because calls and messages from my friends or family tend to make me uncomfortable  confused or out of step with the experience  i put on nasal decongestant and blow my nose continually to clear my nostrils 

 amp    

  trip report  

      allergic test

      i weighed    which is a bigger pile than the equivalent of dmxe  i would say a little less than double the same dose of dmxe  about like the same than mxpr which was also very sparse  the texture and color make me anticipate a certain corrosiveness  a barely beige and gray white  the texture is rather banal between small consolidated heaps and snow powder   maybe i am wrong about the corrosiveness 

      because of its size i cut the line in two  one for each nostril   gt      snorted  

the synthetic smell is really peculiar  the line makes me sneeze  i have a few allergies at the moment and it has also happened to me with dmxe and kanna in recent days   apart from that the powder is neither corrosive nor unpleasant  except for the initial tickle and odor  nothing more to report  the dmxe was a bit more corrosive even  although negligible  

    am   i have the impression of already feeling a slight dissociation  i set my hardtekno and techno rave playlist  more  perched  and anchored at the same time 

      the product goes up quickly  i feel my mushy hands and a buzz in my head  a visual veil is already setting in  the music is receding and hazy  less electric but more  grounded  and more physical dissociation than dmxe  the choice of hardtekno fits perfectly 

i feel my body and mind swept away in a hazy wind  almost ketamine esque  buzz feeling in the extremities  but not electric and precious  to compare with dxme   more muddled and twisted  mellow and grounded 

the body high is much more forced and gravitational  i remain lucid but it reminds me a bit of   for the spatialized aspect and something of mxpr for the aspect a little out of the moment 

      it develops linearly and takes shape  bodyhigh is very present at the ends of the fingers and on the surface of the skin  with the eyelids half closed  while the dmxe bodyhigh is more internalized and externalized at the same time  paradoxically 

it s very slowed down  i feel that there are more abrupt disturbances than with dmxe in my brain 

i am much more physically disabled  getting up is complicated  as is writing 

the weather fluctuates between gray and white outside and it fits perfectly with the effect i feel  disturbed   i like it when the sky is white  less when it s grayish  i prefer either all white or storm   just a note to me 

there s that cold  out of the way but not inhuman something that i loved about mxe  i mean that something out of the world and mythical  rocky  like becoming a mountain 

much more wonky   ketamine esque than dmxe  the nerve endings are very anesthetized  no warmth  something moon esque 

the slowing down of the sound is deeper  more grounded  very particular  more physical and jerky    less emotions  more sensations   

      i want to see further  i prepare   more  snorted 

      mxipr is incredible  it s heavenly and like the wind  an incredible flight facing a precipice  the dream

i have read there that the mxipr hole and afterglow is like being reborn  and well it’s true  endless pleasure and saturation 

hope i formatted well and the write up is nice  lovelylovely dissociative

  hi guys  hope you are all well   

i’m reaching out on behalf of my brother who needs help to complete the research for his masters degree 

quick back story to appeal to your hearts   my older brother was a heroin addict for   years and after getting clean has managed to completely turn his life around  he went back into education earned a degree and now has his own successful practice specialising in therapy and counselling for those struggling with addiction 

it’s safe to say he’s somewhat of a hero of mine  and watching him turn his life around has been very inspirational 

he’s now conducting research to go towards his masters degree  the research is on metacognition and cocaine use  because of the covid pandemic and strict lockdowns here in the uk he’s really struggled to find participants 

all that is needed is a quick       questionnaire to be filled out  completely anonymously 

it’s a study that is ultimately aimed at understanding more about cocaine and the way it interacts with the human brain  therefore it will be a positive for the cocaine using community  it will also be a great help to my brother who is on the front line in a low economic area of the uk trying to help people who are struggling with drug related problems 

all details are below in a copy and past message sent by my brother  

many thanks in advance and please share with anyone who could be a suitable candidate 

as part of a dissertation for my msc in addiction psychology and counselling i am doing a research project into metacognitions  thinking about thinking  and cocaine use which has been approved by the division of psychology research ethics committee  london south bank university 

this will consist of a completely anonymous on line survey measuring metacognitive beliefs  avoidance  negative affect and cocaine use  i would really appreciate any help in getting this survey out to as many cocaine users as possible  if you could please share this message with as many people as you can it would be very helpful 

follow this link to the survey 

take the survey

hello  i recently did   of   nboh  my first real dose of any nboh nbome   i heard a lot about it being stimulating but it was pretty intense   i have no experience with recreational stimulants  only double dosing on prescribed adderall as a teenager  so maybe it wasn t even that intense and it s just a lot more than what i ve felt before   it was strong enough for me to feel really drained  demotivated  and irritable the next day  but the second day after i felt fine   don t get me wrong  it was a great trip and no harm was done  i d just like to know what i m taking if i decide to ever do it again 

i bought them from the most reputable vendor i could find that sells it  and i have no doubt that it contained what i bought   i got all the visuals i was expecting and it tasted metallic and made my tongue numb as expected  no other tastes   i do wonder though what the odds are of any vendor adding a bit extra of some stim to their nboh tabs though   i m considering if i should order a broad amphetamine test kit just out of curiosity  i d like to hear the opinions of anyone who s done nboh or other stimulants  since i don t have anything to compare the experience to   i d also like to hear if anyone s heard of nboh nbome being adulterated with stims before
