text: not sure if this counts as an rc but theres little info out there and i figured i d add my current experience  initially took large doses of ppap and n methyl cyclazodone earlier in the day seeking a false sense of drive and energy to complete some emergent household repairs that couldn t wait till morning  the anxiety and stimulation became unbearable and i could no longer functionally work to complete my tasks therefore i became desperate to take the edge off  went with   injested via capsules  tasteless and easy  effects kick in less than   minutes on a pretty empty stomach  a few mild chemical burps so far but nothing major or unpleasant  immediate relaxation and euphoria similar to a few shots of ethanol but very clear headed and no noticable lack of coordination  although i now have no desire to do anything besides lay in bed but cannot sleep  feels like a cross between ethanol and one of the more benign benzos  if there is such a thing  will update with duration  any hangover or comedown  or any further usage if there is interest  cant recommend the combo i tried at all  but   seems to have potential on it s own in low doses for maybe a certain breed of researchers out there  nothing new to add other than living life on just your natural vibe is often better than experimenting with what you have on hand just for the sake of it  you are complete as you are and dont need drugs to fill some imaginary void  sometimes a little willpower makes all the difference  dont be like me stuck in bed very sedated yet unable to sleep having left more problems than you started the day out with due to your  research     though it s pretty legit

text:
the past seven hours have seen some of the best and worst trip moments of my life so far   at its lowest  i felt trapped and insane  doomed to repeat the same mistakes over and over  and at its peak  i experienced a full body orgasm the likes of which i didn t even know was possible    it was absolute bliss  and now i m so much more envious of the female orgasm 😂

in general  this definitely ranks as one of my most difficult rides  intense nausea initially fueled concern over my health  which spiralled into a negative thought loop  visuals were very intense too  with strong similarity to my pharmahuasca experience  fortunately though  i was able to stay calm and in control  unlike with the pharmahuasca   

would i repeat taking this substance  maybe   the orgasm enhancement was out of this world  but it came with a lot of physical downsides as well  i m glad to have tried this  but i doubt it ll be a regular trip companion

text:
good morning my fellow researchers  in this post i will be reporting my findings about different stimulants when used with the objective of increasing the productivity motivation at work  lets dive into each of them 

      mph    it is mhp on steroids    times more powerful per mg and last between   and   hours  take something between   and   mg early in the morning  it seems to work as a powerful dopamine reuptake inhibitor  just like mph and cocaine  has a low abuse potential  probably lower than ritalin itself  this can be explained by   interesting facts about it  first of all  snorting it can be painful to the extreme  i m not dumb enough to do that  but a few weeks ago i decided to place a bit of powder under my tongue and it was overly painful  it literally burned  the second fact is that it has a tendency to produce anxiety at higher doses  while the pleasurable effects seem to stop increasing after certain amount  motivation feels forced and robotic  which is ideal for certain activities like programming and math  overall  i would give it a     as a functional stim  

      fma    it feels a lot like amphetamine salts  adderall   but it lasts longer  between   and   hours  take between   and   mg early in the morning  it is a methamphetamine analog  so it is safe to assume that it is a dopamine releasing agent  some people say it is almost exactly as lisdexamfetamine in terms of effects and duration  i consider that it has certain abuse potential  it also has a ceiling like   mph  but it is high enough to allow abuse  also  it can be snorted  in terms of productivity and motivation  it makes you  happier  than   mph  which makes boring tasks seem more entertaining and easier to do  overall  i would give it a     due to its higher abuse potential  

    modafinil    different from the others in this list  it is not a rc nor a amphetamine analog  it is a wakefulness promoting agent  how it works is not    clear  but apparently it has something to do with dopamine  it seems that tolerance doesn t really happen with this substance  this is polemic  many will disagree about it   it is not as good as the amphetamine analogs to create forced motivation and lifted mood  which makes it a bit less useful for many and weak in comparison  however  it is considered physically safe and has a low  almost null  abuse potential  also  it lasts the entire day  overall  a      

    amphetamine salts    known by many names in the usa  including the famous adderall  it is one of the most researched substances used to treat adhd  it has a short duration  between   and   hours  the normal dose for me is between   and   mg twice per day  but it can go as high as   per day for some people  it increases motivation  improves mood and  since it has been prescribed for many decades  we know it is mostly safe when not abused  it has a well know addictive potential and is the only substance of this list that gave me redosing urges  also  it has a bad comedown and it will happen twice per day  not really my favourite due to this but it is the gold standard for adhd  so it is useful as a reference  overall      

    caffeine    pretty good for the price and how easily you can get it  take between   and   once per day  it lasts a lot  be careful with damaging your sleep at night  i will make you feel awake  anxious and a bit motivated  quite like modafinil  tolerance develops extremely fast  but the  withdrawal  from it is pretty soft  not really supposed to be used daily in the long term or you will go back to baseline in matter of weeks  i would rate it      

    cocaine    not really functional to be honest  i decided to include it just because so many rich  and dumb  americans seem to use it at work  it is clearly addictive  short lived and distracting  if you are going to use it functionally  don t snort it and go oral  dosing it is tricky  probably   mg   times per day would do it  i used it once and it felt uncomfortable  just dirty stimulation that fades quickly  with a bad comedown  i you know someone who is using it for productivity  help them to get a way cheaper and more effective meth addiction      

general note  do not increase your dose constantly  if it is no longer working try taking a tolerance break  upping your dose every time it is no longer effective will put you at risk of developing an addiction  

also  please be careful with the long lasting stimulants like   mph and   fma  they can truly ruin your sleep  the residual stimulation may last may hours more  i took     of   mph a bit too late yesterday and    it is f cking   and i m still   speeeeeeeed   slightly stimulated  stay safe

text:
serotonin imbalance and pervasive thoughts  a trip report

subject    lbs male    cm       
dosage    mg volumetrically liquid dosed beta hydroxy   b

a somewhat difficult trip most likely as a result of negative thoughts and extreme anxiety  but luckily i had quite nice people around to ensure my safety  the trip was defined by a mental preparation for experiencing an altered state  causing unceasing come up anxiety for the first half  until about t     hrs  decisions made as a result  resume my antidepressant  i simply cannot function without it  and i perhaps never will be able to  speak thoughts up front  no more lying and being timid  low self esteem is too useless for this transient life   if you are the only one who exists  then why not play around with the experimental game you find yourself in  

brief desrciption of experience 

t       ingested    beta hydroxy   b 
t       first effects felt  slight nervousness  nothing like the anxiety which was to come  this is probably how most people feel anxiety 
t       mental fog and heavy headspace felt  slight vision blur
t       worst anxiety felt  panicking  etc  pervasive thoughts were about suicide and being out of control  the usual  but it felt much worse  maybe the most out of control i have ever felt  
t       calming down through conversing  thinking of other things helped  but how to stop these pervasive thoughts 
t       most intense visuals felt  closed eye visuals  heavy patterning and slight dimensional dysphoria  
t       peak of trip  dreamlike and without sense of self  unfortunately not very conscious either 
t     onwards   relaxed  sociable comedown  slight visuals  what i had originally planned for the trip to be like 

conclusion  it was quite eye opening and there is much to learn from  however i should have prepared better  always remember  set and setting 

a week later i tried about half    mg  and had a wonderful time

text:
age   

weight    lbs

dosage    mg oral in solution

setting  my house

preface  doip  also known as doipr  is another fairly logical direction to go when developing psychedelic phenethylamines  it is the amphetamine analogue of   ip  the compound that probably gave me the worst body load of any psychedelic i’ve ever taken  thus i was not particularly eager to delve into doip  but i was still a bit curious  i only had   mg at my disposal  which i would ultimately consider a low dose of this compound    ip is notably less potent than other   x compounds and i expected this property would carry over to doip  for those with less sensitive bodies than mine  it would appear a dose in the range of     mg proves more fruitful  though i personally am not inclined to take it any further than i did  the effects i experienced were just above threshold  with a disproportionately intense bodyload  this report will be shorter than usual  but the few effects i got are as follows 

     dose taken  in my past experiences  dox compounds are unbearably cringingly bitter so i brace for the sting  it turns out that the solution is fairly dilute and the taste is agreeable  especially when i chase it with cranberry juice  a shudder still runs up my spine 

     onset of a suddenly intense nausea  no other effects are noticeable 

     a slow and steady come up  stimulant effects become more marked  i am shaking and my thoughts are racing 

     i feel a bit light and uncomfortable  i vape some weed to take the edge off  it has little to no effect 

     stimulation becomes more marked  i am clenching my teeth a lot  not much else to note 

     i am feeling hyped up and energized  maybe it is because i am listening to the beastie boys very loudly  the drug occupies an odd headspace  as though it is just in the threshold between a stimulant and a true psychedelic  there are hints of the freely associating  efficiently flowing psychedelic headspace  but they are certainly not at the forefront  it is present primarily as a physical stimulation  shaking  increased heart rate  slight hyperthermia  and a definite alertness  the body load is becoming deeply uncomfortable  i have to lie on my stomach to suppress nausea  gi disturbances are marked despite having taken   mg of loperamide shortly after dosing 

     shaking a lot more  shaking whatever surface i am on  the psychedelic headspace peeks out from its hiding place a little more now and comes to overshadow the base stimulation by just a bit  i’m lying in bed obsessively reading news articles about coronavirus and its implications  despite the stimulation  there is no desire to get up and move around or do any activity  the nausea has me bound in place 

     still pretty nondescript  the bodyload is now accentuated by an uncomfortable urinary retention  the headspace is pleasant  a bit of a euphoric rush  ultimately subtle and based on the foundation of electricity running through my muscles  no visuals or sensory effects to speak of so far 

     bodyload still rages hard  not much else to say beyond that  it took several hours for the mental effects to come on and it seems they are already receding  leaving my alone with all of this physical discomfort  quite disappointing 

     still mostly just feel sick 

     i smoke a whole joint in the backyard  it’s a mildly cold day  this seems to have a nice effect of both suppressing the nasty physical sensations while boosting the cognitive aspect of the experience  the stimulation and euphoria rush back in like an opened dam  i find myself dancing around the house  hyped up and wishing i had something to do with all of this newfound physical and cognitive energy 

     on impulse  i decide to watch ingmar bergman’s “the seventh seal”  a well renowned movie i had been meaning to watch for some time  it was thought provoking and had some stunning imagery at times  the drug had me fixated on the screen  mulling over every detail in the cinematography and writing  as time passes the nausea creeps back in and i find myself lying on my stomach to help suppress it 

     the movie has ended and i notice that i feel almost entirely back to baseline  save for some tremors and nausea and urinary retention  my partner comes home from work and interaction is normal and not noteworthy 

     the nausea is all that persists but it too has mostly subsided by now 

     entirely back to baseline 

conclusion  perhaps for someone else this would be an interesting drug  but listening to my body has made it clear that i should not push this any further  this drug primarily manifested as bodyload  just an intense twisting piercing nausea  urinary retention  bruxism  tremors  and general discomfort and malaise  the headspace was just on threshold  there definitely was something psychedelic there  but it was furtive and elusive  it seemed just over the border from being a regular stimulant  there were absolutely no visual or sensory effects to note and just the slightest hints of an energetic  electric euphoria  there wasn’t much desire to socialize and the bodyload all but decimated any motivation to complete tasks  perhaps more interesting cognitive effects would manifest at higher doses  but i know i would pay the price if i were to push the dose of this higher  it notably had a long comeup  similar to other dox compounds  but a remarkably short peak and offset  cannabis provided some relief and improvement to the overall experience  which was ultimately lackluster  i spent most of this trip lying down trying not to throw up  i’m glad to have added this to my bank of experiences but i think i will not be exploring this compound any further

text:
this is the first trip report i ve written  it s probably gonna be long  i ll try and make it a good read though  

set and setting   the work week is finally over and i m happy with the work i ve accomplished  i m laying in bed with my dog  watching tv  while my girlfriend is putting together orders from her etsy shop so she can send them out in the morning   

      i dose   al lad  

             i start to notice the early signs of the al lad  my teeth feel like there s electricity in them  i start getting fidgety and giddy  and i get random itches that feel really good to scratch  the image on the tv is starting to bleed out passed the perimeter of the screen  our bedroom has    of black light led strips lining the ceiling and my nightstand lamp has one of those rgb bulbs that you can set  i like to turn these on when i start getting these first alarms so i turn the black lights on set the lamp to slowly cycle through all its colors  

             starting to notice the tell tale patterns of a lysergamide trip covering the faces of the cast of modern family  they look like they re donning red and yellow war paint that bleeds off their faces and decorates the background  the visuals came on really smoothly because i suddenly think to myself   holy shit  am i already tripping this hard   anything textured is slowly starting to morph without effort  i remember thinking that it was like the acid was a lubricant that allowed for textures to flow how they normally would if they weren t held static by our observation and expectation of them to remain still  i find my cracker  a balloon  and a box of nangs and start filling the balloon  i take a few deep breaths to exhale all the air out of my lungs  and follow it by a deep inhale from the balloon  i cap the hit off with a breath of normy air and hold my breath  the colors of the patterns i ve been seeing suddenly become even more neon and geometrical  flourishes of neon green  orange  yellow  pink and purple become bold and start doing somersaults as the patterning covers my entire field of vision  i can hear my heartbeat in my ears and the neon patterns are pumping in time with it  the effects of the nitrous start to dissipate a bit and after having given it a minute  i repeat the process until the balloon is empty  

          hrs    the wild morphing and patterning is starting to settle and has less sharp outlines and now blends more seamlessly with the image on the tv  facial features slide around their faces and change size along the way  this show is fucking hilarious  y all  the writing had me fuckin crying at parts  my girlfriend s busy working on the other side of the room  but we share a laugh every few scenes  i hit a few more nangs and enjoy the fireworks  

my dog likes to lay under the duvet and asphyxiate herself so she jumps up on the bed and starts trying to shove her head into the covers to try and get under them  it s the cutest fucking thing  she s been doing it for as long as i ve had her and i just see it as this cute weird thing she does for the comfort of being in a little cocoon  the thought hits me that she s always on top of the covers chillin with her humans  but we never go under the duvet to hang out with her in her little cocoon  i poke my head under there and it looks like i m laying in a cloud with my pup curled up against me  the duvet cover was in the dryer so the black light was shining through and illuminating this little cloud cave my dog had discovered  i lay under there for a while and gazed lovingly into my dog s eyes while i gave her pets and scritches  

i started thinking about how happy i am to have been able to give her a better life  she was rescued from a dog hoarding situation where she was clearly mistreated  was fostered by my ex s aunt and uncle who she ran away from and lived outside for   weeks  before they found her again and i brought her home  she was absolutely terrified of everything for the longest time  but has in the     years i ve had her become such a happy  and funny  and loving  brave little pup  she s the sweetest dog i ve ever met and she had such a rough start in life  i start tearing up a bit thinking about how much i love this animal and how happy i am to be alive to be there for her  

        hrs    i m laying in bed and looking at the tapestry we have hanging over our bed  it s one of those trippy landscape tapestries with mountains and trees made of fractals and textures  i always use this to kinda gauge how hard i m tripping  the whole image is moving around itself very deliberately  the changing colors from my nightstand lamp give it a pulsating effect as each color on the tapestry reacts differently to the colors in the light s cycle  i ve never been happier to be alive  at this point  i remember that i also had just gotten some dmxe and that i d been wanting to see what all the hype is about  the only dissociative i ve done with psychedelics is nitrous and i m already a huge fan of that combination so i m excited to try this new one  

i carefully scale out   of this fine  light tan powder and make sure my eyes aren t deceiving me when i look at the scale s led display  i roll up the    in my wallet and snort it directly from the little receptacle i weighed the powder in  i really like the smell  it has a faint smell of gasoline and some other terribly unhealthy chemical to be ingesting  pretty easy on the nose too  

          hrs    holy shit  i get it  i get why people love the psych and disso mix  the dmxe has added a very crisp and vaporwavey feel to the trip  the lighting in the room definitely helps set the vibe even more  but now everything has a shiny quality to it  my dog s fur is extra glossy and changes tints with each color change from my lamp and her eyes extra clear  the edges of furniture  the tv  the walls  everything is glistening  i close my eyes and see a beautiful aquatic landscape with impossible coral infrastructure that looks to be populated by sea monkeys  this image is so crystal clear  like looking out of a window on a clear winter morning and seeing it before you  

my girlfriend takes a break from working and comes to lay in bed and watch tv with me and the pup  she s so absolutely beautiful  i mean  she already is when i m not tripping  but it was like seeing her for the first time all over again  kinda reminiscent of those animes where the qt π appears and has soft pastel colors behind her and the light gleaming off her  she smiles knowingly and asks me how i m feeling  i tell her that i m having a great time and give her a long kiss  we lay in bed cuddling and watching tv for a while  this show is still sending my sides into orbit with its writing  

         total     since dmxe    understanding what s going on during some parts of the show is getting tricky  concepts are getting harder to grasp  like  social concepts and stuff like that  some of the dialog starts to seem like non sequiturs  i m still finding it hilarious  but i m more confused as to why  it s not a bad sort of confused like it s making me anxious or anything like that  in fact i m perfectly happy writing the confusion off as  i m high as shit on drugs that can make things confusing sometimes  fuck it  still having fun   

the visuals are really popping off now  it seems like different visual distortions will randomly take hold and control my vision s narrative for a while  at one point  the image on the tv looks like it s separating into cmy layers  then the scale of everything around the actors would fluctuate as if someone was adjusting the levels of the objects on a mixing board  then their faces would shift like those snapchat filters where it squeezes your head into different shapes and makes you look like an alien or something  then there was one where everything looked made of tiny threads worms that would wiggle around  i suck on a few more balloons to season the ride a bit more and see how much the visuals can glow bend  having a fucking blast lol

              one thing that really piqued my interest was how adding the dmxe gave reality a sort of plastic  tangible feel to it  at one point watching tv  it felt and looked like the space the characters were moving through had a solid quality to it  almost putty like  this reminded me that i have a little tin of this glow in the dark putty in my nightstand that i like to play with while tripping  if y all don t fuck with tactile toys during your trips yet  i recommend them  i pull out this silly putty from the tin and start kneading it between my fingers  mesmerized by how it looks and feels  when i look up  i notice that the room around me is moving in tandum with my kneading of this putty  probably one of the weirdest things i ve experienced  if i stretched the putty  it was like the space in my bedroom was stretching along with it  if i bunched it together and firmly twisted it between my fingers  that s how reality seemed to move around me  

        total  at this point it s starting to get late  my girlfriend is stressed from the volume of orders she s had to put together and all the things she s had to accomplish during the day  i crack another nang and it hisses loudly into the balloon  she asks me if i m gonna be done with those soon  she gets ready for bed and i do couple bumps of dmxe  once it kicks in   minutes later  the effects of the al lad are reinvigorated  but with less intensity  

the tapestry hanging above our bed is still very much alive though  my girlfriend crawls into bed and i ask her if she s mad at me  she says she s not  that she s just stressed with work  but that she also worries about me when i mix and match different drugs  i reassure her that i m not going about it haphazardly  that i read up extensively about anything i take and how each molecule interacts with the others and how i never take more than i know i can handle or take drugs i know nothing about  she says she knows  and she just wants me to take care of myself  i kiss her good night  turn the lights off and she drifts off to sleep 

        total    i m laying in the dark and enjoying this same show still  i m biting into the duvet trying not to laugh too loudly should it wake her up  my dog is laying between us and i m petting her velvety little heart shaped ears while she makes those happy little nose sighs dogs do when they re being pet real good  i m not really tired and the trip is still going  though faintly  but i m starting to get a bit bored  i take some kratom when i remember that i have a delta   cart in my nightstand drawer  i find it and start puffing on that a bit  it gives the slowly dwindling visuals a bit of a glow  but mainly it just makes me sleepy  the last time i remember checking the time  it was      

all in all  i d definitely recommend al lad and dmxe  especially for those mixing psychs and dissos for the first time  the al lad has a really easy head space so it doesn t really throw you for too much of a loop if when the dmxe starts doing its thing with your head  i ve tried al lad before  but never really fucked with dissos much aside from drinking robutussin before class in high school or iving ketamine to ward off heroin withdrawals in my early    nitrous is the only one i ve really experimented extensively with  but it s pretty mild in comparison  i m definitely gonna be adding dmxe to my trip spice rack and revisiting this cocktail

text:
hello  
this week i got my delivery with   and   samples with dissos  that i want to try  so i was the whole week excited for friday 
when i was finally at home today after work  i can’t decide which of the unknown dissos i should try  so i took      after   i redosed   and   later i took   again 
overall i took around   in   and i only felt a short time comfortable  but i destroyed this moment because i thought  „finally a nice feeling  let’s try a hole“  so i took another line and everything was boring again     what a wasted afternoon and evening    after the last line i feel sober again  ofc not complete sober  and i‘m chilling with   beers and a bit of kratom  in the moment i also regret that i didn’t tried mxipr this afternoon evening 

also i‘m wondering why   is so popular  while it is at the same time so boring

text:
dck    fdck      flourodeschloroketamine    f ketamine   

  pics of reagent tests   

 https   imgur com    https   imgur com   

  summary of reagent tests    

  marquis  mecke      froehde  liebermann  hofmann have essentially no reaction  the mandelin turns a deep reddish color  similar to the way ketamine would react  there was even some smoke emitted during initial reaction    

  pics of dose comparison   

 https   imgur com qlhqdea  https   imgur com qlhqdea 

note   please this is just for reference   always use a scale 

  pics of molecule comparison  ketamine  dck    fdck   

 https   imgur com    https   imgur com    

 amp    

background to the experience  i wish everyone wrote trip reports like this  d   

  drug dose    powdered   fdck  doses          

  roa    insufflated 

  confidence in supplier    i am    sure my supplier had highly pure product

  date     time                 

  diet    fairly strict carnivorous diet  beef only  for about   out of last   days  usually eating omad  one meal a day   if you don’t know about this diet  i would suggest some research  it is quite interesting  i did a   hour dry fast  no food  no water  nothing consumed  two days ago  yesterday  i ate slightly more than usual to compensate  digestive system feels fine today

  recent drug use    no external mind altering substances  drugs  of any kind in the last seven days  some caffeine was had on maybe two occasions the week before  some cannabis was smoked twice in the last month  no hard drugs for several months  

  mental    feeling optimistic  motivated  and driven  excited to work on a new book and learn a new language at the present  there is little stress in my life currently  besides watching the crypto markets fluctuate    for the most part  i have escaped many of my addictive tendencies when i found purpose in life fairly recently  it feels good  usually  i am more excited to try a new drug  but because of recent life changes  i am more nervous this time  

  physical    i believe my health has never been better  because of good diet and exercise  i usually feel wonderful  currently in ketosis  may skew results   last night’s sleep according to fitbit was   hours  this is average for me – and i feel rested   stomach is empty  nasal passages are fairly clear  slight hunger  which is normal  haven’t eaten or drank anything since about   yesterday  i usually dry fast for   hours out of the day  this is normal for me   hr about   bpm  did a small meditation this morning  and studied some chinese  

  setting    taking the drugs in my home by myself  roommates are home  but i will likely be avoiding them  i may go for a walk to the laundromat just to experience the outside  

  expectations questions    i have heard that out of the dissociative rc’s that exist on the market today    fdck is the most similar to traditional ketamine  i am curious to see the similarities  i have heard mixed reports on   fdck potency  some sources report it is stronger mg per mg than ketamine  while others report it is weaker  reddit has mixed reviews as well  some users have high dissociative tolerance  likely skewing what the “starting” dose is  while i remember one report of a user saying he was highly intoxicated on    to be safe  i will start at    as i trust my source to have supplied me with very potent and pure   fdck  based on the   dose  i may take subsequent doses that are stronger to achieve more powerful effects with even spacing to report the effects  

i am trying to observe where this may have potential use in life  recreational  social  introspective  creative  hopefully i can determine if there is some value in this compound  

 amp    

 amp    

  the actual experience    

 dose         

t    i expected it to burn more than it did  but it was fairly tolerable  a bit harsher than ketamine  i would say  but not by much  

t    perhaps the slightest sensation of effect  could be placebo  but the birds chirping outside has just a faint change to it  

t    definitely some trace effects present  no dissociative effects at this dose  perception is very slightly altered  a slight head buzz  distant sounds outside the window seem different  nose tickled  almost sneezed  have not snorted drugs in a long time  

t    started dripping down my throat  slightly similar taste to ketamine  still feel fully functional  mild relaxation   

t    a slight drug induced chill spreads over my body  not unpleasant  

t    i can definitely handle social interaction if it was available  slightly slow in thought when moving around my home and when getting ready to go outside and do laundry  a hint of euphoria   

t    a bit forgetful  but it makes me laugh  not troubling  being outside is nice  

t    effects have been extraordinarily mild so far  i will try the   line i made for myself next  

 total dose                 

t    heart rate jumped to   bpm  could be the initial rush of insufflated drugs  there is a slight warmth  and i would say i feel increased euphoria  

t    changes in perception more noticeable  specifically hearing  faster come up of effects with second dose  the fact that it was double the first dose is likely a contributing factor  a slight general sense of well being  

t    definitely a bit slowed down mentally  but relaxed  it could be described as pleasant  i put on a song that i like – it sounds different  but still quite enjoyable  i think this drug has recreational potential at this dose  increased desire for sociability  i am moving my body to the music more than i would if i were sober  looking through old photos has a surreal kind of feeling to it  

t    enjoying the effect of enhanced and altered music appreciation  still feel very functional  though i feel like the aforementioned forgetfulness would persist if i pursued alternative activities  walking around feels very ketamine like at a comparative dose – a little “wonky”  very slight instability  as some may describe it  effects are still on the mild side – perhaps a rank of        after i put my clothes in the drier  i will attempt a high dose  perhaps in the     range  as it stands right now  i would say the drug is slightly less potent than ketamine mg for mg  

t    at this dose i am content for social interaction  i had fun cutting out the pictures of my reagent tests to make this post     nose mouth area has very trace numbness  perhaps on a similar level to the anesthetic effects of an equivalent dose of ketamine  

t      i am not getting any profound epiphanies  but i suppose i was not necessarily searching for them  occasionally i feel like i get a good great idea on ketamine  but it is rare compared with traditional psychedelics  the enhanced mood is nice  there is a tranquil and relaxed energy  there is recreational potential in a party type environment  depending on the party  the drip of drugs down my throat tastes worse than ketamine  if my memory of the ketamine drip serves me correctly  now let’s try a high dose      

t        insufflated 

 total dose                  mg    

ouch  that burned a little more  perhaps my sinuses are a bit raw from not having snorted drugs recently  t      effects come on much faster now that my body has adjusted  dissociative effects are definitely more noticeable  numbness in nose and top front teeth within minutes from the large dose  i burst out laughing a few times  there is a disconnected  but relaxed feeling   

t      typing is quite odd  so is the concept of the internet when i really think about it  i would definitely say i am intoxicated  the effects came on surprisingly fast  quite ketamine like  music helps enhance the experience  

t      if i turn the music off  there is a tranquility to the substance at this dose  but when i get up to move around there is a feeling of drunken intoxication  

t      what dripped down my throat was tasted on my tongue was quite foul  spit it out  i did hear that this compound has good oral potential  but because i have not eaten or drank anything yet today  i am trying to avoid having   fdck be the first thing in my stomach  when i close my eyes and rub my face  my hands feel bigger than they normally do  

t      playing music loudly with noise canceling headphones creates a totally different experience  numbness in the nose and front of the mouth  sense of well being is strong  very ketamine like  definitely more similar to ketamine than methoxetamine was  

t      i believe i could converse at this dose  but meaningful conversation may be more difficult  definite dissociative effects  i think   would be better suited for a recreational party type use  

t      the drug has been fairly gentle at the doses that were taken  i am feeling quite optimistic in general about the future  i would usually describe myself as optimistic in sober circumstances  but this drug induced optimism is appreciated  perhaps this is where the anti depressant effects of ketamine emerge from  the experience has been enjoyable so far  

t      there is definitely a pain killing  analgesic  effect with this drug  it is easy to ignore the pain in my sore muscles from working out yesterday  

t      when i close my eyes without music and just breathe  then i am more in tune with how the substance gives me the feeling of separation from mind and body  dissociation   

t      i put on some party music in the room since no one is home and it brings me energy  there is definite recreational potential  the taste in my mouth is dissatisfying  however  

t      there is a euphoria present  things that would not usually make me laugh seem to be causing me joy  having the music volume up very high can cause an enjoyable sensory overload  occasionally  i sit introspectively and think about my life  it can be uncomfortable at times  but satisfying therapeutically  

t      debating on going on my daily run  now that much of the peak intoxication has worn off  but i think i will hold off for a while  

t      there is still definitely elevated mood and perception change  but the effects have started to wane  i had read reports that   fdck lasted longer than ketamine  and this may in fact be true  there was probably a solid   minute peak  i am definitely coming down now  though it is quite gentle  life feels good today  

t      the effects have definitely not fully dissipated  as when i went to retrieve my clothes from the drier at the laundromat  it was quite an event  this entire experience has felt in a way    cleansing  i don’t know if that is the best word to describe it  but it is the sensation i feel  this is likely more personal  so take away what you will  

t      i believe i can “feel” the music more  it is quite enjoyable  

t      i will go running now     

t      ran a little further than normal  the slight pain that i have had on the outside edge of my left foot was far less noticeable today – a tribute to the analgesic effects of the drug most likely  my run also felt more profound if that makes any sense  note  exercising under the influence of dissociative drugs is dangerous  be careful  effects have mostly subsided  there is a lingering positive mood state that is appreciated  

t      perhaps a side effect i am noticing later  when looking at the sun reflected off white paper  i went back into my much darker room  and my eyes were not adjusting to the dim light as they normally would  seems that light sensitivity is still affected several hours later  

t      i would say i feel back to baseline  three hours post last dose of      there is a lingering afterglow feeling which is pleasant  

     

an hour later  i had a subsequent unplanned   dose to explore what the drug was like in a sexual environment  the sex was    enjoyable but weird  the orgasm felt foreign but pleasurable  there was some slight confusion at times  i have little desire to repeat  but i suppose it was worth it for science  

 amp    

  after thoughts    this substance is remarkably similar to ketamine  in a social or recreational setting  some users may genuinely not know the difference  the drug did seem to burn the sinuses a little bit more than ketamine  also the drip down the throat produced a more unpleasant flavor  there was a bit more stomach gas after the substance dripped its way from the sinuses into the stomach cavity  ketamine does not do this to me  my partner also suffered from a lot of stomach gas  he also claimed that the drug made him feel more worn out and slow than a comparable dose of ketamine  

the duration of effect seems to be a bit longer than that of ketamine  but not by much  the substance feels ever so slightly more toxic than ketamine  but not by much  i am sure there are for more toxic substances that exist besides this one  there seems to be a lingering positive mindset that persists for hours after the dominant effects of the drug wear off   

is it worth it  i suppose so if the desire is for a dissociative drug that is like ketamine and ketamine is not available  if access to ketamine is available  it may be fun for the curious explorer to do a comparison and report effects  since i have not consumed ketamine in such a long time  i may be misremembering how the drugs feel when compared to each other

text:
this may or may not be appropriate to post about the substance here however i felt like this community would appreciate especially considering the popularity of benzo derivatives  i ve tried ghb as well as bdo so i can compare the two and info in that area is scarce  in short    actually feels like alcohol  it has for me all the enjoyable parts which is strange because i attributed some of the sensations i enjoyed to the involvement of the nmda receptor but based on its appearance with   i was evidently mistaken  ghb is nice  it s euphoric  and its not nauseating unlike bdo for me but its distinct from alcohol and isn t as much of a   to   replacement as   is 

i m not even sure what i ve lost here  it seems with less of the negatives and a massively extended duration  you know that feeling when you hit a good level of drunk and its like this burning stream of euphoria  yeah well imagine that but it doesn t go away in an hour or two  its like this steady stream of pleasure  my dose was roughly          caps in total about   ml or less over the course of a day  it doesn t seem to last the full duration but its likely that it does just similar to benzos where you can get used to it  one thing i will say is that if you get moody on alcohol the potential is here as well in which case the mood wouldn t fade quickly since your going to be intoxicated for a while 

it can make you really  really sleep though  i countered it with some fl modafinil  worked like a charm but that sleepiness crept right back in after it wore off which it usually does in   or so hours 

tldr  if you have ever thought to yourself  i could do this    if i was constantly drunk  well now s the chance to awaken your hidden powers and live the life of a bohemian

this is gonna be a long one  wanted to keep it short but there was no other way   

background  i have rolled on mdma about     times maybe  and once on mda  my dosages for mdma have been from     and the mda trip was   thought it was    didnt want that much   this felt more intense than that mda trip  i also have combined that mda trip with   of   and   of ket  and did several disso psych combos with mdma too  until this experience i started rather low with all my rcs   


preparation  dissolved about   of   apb powder in   of water in a small glass  it didnt disolve much at first    i also didnt break the clumps  so i figured it should be succinate  as so many people here has told me that its all succinate and hcl is fake advertising  and i believed that from the start  otherwise i wouldve dosed like      first mistake  nevertheless  i proceed to take a nap and wake up   later     


t            i wake up  i had set an alarm off to dose at hour      i had eaten a heavy meal prior to this around        mistake    i wake up a bit confused and look at the   of water  only a small clump   probably around    still floats there  nothing else is left  without realising that succinate shouldnt have dissolved in the first place i gulp it all down  leaving the small clump and    of  water  so lets say i took   out  maybe   if i am being generous  tastes bitter  similar to mdma  and i go back to sleep  i have my alarm set off at     

t      i barely fall asleep and get this anxiety  time says     and a lot of restlessness  i get up after   and walk around  starting to get nauseous  a headache begins  the anxiety  headache and nausea get more intense every couple of minutes  i almost never get nausea or such from molly or mda  or drugs in general  i realise that this is probably not succinate  anxiety spikes up 

t     i am making myself vomit  i kept burping after the heavy meal i had an hour and a half before dosing  still agitated and anxious about the incoming trip  after puking  the headache starts becoming a headrush high and the anxiety fades off quickly  i lay down on my bed  my so is around and i put on some music  the rush in my head is so intense  as if all of my serotonin has been dumped at once  almost a bit concerning 

t     i am laying on my bed  still calming down a bit  more physically  anxiety has completely gone      damn the music sounds soooo good   and my body feels so euphoric  like every muscle in my body is having an orgasm that keeps building up  i stretch and moan on my bed  it feels soo good  more alert music plays so i get up and start chatting  i feel a constant effect that has a smooth comeup  unlike the mdma where the emotion and euphoria come in sudden waves  this one has a logical build up regarding the empathogenic  amp  euphoric effects  much better and more mature feeling than mdma mda  and the visuals dont have patterns like mda which isleaning towards tryptamines  but a more electric  fuzzy  shiny  pixelated effect like phenethylamines  a more alert song comes down so i go in the living room and crank up the soundsistem  i start dancing  feels amazing 

    it has fully peaked now  whenever i put a chill song  i find myself floored  tensing into full body orgasm on the couch  squeezing the fabric or a blanket in my palms  when i put a more alert song  i find myself dancing or moving around  i talk lot  ans play with the cat  the headrush is ro intense  feels as if i am floating  

t     kept talking a lot  but conversations are more deep and i don t switch the subject as much as with mdma  hard to focus because its so euphoric in my body  i am having internal hallucinations  if i quickly move turn my head vision around  it feels as if the entire imagie dissipates then reform again from tiny pixels  and if the vibe music changes  the entire filter looks as if i am dreaming and its a new chapter  really intense  never had this type of visual  but very similar stuff from phenethylamines and weed happened to me once 

t          the extreme body euphoria lasted for about       then i got a more stable roll  easier to focus on the music  talking  the music gets so deep  i would dare to say as deep as acid  it s just too good   i understand my cat so well  its as if we are directly exchaging emotions  never felt such a deep connection with a pet where it feels as if i am literally communicating with him  ans this went on for hours  cat also acted as if he was in   apb  they dont need drugs haha  i keep commenting in how this checks every box where molly mda fell short for me  my nee favourite roll

t         so gets into the sauna  i only get in for a few seconds at a time cause high heat  amp  stims suck  its cold outside the sauna which is good  i keep dancing laying down  still feels very euphoric and orgasmic but not overwhelming as the first hour and half  and talking  we both shower after she s done 

t         i decide to test the sexual aspect  getting hard is suprisingly easy  having an orgasm feels like it requires some effort i am not willing to make  every touch feels very intense  after   i tell her that we should stop since the happy ending requires some effort and i wanna dance a bit more and listen to thr music  music is    on this drug  

t     so goes to sleep  feel like i am coming down slightly   nope  it s still on  maybe only     

t     definitely starting to comedown now  lets get some weed ready to vape

t     only now i vape some weed  still listened to music  mostly on my headphones 

t     tripping a bit visually from the weed  around     consumed   still coming down  very long and smooth comedown

t     lets do some dissos   i load up   dck into my herborizer bowl on top of some vaped weed 

      more of dck  my vision gets very distorted  i kept texting people nonstop and shitposting on reddit for the past    i tell my friend i can barely text anymore  really weird visuals  music still enhanced 

    i prepare my headphones and my bed  time to hole  load up   of o pce  put on some sphonlge on my headphones and hit the bong  i have about   to get ready  i lay on my bed and i feel a tsunami coming  but it s the hole  even tho i can still move and see  i can feel it coming  like an unstopable force that has to make its way with me now  i do oppose  this tidal wave of dissociation reaches me and throws me intk what feels like the perfect hole  

t         this is the  god hole   gave me goosebumps remembering it now lol   everything is in full auto  i watch creation and destruction  the beginning and the end  its all there  unfolding in front of my eyes  so intense and abstract  more intense and deeper than any hole i have had  i am completely calm and engulfed in this experience  about   pass and i start to see my room again  i feel i have a body  wrapped in spiderweb  just my clothes  i realise a couple of min later  i listen to   more songs then get up  

t     mostly came down from the disso high mentally  still felt body sendations for a couple hours after  feels as if i am back on the neverending comedown  no more roll feeling  just residual stimulation 

t     watching shitty internet videos  still somewhat stimulated  turned off music  started to annoy me  i vape weed  teeth are barely grinding but jaw muscles have been very tense since t      ate a lot of magnesium gluconate  i should have bought more  had   of magnesium but my body ate it in   

t     still stimulated  maybe i could sleep but i keep browsing the interwebs  i vape a lot of weed  maybe      

 t       grams of weed vaped  i lay in my bed  i have strong weed  used like   different strains   sleep comes in    this was around     am  remember i dosed at   pm  

next day i wake up around      slept like shit  feels like a vegetable  drained of every last drop of emotion amp energy  until     when i fall asleep   wake up the next day around     am  i feel    ok physically  maybe    of my emotions are back  i do some   pcp throught the day            i get manic as hell  never got me like that on    go to sleep at   and wake up feeling around   ă feels a bit off  vaped some dck at midnight cause i had very weird thoughts and felt they were literally making me sick  i realise the pcp mania was there  but i was not aware of it  it has been there all day  the dck hole woke me up from it  fucking shit  i was so deep into it and unaware ffs  also had some psychotic  thoughts  and it all sneaked past me  meditated awhile until the dck weared off and slept  i am now pretty much sober  i can feel it used up all my serotonin few days ago but its fine  

i think i am going to conclude my ongoing research for awhile  gonna be completely sober besides weed for at least a month  dissos can be tricky  never forget    apb is an amazing drug  but i really wanted a light roll  gotta trust your vendor regarding the salt form of ny substance i guess  stay safe  people  

tl dr  took about     of   apb thinking it was succinate not hcl  got smacked in the face harder than ever  imobilizing body orgasms  amp  internal hallucinations  holed on o pce dck on the comedown  most intrnse disso hole ever  was fucking trashed next day and did   pcp   day after  mania  amp  psychosis sneaked into my brain  felt off did dck the following day to snap out of it  i am done for awhile  back to only vaping weed at night maximum for some time

text:
hey everyone  using throwaway account

to preface  i m a happy little researcher who s done most mainstream psychedelics available to me  psilocybe truffles  mdma  mda     and   lsd  worth mentioning weed too   my best friend to research with has experience with the same substances as well  so not a newbie     always use a test kit to know what i m truly taking  however my r chems supplier  will not source  has been verified to be extremely trustworthy  so i take their word for it 

following harm reduction  amp  set setting practices is important to us  have been indulging since    always trip in a safe place so home  in proper days  amp  times to do so  with the friend if needed  give ourselves breaks  have been eating and sleeping better  amp  reducing stress in journey of self improvement    so we are pretty good to roll     

we are pretty stoked to be having   apb and   mapb available to us  i am equipped with a milligram scale  amp  our body types are about perfect average so we go for the average dose   in this case   for either drug   after research of my own on reddit and psychonautwiki regarding these drugs i have concluded  

  apb is more comparable to mda   slightly more psychedelic   a longer length      hours  

  mapb is more comparable to mdma   slightly less stimulating   average roll length     hours  

my real questions are  

  our intended roa is vegetable gel capsules  this was the best way i could think of  besides dissolving the powder in a juice drink  not fans of insufflation    this is a good way to take it  right  maybe with a meal     hours before  no alcohol mixed  

  both substances were anecdotally stated many times  to have a much less harsh comedown  compared to the mdma roll  while my case is that i  lost the magic  after a few less careful experiences when more young      amp  smarter now  the comedown was never that unbearable  physically exhausted but ok mood wise  as long as i took supplements  my friend on the other hand is intrigued a lot by this  as the mdma comedown is very harsh on him  he gets quite depressed and no energy which is why he has not used it in a long time    so i wonder if perhaps he would need to dose lower  or if it could still be difficult for someone more sensitive to this  since we want to avoid a challenging comedown  though i know this is unpredictable  

  by the way      as stated  would be for an individual experience  i am very curious about mixing these two substances together for a more interesting experience  maybe more round in its effects  but i do wonder if doses would need adjustment in this case  as well as if there d be a schedule to follow  due to their differing lengths  

i have mixed psilocybin  amp  mdma in the past  noticed flips of these analogues     lsd sound popular  in theory mixing acid with either of these could make for a great time right  what about all    🙂 should weed be avoided  just want to be kind  amp  careful to our bodies  

long post so to whoever took the time to read thank you so much  if you can answer any part of this it is very appreciated  if not thank you anyway  have a great day  🚀 safe travels

    both substances were anecdotally stated many times  to have a much less harsh comedown  compared to the mdma roll  while my case is that i  lost the magic  after a few less careful experiences when more young      amp  smarter now  the comedown was never that unbearable  physically exhausted but ok mood wise  as long as i took supplements  my friend on the other hand is intrigued a lot by this  as the mdma comedown is very harsh on him  he gets quite depressed and no energy which is why he has not used it in a long time    so i wonder if perhaps he would need to dose lower  or if it could still be difficult for someone more sensitive to this  since we want to avoid a challenging comedown  though i know this is unpredictable  


    by the way      as stated  would be for an individual experience  i am very curious about mixing these two substances together for a more interesting experience  maybe more round in its effects  but i do wonder if doses would need adjustment in this case  as well as if there d be a schedule to follow  due to their differing lengths  

i have mixed psilocybin  amp  mdma in the past  noticed flips of these analogues     lsd sound popular  in theory mixing acid with either of these could make for a great time right  what about all    🙂 should weed be avoided  just want to be kind  amp  careful to our bodies  

long post so to whoever took the time to read thank you so much  if you can answer any part of this it is very appreciated  if not thank you anyway  have a great day  🚀 safe travels

text:
so for this is my first time ordering an rc of any kind asides from benzos and ive got to tell you i am absolutely impressed  i weighed out   milligrams for the first time on my scale and downed it  about   minutes later i start to feel hints of the come up but i still thought i took too little of a dose so i tried weighing out   milligrams and my scale is a bit crappy so it was probably   mgs off so i couldnt tell whether i put   or   mg  so anyway i put that ina capsule down it and in   minutes i start to feel the comeup ramp up while playing fallout  colors seem brighter  a hazey fog starts to develop in the room and i start to get some drifting along with that 
fast forward   minutes later and i am coming up strong  patterns developing all over the place start to get some tracers and all over my walls and carpet i start to see hands and eyes forming embedded onto surfaces my vision gets very wavy  

i go outside and am blown away by the outdoors the tree looked as though it was a collection made of egyptian hieroglyphs   limbs that resembled arms and legs and even eyes   the trees even seemed to mirror themselves  in a symmetrical fashion and sway like never before in a cartoonish manner   i thought to myself this is the most beautiful thing i have ever seen 

i went back inside and listened to lorn music and let me tell you that just made my experience   better i remember laying on the floor with headphones on basking in complete and utter pure euphoria   thinking about my human life and our primal nature  at this point the visuals were taking on a futuristic neon color  feel i closed my eyes and saw endless fractals and colorful spinning neon rainbow spirals that eventually turned into electric tentacles and impossible shapes i can only describe like the tesseract cube and also saw scenarios with closed   the next few hours were spent listening to music and watching tv just chillin still feeling some effects but at that point the main effects mainly died down 


this is probably hands down the best psychedelic ive tried out of most i have had experience with what seemed to be lsd a few times   shrooms   times   san pedro tea   and mimosa acacia with rue  
  aco met is perfect for me with the right amount of visuals and the right amount of pure euphoria this experience will not be forgotten   anyways trip safe guys i wish you the best of luck in your journeys ✌️✌️✌️

text:
after reading some reviews from people saying they popped multiple   tablets and claiming they barely felt anything  i got a little worried i chose the wrong substance to give a try  

well  today a few of those   tablets dropped in the mailbox 
i rushed downstairs to open the letter and took one of the   well pressed   yellow tablets with the letters “ll”  on them   no idea what that resembles  but ok  

exactly   minutes later i started to feel a calm blanked around my body  no intense euphoria  but just an extremely comfortable and natural feeing of joy 

i took a shower and noticed i was feeling a little wobbly but not in an annoying way 

i would describe the high somewhere between a decent dose of strong white kratom  mountain lion for example  with some hints of a low dose ghb wobbliness  if that makes sense 

surprisingly these effect come with an increased mental clarity and sharpness  

t   until t   have been practically very stable in terms of effects  no sudden decreases or increases 

as i am writing this it has been   since i took it  so i am not able to complete the report for now  but i will keep you posted 

tl dr  very surprised of the effects of only   o dsmt  kratom ish high  with some hints of a low dose ghb while maintaining mental clarity  talkativeness greatly increased to stim levels

text:
i ve been a daily pot smoker for   years  i m nearly    
i ve always wanted to use ativan from a psych for my anxiety but to also negate the need for me to smoke pot  
i hate being high  weed is trash compared to what it was   years ago and i feel like a lousy shit all the time  
now i m using clonaz to keep my mind and attitude right while going through this tough breakup with pot  i ve been wanting to quit weed for almost   years now and yesterday became the day i decided for good  i m so emotionally attached to weed because it got me through the hell my life has been but now i m scared of being myself in this world again  benzos are much better for my mind than thc so the trade off will be okay but part of me is always going to love weed deeply and probably always want it  
can anyone here relate to this and has anyone gone through this  success and failures  hold nothing back  i want deep insight into your opinions as well

text:
hello r rcs 
  
last night i received some mxipr and   fdck  being a long time fan of   fdck  i’ve been disappointed in the drop in quality over the past   months  decided to give mxipr a shot after my girlfriend suggested we try it  
  
at    we dosed   intranasally  started feeling warm and high about   minutes in  around     my body was getting slightly numb  in a comfortable way  mxipr had more energy to it than   fdck  i guess that’s the mania people talk about  physically i felt really nice and borderline like anesthesia  
  
at     we decided to do about   of   fdck  intranasally  things got pretty wonky but nothing crazy  it felt really good and my girlfriend loved it  i would like to do some research with mxipr again but by itself  because it was different than   fdck or   meo pce but in a desirable way  
  
around     i felt like i was past the peak and  without thinking about it  decided to take one hit of weed from a bong  bad idea  i don’t have a good time on weed    of the time but i was just in a good mindset from the dissociatives and didn’t think twice about it  i became ridiculously confused and dysfunctional  for the next   minutes my body was shivering uncontrollably and i couldn’t focus on anything  just plain dysphoria honestly  probably an anxiety attack triggered from the weed  
  
i plan to try out mxipr again soon and dive a bit deeper  be safe anyone who researches mxipr  as there are anecdotes of it causing seizures in high doses  
  
thanks for reading

text:
i had a friend  was a great guy  other than myself i didn t know anyone else who had a curiosity for rcs like we did  i used to buy lots of   aco dmt and   lsd and he would get the more weird things like the analogs of ket and stims  

he s always been an upstanding guy before things really went downhill  was part of the rugby team  did the radio club at the local community college  had a love and appreciation for gloving  best i ve ever seen  wore more tye dye than anyone else i ve ever met  even when he stopped smoking he d let me smoke at his place  no one was friendlier than him or more understanding 

one night we were seeing our friend perform at a local bar and he brought this brown vial  told me it was liquid clonazolam  i knew he knew the effects but still told him  something in my gut told me he was running away from something and i tried talking him out of doing it  even poured his vial in the toilet during our friends performance because it really struck a nerve in me  on the way home he crashed  failed a sobriety test   times and cops let him go  

few months later he went to rehab  died of a heart attack from the withdrawals  he got addicted to it so fast and so hard it took him when he tried to get better  he kept ordering more every time he thought he was getting better cause clon s grip is that strong  

whatever strife is plaguing your life it s never ever worth going down the path of addiction  when you hurt yourself you hurt everyone around you that cares  even if you think no one cares there s someone out there that cares for you  someone who s life you touched in a positive way  

rest easy friend  we all miss you

text:
okay  short backstory so you can understand where i m coming from and  hopefully  don t immediately comment  muh volumetric dosing     real post starts at the fourth paragraph   

i used to have some nice professionally made benzo mannitol mixes you could easily dose accurately using a cheap scale and it was all good and well but now i m only able to buy pure powders which begs the question of how to dose it properly 

i would like to use powders because compared with volumetric dosing i find powders to be much more practical for a number of reasons  first and foremost the abilty to easily fill them in capsules or even press pills with them whcih i need to do to be able to use them discretely on the go against panic attacks  you could make something to fill capsules with using volumetric dosing by putting your liquid on powder  but the only good nontoxic solvents for many benzos such as pg won t just easily evaporate like poor solvents such as isopropanol would and i can t put wet pg in capsules because in my tests the capsules melted in less than a day and i might not be able to get enough of the soluton into small capsules like the tiny size   ones i like to use when i m out 

  alright now to my main point    getting a proper powder mixture  studies have shown that you can easily get very safe  stable  homogenous mixtures of mannitol and active pharmaceutical ingredients by using laboratory powder mixers and powders with certain particle sizes  i ve looked at these mixers and their blueprints and most of them are honestly not at all complex or hard to build yet for some reason expensive as hell    powder mixers  which were used in the study  or these v shaped things are literally just one or two little motors connected to rods  and for the   type some rods  ball bearings and hinges  that spin a container around  why the hell does that cost thousands of dollars 

so i m currently thinking about building one myself  perhaps using a   printer  as i said even looking at the blueprints for these mixers they are obviously not very complex  my plan would be to build a   mixer  buy pharmaceutical mannitol  which is made for this exact pupose by having very consistent particle sizes   get some filters for the needed particle size of the benzos  filter the benzos and perhaps if needed reduce particle size and  well  mix them  maybe in small batches at first to reduce the impact of hotspots should they appear  although that would also make the powder ratio less accurate 

now to my questions 

  am i stupid for trying this    please explain my foolishness in detail before i accidentally kill myself 

  is there a better way get such a powder with reduced potency    maybe there s some great technique or a solvent i don t know about that s effective and easily evaporates 

  any advice or insight regarding the building process    if you have more knowledge on such equipment and can either tell me i m stupid af and i shouldn t even attempt it or give some tips an tricks 

  any advice regarding   priting    is this even a smart option here  which filaments would be best for this application  those machines don t spin very fast and it won t move much weight so the forces involved probably won t be too strong  but given how weak   printed parts can be the filament should be pretty strong just to be sure  any recommendations for decent cheap beginner printers would be great too  

tl dr  i don t like volumetric dosing so i m probably going to make a diy pharmaceutical laboratory machine that normally costs thousands if not tens of thousands of dollars and now i need to know if i m out of my mind or not

text:
a few months ago i got ahold of some mdphp for the first time  after sniffing three massive lines and realizing it was freebase  i had to improvise a method to vape it because i didn t have an oil burner  

i emptied out a cigarette and packed it into a spoon pipe while creating   thick layers of mdphp in between  i packed the layered tobacco down a lot and then sprinkled some more mdphp on top  this bowl lasted me a whole night and produced at least     good hits  i shared the bowl with five other friends at the same time and we all got super high  you don t even have to use a lighter every time because the tobacco will keep cherrying for a while  

this method is the best because you can share one bowl with many friends  passing it around and without having to worry about unexperienced people burning the freebase unlike an oil burner  the best is when you reach the next layer of mdphp and you can hear it all crackle and vape all at once getting that vibration 

even after the bowl was cleared  after an hour or so of smoking   there was a lot of melted freebase at the bottom that you could just gently heat  this method got me so incredibly high for like   hours  the pyro rush mixed with the nicotine buzz is really something else  i have a oil burner now but i m not even sure if i m going to use it for a while because this method is just so great  has anyone else tried this 

love y all

text:
i posted some of this as a comment on someone else’s post but decided to make a post about it because it was a unique experience for me  

a little over a week ago  on my last disso voyage  i tried just laying down  eyes closed  and listening to music with good headphones   

i really want to recommend the ambient artist alio die  horas tibe serenas is a masterpiece album  in the labyrinth garden is my favorite track on that album  he is a wizard  my other favorite album of his is amitabha  

i was listening to in the labyrinth garden on   of    oral  and   of mxipr  one dose  nasal  and it took me through realms  it moved lots of energy around my body  also it seemed to greatly extend the journey and make it feel more like an lsd trip  i was going deep for like   hours  at times i thought that i permanently disassociated myself and i would stay like this forever  also anytime i turned the lights on to go to the bathroom or look at my phone or whatever  my vision was totally like tryptamines  felt like     g of shrooms everything was so sharp and detailed  my mind was also in a more psychedelic headspace than what i’m used to on dissos  i swear the music was just unlocking things  it got so weird at times i thought about turning it off and reeling myself back in but i just kept trusting the music and just trying to relax more and more  the crazy thing really for me was how it seemed to extend the duration  i didn’t sleep last night and i’m telling you it didn’t dissipate so much like i’m used to  i was really dissamasocialamatiated for like   minutes after i took the mxipr but i lingered in this verrrry psychedelic and surreal place in a steady level of vibes for like   solid hours after that  

the funny thing is i only started the music and lying in the dark after what i thought was “the fun part” so i think i missed out on some of the potential  i’m still getting used to dissos  i’m new to it  i need to tell myself to just get in bed with the headphones close your eyes and stay there  i get a little distracted  so for this one i took my mxipr an hour after the   and started watching midnight gospel which was amazing but also very fuzzy and don’t quite remember the experiences  i just remember the epiphany and overall profoundness of it  but when i came to  i decided to retire with my headphones and ease out of things but to my surprise that’s when all this magic happened  

i’m going to wait maybe a month  been doing stuff like this weekly and these doses are relatively high so i feel like my tolerance needs to reset a bit  then do the same thing      of   and then   of mxipr  and just get right into bed with the music on and let it happen lol  

also brian eno is obviously amazing  favorite album is music for installations favorite song is   million paintings  i’ve been through that one on eth lad a couple times that was like casting a stone into the infinite psychedelic abyss  or skipping a stone through the galaxy until the end of time  that’s the visual and emotional feel i kept getting it was weird

text:
so im trying to recover  mainly from rc abuse and  of course  in my dumbass fashion i decided to self medicate with naltrexone  it s an opiate antagonist and helped me kick opiates   times  it s also helped me kick coffee  made it a lot easier  it s still really hard to stay sober but it helps

and of course i m weak willed when it comes to drugs so of course i ve basically tried everything i wanted to avoid while on naltrexone  so here s my experiences 

  opiates      oxycodone no tolerance did absolutely nothing  got really anxious if my breathing is gonna slow down but it didn t  didn t take more  i usually get a nice functional high at     and am nodding at   

  o dsmt made me anxious and stimulated  i usually nod really hard at     

  benzos    basically the same  i take them feel nothing and sleep a lot 

  alcohol    you know that feeling when you get too drunk so you stop feeling good and just impaired  like that but at any doseage  low doses makde me feel slightly impaired while large doses made me feel like i ve drank too much  hated it 

  stimulants      mph and ritalin were pretty much the same as normal  

meth and   fa still made me stimulated but in a really functional way  not the in your face insta orgasm euphoric they usually were  

  mmc felt like coffee  then i took a lot more and felt like i took ritalin  

mdma also felt like i took ritalin 

  psychedelics    i don t have the courage to trip while on naltrexone haha

  dissos    fucking hate them  haven t tried them on naltrexone but i also don t intend to try any again  i m intrigued in   meo pcp s ability to induce mania but imma leave it for the future lol  

  tl dr    naltrexone sucks the fun out of any drug while not really affecting my sober life  makes really not functional stims feel functional  and didn t change the functional ones much  it made it easier to kick drugs as long as i keep taking it  it made me quit oxy overnight  because it literally just stopped working and naltrexone s effects last long so i had to give up 

anyways that s the post 

i kinda regret frying my brain with   mmc and mdma knowing full well i d not get euphoric effects lol

text: some time ago i got a large amount of what was supposed to be lsd blotter  i knew from just one tab that that’s not what it was at all  but the visuals were almost exactly the same and they hit hard  like two tabs of lsd would hit for me but without the mindfuck  anxiety  or stimulation  like  i can even go to sleep on it sometimes  although there are some low key closed eye visuals  it feels more empathogenic than acid  but i wouldn’t compare it to molly or candyflipping  it lines up with everything i’ve read about   b  but i’m aware that a dose of that can’t fit on blotter  or so i’ve read  the visuals are already really strong  and they don’t really get stronger when i take more than one tab  but i’ve taken five tabs of it in the span of a few hours before and what it did was make the trip last   hours  another interesting thing about it is that it gives me an lsd tolerance  so i can’t stack acid onto it  but i can take it at the end of an lsd trip and get like a second wind on it  turning the visuals up to   and everything for another   hours  i’ve confronted the guy who sold me a sheet of it for   and he doesn’t even know wtf it is  help

text:
i heard about this research chemical lab going out of business that was giving out free al lad tabs  so naturally i was like bet  let s go get some  that promotion ended so don t pm me for it   as soon as they came in the mail  i convinced some frat mates to take them with me and we headed to a local sand dune forest  there were   of us  of whom   on   and   on    

about half an hour after popping the tabs i noticed textures were becoming more defined  and grass and trees started to wave more  this effect increased until i saw pink outlines along objects and every component of its texture  the environment was clearly waving  and my depth perception became totally off  smoking joints as we were walking kicked this up another notch  and when i zoned out i could vaguely see things in the environment morph into moving figures  

at the peak of the experience  there was a short time where my entire body felt electric and very warm with a sort of buzzing sensation  and all the visuals were extra crispy  it made the environment extra bizarre  and made the pink outlines pop even more  at this moment i wasn t able to speak very well  

after this  the effects died down for a nice afterglow  all four that were on the tabs had a nice trip  although one of us got a bit overwhelmed on    it also got us all behaving quite strangely and having weird directionless conversations  but in my experience that happens all the time with people on any psychedelic  we got to see another side of those sand dunes  which was very nice  


tl dr    ug of al lad made textures more defined with a pink outline and made the environment wave  also morph into figures sometimes  electric buzzing body sensation at the peak and calm afterglow  would recommend

i’m about to go on a trip and my alp script is only gonna be enough for me  but several friends are going to trip for their first time and or may want to take a benzo at some point either way  so i obtained some clonazolam and just began to test doses yesterday 

from the research i’ve done    clonazolam is roughly equal to       alprazolam  although  when i take   of clonazolam  it does not feel like i took   of  pharma  alprazolam  more like   alp of maybe a tiny bit more

text:
hi all  i ve been taking   of o dsmt every day at precisely   for a month or so  on tuesday i switched from a bag i d bought in december to the new  more granular less fluffy batch  this is profoundly different for me  the older batch made me sleepy and kind of dull at times  but it was long lived and had a pretty traditional opioid feeling  the new batch speeds up my heart rate  has little opioid feels  though maybe they re suppressed by the other effects   its onset is very slow    hours  and its effects are brief  i also have this strange feeling  like my brain chemistry is being altered but not in a desirable way  

i swear  i want to say it fits the profile of regular tramadol  but i haven t had that in   years and really have no idea  something is different  though  i m very disappointed and feel like an idiot for buying as much as i did  even after reading the reddit posts from others who felt things were different  anyway  this topic sort of died down after an initial flurry   does anyone else who hasn t posted yet have a similar experience  for those who really like the new batch  do you have a lot of recent experiences with the older ones and can compare the type of effects  not just whether you like them
