text:
i don t have the time to type out a whole trip report from this trip because my  recent posts go into my     aco det experience which details the physical and mental effects of this psychedelic  along with negative physical side effects  but i do want to talk about an extremely  profound visual experience i had on     aco det  i hear many people talk about their psychedelic trips and how intense the visuals get  and sometimes i get very skeptical that something that complex can be perceived by the mind  but  this trip and other tryptamine experiences have proved me wrong 

 amp    

i lay on my bed with earplugs in my ears  hands covered over eyes to impose complete darkness  auditory hallucinations sound like a consistent pinging  very similar to pellets being eaten in pac man  the visuals on the other hand were out of this world  trpytamine experiences are hard for me to explain    in detail because     am stoned and    words literally cannot describe the intricacy of these visuals   but i was seeing symmetric blocks radiating of red energy  upon inspecting these blocks further  i could see that these blocks were the womb of the mother  and that consciouscness was being created  i could see the joy that the mother had from bringing her baby into the world and the joy of the baby being brought into the world  many times when i trip there s a fine line between what i think i m seeing and what i m actually seeing  but everything that im describing is exactly what i saw  i saw literal consciousness showing forms of emotion and experience  i can t say that i ve experienced anything this profound on a dmt breakthrough  but maybe i haven t taken dmt enough times  anyways these visuals had an extremely nurturing vibe to them  and the colors were very vibrant and almost reminiscent of a video game      would do this again  just did not enjoy the purging

text:
so i had quite an interesting experience with al lad  and i wanted to ask if that s normal for psychedelics  specific to al lad  or just me 

it was my second time taking it  for time i took   tab with     tab of   lsd  had great time

second time     tabs of al lad  staggered though   the trip itself was really quite underwhelming  not much in a way of visuals  although listening to some phish jams was awesome   but i did notice this 

   on al lad alone even when  i think  i was full tripping with eyes closed and everything i was fully aware of what my body was doing  but it was a fairly distant observation
   second is something that bothers me  i think i kind of noticed it the first time as well but didn t pay much attention as my mind wasn t really into that  it felt as if the  take off  to mini trips  or whatever it is when you mind goes woosh for       minutes at a time before coming back to it   and the trips themselves  i had something like involuntary muscle spasms  second time i noticed it a lot in my face muscles   my jaw would twist stideways  my eyes would pull pretty hard inside the skull  that kind of thing  i knew i could always stop it  i e  it wasn t completely outside of my control  but if i stopped that my trip would get interrupted 

thinking about it  i think i had similar situation the first time  when i mixed it with   lsd  but i was way deeper in it 

i always get a headache after a trip  be it mushrooms or anything else  and analyzing it i d say that headache is consistent with all those muscle contortions  especially the eyes  that headache is nothing tylenol  hydration and sleep don t fix though 

so    is this normal at all for psychedelics or should i be worried

text:
bg    male  lots of experiences with benzos  z drugs  slight tolerance  i still feel    of etizolam fine  but it def has less effect than a few years ago  
i bought     pyrazolam pellets from a well known vendor 

pyrazolam peaked my interest as the few reports i found led me to believe the it has way less sedation than most benzos and has good anxiolytic properties 

         took     pyrazolam pellet

    muscles start to relax  sedation is building up  mind at ease  o real benzo  euphoria  i normally get when a benzo kicks in  but i haven t had that since going overboard with flualprazolam a few times 

    nothing special  feels like a low dose of eti  i d say less than   of eti 

    skins feels very soft  added coke to counter the sedation 

    add another   pyrazolam

    doesn t feel like the second   has kicked in

    adding another   pyrazolam

      of pyrazolam in full effect  feels like     of eti  getting harder to walk  coke has no effect anymore  so i put that away  and decide to walk upstairs to smoke a sig  walking up the stairs was a bit harder than normal  after smoking i go to bed  fell asleep to a movie and slept through my first alarm 

woke up at     because of my second alarm  rushed downstairs just in time for standup over zoom 

throughout the morning there was some sedation  brainfog and no anxiety  as the day went on the sedation wore off and my anxiety was back to base level 

overal i would say this is an ok benzo  but i would use this one for sleep as it seems to have a lot sedation

text:
bg    male  lots of experiences with benzos  z drugs  slight tolerance  i still feel    of etizolam fine  but it def has less effect than a few years ago  

i bought     pagoclone pellets from a well known vendor  

i bought pagoclone because i had some good trips on zolpidem  ambien  and zaleplon  so i thought this would be fun as well  and if not i would have at least something the help me sleep after a stim binge 

a few days before this trip i had already taken   of pagoclone in the span of   hours  this had no effect  did not even help me fall asleep  

         i take   x   pagoclone pellets 

    text on my phone screen seems to look a bit sharper  colors a bit warmer 

    i take   more  and go downstairs to eat some food  i the corridor i notice slight tracer cause by the screen of my watch moving in the dark  nothing crazy though 

    no effects  i feel relaxed  but that more because it s friday and watching some youtube  since i feel nothing from the pagoclone i count the pills i have left and take them all     

    still no effect  kid cudi   hyyerr comes on in the shuffle  so i put it on repeat and decide to smoke some weed  maybe that will boost the little effect i have from the pagoclone  text still looks a little sharper than usual and colors a bit brighter  but only on my phone  when looking around the room everything looks like usual 

    the weed has me high af    passed that felt like hours 

a few hours of a good weed high pass 

          i start getting nauseous  so i lay on my side  because that seems to help and fell asleep 

woke up at   feeling very thirsty  drank some water and fell asleep again 

now it s    i still have minor pain in my stomach  but was able to eat some breakfast 

in short  pagoclone seems to have no noticeable effect on me  too bad  because i was hoping to have some trips on it similar to those i had on zolpidem 

everyones body is different  so don t go above   when testing this the first time

text:
hi all 

so every month or so i like to taken a break from the xanax  i’ll usually just switch the diclaz and taper down to a decent dose  then take a     week break before jumping back on the xan  

anyway  this time around things got a little too hectic and i got a few too many xans in me after a tolerance break and just went hard with it for a few weeks and just totally fucked my tolerance and left myself in some shitty wds if i don’t keep taking the xans  tonight i took like   bars  over the course of like   hours  and i barely felt intoxicated 

sadly this is a position where tapering now is more important than ever since i’ve never been this addicted  but my ducking vendor has been out of diclaz solutions for weeks now  i can get powder  and have no problem doing it  but i just need to make sure i do it right because if i fuck it up then not only at i still stuck in shitty xan wd with no way out  and now i’m out a bunch money lol 

so it simple as this 

   acquire microgram scale  container for hot water bath  concentrated cylinder  pg  erie meter flask  and obviously powdered diclazepam

   heat water bath

   crush diclaz powder crystals as finely as possible  and weight desired dose  

   measure desired amount of pg in graduated cylinder  heat in water bath 

   toss in diclaz in creamers  or all at once  

   stir the shit out of it til in the flask til it’s allo dissolved 

   not die from a gran mal seizure 

is it this simple guys

text:
ok so last night i took   ho pcp

i ve had deep holes before  but this one was different

from the moment i put on the music i start to meditate

after a few minutes of meditation and already well dissociated i start the hole

my beginnings of holes are generally vague  for ten minutes i crossed the first level 

at this stage  i meet god  i do not see him and i do not hear him yet i know he is there  i communicate telepathically with him and he is willing to open the windows of perseption for me because my mind is hardened 

my ego escapes and begins to dilute in the universe 

i am now in the outer space  this place is infinitely large and the human spirit is not able to go there on its own 

the first step of the journey is improving my brain  obviously drugs and meditation allow me to come to this stage  but the rest depends on your will and your intelligence  i think these two concepts are represented by vibrations  in the outer space 

note  i m trying to be as clear as possible  it s hard and he has way too much to say about this place  and more things i can t relate 

improving the brain is not a pleasant thing  you must be able to overcome the pain  psychic and physical to pass this stage

my mind is being manipulated and stretched all over the place  in order to be brought into liquid form  it s unpleasant

then my brain is multiplied by entities  i now see   brains  of myself  right in front of me  they are arranged in   columns of    i am in a room whose size i cannot determine  i may be in an airlock i think  metallic and liquid 

at the time  i didn t know what was going on  i knew it was what i perceived as god that allowed me to come here and god trusted me 

from there  the journey into the outer space begins  in fact  cast became like omnipotent  i could go wherever i wanted but it unfolds like a story and not like a free world 

i am going to the top of everest  i want to be a mountaineer in real life   my mind watched over my body  i could fill the world by being on this mountain 

then i went to mars 

mars is far away  my body has traveled a lot 
you feel like you are in an infinite roller coaster  much faster than reality and much tought  then after this trip you landed on mars  you see the red sand and you don t have to use your senses to understand 
in reality  i no longer made sense  my ego no longer existed  sometimes when i travel in infinite space  i felt someone who looked like me  who was me 

the more you advance the harder it is  your mind is much more powerful and there is only your will 

big entities control everything  i see them and i hear them  they look like galaxies  they are the ones who dictate time and space  they are the ones who dictate how it goes  i think that s what we call fate  sometimes fate takes me to black holes and i see space change  he twists on himself very quickly 

i have undoubtedly passed through the valley of death  maybe that was throwing dead  it was neither cold nor hot but you had to have a strong mind to get by  the waves were heavy  this place was ultimately not scary and i walked out 

at times i saw men  looking like monkeys  they lived in wooden towers built near a cliff  i stayed with them but i think they didn t know it 

i have seen big machines produced by the imagination of a stranger  everything was accessible  the only condition is that you had to want to be there 

i also thought about religion  i am not religious   i listened to songs from unknown languages ​​and implicitly understood what they were saying  it was arabic  i listened to these words for a long time  they were pure 

i believe in everything  the more i take a step back and the more experience i gain  the more i believe in it  i hope that after death i will be in the outer space  in the meantime  i know where i should go 

i hope you will also have this kind of experience  the only thing i can tell you is that you have to believe in yourself and that nothing matters  absolutely nothing has any contribution except the will

text:
i regularly take a single dose of   fma or methiopropamine to power through work  i sit at my desk and go for   hours solid  drinking a normal amount  i think  not measured at all   i don t urinate much during  but afterwards i feel that i urinate more frequently 

it becomes infuriating if the end of the effects coincides with going to bed  where i sometimes need to urinate     times more before i can fall asleep  

my theory is that the raised blood pressure from stimulants pushes fluids into tissues  edema  and as the stimulants wear off  this fluid is returned to the blood  causing mild hypotonia  driving urination  

when lying down  reversal of edema in the legs and feet will have a particularly pronounced impact on electrolyte concentrations in the blood  

to investigate this further  i will try taking some propranolol with the stimulant next time  to see if it helps  

please can someone implant me with a sensor that monitors my blood electrolyte concentration   other bodily hydration marker  have it on my desk by monday  thanks

text:
aside from this sub  every forum sees that they have significant flaws 

their duration is short and it fades out quite fast  leaving you wanting more

promoting fiendish low doses is something that dissos are known for  but it should be avoided

holing is near to impossible as it does not have that  u know it  moment

my opinion 

the initial rush from the first dose is nice  but the redoses are weird  especially weird because if you do not redose you really feel that you are back to baseline but the redose still seems to work with whatever is left in your body and receptors  considering that mxe did not even have this behaviour because it instantly put you in afterglow  but that was special for mxe 

all in all  the true potential to dissoverse still is aligned to opce  dck and fdick

so i m a disso lover with lots of experience with most and i ve also had my fair share of      
i ve had opce and   separately many many times but only now have tried them together and i must say  the serotonin high of the   is hugely amplified when consumed with even just a small dose of opce 

a   bump of opce  which for me is threshold due to high tolerance  is enough to greatly enhance the effects of   

i know this is definitely the opce because yesterday i binged hard on    insufflating a gram or so overall  without opce or any dissos  with mediocre effects for the first half of the session  the built up effects compounded to eventually be decent for the   half   

at the tail end of the binge i had   opce to help me get out of the endless redosing of    after about   hours i caved in and ripped another line of    no different in amount  i m sorry i can t give amounts as just eyeballed but i would say i was doing around   insufflated every hour    but my god  i actually had a huge serotonin rush finally which i didn t get at all before 

i didn t think opce touched serotonin at all but i guess it does  or modulates in some way  can anyone with more knowledge confirm this  

you would think the   day of a binge the tolerance would prevent feeling anything from the   but it was the exact opposite with this one opce dose  i literally needed about      of what i had previously for same effects 

i m not sure if the dopamine aspect is enhanced  hard to tell 

for the record    of opce does almost nothing to me  it would be my threshold dose  on it s own so i know it s definitely not that and would have barely contributed 

curious if anyone else has tried this  

if anyone can explain the science reason for this i would be so grateful as i will most definitely be continuing to research this combo from heaven  

doing small amounts of each made for a very functional productive time while feeling amazing 

oh i must add there was some flunitrazolam and kratom consumed during the entire binge as i m slightly addicted so those doses were to just keep any withdrawals away  nothing too high  i thought perhaps these added to this enhanced feeling but i tested with and without afterwards and i can confidently claim opce as the enhancer 

thanks in advance for any input and much love xo

text:
i m sitting here enjoying my life by a fire i just made listening to um   on     mcg of al lad and   dck and i was wondering to myself how many of you guys like to stick to low doses of these rcs while going about your life   i have kids  that luckily are at their grandparents house right now and tonight i didnt want to trip my dick off but i wanted to sit by a fire and ponder life with my dog  al lad   and dck   

i used to like big doses of psychedelics like lsd and mushrooms and their lovely analogues but i ve outgrown that chapter of my life at this point   i still have a shit load of   subs and some dck that i like to take     of every once in a while   it s a blast to take mini doses of stuff and watch podcasts or nat geo documentaries and not stay up all night questioning my existence   

i see all you crazy guys taking massive doses of these rcs and i kind of miss it but at the same time i don t feel like that will do much for me anymore   i get way more out of low doses than high doses these days   

anyways i love this scene and this sub and i just wanted to say thank you to all you guys that have answered my silly questions here   i just wanted to see how many of you guys are like me at this point in life and are still interested in rcs but also have a lot of other stuff going on in life at the same time

text:
so i have used   fma since    my use previously peaked in summer   when i would use     a month  binging for     days  this lasted from maybe june to december and i had no issues after stopping  i was getting a     day washout period each month   i lost a little weight  less than you would expect  i was lethargic  right after stopping i would sleep mostly for a day or two then have a week of lethargy and naps  then back to normal  

well  after a year or more without really using it  i went  back on it for finals  from march to june i used every day  i did maybe    after exams i tried to quit  cockily thinking it would be like before  nope 

before i even quit i was in a battle for wakefulness  i would wake feeling like a sack of bricks was on top of me and had to dose immediately to keep from sleeping all day  stopping  after that day or two of virtual permasleep i would be out for a good   hours a day with additional naps for a week or two 

i kept relapsing  it was just too hard having no energy  i could not function  for my first two tries i had not only the lethargy but also an intense craving for more  this lessened with each attempt  so since june i have been buying in   batches  ever the optimist  so i could function when i had to and detox when i could  i ended up in a binge detox binge cycle  but i made progress each time  i started buying   mph as well  a gram of that  which i would dose on my sleep days to stay awake while still detoxing from   fma  it works mostly provided you accept there will be some withdrawal at the end and you have to keep your duration of use short   

i am now at a point where i think i will be okay   my most recent purchase was actually for a different reason than my usual  i want to feel like i can do things  or  i want to enjoy doing things or be high or whatever and buzz   it was to help me get out of a jam with a worse drug  i stupidly started using jwh     so i think after i m off the noid i will finally be able to quit this  

the timing sucks because i just graduated and need to get a job while the getting is good but i m a mess and need to sort that first  i m even on the waiting list for a detox unit  

anyway  onto the health side  i have gained weight  because i am on olanzapine and i spent a good month this summer eating a pint of chocolate fudge brownie ice cream every night  maybe not a month but a couple weeks  olanzapine gives mad sugar cravings  my diet has been total rubbish  

i have aged by a few years  i didn t really have wrinkles before  but now i do  i get grey hairs in beard and head  nose and ear hair became an issue this year but that s probably just my age  

i did notice that   fma makes my eyesight worse  it is bad to begin with but i can usually read without magnification if my phone font is large  on   fma a magnifying glass and torch are permanent fixtures in my pockets to help me see  my hygeinist says i have been grinding my teeth  big surprise  

of greatest concern are the changes to my skin and immune system  i had bed bugs so it became a habit for me to check my skin for new bites  in doing so i discovered i had a tinea infection on my groin  and later discovered athlete s foot  i got folliculitis of the beard and my beard hair is thinning and getting patchy  skin on other parts of my body has become rough and scaly  idk if this is ringworm or not  my gp is only doing phone consultations so asking him to take a look and tell me wtf is up is not an option  on my face  aside from the beard loss  i have developed miliae under my eyes  and my cheeks have taken on this rough  lumpy texture 

visual impairment and immune suppression are both known side effects of amphetamines 

i have started juicing most days and try to get a good night s sleep every day  i m taking various supplements as well and looking after myself better in general  fingers crossed i will be free of this noid bs in less than   days and can do my final   fma detox  

i m glad i may come out of this in a state i can recover from  i was really scared after that cardiac anecdote  

 amp    

that said  there is no way to know if i have not sealed my fate and fucked myself up in a way that takes years off my life  something could emerge in years to come  not to mention the unknown level of brain damage  

as to whether it worked   yes and no  yes  i went on it as a last ditch effort to sit my exams rather than walk away from the degree because i had no  motivation and my memory and concentration had gone so bad that i couldn t focus more than a couple minutes in a lecture and even after spending a week doing all the recommended reading for one of my  modules i felt i couldn t write an essay  so yes  without it i would probably not have gotten my degree  however  i am prone to dug abuse and at the doses i was taking     day it actually impairs your cognitive abilities like memory  but you can stay perfectly focused on a task for hours on end  

i would advise caution  there is no way to know what long term effects could be  go and read a list ofg the health complications from abuse of amphetamine and meth and you can be confident that a lot of that stuff will probably happen to some people who abuse this  even if we had   reports of people doing like me and not getting more than some immune suppression and premature aging  that is still a tiny sample size and does not tell you that you will not get a horrible affliction from abusing this  go have a look at the percentages for serious side effects that are considered unacceptable for pharma drugs  probably it will fail if more than   person in   dies from taking it  probably its a lot more stringent than that  considering that most pharma candidates fail  most of these drugs will probably mess you up bad w ong term or heavy use

text:
so i got a free gram with a benzo order i made  kinda funny right  because it’s basically the opposite  i haven’t able to read many reviews or dosages besides one or two  

so for those who have no idea what i’m talking about  i’m sure a few of you do  just never tried it or disliked it  it’s a synthetic stimulant in the cathinone class  

besides rc benzos i haven’t willingly or knowingly taken any other type of rc’s before 

fair warning  i absolutely love stimulants  good coke is   good  and when i have adderall i blow through it way too quickly  so i’m quite fiendish with stims 

anyyyyways  my pack arrives today  volumetrically dose my etiz solution   ml  and then i’m left staring at this tiny bag of finely crushed crystals  quite like mdma  so i read   is a good starting dose  i took insufflated   and went on with my day  felt good energy  nice mood boost  very clean feeling  

so i just got laid off of work the other day  not much to do  so i said hey  let’s do a quick   line   this is about   or   hours after the initial tester  wow  it was perfect  amazing energy and focus  no jitters or anxiety  thanks benzy  just all around feeling amazing  just the initial rush wears off in like   minutes  but lasts much longer  not sure of duration yet 

so  being the fiend i am  throughout the next   hours i kept taking lines which probably equated to   mg  was definitely chasing the dragon at that point  

anyways if i was in a social setting this drug would be awesome  i’ve heard some people compare it to mdma  nothing like that except the crystalline consistency when not ground up  i felt a bit more empathy and wanted to talk to people   even on the phone or text or whatever  but i resisted  even though i’m not barred out i’ve consumed quite a bit of etiz and the convo is no bueno trying to chat 

i’ve heard there’s a pretty bad hangover that comes with it so i’ll find out in about   hours  you can clearly tell i’m still feeling effects due to the novel i wrote about eutylone  i’d recommend it to those that like stims  not sure if it’s toxic in anyway  not a drug i should take everyday but it’s going to be tempting to not finishing this tiny bag they graciously sent me 

tldr  awesome experience with eutylone  if you’re not interested in the drug  don’t read it  

any other experiences or thoughts on it

text: i tripped on   meo malt about   hours ago  and this is what i took away from the experience  i vaped about   mgs of   meo malt freebase out of a yocan evolve plus  the vapor had a weird smell but was overall pretty mild  i took the hit at around      and the effects were almost instant  i went from slight visual distortions to ego obliteration in less than a minute  it was mostly non visual  but it took me deeper than any other psychedelic i ve done  as for the sorts of things i was thinking about during the trip  i remember thinking about how math is the most universal thing that we know of  i e        everywhere no matter what  i also remember thinking about the concept of superintelligence and the concept of a technological singularity  and how a superintelligent entity would basically be a god  i remember feeling a sensation i can best describe as  oneness with god   i also thought about how dangerous such an entity could be  and how there truly are  fates far worse than death  https   s risks org   that could happen on a massive scale  i remember coming down at around     am  with my ego returning and there still being slight visual distortions  there is a definite afterglow to it  and my mood still seems slightly elevated  i still have very slight visual distortions as i write this

text:
hey all 

 amp    

first of all  thank you to everyone who has supported me in my new recovery   i just got out of detox  have been sober  and will mostly stay away from reddit  but i thought i d return quickly to pay my dues and post this report  which i ve meant to do for a while   obviously there s a lot of information out there on these chems  but i ve had a bit of a different experience  so this report may help some 

 amp    

my experience with stims for studying  this is mostly confined to ritalin and adderall  both of which gave me extremely bad anxiety and other negative side effects such as nervous tics  reduced ability to socialize   and an unpleasant zombie like affect   the pharmaceuticals that have helped me the most are venlafaxine  effexor  and bupropion  wellbutrin   which only assist adhd studying to a minor degree  as those are not the primary use of the drugs     methamphetamine simply does not work for me  i get too distracted and can t think clearly enough 

 amp    

my experience with   mph and ipph   i used these two chems daily  separately and complementarily  for about a two to three week period  after which i took a few week break  and began their use again for the last two to three weeks of the semester   i began my   ho pcp use the last week of the semester  stupid  right    which ended my phenidate use   i began my experiments with doses of    insufflated  first with   mph for a few days  then ipph for a few days  to test the waters   i found that my best use of these chems was to combine     of   mph with a few mg of ipph as a booster   most reports that i ve read comparing the two state that   mph is the stronger of the two  however  my experience was different   i do find   mph to be better for studying  however  i never felt  high  on it   the experience was so subtle and smooth  with so few side effects  which i ll discuss below   that to me it was more of a nootropic than a drug   the only thing i noticed was massive improvements in my focus  accuracy of cognition  and working memory    ipph  on the other hand  did produce a decent amount of euphoria  and had some side effects  which i feel may be the very reason i noticed the  high    the symptoms sort of alerted me to it   therefore  i found that a small addition of ipph gave me a bit of a boost of motivation to complement the superior nootropic affects of   mph 

 amp    

side effects and other info  

 amp    

  mph   again  this stuff is amazingly smooth  and produced few unwanted side effects   the only truly noticeable one was that if i took it immediately after waking  before i ate  i would randomly puke  but strangely with no nausea to alert me  which was a boon  yet also inconvenient such that i had very little time to run to the bathroom   also  if i took either of these chems within four or so hours of bed  they would sometimes  but not always  disrupt sleep   even when they did  i usually didn t feel any worse for wear the next day  especially after i dosed  

i accidently iv ed   mph once  because i confused it with my   ho pcp bag   interestingly  i noticed no noticeable difference in affects   i initially thought i screwed something up with my shot  but then i was able to pick up the subtle   feeling   even the come up time was about the same 

 amp    

ipph   again  i feel that this was the more euphoric chem   it also produced unpleasant side effects such as jaw grinding  anxiety  stomach cramps  and so on  none of which   produced  

 amp    

neither chem disrupted eating  and in fact  they improved my ability to eat  because i usually don t have an appetite anyway  and i actually remembered to eat while on them   another issue with them was re dosing   my one or two   mixes quickly moved up to two or three  and   mixes turned into     mixes   that was partially due to tolerance  my addictive tendencies  increased pressure as the semester came to a close  and comfortability with the chems 

 amp    

to conclude  these chems  particularly   mph  are absolutely amazing for studying   i found them far superior to ritalin and adderall   i highly recommend them for anyone who can t get a prescription or find the side effects of their prescription to be irksome   happy studies

text:
i’ve got experience with   mmc  eutylone  and now nep  only with oral snorted    mmc was way too serotonergic and short for my liking and had a substantial hangover  eutylone is not great but decent for the money  but nep was fantastic 



my experience with nep was with no tolerance    oral and a   snorted   minutes later  i remember regretting how much i had because i felt extremely high and knew i was gonna crash hard  though that wasn’t the case   felt like a mix of cocaine and molly  besides pissing every half hour with all the water i was drinking  the effects were amazing  lasted     hours before i drank a few shots and passed out  woke up with maybe   hours of sleep but i wasn’t uncomfortable  in fact i actually felt pretty good  no hangover  even after taking more than i wanted  i was very surprised that i didn’t have a hangover as bad as with coke  truly a fantastic substance 



anyways back to the question  nep was fantastic  i did not feel any urge to do more the next day or the following  and i am gonna treat this like other empathogens   only once in a while  planned out in advance  no more than one redose  lots of water  etc 

i’m gonna lose my favorite source in a few months so i would like to try to get some other cathinones while i still can  i’ve heard of horror stories with vaping caths like a php etc  but i realize now that they aren’t much different than nep with the gentle roas  oral snorted  

is nep a one of kind cath  i would be interested in exploring some of the other “extreme” caths as i never plan to use them with the extreme roas  vaping needle  

what do you guys think  should i stick with nep or would a few other cathinones be worth researching with the gentle roas  ideally i would like something not too addictive or toxic and with a comparable hangover to nep 

tldr  any rcs comparable to nep with the gentle roas  i will never vape or inject them

text:
covid   has been absolute hell on my work schedule  working in excess of   hours a week beat me down and i was looking for an easily attainable functional stim to keep me lucid  productive  i found cyclazodone and got verified to purchase  ordered the chem and supplies  and worked my way up to what i ve found to the most efficient dose    once in the mornings with magnesium citrate and   nac  

magnesium because stims are better with magnesium as we all know  nac because the liver scare  for reference here  i have an almost virgin liver  drink maybe twice a year  only even smoked pot a handful of times  never abuse any substances  hell  barely ever taken anything at all really  

however there is an incredible amount of unverified hepatotoxic hearsay and unbacked warnings because it s chemical grandfather is pemoline  pemoline caused   cases of liver failure in the   years it was available in the us and canada  with over   children and adults being prescribed  however i can t find a single verified report of serious illness related to cyc  the best i ve found is  one old claim  https   www reddit com r nootropics comments   comment    from a  redditor  https   www reddit com user hawkeyefile  who refused to verify the claim in any meaningful way  

overall it s been great for me    feels similar to a   adderall xr  it tends to last around     hours  depending on how much i eat and how empty my stomach is when i take it  i m taking it orally in vegetarian capsules  its very clean  not too manic or jittery  and come down is pretty easy  less crash than adderall for sure  which side effects have i experienced  yes  all the side effects you d expect from a stim  

side effects as follows  dry mouth  increased thirst  increased chance to muscle cramp  increased heart rate  up to   resting for short periods of time  increased heart rate during strenuous activities   mild appetite suppression  less than adderall  

beside being an effective stim  it also seems to have viable mood enhancing qualities  generally i ve felt happier on it  less easily irritated  all around uplifted  

the only caveat here comes back to the pesky relationship to pemoline and it s very skeptical risk of liver issues  frankly  liver failure is worrying in any circumstances  i m an amateur bodybuilder  no gear or prohormones  and i started my pre spring lean a few week prior to starting cyc  so is the almost unnoticeable pang in my upper right abdomen hunger pangs from a deficit  is it soreness from my workouts  am i just paranoid  are they early signs of liver damage  unfortunately the liver is a fickle organ and you usually never know until it s too late  obviously a liver panel would be the best way to know  

overall  i d recommend it if you re cautious or willing to take a risk  certainly it s fine for occasional use

text:
hello  my labrats have been researching   mph hydrochloride and this is what they ve found so far 

  useless in smaller doses      mg  and very nasty in higher doses      mg  when smoked off foil oil pipe combined with insufflation  produced     hour lasting states of varying degrees of paranoia  toxic psychosis  panic attacks and general restlessness and uneasiness 
  weirdly slow and long onsets even when smoked or insufflated  up to     mins   and up to     or   hours when administered orally
  very potent even in small doses orally  working nicely for     hours   oral is definitely the way to use this thing  a knife tip before breakfast and one more after lunch can easily make your test subjects get through a workday with little to no tweaking  compulsiveness or other unwanted external side effects
  in higher doses we ve noticed speech and expression impediments like stuttering and the typical meth like state of thoughts racing forward too fast leaving the tongue behind to fail  creating awkward social situation
  this substance really seems to be quite potent and your rats can get  too much  very easily  especially due to the slow and long onset times and the inviting slightly euphoric vibes while on smaller doses  so we advice taking with great care
  there seemed to be only mild appetite suppression and insomnia when administered in the right doses   smaller to medium 
  positive  non aggressive  chilled out buzz
  with just some effort your subjects are able to focus on brain work quite alright

overall promising results   future grant already approved

text:
i have never found this class to be recreational but i do recognize their utility  recently i tried bromazolam for the first time  before that my only experience was prescription valium and street xanax  who knows what it actually was   

i took     mg to start and waited   minutes  i don t trust any subjective feeling of sobriety with benzos but i did not percieve any effect  i was mainly ensuring the chemical was not overly potent  caustic  or a personal allergen  

i then took an additional     mg bringing the total to     mg  this should be enough to elicit some effect so i was more patient this time and waited an hour  after an hour i noticed my coordinating was slightly hampered but my working memory was not affected as far as i could tell  according to my coworker  my speech was still coherent  organized  and not slurred  i tend to get mush mouth easily with this class   

i felt no euphoria  warmth  or glow as i do with valium  although valium doesn t even come close to the warmth  glow of opiates   i took another     mg dose and hung out for an hour  total on board is       

at this point i feel a bit more impaired but not incapable of interacting with other people  i don t quite feel  high   still  i felt better than my baseline since i was feeling different at all  i went for a walk  purchased some food and had no issues on this short    journey  the cold air felt stimulating on my face and i simply felt content existing 

i typically have trouble sleeping so i tried to fall asleep when returning home but i still felt restless  i took another     mg bringing the total up to     mg  after an hour i still couldn t quite sleep but a small amount of benadryl and melatonin got me there  i woke up   hours later before my alarm but still feel a bit groggy  my memories from the entire experience don t seem to be too hazy  although i imagine with continued use you could  fatigue  you hippocampus  

overall i d say the experience wasn t exceptionally entertaining  i can see this being useful in small amounts for plane rides  if you accidentally drank too much coffee  or if you re feeling particularly hyper and want to mellow out a bit

he was on   meo pcp  smoked weed and became overwhelmed  he started rambling about feeling guilty and told me some fucked up stuff  even by my standards  i was very stoned so i m not sure if in my mind i exaggerated what he said 

the stuff he said was fucked up an i hope it was the pcp analouge talking but it sounded true

i ve belived on lsd that i m a ghost before so i understand that drugs especially at high doses can make you belive untrue things but i m convinced that he wasnt lying 

i was under the pretence that he kept himself to himself but i guess that hes not who i thought he was 

i wonder if being stoned and him also being high that i failed to realise that he was just making it up due to being in the midst of psychosis  he did take a high dose

text:
obligatory “not my first language”  

so guys  this is my very first research chemical experience report  i just need to put this somewhere because what i experienced is so amazing that i can’t keep it to myself  

no tolerance
dose    mg 
onset  ca    min
peak  ca   
complete duration   after effects    hours

it was an ordinary friday in january  just as i was finished with all of my tasks and boring zoom meetings  i decided to get some introspective in my current mindset and mental wellbeing because of a recent breakup  i wanted to roll with    because my family was around  so i didn’t want to be tripping for long    and i don’t know if this is a common effect  i get very emotional during a   trip  i cry  every single time  so  i had decided to get a good dose down my hatch and do some chores  after that  i planned to go on a short walk and come back with the effects kicking in  well  these tasks took longer than i thought  and i found myself being really zoned out in the beginning of my walk already  

it was semi cold outside  with quite some snowflakes pouring down from the sky  illuminated by the warm light of the ancient street lamps we’ve got here  i stared at them for a good while before continuing  not too far from where i was  there was a very neat  unique spot at a railway track  somebody put an old garden chair to sit on there  near a river flowing underneath the railway bridge  i decided to head to this very spot  already walking like a kid who just poured down his first whisky shot  suddenly  past memories struck me like a lighting strike  i was resting on a pole because i was overwhelmed with emotions  it literally felt like i was cuddling with my ex partner when i closed my eyes  when i finally got my ass rested in the chair  i had the most vivid dream like memories of my past relationship  while listening to frank ocean  needless to say  i cried like a baby while being unable to feel my gum because of the k in my system  

the most amazing part were the scenes from the future  though  it was like i finally saw my life goal right in front of me as a materialization that was definitely coming true  if i keep fighting for it  i saw my future wife  where i will live  kids  the job that will have me fulfilled  it was like this chemical just showed me the point of my existence  my ultimate life goal  that was hidden in my subconsciousness  i pictured myself sitting at a campfire  with many friends  my wife and kids  on a warm summer evening  there was no war  no pandemic  we lived a symbiotic life with our planet  literal heaven on earth  and i contributed towards that state  it was so overwhelming that i either kept staring into the void with a gaping mouth or completely closed my eyes and sunk into the chair  silently sobbing under a bridge  in the middle of winter  at night   i must have looked like a heroin addict od’ing under a bridge  

when i finally came to my senses  i got up and walked to the nearest train station  the heavy mind trip   imaginative phase was basically over  but i kept stumbling and feeling very  very dissociated from my own body  i did a small walk over the parking lot  smiling like an idiot who just discovered his reason to live  the street lamps created a very nice pattern on the pavement and i walked on it feeling some kind of wavy energy coming through me  on the way back home  i felt very relieved  as always after a   experience for me  and content with myself  the positive after effects lasted for hours  

this substance pretty much showed me the materialization of my dreams coming true  something i hadn’t figured out for years  think about it  do you really know where you belong  what will make you happy  what is realistic for your future and personal wellbeing  i didn’t  now  i have something to keep fighting for  this experience told me one mundane thing  that is often overlooked  to get to good times  you have to go through the dirt first  i was seeing my past relationship and this shitty ass virus as some sort of necessary negative  in order for me to keep growing and continuing on my path  until i reach that campfire  until we  the human race  reach that campfire  that shit gave me hope  

in conclusion     at least for me  is a very introspective  anxiolytic and anti depressive substance that needs further research  i dont want to glorify this drug  and i will not take it again for the next months because i’m cautious about its potential bladder damaging properties and addiction potential  but i also know im prob talking to experienced users here so you already know the drawbacks   i dont have any disso experience apart from   and have taken significantly less drugs than a good portion of the active users on this forum  still all i can say is that it helped me  at least in the short term  even if everything was just a shallow illusion  it helped me to deal with the present stress much easier than i normally do  

what an experience  

luckily  there were no people around to witness my crackhead behavior apart from a few cars and my loving family  oh well

text:
recently i’ve been seeing a decent amount of comments and posts that advise things like “stay away from  x substance  ” “never ever try  other substance  ” and notably one that said “for the sake of harm reduction  never use this chemical ”

none of these are harm reduction  

people will continue to use drugs regardless of others telling them not to  that is why effective harm reduction  needs  to include information or advice on how to use a substance  safely   

now  that doesn’t mean you can’t offer a warning  share your experience  and say you would never touch the drug again with a ten foot pole  but those things alone are not harm reduction  these are effectively the equivalent of backwards sex ed programs that preach abstinence only or programs like d a r e  i’m sure nearly everyone subscribed to this subreddit realizes this  but for some reason it has been lost in practice
filtered: recently i've seeing decent comments posts advise things like “stay away x substance ” “never try substance ” notably said “for sake harm reduction use chemical ” harm reduction people continue use drugs regardless telling effective harm reduction needs include information advice use substance safely doesn't mean can't offer warning share experience touch drug foot pole things harm reduction effectively equivalent backwards sex ed programs preach abstinence programs like d r e i'm sure nearly subscribed subreddit realizes reason lost practic

text:
do not recreate these events  if you have questions please reach out 

age  

conditions

physical  

lordosis  fibromyalgia  eds  severe sinusitis 

most of my issues that cause my crippling pain is a mystery  fibromyalgia is just a catch all term for unknown pain 

 amp    

microdosing lsd caused my body to realign itself physically and mentally 

i have only tried it a few times at age   and realized its healing effects on depression  alot of pain and agony went on in the years until i turned   

one day before i turned   i just woke up and said its time to do what i should have done a decade ago  i got myself a strip  and i began my journey 

just know my headspace at this time was  lets rewire my mind on lsd 

i suffer from having zero curvature in the neck  called lordosis  this lordosis has plagued me since a child  building up since age    so its taken years to get all my conditions on paper to find out what is wrong with me  in those years i had severe sinusitis and issues with my whole ent  

i came up with a theory that explains my condition 

the lordosis is caused by my   that has put so much pressure on my spinal cord  i believe it has cause a backing up of cerebral spinal fluid  take note that my mother suffers for chiari malformation  a condition that also builds of csf  

the sinusitis has been horrible since i was a toddler  there is damage to the inside of the whole ent system  i have not  suffered from this condition for years but suffer from the long term effects it has had on me  it causes severe pain and pressure build up around my entire neck and face 

at the end of my microdosing experience i layed there on the floor  waking up from my last dosage 

i lifted my neck up and pop  the pop in my neck i have waited   years for finally happened  it was more of a crunch like cereal tho  i was concerned but felt no pain  like at all  i felt my balance was better when i tried to get up off the floor  im a big guy   and i had that overwhelming need to yawn  but this wasn t any yawn  this was the longest yawn i have ever had  i could nt stop  as i yawned i felt popping and crushing in my skull  i was not afraid  i had hoped this journey did this exact thing 

my ears popped like i was in an airplane  the pressure is gone  

my neck pain has completely gone away at this point aswell 

there is much more to the story like its effects on my mental conditions  so i guess this is part   

i will only make part   if this post is even remotely interesting to viewers 

 amp    

  aidemamok

text:
tldr  nice analogue of al lad  very visual and relaxed  awesome lysergamide 

well i must say i was pleased with last night s little jaunt to the psychedelic dimension 

now i must mention its been about   years since i dabbled with al lad so my memory of it may be blurry 

lastnight
took   total          tab  of   al lad  noticed very subtle onset after about   mins  no anxiety  uplifted mood visual twitches   etc 

at about   hr   into it colours were enhanced and tracers were seen on movement which lasted the full night there after  very visual all in all 

not much of a body load to mention and a happy head space all around 

midnight came so i went outside to watch the fireworks  wow i was blown away  my entire field of vision was awash with flashes and colours  the purple and green fireworks seemed to glow unnaturally and seemed to stay in my vision long after they had actually faded  i was nearly brought to tears with the beauty 

went to bed at about    was still tripping hard  in the darkness  neon fractals flashed and any light source creeping in was dancing and morphing organically  still had a lot of energy at   so nipped out for a joint  this enhanced the visuals immensely 

i layed watching the visuals for a good hour longer before i started drifting to sleep at about    slept on and off until about    still feeling under the influence but not in orbit any more 

i experienced all this with family around who were not aware i was flying alladins carpet  at no point did i feel uncomfortable or out of control  very social chemical  i would say its almost identical to my memory of the origional al lad  only it seemed to last longer than i remember  before it seemed to be in the   hour range while last night was definitely     area  its now     and i have a lovely afterglow 

very impressed and happy with   al lad  just as fun as i remember and as visual  didnt have the body load or feel like it had the potential to turn the trip the wrong way  like lsd does sometimes  felt in control all night

a few weeks ago i combined small doses of   dck and mxipr expecting some pleasant synergy but instead it was a rather heavy body load that lacked the relaxing dissociation that each compound had on its own  after the rough comeup it was actually okay  with pleasant  detached introspective thinking but still unexpected  

i woke up this morning after doing maybe   nitrous cartridges the night before feeling hungover and took   of   meo pce and   cartridge to see what the combo would feel like  while the nitrous did hit harder it really intensified my headache and hungover feeling for some reason  might take a break and try diffrent combinations but was wondering if anyone else experienced this

text:
ho mipt  miprocin 

i weighed out   of the substance and put it in a shot glass with some water  i was a little nervous before consumption but i proceeded to meditate and focus on breathing  it tasted bitter and so i drank some more water and was excited to see what would ensue 

after   minutes i felt a familiar head tingling reminiscent of the stoney feeling that psilocybin produces and it started coming on fast  as i looked at my tapestry it was starting to wobble and spin faster and faster 

at the   min mark it was extremely intense i felt the shift in gravity and my vision was bursting with rainbow fractal overlays  as i approached the hour mark i could no longer see my reality as the colors were flashing super rapidly with so many purple green and orange images i decided to turn my lights off and meditate in the pitch darkness while listening to pink floyds wish you were here album 

here is where the real trip begins  as i turned my lights of everything became clear and crisp i saw torus pillars surrounding my room and it didn t matter if my eyes were open or shut focusing on my breath i took deep inhales and watched miprocin show me what it has to offer  
the visuals were reminiscent of high dose shrooms with a more electric and mechanical characteristic it felt like a blend of lsd cevs with the depth of psilocybin my body was filled with euphoria  it felt like it was tickling the back of my brain  it felt orgasmic  there was some stiffness in my neck but some stretching felt incredible and i was at ease 

at this point i was hearing strange things in music almost reminiscent of when psilocibin turned music into alien randomness  i then saw that the toroidal pillars had morphed  into hooded figures wearing capes guarding a beautiful giant gate which burst open as the music became  intense  in the center was a constantly tessalating cube of hyperbolic geometry and it kept morphing into different shapes with incredible detail i have never seen something so clear on any substance it was truly phenomenal 

the music has this very strange characteristic where some parts would shift pitch and move down an octave only to kick back up and speed up  this was super interesting to me so i wanted to see what it does to some of my favorite albums that i know very well  i started with darkside of the moon and man i could notice the differences instantly   some vocal parties were slowed down whearas others changed in pitch and it felt like my head was in a giant hall with speakers constantly moving closer and farther away while shifting it s angles  it allowed me to experience music in a totally different and unique way and felt like i could separate each layer and focus on it while simultaneously changing how it sounds to my ear   

  hrs into the experience things were slowly starting to mellow out at which point i decided to vaporize some thc concentrate as soon as i took a dab i felt my whole body vibrate reminiscent of the first stage of ego dissolution   in   mins my body felt almost completely numb this kinda freaked me out and i felt my heartrate rise faster and faster  i felt very loopy and it felt like my adrenaline kicked up  the visuals became so much more vivid and fast i was sent back to how the comeup looked  i felt incredibly dissociated and decided to meditate some more and admired the cevs and small characteristics that changed with the thc  it felt like the fractal overlay was dancing to the shpongle i had on  after another   min of being awestruck i felt another wave of euphoria hit me  

new year was in an hour and so i decided to put on one of my favorite albums of the year  slow rush tame impala  since it was a concept album about time and it was an hour long  i had first listened to the album on psilocybin back in february and it was incredibly reminscent of that with miprocin  i saw similar visions and felt incredibly euphoric with waves of nostalgia flooding my soul  at     i decided to go to the balcony and look at what s happening  the stars were incredibly clear and my visuals overlayed over them like exploding rainbows  the lyric  roll into another year  from the last song on the album perfectly matched the time as it turned   am and i was completely awestruck while looking at the fireworks light up the sky  it was by far the most euphoric i ve ever felt 

i was so satisfied after than when i returned to my room i took another dab and the dissociative quality started back up but this time it was much more comfortable  thc has an incredible synergy with this substance    hrs into the experience i was relatively back to baseline and listened to more music which was sounding normal now  i absolutely adore this research chemical and i feel like it sits right in the middle of lsd and shrooms  i highly recommend

text:
first things first  happy new year fellow humans   tl dr at the end  

let’s start at the beginning i guess  i’ve been using “classic” durgs for quite a while now  tried pretty much most of the mainstream substances out there by now   but i recently came to the conclusion that just “taking durg x to get fucked up in a social setting” doesn’t bring me anything anymore  sure  it’s fun  but the “added value” of spending hundreds of euros on substances to wake up feeling hungover and with a few hazy memories doesn’t appeal to me anymore  

until now  i have never really paid much attention to the chemistry  science and history of the substances i was taking  i’ve gotten accustomed to the effects of the substances i was taking  i know what to expect  i know the very basic science  for instance that idk  mdma increases serotonin release in your brain and inhibits reuptake   but that’s about it  

i’ve been curious to try pcp for a while now  which somewhat opened up the rabbit hole of rc’s for me  i knew they were a thing   but it always felt out of reach in a way  i couldnt just pull up to my plug and ask for some obscure rc  and i hadn’t figured out marketplaces yet   take pcp for instance  before starting my research  which is  still at its very early stage   i just thought one could simply buy a substance called just that  pcp  end of story  little did i know about the multitude of analogues out there  hell  i hardly knew know anything about analogues in general    

this has now opened up a whole new dimension for me  i have  in the meantime  finally figured out how marketplaces work   and i am now ready to start my journey  i’m looking to not only try some of these rc’s myself  but also take the time to do my own research about those chemicals before ingesting them  i want to know their history  i want to understand their chemistry  how they’re made  what are the chemical reactions inside your body once you’ve ingested them  what are they used for  what can they unlock  what are their secrets  i want to get to know these molecules from a scientific level  but also from a spiritual level  

the issue is  i am lost as where to start  it seems to me there are hundreds  if not thousands of various compounds available out there  and this is where i need your help  fellow humans  

i would be super thankful for anyone providing me with any guidance  it could be suggestions for which rc’s to use as a starting point  or any literature  books  academic papers  scientific research  pamphlets  websites  biographies etc  on these topics 

if it helps  i am looking  at least initially   at dissociatives  my favorite substance so far being keta   psychedelics  and stimulants  i have never been a fan of benzo’s or opiates  so i am not looking to dig into that rabbit hole  

thanks in advance to anyone who could help provide me some guidance for my journey  and have a blessed start of the new year  

tl dr   i am starting my journey down the rc rabbit hole  and i would be super thankful for anyone providing me with any guidance  it could be suggestions for which rc’s to use as a starting point  or any literature  books  academic papers  scientific research  pamphlets  websites  biographies etc  on these topics 
if it helps  i am looking  at least initially   at dissociatives  my favorite substance so far being keta   psychedelics  and stimulants  i have never been a fan of benzo’s or opiates  so i am not looking to dig into that rabbit hole

text:
to ring in the new year i decided today to imbibe for the first time a new addition to my disso collection    me pcp  i m a longtime fan of   meo pcp  and as such i ve been excited to try this close analogue  so as to determine how it differs from its sibling  in short  i can say with great enthusiasm that this compound is worth exploring for those of you with a proclivity for stimulating arylcyclohexylamines 

in regards to it s potency  i d say that it seems to be roughly equipotent to   meo pcp  today s trial involved two insufflations of   each  spaced   hours apart  compared with its sibling    me pcp does seem to be somewhat more caustic  with the first bump producing a rather unpleasant burning sensation  the second was more manageable  though i attribute this to reduced nociception as induced by the first bump 

as a dissociative  i d characterize   me pcp as being fairly lucid in comparison to compounds with more confusing or scattered headspaces such as   ho pcp or o pce  i was able to maintain conversations fairly easily  and would admit that this compound seems appropriate for social gatherings  especially in the     dose range   the headspace feels somewhat  fuzzy  compared to   meo pcp  however  it does maintain its sibling s manic tendencies  the somatic components of the experience are comparable with   meo pcp  being composed of feelings best expressed as numbing and cold  yet physically stimulating  as i had expected  this substance does lack the soft  dare i say   sensual   physical euphoria present in dck or dmxe  though the detached electric body buzz it produces is pleasant in its own way  while movement does feel slightly robotic  i don t feel particularly disorientated or clumsy  and certainly not sedated  

regarding stimulation  this compound seems to surpass its sibling in sheer energetic ness  the closely related   me pcpy is know to be a triple reuptake inhibitor  and i would suspect that   me pcp shares this pharmacological action    meo pcp is know to have serotonergic properties  mainly as a reuptake inhibitor  and based off the intense stimulation i ve thus experienced with   me pcp  it does indeed feel that this compound extends its sibling s reuptake inhibiting qualities to both dopamine and norepinephrine  in fact  the experience was reminiscent of past times when i ve taken   meo pcp in addition to stimulants like   mph or   fma 

overall i d say this disso seems to be worth picking up if you like   meo pcp  it differs from its sibling by offering a more excited and lucid headspace  though in regards to mania it feels slightly less  focused   and more  all over the place   if that makes any sense  in an attempt to summarize their differences  i d characterize   me pcp as a more recreational and less functional companion to   meo pcp

gt  the experience machine  “imagine a machine that could give you any experience  or sequence of experiences  you might desire  when connected to this experience machine  you can have the experience of writing a great poem or bring about world peace or loving someone and being loved in return  you can experience the felt pleasures of these things  how they “feel from the inside”  you can program your experiences for…the rest of your life  if your imagination is impoverished  you can use the library of suggestions extracted from biographies and enhanced by novelists and psychologists  you can live your fondest dreams “from the inside”  would you choose to do this for the rest of your life …upon entering you will not remember having done this  so no pleasures will get ruined by realizing they are machine produced

text:
yesterday i smoked     
 give or take  moxy freebase was laced on a small hit of cannabis  within minutes my senses are clocked into overdrive  suddenly      i m riding a elevator of anxiety to the top of tower of babylon  this persists for about   minutes  during this time of panic i fear i m on the verge of death  noticable blood pressure increases and hr  i think back on all the experiences that i ve overlooked in my life and realize my potential for greatness  i am humbled as the sands of synthetic time fly by  nearing the end of this initial anxiety phases i m overwhelmed with a sense of divinity  keep in mind visuals are bare minimum besides increased light sensitivity  at best everything looks wet in a sharp synthetic nature with minor tracers  barely perceivable  most of the effects are cognitive and physical  i have a overwhelming vibration from my head to my toes  keep in its just a hallucination i m not actually shaking like mdma  and the cognitive effects are introspective  

     leaving this phase into the post rush as i would call it  i m overwhelmed with a sense confidence  blood pressure and hr return to normal  as my anxiety evaporates it feels like something was heavy lifted off my chest  and now i can clear a path to any destiny i so choose  slightly delusional thoughts of a perfected state of wellbeing  at this point i start to get alot of muscle tension  i realize i didn t take magnesium before to reduce cramping  i prepare a cup of peppermint tea which seems to do the trick and help with anxiety  no noticeable changes to smell  by this point i ve turned on a soundcloud mix  and this is where dangerous recreational potential exists  the music enhancement is it s fucking stellar to say the least  suddenly i know i m trippin and don t just feel like i m on some cosmic spiritual journey 

     i ve literally got the urge to dance while doing the dishes  at the moment life feels like it s got unlimited potential streaming into every possible dimension of the observable universe  i can t help but feel overwelmed in emotions of all that i ve accomplished in this terrifying year  never in my life have i been able to see so many possible outcomes of my reality  metaphysics  as i rock myself into a trance of electronic music  and close my eyes visions of hyper synthetic geometric lines cascade across my inner vision  the lines and shapes represent an ancient language of mathematics  that s built on foundation of emotions   suddenly i slip away  i can t remember what happened in this state of trance but to my best knowledge it acted in a similar manner of clearing the cache file on a computer  and all the insecurities worries are cleared away 

     now i m feeling pretty lucid kinda like a synthetic mushroom trip but novel of its own  it sheds it s god like exterior  and reveals a digital paradigm  reality has a somewhat artificial texture  and this all happening in my mental perception no visuals   conceptual thoughts are easily perceived in the mind  this helps my drive as it no longer feels like i just got hit with a holy hand grenade  now i m feeling productive so i finish cleaning the kitchen  and begin dancing in the living room  life is good and god is great 😂 i m wondering why i doubted my potential  slightly delusional but not negative  

       the last portion big the trip is pretty chilled out i basically finish some school assignments while i wait for the new year s to clock down  for the rest of the day it feel likes god watches peacefully from a above  while me and devil play cards 

 conclusion  in my experience moxy has great potential for helping overcome fear trauma death i ve also found it to give me a little extra confidence  it s also helped me overcome social barriers

text:
hello r rcs 
  
after further investigation  i have discovered that both   methyl ap   and ap   are proven to be toxic  no more baseless “we know it’s toxic” based on the nasal burn or heresay  there is actual proof that these substances cause permanent damage after acute usage  i can’t source here anymore  but there’s pretty much no source that makes an exception to this rule 
  
again  i can’t source vendors  but you can dm me for further  informational only  sources on the matter  
  
here are some quotes from my findings 
  
“a consumer reported     a week of hospitalization after ingesting a novel designer drug called   methyl ap  ” 
  
“the methyl derivates of bucinnazine were later developed and even patented  however  they were tested on mice and turned out to be remarkably caustic  “slightly” toxic and leading to unusual side effects like abnormal walking  loss of posture  gasping for breath or making the mice jump around like they were mad  “motor incoordination”   depending on the dose  the animals died after between a single minute and   hours  the most common cause of death was   methyl ap   affecting  blocking  the cardio respiratory system – the animals suffocated ” 
  
“i took it orally once  a average dose  nothing crazy  i already tried it with a different vendor  but one average dose ended up almost killing me  i went in metabolic acidosis  my kidney failed  and because of the aggressive seizures  and i went rhabdomyolysis  my kidney failed too  they found me   hours after i started convulsing  so i had about a      percent chance of surviving  i had to be in the hospital for more than a week  and now i have chronic kidney damages ”
  
from what i can tell  all of these anecdotal reports are from oral use  and the fact that many people in this subreddit encourage that roa to make administration as “easygoing” as possible is  very  concerning  if anything  oral consumption is one of the worst ways you could research this compound  personally  i stuck with strictly snorting  and despite my nose being damaged and taking weeks to recover from each     day use period  i don’t seem to be suffering any permanent damage     yet  who knows  all i’m saying is this compound is not worth it for simply getting high  and i would never have believed that if i didn’t find this information  hopefully you fellow researches can see for yourself and decide that this compound is not worth it for getting high 
  
thanks for reading  stay safe r rcs

text:
first of all this was intended to be a purely   c trip and nothing else but spiralled into multi drug use  very irresponsible 

i as soon as i took the   c my vision started morphing a bit  like instantaneously  i was pretty surprised but i went on to listen to music  what followed was the most tranquil  introspective beautiful trip ever  the visuals were mild  but intricate and beautiful  greens  yellows oranges and browns 

then i said ti myself

i want to go deeper 

so i took a tab of al lad  the two mix marvellously btw  but  after   mins of effects  suddenly i felt sober  it was as if i was in the middle of a journey and got teleported home 

this is where most of what i wrote on my post yesterday happened 

so here s where my dumbass decided to take a line of ketamine  possibly too much  i really couldn t distinguish size  and take   tabs of strong acid 

and then the doors opened 

my wall in front of me disintegrated into abstraction and from behind it started appearing machines fractalised nature worlds  beings  relationships lives   

i communicated with a being in a language i didn t know

i snapped back into my room and suddenly got transported into a psychedelic desert  i was a baby  i had to learn how to walk  i had to get out of the desert  as i walked i got older  i got mad at my parents for leaving me here stranded  asi walked i got older  i was a grown up woman  i knew the desert  it was my whole life  then i found the edge  a psychedelic futuristic machine town  i was old  i died 

i m back in my room  and now i m not  i m on an operating table  i am giving birth  i m surrounded by the mist advanced   dimensional machinery  it hurts  but i know it e what i want  a baby screams 

i m in my room  it folded into itself and i m in what i can describe as the dmt waiting room  the colours changed  they werent greens browns and yellows and oranges  they were purple  golden  there were faces everywhere and repeating totems depicting people in every stage of life  the waiting room opened and i got hugged    by a being  she loved me  we had sex

i m back in my room  something is wrong  all my things are on the floor and there s liquid everywhere  i m naked  i m like holy fucking shit did i break everything  i take a benzo 

i woke up   minutes ago writing this 

my room is not a mess and i was not naked  nothing bad happened but if i hadn t taken the benzo i d have flown much further 

this is an experience i absolutely shpuld experience

there s so much more that happened  i can t remember it all  i might edit things as i remember them

text:
dmxe vaped report

so dxme came in yesterday and i never tried vaping dissos so i tried it for shits and giggles  well it was fucking great and i wanna tell y’all about it  for reverence my doses were       and   in   doses over   hours  

it was hands down the most enjoyable and mellow disso experience i’ve ever had  to me all dissos have an edginess to them that i thought was just unavoidable  but dxme had none of it  i did have an fairly elevated heart rate but it didn’t bother me in the least  until i tried going to sleep  then it was really annoying   physically it made my body feel like a sack of bricks  it’s the most sedated i’ve ever felt from a disso  more so than nitrous  

so overall  dmxe vaped has been the most sedating  most relaxing  most relaxing disso experience i’ve had  

worth mentioning though is the fact that it didn’t really feel specifically hallucinogenic  it felt mostly disconnective and stoning  maybe that might not be the case with a different roa and a diff dose  next time i take this stuff i’m gonna try with a diff roa  vaping it would probably be amazing if i was on psychedelics  but in general i’m not that enthused about vaping this stuff because the peak fizzles out in a matter of     minutes  i can see this being a real problem for disso fiends  

so tldr  vaped dmxe gave a super short  super sedating and relaxing dissociation  with minimal hallucination  i suggest trying a different roa  vaped isn’t wasteful per say  but it might not be a good reference for the effects of this drug

text:
i ve sat around too long trying to improve my life wothout actually doing anything  my happiness is sporadic and when my so isn t around  my default mood is just meh  i don t take as much pleasure in the things that made me happy  now i do them out of habit  i potentially have adhd and ocd so maybe that would explain it 

my biggest issue by far is anxiety though  i don t really go out much anymore  i m lonely  i would love to interact more with people if only my brain would stop thinking about how i ll fuck it up  essentially i can still shop for food  go to the gym  and catch up with a friend or   but by the end of it all  i feel pretty damn drained 

i know there s no wonder drug that will magically fix all this  and i know self improvement combined with drugs is better than just the latter  but i need something to give me that shift in mentality  to stop putting this aside and stop these months slipping right through my fingers  my biggest issue is my anxiety  i have hashimoto s but my tsh levels are unaffected  frequent weed smoker  occasional psychs dissos stims  lets say once a month   tried meth once  overamped and it feels like i ve went downhill since  or i ve made myself believe that  either way  not touching that again 

tl dr  looking for a something with main focus on reducing anxiety  and increasing mood memory  which won t have a significant effect on blood pressure   uk

text:
this is my third trip  wanted to recreate my first   experience which was pure joy  i literally haven t been that happy for years  my second trip was   and great but i figured the extra half tab wasn t worth it  now i m     hours in and the trip is just lousy  hands shaking  always too cold or too hot  hungry but can t eat  can t get comfortable  not a bad trip exactly  nothing frightening or anything like that but not enjoyable either  

then  i had an exchange with a fellow researcher here on the sub and he was like  don t tell people it only lasts   hours  i was tripping for    on   tabs   for reference i was total baseline for each trip  no tolerance  anyone else want to weigh in with their experiences  lot   if that means anything  al lad on one side and the molecule printed on the other  thanks for reading

text: took about   hours to kick in for me  extra big tabs  it was   years ago  all white  sold as lsd  way different kinda trip than any lysergemide or mushroom or nbome  also sold as lsd  i never knew about testing your stuff back when i was running wild back then  plus i think it was less common knowledge of rc s and we mostly thought there were only so many different substances out there  i thought it was bunk so i went home to take the rest  i took   hits i was gonna take the other   lol  when i got home my dogs tongue rolled across the ground   much different than any other hallucination i d seen up to that point  i decided not to take the rest but i was young and wild  i didn t come all the way home for nothing  so i took one more  went back down to the river  tripped a crazy fucking trip   went back home  girlfriend came home  why was i still tripping  played it cool all day  said i went to the river and bumped my head  was tired from work too  that night i could hear monkeys and jungle animals coming from the sound of my fan at night  i tripped about   something hours  hard  it was a much different type of feeling than any lysergemide or tryptamine i had ever experienced  the body high was a little extra euphoric and i was extra stimulated the whole time  and ya took about         hours to kick in  next time i took what i had left and it was shark week   watched some national geographic and a great white shark jumped out of the tv  made a devastating kill in front of me  i was loving it but kinda scared  like i said it was so different  unlike any type of hallucination i have ever seen in my life before during or since  found out later the indeed was not what it was sold as and that s how i learned about the d o x chemicals  all in all good times  know what you re in for  how fucking long it lasts   and know you can od and die on it  glad i had those experiences though  gave me insights into spirituality and life that i still carry with me today  life changing  could have been life ruining if it went bad though  it was beautiful
